title: Unpleasant surprise
review: A very nice, cozy hotel in the middle of Florence. Great rooms, service. Very good breakfast  Unfortunately - internet connection is very slow and erratic - They failed to communicate effectively that their spa was under renovations when I made the reservation. So, upon arrival this came as unexpected bad news. Staff claimed that they informed Expedia... but not to my knowledge

title: Lovely Hotel, Staff & Great Location !
review: Just had a delightful stay at this lovely boutique hotel. Excellent location in the heart of Florence yet tucked away and quiet. All the main tourist sites are very close. Lovely staff in reception, restaurant and the porters. Nice breakfasts and very good spa also. Well worth it.

title: Very well location
review: Dear RJDBP17,  We would like to thank you for your lovely review. We love our job and we wish to grant a nice experience in Florence to all our guests. We are very happy we have lived up to your expectations and we look forward to welcoming you again!  Please do not hesitate to contact us for your next stop in Florence.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Exceptional Weekend at The Golden Tower
review: It's a wonderful hotel in the heart of the city. The staff is very friendly, the rooms very confortable. It has a spa. Very good clean. The breakfast is a good choice. They have a happy hour at 18 h with Prosseco. We love it.

title: Honeymoon and visit with daughter
review: Dear Cristina V,  We are very happy to read that you appreciated our Hotel, the location, the services, and the Prosecco. We hope to welcome you again and we also hope to gain 5 points for your next stay!  Best wishes,  Elisa Costoli

title: Beautiful, historic hotel in a perfect location
review: Everything about this hotel was wonderful, but nothing more so than the staff! We’ve never felt so genuinely welcomed and valued as we did here. Breakfast was delicious and the happy hour was very nice. Bathroom was the best of anywhere we stayed on our vacation. Comfortable king-sized bed. As great everything was, our best memories will be of the incredibly warm staff. STAY HERE! You’ll be glad you did.

title: The best possible location
review: Dear Kenneth A,  Thank you for a such Wonderful review! Thank you of highlighting professionalism, attentiveness of our warm staff,  which is surely one of our best features togheter with the great location.  Yours satisfactions means a lot to us and it will encourage us to keep up with our hard work aimed to provide a superior customer service to all our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you again for your next stay in Florence!  Warm regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Video Review of the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa - My rating is 5 of 5. Read why.
review: Excellent service, comfortable room, very good breakfast, nice spa facilities ( but where is the damned button to make the jacuzzi function?),......... but the best is of course the location. Walking distance from all the historical buildings, the shopping district and the ponte Vecchio.

title: Absolutely perfect in every single way
review: Dear 459marcd,  Thank you for taking the time to post your kind review. We are delighted to hear that everything was to your liking and that you enjoyed a pleasant stay. Our location is perfect for whom wish to stay in a central position and also looking for a relax moment in our Spa. We recently did some rennovations in the Spa and all our guests have it for free. We hope to welcoming you soon agian and we will show you the Jacuzzi Button personally!   Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: excellent boutique hotel
review: I made a high-quality video review of the Golden Tower. You can check it out on my YouTube channel, High Standard Vacations. I talk about the hotel and the surrounding area.  The Golden Tower Hotel and Spa in Florence is located in an authentic historical building. The same building that housed the powerful Strozzi Family. The hotel is centrally located and only a few minute walk from the Uffizi and other attractions.  The rooms have a classic elegance to them and are very cozy with details dipped in gold. I loved their turndown service here. They set the lighting,  make up the bed, put chocolates on your pillow, candy and a bottle of water on the nightstand. The hotel has a restaurant and spa. Something to note. The spa was under construction when I was there however it will be…

title: Best Combination of Service and Location
review: Just delightful.  Staff speaks and understands English very well. Most helpful in advising and arranging restaurant reservations.  Hard to imagine that there is another hotel that combines central location and service.

title: Florence holiday of a lifetime
review: Dear Joel K,  Thank you so much for choosing us again for your stay in Florence, is always a pleasure to have you as guest.  We really hope to see you soon, Best regards  Elisa Costoli

title: Heaven in Firenze
review: This is a remarkable five star hotel situated right in the centre of Florence Close to all the beautiful museums and superb shops. Facilities in the hotel are superb. Reception staff are so friendly and the dining room is a delight with excellent food at breakfast and dinner. Although the spa was out of use due to renovation, this did not spoil our four night break in anyway. Our room was spacious and extremely comfortable And extremely quiet. As a boutique hotel there are only 27 rooms but the standard throughout is impeccable and we would definitely return in the future. We cannot wait

title: Truly Extraordinary
review: Dear Nicholas S,  We are thrilled to read your review. Thank you very much for your nice words spend for us.  We are so happy to know that you really appreciated our Staff, services and the Hotel itself. We always try our best to grant a wonderful time to all our guests and we feel proud when we got it!  We really look forward to welcoming you back and please do not hesitate to contac us to organize your next stop in Florence!  Best wishes,  Elisa Costoli

title: First class hotel
review: Elegantly furnished room. Provided a complimentary delicious cheese and bottle of wine tray on our arrival. Great location near all the museums and within walking distance of train station. Front desk very helpful. Would definitely stay at Golden Tower again.

title: Poor Customer Satisfaction
review: We selected this property and used cc points to secure/pay for our reservation. Two days later we needed to change the dates to the following week and they would not change the dates.  Our credit card company said they had never had a property refuse to change the date and transfer the points to the new dates.. So they kept the original reservation and all the points and we had to pay out of pocket. Poor taste in our mouth. Would not go back due to the fact that they obviously don’t care about customer satisfaction.

title: Loved Golden Tower!
review: Dear Patricia M,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry for not reading anything about your recent stay in our Hotel. We hope it has been satisfied! Regarding the matter you mentioned we would like to clarify that we do not have agreement with any credit card company for the payment by points. We received the reservation through one of our partner done on a Not Refundable basis. After 10 days the reservation was made, we received the request to amend it and we informed that the reservation would have been in penalty as per not refundable policy. We never received the cancellation of the reservation but we received the confirmation of one more reservation for you.  We believe that there was a miscommunication with the company you booked through because we do not have any fault if they did not recognize you the right to use the points.  We hope you will give us one more chance and please do not hesitate to contact us to find the best solution for your next stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Location location
review: I stayed here with a friend during our visit to Florence. The location is perfect - in city center but a few blocks away from the throngs of crowds. The staff was warm, professional and extremely helpful. Room very clean, comfortable and thoroughly updated. We especially  enjoyed Faby’s cocktail concoctions in the bar/restaurant - unique, beautifully presented and tasty!

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Dear goanytime2016,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind words about us. We are really happy that you appreciated the special flair of our amazing bartender Fabiola, she is the best! Our location, staff and room cleaning are our strongest point, and we are glad you noticed.  We hope to see you and your friend soon, Best regards  Elisa Costoli

title: Nice hotel, but not great
review: When you first enter the hotel you question the 5 stars and the use of the word Luxury.  You have to remember this hotel is right in the middle of old Florence and does not have the option to spread itself producing large open foyer etc.  The limited space available to the hotel is well used and the staff are truly excellent. From the front desk crew to the housekeeping girls everyone has commitment and competency. The room was always cleaned and stocked twice a day. Unfortunately the Spa was undergoing emergency repairs and therefore out of use. End result a room upgrade. Thanks. I would highly recommend this hotel because if its staff and location. A very enjoyable stay

title: Boutique Hotel
review: Located in the old city, the hotel is very close to the popular scenic spots. There are not many hotel rooms, but they are well-equipped, clean and tidy. The staff are very friendly and nice. Florence has a strong literary and artistic atmosphere. It is worth visiting many times and will stay in the hotel next time.

title: Nice hotel in central Florence but certain issues
review: Dear wilm0tt,  All our Staff wish to thank you for your 5 points review. Florence is magic and we are happy you have been bewithed from Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  We look forward to welcoming you again ad we remain at your full disposal,  Warm regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: best keot secret
review: This hotel confused us.  It brands itself (and prices accordingly) as a luxury hotel.  But then it does silly things, such as hangers in the closet that are not the independent hangers that can be removed to hang clothes on, but rather the type of hanger found in a Holiday Inn/Best Western-type hotel that are attached to rings on the closet rod, so that supposedly one cannot steal the hanger I guess.  These are VERY frustrating types of hangers to use, and certainly not what is offered in other luxury hotels costing approximately 400 Euros a night - come on Golden Tower, get with the program!  The hotel also uses annoying key cards that must be "plugged" into a wall slot while in your room - to control the lights for electricity usage.  Again, a cheap hassle for this expensive a…

title: 4.5 stars
review: Dear Craig-in-TO,  First of all we would like to thank you for taking time in reviewing our Hotel. We are very sorry that your stay was not complitely enjoyable beacuse of the issues you mentioned, and we are even more sorry that you did not inform about them our staff during your stay. All our Staff would have been happy to assist you and find some solutions to make your stay more comfortable, as we wish to explain below:  In all our 27 rooms we have both, fixed and standard, hangers. If you would have told us about your preference, we would have given you some more standard hangers.  We use a technologic system for doors and lights which ensure you a safety stay respect to the metallic key in case of loosing, but also in this case we could have given the key and left the card inside the room for the lights;  Our toiletries amenties, by Etro, are:  a cake of soap, liquid soap, shampoo, shower gel, hair conditionar and body lotion. Also in tis case, if would have told us about your preference in using only cake of soap instead of the other product, we would have been happy to provide you more of  them.  If you do wish to perhaps consider giving us another chance then we would be more than happy to take care of your reservation to ensure you have a most comfortable stay.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: 30th anniversary from canada
review: priced perfectly for this small hotel - new chief makes great meals -  caring staff and lovely newly refurbished rooms . location says it all.  close to david and so many side shops, restaurants and interesting crafts vendors

title: Firenze
review: Great hotel, impeccable service, great location, staff went the extra mile to make our stay the best, would go back in a heartbeat. All the best sites in Florence are in walking distance, as are many restaurants.

title: Great location in proximity to sites, but quiet.
review: Dear MMO558,  First of all we would liket to thank you for your wonderful review. We always try our best to ensure a fantastic stay in our Hotel and we feel very proud to know you have been successful.  We hope to welcoming you again and we remain at your full dispsoal,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Excellent city break
review: The level of service was the standout quality of this hotel.  They answered every question and handled any inquiry they could for us.  The cleanliness of the common areas and rooms was exemplary and the breakfast was a terrific way to start the day.

title: Perfect Spot
review: Dear gcstrub,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. We are very  happy to read that we were able to grant you a good service and you appreciated our breakfast.  We hope to welcoming you again for your next stop in Florence and please do not hesitate to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Unexpected gem
review: We had a great city break in this boutique hotel which is right in the middle of the town close to all historical places and all the shops. Very professional and friendly staff made us feel very welcomed. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend the hotel!

title: The Proposal Weekend
review: This 5 star hotel is beautifully decorated and right in the centre of Florence a short walk from the train station; Very convenient. I'd asked for the best room they had for my proposal weekend and whilst the room was lovely, the hotel did not go out of their way to help me do anything special.  Breakfast was adequate but disappointing that I was going to be charged for requesting more than one poached egg despite the menu saying "poached eggs".  Are they really concerned about the cost of an egg given the price of the stay and their 5 star rating??  The spa facilities and massages were great and a nice rest bite from the heat.  Overall a great little place to stay but frustrating on some of the little details they shouldn't be concerned with.

title: Fantastic luxury hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Dear ImLostAbroad,  Thank you for your your review. We are very happy to know that you appreciated our Hotel and our Spa facility, but we are very sorry to hear we did not fully met your expectations.  We would like to specify that we always try to do our best in order to satisfy our guest's request, but unfortunately we did not have upper category room available for your entire stay. Our Buffet breakfast is free of charge respect to many other 5 star hotels, and we also offer a Menu for express plate which is also free for the first order. Anyhow, we take very good note of your comments to improve our service. We will continue to work very hard in order to offer our guests the best possible service.  We hope to welcoming you again,  All our Best,  Elisa Costoli

title: Unforgettable stay
review: My wife and I stayed in the jacuzzi suite and were absolute blown away by this hotel. From the moment we arrived, we were taken aback by the high level of service and helpfulness of the staff. The room itself was better than advertised and provided an excellent place to relax after our days in Florence. Situated in the center of the city, this hotel/spa provides easy walking access to restaurants, shopping and the train station. We were incredibly happy with both the hotel itself, as well as the people. My only regret is that I did not stay long enough to enjoy the spa. I would highly recommend to anyone visiting Florence.

title: Amazing Hotel just perfect for Florence
review: Dear ramseycj80,  thanky ou very much for your lovely feedeback. We feel very proud in reading your review since we were able to meet your expactaction and you had a " fantastic" stay with us. We hope to welcoming you soon again!  All our Best,  Elisa Costoli

title: Highly recommended
review: This must be the best boutique hotel in Florence by a long way. Service was way beyond expectations even for a 5 star hotel - and really personalised - like a first class flight!  Every single staff member from front desk, restaurant and luggage assistants were efficient, highly trained and warm and friendly. Andrea and Catalina at front desk took special trouble to return a lost item to us which we highly appreciated.   Spa was also quite fantastic and included in the stay. Breakfasts were absolutely superb - included even delicious eggs benedict,  and porridge was customised according to our tastes. Great vegetarian options, we enjoyed dinner here a couple of times.  In short you will never forget a stay here - the only place I would return to in beautiful Florence. Amazing…

title: Great place to stay in Florence
review: Spent 5 nights here with my wife for our 20th anniversary, it was great in all aspects.  Great room size, very helpful staff, great breakfast.  The location could not be better to see the sights of Florence.

title: Superb Very Special Hotel
review: Dear ABQJDZ,  Thank you for spending time in reviewing our Hotel. We are very proud to have been chosen for your special occasion! We hope to welcoming you again soon ad we remain at your full disposal,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Best of The Best
review: Wow. Could not have asked for a better place to celebrate the 60th birthday of my wife with the family. The location is perfect within a few minutes of the major piazzas and sites of Florence but in a quiet street.  Check-in was very welcoming and quick and our cases were in the room before us. We had three rooms and each was unique. Very pleasantly decorated with good facilities, A/C and a decent shower.   The hotel has many interesting objects of art and a lovely lounge. The restaurant felt intimate and you were made to feel very special.  There was a good choice  at breakfast. We also had booked the celebration dinner at the Restaurant  There was plenty of choice on the a la carte menu and the food and service was second to none. There is also a  good spa    All staff were…

title: Great hotel and location
review: Dear surrey1871,  We would like to to thank you for describe our Hotel as " Special " We always try our best in order to guarantee a memorable stay to all our guests and we feel very proud when we succeed. All our staff have been happy to assist you and we hope to do it again soon.  Please do not hesitate to contact us back for your next stop in Florence.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Pat Strangio
review: Best place we stayed at in our entire trip. Staff was Wonderful and helpful. Breakfast was amazing. Spa service was very nice and refreshing. Our two rooms were awesome. I would pay extra and get the double bed room with the staircase leading up. It was so lovely. Charming. I would go back and stay there again in a heartbeat.

title: Impeccable Service
review: We stayed the weekend at the Golden Tower and we had an amazing experience. From the front desk to the drinks at the bar! When we checked in we were welcomed by Alessio and Andrea and had such a quick check in and they both speak good English and easy to understand. Once we checked in and walked around Florence we decided to go back in for a drink, once we set down we were greeted by one of the best bartender Fabuola. She offered us some drinks, and we decided to just have her make us whatever she wanted. My uncle told her what he alcohol he likes and what mixes and she created MAGIC!!!!!! I have had many drinks around America at some of the best restaurants and hotels, and I never had anything as such. Her drinks were not too strong or too weak, but they were just right. Once…

title: Beautiful hotel in the perfect location
review: Dear Rita0101,  We are absolutely amazed by the words you had for our hotel and our staff, we don't even know where to start thanking you!!  We truly love what we do, and we try to show our passion in every way, and when we receice feedback like your, we feel very proud of our work. Alessio, Andrea and Fabiola are sincerely happy to hear that their cordial welcome and drinks have been so appreciated, and we all are as it shows our love and passion for what we do.  It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Golden Tower Hotel & Spa
review: We loved everything about this hotel. Very friendly and helpful staff, spacious comfortable room, delicious breakfast. Loved the special touch of the Prosecco and strawberries sent to our room as well as the diffuser.

title: Best hotel
review: Dear Melissa S,  Thank you very much for your review, Perfect and concise!! We are so happy to know your stay with us was so pleasant and enjoyable.   We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for another unforgettable stay with us!   Kindest regards   Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Nice confortable hotel in the centre of Florence
review: Matilde at the front desk made our stay at the hotel magnificent. She went above and beyond to help us to navigate through our short stays to be pleasant and we want to come back to the hotel next time. Although we couldn’t use the spa after a long hot day in Florence due to mechanical issues, it was duly open on the following day. It was a pleasant surprise to have found a hotel where staff members were caring and kind professionals.

title: Great place to stay in Florence
review: OK, forget the other reviews..here is the true scoop!! This is a great hotel in a great location...Have been to Florence about 10 times and this hotel was the best...First, location is central Florence about a 10 minute walk to all the major sites....No problem!!!...Reception is very helpful and check in was pretty quick.... The rooms are really nice with great air conditioning....It was hot, and this helped... Nice size and QUIET!!! for being in central Florence....Bed was comfortable and I believe the bathroom was marble...shower was a little wierd...a separate spray that could not be adjusted....but it worked!...Not alot of shelf space but it was enough.... A nice feature that I have never experienced before....You can take anything in the minibar for free and they just…

title: Best hotel in Florence!
review: Dear sak01,  thank you so much for your fantastic review and believe us, to be considered the best Hotel in Florence you have stayed is an honour and make us very proud of our job. Florence is indeed and wonderful city and our location is perfect for the guest that love to be central and explore the city but still enjoy some peace and relax.  We are so glad to hear you spent wonderful time with us and for emphasize our buffet breakfast even if it is not so large it contains high quality products as you mentioned. We would like to underline also the our Breakfast is included, while in all 5 star hotel you have to pay for.   As you did not use the Spa and tried any treatments, it is a good excuse to come back and we will be really happy to welcome you.   Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful stay— highly recommend
review: This was one of the best hotels I have stayed in. Beautiful rooms, very friendly staff, amazing breakfast buffet, perfect location to everything, incredible spa. Highly recommend and would definitely go back!!

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear Waccurso,  We thank you very much for your comment and we are very happy we have been one of the best hotel you stayed in. What we simply do is to render more plesant possible the stay of our Guest,and we feel very proud when we got it. We hope to welcoming you back in the next future,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Luxury Hotel in the Heart of Florence
review: The Golden Tower Hotel was wonderful!! Great location, excellent service, very clean and quiet rooms in a beautiful city!! We stayed at Golden Tower for 4 days and the people at the hotel were so helpful and pleasant. The breakfast was great —- loved the omelette!!!

title: Luxury in Florence
review: Just returned from our Italy trip and Golden Tower was by far our favorite hotel. Great location, front desk was staff was always courteous and helpful with recommendations and assistance. Breakfast and evening appetizers included and always a variety. Our room was spacious and clean with luxury touches. We didn't get a chance to use the spa, but we will definitely be back.

title: Fantastic stay at the Golden Tower
review: Dear nirits2016,  We are so proud to know we have been your favorite Hotel in Italy! We always try our best in order to assist our guests to guarantee them a wondeful experience in our beautiful Florence. We also take care of cleaness, thank to the excellent job of our room division departement We hope to welcome you again,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Small, luxury hotel in the heart of Florence
review: My wife and I had an amazing time at the Golden Tower. The staff was extremely hospitable and went above and beyond to make sure that we were taken care of. The food was great, people were nice, and room was clean! Cannot say enough about how amazing our time was staying there.

title: May in Florence
review: Dear Maccurso,   Thank you for your amazing review! We have been very happy to host you and we look forward to welcoming you for your next stop in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Excellent service!
review: A luxury hotel with a lot of charm, the Golden Tower is located in the heart of historic Florence. I couldn’t have asked for a nicer room. The hotel goes out of its way to introduce the traveler to the city with a nice folder full of recommendations.  I didn’t try the spa but it looked to be excellent.

title: Great Florence hotel
review: This was a great hotel with a large bedroom, sitting room and bathroom.  Everyone was very nice and the location was convenient to all the activities we were interested in. Our travel agent made the arrangements so we didn’t know what we would get.  Super nice!

title: Best Hotel in Florence
review: Dear Julie S,  Thank you very mush for your kind words.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you appreciated our location, we really are in the main city centre of Florence.  We really hope to welcome you back soon, Best regards

title: Honeymoon stay
review: This hotel is top notch.   The staff are rated a 10!  They were a pleasure and very helpful.   The hotel restaurant is delicious for breakfast and dinner (I recommend the ravioli) and the room comfort was also a 10.    I can't recommend this hotel enough.  P.S.   The location was PERFECT!

title: Perfect Boutique hotel experience, and a great spa!
review: Dear LinguineLover,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review.  We are happy to hear that you enjoed our Ravioli in the restaurant, we work relly hard every day to find the best products for our restaurant and breakfast.  All the staff is glad to hear your kind words.  Best regards

title: Excellent Hotel in centre of Florence
review: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for our honeymoon to Florence and it couldn’t have been better. Our room was lovely and bright, and the mini bar being included was a nice touch, as was the bottle of water and biscotti left each night at turn down.  We also really enjoyed the “happy hour” in the evening where a glass of Prosecco was provided and some tasty snacks too. Breakfast too was very good.  The spa facilities were wonderful, my husband and I made good use of the jacuzzi and steam rooms.  Service was brilliant, all in all one of the nicest hotels I’ve stayed at.

title: More than a 5* Hotel!
review: I dare you to find a better Hotel in Florence for a Luxury stay within walking distance of all the major sites. Mobile in room available for free use for stay even for calls o/s & within Europe. Luxury Twin Room huge, had 2 dble beds (travelled with Mother) with free ample supplies in snacks & drinks in Mini Bar. The map supplied by Reception was invaluable in planning our day trips without getting lost. Breakfast variety ample, complimentary Proseco or other drink plus nibbles a nightly bonus. Honestly can't fault our stay in any way. 10 stars in my opinion.

title: Great Boutique in Downtown Firenze
review: Dear barbaraa572015,  Your review is simply faboulos! All the Staff thank you very much for spending your time in sharing your experience in tripadvisor. The Golden Tower Hotel has 11 different type of rooms and our Luxury twin rooms have two french beds of 140 cm in width each one. They are very comfortable and their mattress are Heavenly bed certificated. Booking one of our Deluxe room to upper level, guests also have free drinks and snacks from minibar, that we refill everyday once per day. Our Breakfast has been revisited lately in order to improve our service and thank you for your feedback.  We look forward to hearing from you soon for your next stop in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli  Elisa Costoli

title: Excelent option in Florence
review: Lobby is small but elegant. Staff is overly zealous but quite courteous. All of them are polite and very helpful. Rooms are of good size and very clean. Bathrooms are large and neat. Daily breakfast is abundant and quite tasty with a lot of varieties to please all needs. Last but not the least, nothing beats it’s location, which is close to everything. Great restaurants, nice shopping spots, museums and even the train station are all within short walking distance.

title: Great stay and amazing staff!
review: Dear Getaway34386091301,  Thank you very much for taking time in writing your short but detailed review. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is a Boutique Hotel of only 27 rooms and we always try to personalize our service accordingly to our guests needs. We wish our guests to have an unique experience in Florence because we believe everybody deserve it. We are happy you appreciate our Staff and services and we hope to welcome you again.  Warm regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Florence at it’s finest
review: Amazing rate cost-benefit. Excelent location, very comfortable rooms, great tema (a star to Andrea form the reception, extremely nice and efficient). Small spa but good facilities. Great place to stay.

title: Great discovery after all this time...
review: We stay twice a year in Florence for a speedy Business trip, and have done for the past three decades. We are thrilled to have found Golden Tower Hotel.  We have stayed in the best in Florence both old school and modern luxury yet the Golden Towers provides something unique. Great location, great team, comfortable rooms and bathrooms. Great breakfast and lounge services..a little bit of “Home” away from home... We will return. Excellent value.

title: Great location
review: Dear Daydream27820135621,  Thank you very much for your " great " review. Your defination of our Hotel as "Home" is the best compliment you could have done.  We take care of our guests and we wish to gift them a wonderful stay in a familiar Hotel. We look forward to welcoming you agian soon,  Warm regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Superb service
review: Got the deluxe room, nice spacious room with comfy bed, minibar is included in the deluxe so it was a nice addon and they have a good range to pick from including bottles of beer. Nice bathroom. Also got a bottle of prosecco and some treats as we were celebrating our anniversary. View on to the street, with sounds of Florence, no loud noise too early or too late though. A great addition was the handy phone they provide, the first time we have seen this at a hotel, makes navigating around so much easier as it has unlimited local Internet and free calls.  Got a free aperitif with our Expedia booking which included some snacks and glass of prosecco/soft drink everyday, another welcome addition. Breakfast was a drawback for the hotel, I would say below par for a five star, very…

title: Great Hotel, Great Location
review: Dear mitzfcb,  Thank you for your detailed review. We are happy to understand that you appreciated our service and you had a great time for your Anniversary! As you kindly described we have 11 different category of rooms and all have free access to our Golden Spa and also breakfast included. Booking from a Deluxe room also minibar is included and we refill it every day, once per day. We are located in the city center,  in a pedestrian aerea, and our sound proof window ensure all our guest a comfortable sleep and relax.  We hope to welcoming you again for your next anniversary and we remain at your full disposal,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Thank you!
review: We stayed here for 5 nights and found the hotel excellent, really comfortable rooms, a lovely Spa.  What made the hotel stand out though was the superb service from every single member of staff.   Nothing was too much trouble.  We loved it

title: Ideal spot for a weekend
review: Very well located hotel, couldn't be better I think. Really at the center of town, everything was in walkable distance, museums, various bridges, cathedrals, restaurants, shops. We enjoyed our stay very much, the staff was very helpful and caring. Special thanks to Andrea who's been really kind and professional. The spa was not the main purpose of the trip but it was nice to enjoy it at our arrival to relax. Sauna, steam room and jacuzzi, everything was spot on. Rooms were well good for the short amount of time you spend in it, comfy beds and clean bathrooms. We'll definitely be back to Florence and likely to be in the same hotel :).

title: Golden Tower Hotel and Spa
review: Dear imantho,  Thank you so much for your review. As you said, The Golden Tower Hotel is ideally located with only a 5-10 minute walk to all the major sites: Ponte Vecchio, Uffizi, Palazzo Vecchio, Duomo but also shops and resturants  Thanks for the words spent for our staff, we are glad to know that you appreciated our service.  It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again when you will be back in Florence.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Cosy hotel in old center
review: We so enjoyed our stay at the Golden Tower. The room was lovely and located in a great spot within walking distance of the train station, restaurants and sights. The service though is the best part of this property. We were greeted every time we walked anywhere in the public spaces. The bartender (Fabiana) was knowledgeable and friendly. I will definitely stay here again if I go to Florence!

title: The hotel location is remarkable
review: Dear constanttraveller63,  We are happy you had a wonderful time with us at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. We thank you for your fantastic review and we look forward to wlecoming you again for your next trip in Florence.  Please feel free to contact us !  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Really nice hotel. Perfect place after long day trips and specially in winter in case of colder weather to have some spa treatment. Friendly and helpful stuff. Everything is really close. Very good breakfast. Certainly coming back if in Firenze.

title: Great location
review: I really appreciated my stay at Golden Tower Hotel, the team are great, they are very polite and make you feel like you are home. And the best thing about the hotel it is the location, you could walk everywhere, all of the touristic attractions are close. Unfortunately I didn’t have time to try the Spa

title: Best hotel in Florence
review: Dear Lucy A,  Thank you very much for taking time in writing your review. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is located in Piazza Strozzi in a pedestrian area, very quiet, but also very near to all the attractions, such as Duomo complex, Uffizi Gallery, Repubblic Square but next to the best brands ' shops: Luis Vuitton, Loro Piana, Cotton of Florence, Gucci ect... A " Great Location" for a great experience in Florence!  We hope to welcoming you again and so you can try also our Spa! Please do not hesitate to contact us,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: An example of excellence
review: This 5 star hotel offers an amazing time in Florence. This hotel was walking distance from so many good restaurants and tourist sites. A luxury breakfast every day and easy to get out and walk around. The beds are very comfortable and the room offers a luxury stay. The gourmet coffee and tea will cure your thirst if you don't want to leave your room. In general, this is the best hotel for a perfect trip to Florence.

title: Perfect Service and Location
review: Dear  Escape39353951980,  First of all we would like to tank you for taking time in writing your review. We are very honoured to be reviewed as the " Best Hotel in Florence" from you and we hope to welcoming you soon again!  Please do not hesitate to contact us directly,  best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Amazing location and service
review: Everything about this hotel is wonderful : location - it's in walking distance from almost all sites; building - incorporates 15C tower; design - elegant; special words about the staff - very friendly, helpful, excellent room servicing; delicious authentic food served by caring people. We are definitely staying there again when back in Florence.

title: Always amazing!
review: I have been lucky enough to stay here a couple times and it is always amazing.  The location is great and coming back in the evenings to canapes and wine included is such a great perk!  The spa facilities are fantastic after a long day of walking around, and the staff is first class every time.

title: Impeccable service and fabulous location
review: Dear Jennyware,  Thank you so much for spending some time to write a reviw! It was a pleasure to have you with us for the second time.  We are reallly happy that you enjoyed our Happy Hour, that is always available from 6:3 pm until 8:3 pm with prosecco and little canapes. Thank you for mentioning our Spa and the staff.  We are convinced that also the smaller thing, in this job, matter!  We hope to have you as guest for the third time soon, Best regards

title: Perfect
review: My husband and I really enjoyed Golden Tower Hotel.  The service was impeccable and the rooms were nice and comfy. We also had great massages in the spa and enjoyed using the sauna room/hot tub each evening after long days of walking the city. Highly recommend.

title: Fab! Fab! Fab!
review: Thank you very much for sharing your experience in tripadvisor. Your review makes us feel very proud of our work and give us the good energy to keep doing always better. Our Spa and Beauty Center are our gems and we are happy you had the opportunuty to enjoy them!  We hope to welcvoming you again for your next stop in Florence nd please feel free to contact us,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli

title: Perfect location
review: Stayed here on our last Visit to Florence, even better on our return. Perfectly positioned for the sights, great food and drink, excellent and friendly staff, lovely rooms, one of the best 5* I have stayed in

title: Wonderful personal service!
review: The golden tower is beautiful every aspect of it is sparkling clean wonderful service and a small cozy boutique atmosphere. The morning brunch is excellent cappuccino is amazing and Fabrilo a great sommelier! It was a wonderful ambience and experience!

title: Perfect location, top service, but it's a small structure
review: Dear cascade4747,  thank you for taking time to share your experience at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  We are happy to know that you appreciated the Hotel, our service and above all our Cappucino.  Please, contact us directly if you are planning another holiday in Florence, will be a pleasure to have the chance to welcome you back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.   Kindest regards Sara Carniel - front Office Manager

title: perfect!!!!!!!!
review: For my long weekend in Florence, I chose Golden Tower Hotel 5 star in city center. Hotel is perfectly located in Piazza Strozzi in the real heart of the old city. Structure is an old building refurbished in 5 star Hotel. I booked a Junior Suite: surface 25 sqm, two levels, one bathroom, 2 TV Set. Overall my experience has been very positive: client service was perfect, room and location at 5 stars level. To be reviewed breakfast, too poor for a 5 stars. Obviously you're in an ancient building so you can't aspect to have all facilities which usually a 5 stars hotel have but client service composed this lack.

title: So So
review: Dear zedaluva,  thank you so much for your perfect location. As mentioned, our hotel is ideally situated with only a 5-10 minute walk to all the major sites: Ponte Vecchio, Uffizi, Palazzo Vecchio, Santa Maria del Fiore and the many Piazza, including Piazza della Signoria. The Palace where the Golden Tower is located was the first residence of the Strozzi family, one of the most important families of the Renaissance.   Regarding the Breakfast we are working hard in order to improve it. In addition to the buffet, that offers various products of the highest quality, there is a menu with a choice of dishes freshly prepared.  Thanks for the words spent for our staff, we are glad to know that you appreciated our service.  It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Hotel (and tour guide in Florence)
review: perfect hotel with perfect service in a perfect location!!!!! Very good breakfast with many choices. We had a special upgraded for our room and we love it.!!!!! The location is the most popular in historical center and all you must see is near!!!!

title: Best hotel if entire Italy adventure!
review: The golden tower surpassed our expectations everyday. The room was magnificent,  comfortable and had every luxury you would ever want or need. I sincerely appreciated the in room expresso machine,  what a delight. The bathroom was huge and we felt like royalty just being in room.  The hotel restaurant was very good and the staff was always there to make your wishes come true, even if it was a late night gelato.  The beds are very comfortable and it was perfect for my traveling legs. I also used the healing waters of the spa. We traveled most of italy staying in all 5 star hotels but holden tower and Florence are truly our favorites. Front desk personnel very kind and welcoming.  Thank you for a graat stay.

title: Dreamy Honeymoon!
review: Dear DianeMonongahela,  thank you so much for your fantastic review and believe us, to be considered the best hotel that you have stayed in during your Italy adventure is an honour. We try to make all our guests feel welcome and when we received such positive feedback like yours we feel proud of our service.  We are glad to know that you appreciated the nespresso machine in your room and your dinner in our Golden Restaurant!! We worked hard to improve it!  We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for another unforgettable stay with us!   Kindest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful Hotel right in the Center of Florence
review: What a fabulous stay from start to finish! We were made to feel so special from the minute we arrived at the hotel, greeted with Prosecco and shown around the hotels spa and dining areas. Our room was lovely, it was nice and spacious, the bed was really comfortable and each night the staff came and placed a little biscuit on our pillows. It’s the small things that go a really long way when you are on a special holiday and none of the little touches went un noticed. Each day as we were Expedia members we had a glass of Prosecco waiting for us at the bar as well as a ‘snack bar’ between 6.30-8.30pm and this was a very nice treat. As it was our honeymoon the hotel came up to our room one day and brought us a bottle of Bottega and some cake...this really made our stay a stand out as…

title: Heart of Gold in the Old City!
review: Dear Bekkiblazey,  Thank you for taking the time to write such an amazing review about our hotel. We strongly believe that the difference between a standard service and a tailored service is in the care of every single detail. And we are obviously happy when all the little touches went noticed and appreciated by our guests.  Thanks again for for the beautiful words spent on us and we are very honored to have made your honeymoon really special.  We look forward to welcoming you for your first anniversary!  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Excellent Stay
review: The hotel is located right in the heart of Florence. You are a 10 minute walk from just about everything. You just step out and go either right or left.   The rooms are quite nice. They are clean and very well decorated. We had a wonderful in the Tower, which had elements of the original building. They serve a complementary breakfast that is very good. It's not a huge offering, but you would be hard pressed not to find something you like. They also had gluten free offerings.   The service was very good. Everyone at the front desk was willing and able to assist with any request we had.   One important note for those who want to drive their rental car to the hotel. Don't do it!!! It is mind-boggling. Multiple GPS systems could not find the hotel. We were going to return the car…

title: Three day city break in Florence
review: We had a very comfortable stay any enjoyed the luxurious bedroom and bathroom. The breakfast selection and quality was top notch and the addition of complimentary aperitif and snacks in the early evening were a welcome addition.The basement spa was looking a little tired and could do with a little upgrading. The ultra bright cool white lighting in the hotel lounge detracted from what could be a luxurious space to spend time and enjoy a drink within a space of sophisticated ambience... so we found other places in Florence to do this.

title: Celebrating 60 year birthday
review: Dear DeanW,  We thank you for you feedback and really glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us and you appreciated the Hotel and our services, above all our breakfast. We are sorry to read that the spa has not completely met your expectations, but it is important to have feedback like yours, so that we can work on the issue.  We hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back.  Best Regards, Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Perfect location
review: Beautiful hotel friendly staff very nice and accommodating.  The desk staff especially was very helpful and the food and drinks were very good, breakfast was delicious loved the daily coffee and cappuccinos.

title: Nice Hotel, but noisy surrounding
review: Dear Patricia B,  Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience at the Golden Tower Hotel and for posting this wonderful review.  We do our best to render the stay of our Guest memorable and appreciate vey much when reading review like yours.   Thanks again and hope to welcome back for your next Birthday,   Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Golden Tower
review: Friendly and helpful staff, comfortable and well appointed hotel. Perfectly located to walk to all the designer shops, see all the historic sights and visit the major galleries as well as find restaurants for  evenings out.

title: Favorite hotel
review: We were on a family vacation for 13 dsys, and stayed in five different hotels. Golden tower was rated number one by all of us. It’s a true five star hotel. The service, rooms, breakfast and location is excellent. I will defiantly stay there again

title: Great hotel in central position
review: Dear Rukhsana A,  Thank you so much for choosing our Hotel for your stay in Florence and for taking the time to share your wonderful review.  We are very happy to read that all hotel services have met your expectations. and we are truly honored to be condidered the best hotel you have stayed in during your family vacation!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future, and please, do not heistate to contact us directly when you will be back in Florence!   Kindest Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: The best hotel during our trip to Europe
review: About a 20 minute walk from the railway station this hotel is very central. Beautifully clean and tidy with extremely friendly and helpful staff. The room was everything we wanted and exceptionally quiet. Would definately come here again.

title: Best hotel of our trip
review: Dear Dream623834,  thank you so much for your wondeful review.  We are very happy to read that you appreciated the rooms and the service offered by our wonderful staff. As you underlined, the location is fantastic, in the heart of Florence but in the meantime in a very quiet square.   It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Very good!
review: What a beautiful hotel. Starting from the location to beautiful rooms, nice staff , amazing breakfast and a wonderful spa. Not enough words to describe our experience. This was voted the best hotel by my entire family. We would love to stay there again.

title: Awesome staff!!!
review: Large room with street view, free access to spa facilities, free breakfast and free wi-fi.  Centrally located.  Lots of wonderful restaurants/stores close by.  I was even provided a breakfast bag since my flight was leaving so early in the morning, like 4:00 am.

title: Florence Hotel
review: Dear kdcarroll2003,  thank you very much for posting this wonderful review.   We are more than happy you spent a wonderful time with us and really look forward to welcoming back in the near future,   Kindest regards Sara Carniel - front Office Manager

title: 50th Anniversary Celebration
review: Wonderful hotel in a great location close to all the major sites,excellent breakfast included and also had a great meal one night when we were to tired to go out.Very helpful staff and a great bar to relax in

title: An incredible hotel in the middle of an amazing city
review: Dear safehaulage,  We thank you very much for your lovely words and for taking a moment of your time to share your experience with us!   We are absolutely delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and above all for having appreciated the complimentary breakfast. Usually in 5 star hotels is not included.   It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Florence Hotel
review: We have visited Florence on many occasions and have found each one very memorable.  For our 50th Anniversary we found the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa the ideal accommodation for celebrating this very special occasion.  We highly recommend it.

title: Cute boutique hotel in the heart of Florence!
review: We stayed here for the first leg of our honeymoon.  It is a short walk from the train station.  Be advised it is hard to wheel luggage to hotel on the cobblestone streets, but it only took us about 10 minutes to get there on foot.  The staff was incredibly welcoming.  Went over a map of the area proactively, and even gave us a list of restaurant recommendations.  On our first night there, the bar staff sent up a bottle of prosecco and tiramisu to celebrate our honeymoon!!  The front desk booked us all of our restaurant reservations for our stay.  My husband and I both got massages at the spa... there was a slight miscommunication, I believe a language barrier, in the timing of our services, but we both really enjoyed our service!  The free breakfast was super convenient.  They…

title: Golden Tower Hotel Florence
review: Dear Erin D,  Thank you for the wonderful review!   We are very happy to hear you spent wonderful time with us and for having contributed to make your stay Honeymoon memorable.  Thank you for the nice words about the staff as well, I am sure they will all appreciate your kindness.   We hope we will have the chance to welcome you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.   Kindest Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Amazing hotel in the heart of Florence
review: The staff and the location of this hotel are well worth 5 stars. The staff at the front desk, bar and at breakfast were all totally professional, were really pleasant every time you met with them and some of the best I have come across in the thousands of hotels I have stayed at.   You could not ask for a better location if you want to visit galleries, shops or restaurants. Everything, including the Duomo is within 10 minutes walk.  Everything was nice and clean and fresh throughout the hotel.   I found the room a bit small for a 5 star hotel, the twin beds compromised the overall space and what was disappointing was the noise from outside each night. I appreciate this is city centre but the soundproofing was not great. I also found the shower to be too small.  Lots of power…

title: Location and Luxury in boutique Hotel
review: Dear grwpl,  thank you so much for taking time to share your experience and for the nice words you had for the Staff at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. We are all glad that you have enjoyed your stay, liked our services and location, but we are sorry to hear that you were not impressed by the room and the noise outside. Thanks to your feedback and we are going to check the soundprrofing of all rooms!    As you did not use the Spa and tried any treatments, it is a good excuse to come back and we will be really happy to welcome you.   Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Everything is fabulous in this hotel: the location - in the very center of the historic neighborhoods -, the rooms - beautiful, perfectly silent, perfectly equipped, the staff - helpful, niceOne of the best hotels we've experienced

title: Great location!
review: Beautiful hotel near all the attractions. The staff was incredible, especially the front desk staff. They were very helpful recommending dinner options and making reservations. Nice room, beautiful common areas and good breakfast included in the rate. The hotel is located in the restricted driving zone but the valet charge includes the fee which allows you to drive on these roads. We got lost but called the front desk did a nice job talking us in. Make sure you don't drive on the roads marked buses only or you will get a ticket.

title: Golden tower hotel florence
review: Dear kentr15,  We thank you for your great review. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is located in the city center in a pedestrian aerea but all our guests can reach the Hotel by car. We are always at our guests'disposal to help them in driving in front of the Hotel, then, the garage does the car valet service.  We hope to welcome you again soon and d o not forget to conatct us directly!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Golden Tower Hotel and Spa Florence
review: Exellecent staff. Staff were very helpful and kind. Good location.   Will definitely come back. Very close to city centre and all local amenities. Love this Hotel.  The staff were very kind and helpful.  The rooms are very clran. xxxx

title: Hotel stay the last week in August
review: Dear idowu2016,  All our Staff thank you for your lovely review. We are glad you had an enjoyable stay with us. We hope to welcome you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and please do not hesitate to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: 5 star hotel!
review: What a lovely hotel. We were only here three nights and the reception could not have been so informative. They seemed engaged in our making the best of the trip-for example marking out places of interest on the map they provided. The hotel is reasonably small, in the centre of the warren of streets that make up Florence and four minutes walk to the river Arno. You can wander in any direction and come across a softly lit delight of shops, restaurants and piazzas. The support staff are highly skilled in customer service. They seem to know when you out and make the room pristine without being seen. Only trouble is I could get used to this with my usual hotels seeming flop houses or sleep factories. Will miss the mini waterfall in the Spa room, the cotton robes and slippers, the…

title: Excellent location and pleasant staff makes this hotel a hidden gem
review: if you are looking for a classy hotel, with an unbelievable location to explore the city, then Hotel Golden Tower is for you.   Location About a 15-minute car ride from the train station, it sits in an off the beaten path area that is literally in the center point for exploring the city.  Short walks to the Ponte Vecchio, Duomo, Uffizi, and many others. Even though it is central, it is very quiet. We never heard a peep, not even a door opening, in the evening times.    The Hotel The rooms are small, average European style rooms but well appointed. Beds are comfortable and as mentioned before they are very quiet. The spa is nice, large jacuzzi, steam room, and sauna, a great way to unwind after a busy day exploring the city. The breakfast is solid, many different pieces of bread…

title: Hidden Gem
review: Dear Chris G,  thank you so much for your wonderful and detailed review. Florence is indeed and wonderful city and our location is perfect for the guest that love to be central and explore the city but still enjoy some peace and relax. The Golden Tower is a boutique Hotel and we do not have huge spaces but we strongly believe that The care and the attention to all details is very important!  We hope you will give us the chance to welcome you again!   Kindest Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Great Hotel and Staff
review: This is truly a 5 star hotel only one block from Plaza Republica and convenient to many sights in the old city. The staff is amazing and very helpful.  Rooms are spacious for Florence and very clean.  I would go back to Florence just to stay here.

title: Fantastic Hotel in Florence
review: Dear NOTGONE,  thank you for your wonderful review!   We are very delighted reading your nice words and happy to know that you loved staying with us.   We look forward to welcoming you back very soon,   Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Cannot praise this hotel enough. Stayed here for my husbands 50th and it was a brilliant time. Amazing location and hotel spa lovely. Staff so helpful and kind. Nothing was ever enoughMade a 50th birthday very specialCannot wait to return

title: Golden Tower Hotel & Spa
review: Absolutely the best hotel!  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  The morning breakfast was delicious.  The room was very nice and comfortable with a complimentary mini bar that was restocked every day.  Evening turn-down with water at our bedside.  Florence can get be very confusing while walking around.  The room had a phone with GSP that was complimentary too.  Top notch hotel.

title: Great location and very friendly and helpful staff
review: Dear glc2411,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review. We work hard in order to guarantee the best service and we feel so proud when we reach our goal. As you mentioned, all our rooms come with a mobile phone which allow you to have free international calls and free internet. You can also take it with you during your stay in Florence.  We hope to welcome you again soon and please do not hesitate to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Excellent Place
review: We toured for a few days.  Hotel staff very helpful.  Everyone spoke great English.  Breakfast included was very good.  One night we had a late dinner in hotel and B+   Rooms pretty, clean, quiet,  air conditioning worked well.   Best part: very good location.  Only thing I missed was shower, no bathtub.

title: Lovely hotel in a lovely city
review: Dear Marcia G,   thank you for taking the time to write such an amazing review about our hotel.  We are indeed in an ideal position for sightseeing and shopping, and we know how important it is to have a nice place to come back and relax after a day in Florence!   All our staff is thrilled to hear that they made your stay even more special, and we couldn't be more proud of our service!   Regarding the bath, our hotel has 27 rooms, some with shower, some with bath, some with both. On your next stay we will be glad to assign you a room with a bath.  Thank you for choosing the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for your stay and we are looking forward to welcome you back in the next future!   Kindest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Loved this hotel!
review: You have to go yourself and see how Excellent the team is.One of the best hotels everService, location, cleanliness, all are excellent, located in the center of the action, a real Jewel in a beautiful city

title: Truly a 5 star hotel!
review: My family and friends stayed 6 nights in this fantastic hotel! The rooms and facilities are beautiful, very clean and very well maintained. The rooms are very comfortable and impecable. What especially made this hotel a 5 star hotel was the staff and customer service. They are all very friendly and they went out of thier way to make our stay a very pleasant one. A very special thank you to Marianna for being so sweet and for the attention she gave us during our stay. The location is perfect and in the center of Florence. I would not consider staying anywhere else on my next visit to Florence.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Dear AnaMP210,   We Thank you (expecially Mariana) very much for your positive review.  We are so happy your stay with us has been wonderful but above all that you found great our Staff. Guest's satisfacion is our goal and we always try our best in order to reach it.  It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel!!
review: For our first trip to Florence we booked two luxury rooms for three nights direct with the hotel online. The experience was excellent from start to finish. We arrived at lunchtime on a hot day and the reception team looked after us with drinks in the lounge until our rooms were ready. Rooms were sooo comfortable and spacious and our teenage boys loved the free mini bar! My wife and I used the lovely spa each evening to refresh ourselves after full on days of sightseeing and shopping - hotel is located in easy walking distance of all the main sights. Breakfast was good and complimentary glass of Prosecco in the evening was a nice touch. Concierge sorted out reservation for the Uffizi one evening. Each room also had a free Android device which you could take out and make free…

title: Excellent experience!
review: Dear Graham T,   Thank you for your fantastic review.  We love to hear that you have appreciated all our service, from the breakfast, to the room and spa. Thank you for appreciating "Handy", the device available to all our guests for free national or international calls or to use the internet anywhere in Hotel and Florence.  We are happy to know that you have enjoyed your stay with us and extemely glad you would highly reccomend us.  Thank you for choosing the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for your stay and we are looking forward to welcome you back in the next future!   Kindest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: city break
review: The location was amazing, walking distance to everything.  The staff was very friendly and made some great restaurant recommendations for us.  The included breakfast had good hot and cold options.  Our room was very spacious with two full bathrooms.  Very nice to spread out a little bit.  Lots of storage for clothing.The bathrooms were large and well appointed.  Not a very good hair dryer, but that's about the only negative!  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Excelent. Really nice room and location
review: The location was perfect, right in the city center and the room really nice. The breakfast was good and the personal was nice and willing to help us with anything. I didn’t try the Spa or the restaurant.

title: Wonderful hotel in Florence
review: Dear theodoraioanamarin,  thank you very much for your comment we are very delighted to know you enjoyed staying at Golden Tower Hotel.  It was a shame you did not use the SPA or try our restaurant... You have an excuse to come back!  It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards   Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Would Recommend
review: My daughter and I just spent 5 days at this fabulous hotel.  The beds were very comfortable and the room was spacious.  First class bathroom.  Employees always greeted us with a smile and were there to call a taxi, help with reservations whenever we needed them. Breakfast is a gorgeous buffet.  My daughter is gluten free and there were many healthy options for her to choose from.   I highly recommend the Golden Tower &Spa.

title: First time in Florence.
review: Dear songdivauk,   Thank you for taking the time to write such an amazing review about our hotel. We would like to thank you for your feedback about our service, staff and above all about the breakfast. We worked hard to improve it and to offer our guests quality fresh products suitable for all needs.  We hope to welcoming you in the future and please feel free to contact us!  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great stay in Florence
review: This was a very nice hotel with very attentive staff.  Great location. Our room was a king size bed and it along with bathroom was small but was clean. Very nice happy hour and breakfast buffet. We would stay here again.

title: Charming Hotel
review: Absolutely loved this hotel! The staff was so accommodating and friendly.  The happy hour is a nice touch as well.  Bed was comfortable - only problem was our air conditioning didn't work that well throughout the night.

title: Excellent Location
review: Dear quickhea,   Thank you for your wonderful review.   First of all, we would like to sincerely apologise for the inconvenience with the air conditioning, and we would like to thank you as well for letting us know ,so that we can look into it.  All the staff at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is glad to hear the you have enjoyed your stay with us and that they have been helpful.   We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for another unforgettable stay with us!   Kindest regards   Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful hotel in the center of Firenze
review: My daughter and I loved the location of the hotel.  It was close to restaurants and historical attractions.   We found the staff to be helpful and friendly!  We will stay here again on our next visit to Florence.

title: Fantastic Hotel!
review: Dear kthornburg2006, Thank you very much for your review, Perfect and concise!! We are so happy to know your stay with us was so pleasant and enjoyable.   We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for another unforgettable stay with us!   Kindest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Little Gem
review: My overall experience with Golden Tower Hotel is extremely fantastic.   Location is superb. It is right in the heart of Florence city center. Within walking distance to all the main attraction in Florence. Also very close to Arno river where it is so nice to have a morning walk or run, which I did have a morning run and the view was very good.  The service of the hotel staff is also remarkably good. Breakfast is fresh and delicious.   Rooms are superb. The space is adequate and the room is very comfortable. The hotel also provide the guests with a mobile phone that you can use during your stay, with free data and free local calls which comes very handy and useful during my stay in Florence.  This hotel is very recommended for anyone who is looking for comfort and luxury during…

title: Beautiful Luxury hotel in the centre of Florence
review: The staff are excellent and helpful. They will provide you with tips and recommendations whether it be a guided tour, restaurant suggestions or places to visit.  The hotel is beautiful with a very nice spa. Overall a great experience from the time we walked in through the front doors.

title: Beautiful Hotel! Amazing staff and service!
review: Dear PatrickF,  many thanks for your wonderful review and are very glad to know we have been up to your expectations.    It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Small and intimate boutique hotel
review: My husband and I absolutely love this hotel. When we first walked in the staff was incredibly welcoming. After we checked in someone gave a tour of the hotel and also our hotel room while the bellman brought our luggage to our room. We were in a junior suite and it was extremely spacious. There was a sitting room with fireplace in addition to the bedroom and nice sized bathroom. They had a gift from their spa waiting for us on the bed as well as some chocolates with a nice handwritten card welcoming us. We were informed that the food and drinks in the mini bar were included at no charge which was a nice surprise. I believe it had something to do with the type of room that we booked.There is a restaurant on site that is only for hotel guests and the food as well as the service…

title: Great Location
review: Dear ilmf2018,  Thank you very much for your wonderful and above alla detailed comment.  We strongly believe that the staff and the attention to the details make the difference and review like yours make us feel very very proud of it.   We are already looking forward to welcoming you back in the next future for another unforgettable stay with us.  Warmest Regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Awesome Stay
review: I stayed with my partner in this hotel in February of this year.  It is so well positioned in Florence that you can walk straight out of the hotel into the city - great for those that like walking.  The staff were friendly and helpful and unbeknown to me were working with my partner to create a surprise that took my breath away.  The rooms were clean and the bed was really comfortable.  My only criticism was the room had no view. There was a lot of attention to detail to make our stay a lovely experience.  The breakfast offered something for everyone.  We both enjoyed the spa and had no problems booking it though I am sure in the busy season you probably would need to book ahead of time.   Definitely worth a visit.

title: A Gem in Florence
review: My husband and I are wrapping up a 3 night stay at the Golden Tower, and could not be more pleased. From the moment we arrived, the staff has been friendly, responsive, and engaging. Morning breakfast is such a nice way to start the day. Happy hour at 4:30 is a lovely break before dinner. Fabriella, the bartender for happy hour, is delightful and always happy to share recommendations for places to go. She treats her guests as friends. We look forward to a return visit!

title: Fabulous in Florence
review: Dear Lenore,   Thank you for your postive wonderful review and really glad to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Golden Tower Hotel.   All Staff, Fabiola in particular, appreciate your comment.   It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you in the next future.  KIndest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Lovely hotel with great staff
review: The Goldne Tower hotel is by far the best we have stayed in . Superb staff.  great attention to detail . Excellent location . We will be going back soon to enjoy their hospitality . Highly recommended and despite the 5 star luxury , prices were reasonable

title: Love this fabulous hotel
review: Dear Carole B, first of all thank you for your wonderful review and we are so happy you spent wonderful time with us.  The care and the attention to all details is very important and we are very proud when we meet our guests expectations.   We sincerely hope you will come back to Visit Florence, and that you will decide to stay with us again!   Warmest Regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful property!
review: My mother and I stayed at this hotel in June 2018 during a four day break in Florence. We had a fantastic stay at the Golden Tower: the room was extremely comfortable, quiet and very relaxing; the hotel was very clean; and the staff were so friendly and helpful. We also enjoyed a hearty breakfast - there was plenty of choice and the morning cappuccinos were delicious.   The hotel is in a very central location so it was a handy base for getting around. The reception team were extremely helpful and happy to assist with various queries. The staff working in the breakfast area / bar were also very friendly: we certainly felt welcomed. We enjoyed some happy hour prosecco and canapés during our stay and also made use, briefly, of the spa for a beauty treatment.   All in all, a lovely…

title: Florence hotel - Golden Tower
review: Excellent services and staff, very nice accommodations with long, comfortable beds. Good breakfast bar, very close proximity to many of the famous Florence sites to visit. Spas is OK, nothing special, and water was not warm enough. Would rent again!

title: Great Florence Experience
review: Dear sctthowe,  We thank you for you feedback and really glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us and you appreciated the Hotel and our services. We are sorry to read that the spa has not completely met your expectations, but it is important to have feedback like yours, so that we can work on the issue.  We hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back.  Best Regards, Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful Stay
review: Fantastic hotel.  Great location. Food and drinks were outstanding. Staff was courteous and helpful in every way.  The GPS phone was an added bonus - so much easier than trying to use a map.  Getting taxis to and from this hotel was extremely easy.

title: A great 25th wedding anniversary
review: Dear LindaMR50,  thank you very much for posting this positive review. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are very happy that you appreciated "Handy", the smartphone available to all guests who can use it to make free national and international calls or as you did, use anywhere in the city as "virtual guide".  It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again.  Warmest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: A 5-Star Hotel Located in Heart of Florence
review: This was my 2nd visit to this hotel (previous was 3 years ago) and it's a really great hotel.  I spent 3 nights here with a group of 12 family and friends and I made sure we could get rooms at this hotel before confirming the timing of our trip.  It's in a wonderful location - in the heart of everything, but on a quiet, charming side street.  Staff is very friendly and accommodating, breakfast was great, room was beautiful and very clean.  Will definitely stay here again.

title: Tour
review: A beautiful hotel tucked away in the historic part of the city of Florence. The hotel is walking distance to many historic sites and buildings. The staff are very friendly, helpful and courteous. Lovely rooms and bathrooms. The spa, jacuzzi  and steam bath is a great experience.

title: great and central location located
review: Dear yunoos, We thank you for you feedback and really glad to hear that you had a great stay with us. The location of our hotel and the Spa are definitely our main strengths and give our guests the opportunity to enjoy the city to the fullest and to relax after a day spent between shopping and culture.  We truly hope to welcoming you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and please, do not hesitate to contact us directly for any information.   Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great Location, great facilities
review: In the middle of everything, staff is very friendly and gracious. just wish their dinner menu was more extensive. But great stay. will recommend to my friends and family. What I liked the best was the staff

title: In heart of Florence
review: Dear docibarra2000,   Thank you very much for taking a moment of your time to share your experience with us and for the fantastic words used to describe you stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa We are so proud of our job and reading reviews like yours make us feel very very excited.   We really look forward to welcoming you back in the next future to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa!  Warmest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: A few days in Florence
review: Centrally located, great service, welcoming drinks, happy hour, mini bar all included in the room rate, mobile phone with internet in room available for guest use, only thing negative I can say is the valet parking is a little expensive but after a bit of a stressful drive to get to the hotel I was happy to hand the car over. I would choose the hotel again!

title: Truly a place for luxury in the heart of Florence!
review: This five-star hotel really deserves all of its stars. Our room was impeccably clean and lovely, with every imaginable comfort. Everyone working in the hotel was warm and friendly and made us feel really welcome. They spoke good English and also helped us improve our Italian. The restaurant offers very good food, which we enjoyed the first evening as we were too tired to go out exploring for dinner. The breakfast was delightful - a small but varied selection of very good food, served with style and kindness. We felt very well cared for the entire time we were there, and the hotel staff made every effort to help us with whatever we needed. This included talking us through the maze of streets we had to negotiate to find the hotel with our car, and that is not easy in Florence!…

title: Golden tower hotel
review: Dear Edouard F,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review of our property, we really appreciate all the details you gave.  We are very happy to have appreciated all the services of the Hotel, but above all that all the staff made you feel at home. For all of us it is essential that our guests can enjoy all the attention and we are very proud of our job when our guests felt well cared during their stay.
