We look forward to welcoming you back at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for another unforgettable stay with us!  Warmest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful Experience
review: My wife and I just returned from a birthday trip to Italy. We spent three nights at the golden tower. Matilde Farolfi and Jlenia Ratto at the front desk were fabulous. I had requested the hotel’s recommendations for restaurants well in advance of my stay and they had made all the dinner reservations for us. Their choices were all excellent. The hotel was centrally located and within walking distance to all of the city. We spent ten days in Italy, and stayed at 5 different hotels, including four relais&châteaux chateaux properties - Hotel Il Pellicano in Porto Ercole, Il Falconiere in Cortona, Il Borro outside of Florence, and Hotel Raphael in Rome, and the golden tower hotel ranks up there with the best of small boutique hotels which I prefer. I recommend this hotel highly.

title: Wedding anniversary vacation
review: Dear Sandra G,  There no words to explein how thankful we are for the amazing words you wrote about us!  Matilde and Jlenia are sincerely happy to hear that their suggestions and their help has been so appreciated, and we all are as it shows our love and passion for waht we do.  We are honored to be condidered one of the best boutique hotel you have stayed in during your italian vacation, and we can not wait to welcome you back to Florence and to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  If you will ever need any more information, suggestions or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Expensive hotel, tiny rooms, with tired lobby and spa.
review: The hotel is a boutique hotel  well located in the center of Florence with easy walking access to all relevant museums and restaurants. The staff was more than accommodating with Andrea being the suburb assistant. The Jr Suite was very spacious  with a large bathroom, not ordinarily found in Europe. We would definitely return the next time in Florence.

title: Golden tower Hotel
review: One of the nicest hotels I've ever stayed in.  The Spa was such a treat. I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Florence.  The location was perfect. The staff was exceptional. Always had a smile.

title: Quiet & comfortable
review: Dear Mary B,  We are so thrilled to hear that we are consider one of the best hotel you ever stayed in, thank you so much!!  And we are even happier to hear that our friendly, smiling attitude has been appreciated, as our perfect location!  We sincerely hope we will have the chance to welcome you again to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Kindest Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Our relaxing and pleasant stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa!
review: Very friendly and helpful staff, nothing a bother. Very comfy room, hotel extremely central, easy walking distance to all major museums, art galleries & shops. Would recommend this hotel to everybody.

title: Magnificent little hotel
review: Dear Mary M,  Thank you for the very nice words about us!  We are so glad to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us and that you liked our hotel, our staff, and our ideal location!  We look forward to welcome you back to Florence and to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: An amazing hotel
review: Upon arrival we were greeted at the front desk by smiling staff members. While waiting a few minutes for the room to be ready, we enjoyed complementary coffee at the uniquely decorated lobby.  We stayed at the “Junior Suite Split Level with Free access to Wellness Spa”. The room was spacious, clean, well-lit, had a lot of closet-space, with a clean and comfy bathroom. We felt very welcome by the staff and from all the freebie gifts that were waiting for us in the room on our arrival.  The room was very comfortable and well-scented with a special perfume blend that was prepared specifically for the hotel. The room was not entirely isolated from sounds in nearby rooms however we were not bothered too much by this and were able to get a good night sleep on the very-comfortable…

title: GREAT HOTEL AND STAFF
review: From the moment we walked through the door we were treated as honoured guests. The staff were friendly and any request was actioned immediately. The bar and dinning was for guests only and made for a most enjoyable atmosphere. Our room was luxury with a free mini bar and serviced at least twice a day.  The location was so convenient we were able to walk to all the main sites of interest.

title: Fantastic position
review: Dear carolS906RP,  Thank you so ever much for the kind words you wrote about us.  We want our guests to feel honoured, and to know that they made the right decision choosing us as their hotel in Florence. We truly love what we do, and we try to show our passion in every way, and when we receice feedback like your, we feel very proud of our work.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to leave this nice feedback, and please whenever you wish to come back to Florence and to the Golden tower Hotel & Spa, contact us directly.  Kind Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Outstanding hotel
review: A wonderful hotel right in the centre of Florence.  Staff were great from the moment we stepped through the door.  Rooms very modern and spacious for a city centre hotel.  Loved the complimentary drinks and canapes served every evening at 6.00pm.  Would definitely stay at this hotel next time we visit Florence.

title: Wonderful Hotel in Central Florence
review: Dear adb245,  We are so glad to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us and that you will be back next time you come to Florence. We want our guest to feel welcome and have all the possible comfort when they are staying with us, that is why we like to add the little touches as the complimentary wine and canapes.  We really hope you will be back to Florence, so that we will have the chance to welcome you again.  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Perfect Location, Fabulous Hotel
review: Great location with nice and spacious rooms. Decent breakfast buffet. Staff is super friendly and helped us book many tickets and restaurants. We had a room on the 2nd floor facing the road in front. It was perfectly quiet during the night. The hotel is in close proximity to many sights. Would recommend staying there.

title: Amazing Place
review: Loved Sara at the front desk. Most helpful person I have met in ages. Kind, considerate, thoughtful and funny!   The morning breakfast was delicious and the hotel is in a perfect location.   Easy walking to just about everything in the city

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear Earl F  thank you so much for your amazing review.  We always try our best to satisfy all guests's need and we are very happy to read that we have met your expectations.  I would like to thank you personally for the words reserved to me.  Our location cannot indeed be compared with any other hotel in the city centre.   It was a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to welcoming you again in the next future.   Warmest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Perfection in Florence
review: Highly recommended for couples.clean rooms .relaxing spa and massages. I will choose this hotel again in my anniversary .the room service excellent with sweet hand write cards from hotel wishing for visitors good sleep and sweet dream

title: A very special treat
review: Dear reemosweet,   Thank you so much for choosing our Hotel for your stay in Florence and for taking the time to share your wonderful review.   We are happy to hear that we met your expectations, and please, contact us directly if you are planning another holiday in Florence, will be a pleasure to have the chance to welcome you back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.   Kindest Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Desk Manager

title: Sisters special holiday
review: This was our second stay at Golden Tower, after the experience the first time there was just nowhere else for us to choose when we came back. The staff are so friendly and helpful, it’s a classy hotel without being ‘snobby’. Perfect for exploring, great central location. Welcome pack had been improved, we followed the meal recommendations and managed some great day trips to Venice and Pisa.

title: Pure Perfection - it doesn’t get any better than this...
review: What can I say about the Golden Tower hotel, not a bad thing that is for sure.  If this is not the best hotel in Florence, then it must surely be up there at the top as here, from check in to departure, you receive nothing but excellent service.  The hotel interior is pure class, cleanliness is paramount throughout and our luxury room was, exactly as it says on the tin, pure luxury.  Spacious and well equipped with excellent facilities including a free mini-bar and superb toiletries, the beds were extremely comfortable and the peace ensured excellent sleep quality.  The personal touches were in abundance from the Easter egg, the fruit basket and the turn down service to mention but a few.  Everyone we met, or came into contact with during our stay, took the time to stop and…

title: Fab hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Dear Cazz111_12  We are absolutely amazed by the words you had for our hotel and our staff, we don't even know where to start thanking you!!  Your description coudn't fit us any better, we love what we do and we love even more helping  our guests in every possible way to make their Florence trip as easy and memorable as possible.Your happiness and your satisfaction is our main goal, and it truly makes us proud of the service we offer and of the team we have.  To be considered on of the best hotel in such a beautiful city as it is Florence it is a honor and we honestly couldn't thank you enough for the appreciation and the feedback you gave us.  We hope as well that you will be back in Florence and that we will be so lucky to have you back at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Luxury and perfect location in Florence
review: Perfect location, ten min walk from the station or 15 Euro in a taxi. Perfect location for sightseeing, restaurants and shopping. Lovely spacious room in the tower with fruit and free minibar ! The happy hour canapés and free prosecco was a nice early evening touch. Breakfast was good, we didn’t have dinner in the hotel and the spa was nice after a day sightseeing. The thing that made the stay special was the staff. The ladies and gent on reception knew everything about everything. Made suggestions, recommendations and one even saw us out in the rain one evening and gave us his umbrella. Very welcoming I would def recommend and will return

title: Wonderful location!
review: Dear 555lou,  Reading your review made our day!  We are indeed in an  ideal position for sightseeing and shopping, and we know how important it is to have a nice place to come back and relax after a day in Florence!  All our staff is thrilled to hear that they made your stay even more special, and we couldn't be more proud of our service!  If you ever come back to Florence please contact us directly, it would be a pleasure to have the opportunity to welcome you back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Warm Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Great Boutique Hotel in Florence
review: We stayed for 3 nights at the Golden Tower Hotel last week. Our college and high school daughters were with us and had their own room as well. This hotel had the perfect location in the center of Florence- 5 minute walk to Duomo, Ponte Vecchio, Uffizi, great shopping and basically everything you would want to do there. The staff was amazing and was so helpful when our luggage was delayed at the airport.  Breakfast was included and there was a wonderful happy hour with complimentary apps and sparkling wine  each night. The beds were comfy, the rooms had all amenities and their customer service was perfect in every way. The only recommendation I would make is to ask for a room opposite the main street side so if you want to keep windows open at night, it will be less noisy. As…

title: Best service
review: The hotel is well located in the heart of florence. The service in the front desk is fantastic. Anything to help the guests. Also the breakfast is very good. They took extra mile for us as vegan. The room is very small. That's the downside. Also in the spa we had a bad experience with one of the massagest. Overall defently recommended the place to stay in Florence.

title: Weekday stay
review: Dear Tal a,  Thank you for your kind review.  We are extremely happy to hear that you found our front desk staff fantastic! At the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa we try to give the best possible service so that our guest feel welcomed and know that they can count on us for anything they might need.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience in our Spa, we will definetely look into that.  We hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you again in our hotel.  Best Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Hotel, Great Service, but LOUD, and no AC.
review: A beautiful hotel central to everything. The staff were so very welcoming and couldn’t do enough for us! Restaurant was lovely. Spa could do with a little attention, but other than that we had an amazing time and could not recommend it enough!

title: Our stay at the Golden Tower
review: Dear Baljit R,  Thank you for the nice words about Golden Tower Hotel & Spa!  We are so glad to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us and that you would reccommend us! We took good note about the Spa, and we will definetely look at it to make some improvement.  We hope you will be back in Florence and that we will be so lucky to welcome you again in our hotel!  Warm Wishes  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: My birthday anniversary in Florence.
review: First, the positives - this hotel is in a great location.  The building itself is beautiful. And the people who work here are really wonderful.   The rooms are a bit on the small side, but to be expected in Florence (we were in a luxury twin room and it still felt a bit small).    The negatives (which will keep me from returning to the hotel) are (1) it is loud.  This is due to its location, but boy is it loud - people are out in the streets all hours of the night, and there are a few bars right near the hotel that seems to exacerbate the problem.  I live in the city and am not particularly sensitive to city noise, but this was at another level - it was truly the loudest hotel I’ve ever stayed in.   Shutting the windows helped somewhat, but that leads to my second complaint:  2)…

title: Second time and I am still Impressed
review: This hotel is an absolute gem in Florence's crown.  The staff and management of the Hotel have a highly personalized approach to its Guests.  During my stay of 8 nights, International Woman's Day occurred, and the Hotels response was pure class. I received a small floral bouquet as a gift. It was the Hotel's gift to its Female guests in celebration of the day.   My son and his girlfriend joined me on this trip and we all made use of the Hotels spa facilities. The Spa Staff was also exceptional and professional.  When I return to Florence next, I will continue using this Hotel as long as there are rooms available.  I couldn't imagine going anywhere else.

title: Golden Tower Hotel Florence
review: Dear Julienne m,  Thank you so ever much for choosing again the Goldent Tower Hotel & Spa for you stay in Florence. The most important thing for us is to make our guest feel welcome and be able to meet their expectation, and we are so happy to hear that we didn't dsappoint you! We like to add little touches to make everyone's stay memorable, and we are sincerely looking forward to welcome you back to Florence!  Please, do not hesitate to contact us directly for aninformation or assistance you might need!  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel
review: Very nice hotel, clean with friendly helpful staff Centrally located so convenient for getting to all the main attractions and plenty of good restaurants close by Nice touch each day with happy hour between 18:00 & 20:00 offering a glass of Prosecco and range of nibbles

title: Great location
review: Beautiful hotel with very comfortable rooms. Nice and cosy spa, perfect to relax after a day of visit of Florence. The staff is very friendly and helpful at all time. This hotel has a perfect location to visit all the main monuments (everything between 5 to 20 minutes walking distance).

title: Excellent Experience, Professional Staff
review: Dear olivia792,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a nive review of the hotel.  We are glad you found us helpfull, and that you could spend some time in our spa to relax after days of sightseeing!  We hope you will be back to Florence and to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Wishes,  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: great choice for being in middle of Florence
review: Excellent location for shopping and sightseeing in Florence.  Clean, cheery rooms  Good breakfast and has prosecco and snack time in early evening for guests.  Helpful concierge and if in higher price rooms, you are lent a Handy which permits free international calls and internet with maps to navigate city.

title: Excellent
review: Dear EBFnyc,  Thank you for taking the time to write those nice words about the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  We are pleased to know that you appreciated our services.  We are indeed in a very central position, close to most of the attractions and shops in the historical area of Florence.  We hope you will be back again and that we will have the chance to welcome you again.  Kind Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful in every way
review: Stayed for 4 nights in March 2018. Excellent location, excellent accommodation, outstanding staff. There was nothing we could fault.Staff were very helpfull in planning our places to visit each day. Our room was quiet and perfectly clean.

title: Lovely hotel with fantastic customer service
review: Dear Colin S,  Thank you for taking the time to write such an amazing review about our hotel. Our staff is so glad to hear that have been outstanding and helpfull, our service is what we are proud of!  We sincerely hope you will come back to Visit Florence, and that you will decide to stay with us again!  Best Regards  Sara Carniel-Front office manager

title: Fantastic boutique luxury hotel in the centre of Florence
review: We had a lovely stay at the Golden Tower. The hotel is beautiful, the staff were exceptional, and the facilities were great. Breakfast was all we could have hoped for. The room was spacious and with plenty of storage space. And the bed was extremely comfortable.  And the spa facilities were a lovely addition. Beautiful! Our only complaint would have to be the WiFi which was weak and unreliable. Other than that we had a great time. Thank you!!

title: Amazing experience
review: This hotel is exquisite. It is not only beautiful and in a great location (and smells amazing!) but the staff is the best.  They go above and beyond to accommodate and to anticipate any needs their guests might have. The room was beautiful and had everything to make our stay so comfortable. The breakfast setup has something for everyone including. Vegetarians. I felt so safe and at home at Golden Tower. Matilde is especially amazing. She will take care of you. Ask about the fragrance that is in the hotel. They will tell you where you can go buy some of your own.  Believe me...you will want some to take home!

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Danielle M,  Your review made us so proud of our staff and our service.  We all would like to thank you for the kind words, especially Matilde, which is a very valuable member of our staff, and indeed, we try to go above and beyond to make our guest stay unforgettable and to help them organizing their days in Florence if any suggestion is needed.  It makes us so happy to know that you felt at home and safe , and we truly hope we will have the chance to welcome you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Wishes  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Great location, superb service, rooms with character
review: We only stayed one night in Florence, but thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Golden Tower Hotel. The breakfast and happy hour both were good, and the room was lovely. The front desk staff gave us great advice for a lunch spot, and were very accommodating. Glad we stayed here, and would definitely return.

title: Spectacular
review: Dear Rebekah E,  We are always  so happy to hear that a guest would definetely retutn to stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  It makes us proud of our service, our staff, and feedback like yours make us understand that we are going on the right direction.  Thank you so ever much for the kind words, and please , whenever you wish to come back do not hesitate to contact us.  Best Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous
review: Cannot say enough about this place, from the service to the location to the wonderful rooms (book a Jr suite if you can, the free breakfast alone makes it worth it)- this hotel is tough to beat. The nightly happy hour is also great.

title: Gem of a hotel in Florence
review: Wonderful city, perfect hotel. Right in the centre, yet quiet and peaceful. Spotlessly clean, lovely room, huge bed. The staff were amazing - helpful, polite, knowledgeable. Loved it. Would definitely stay there next time I go back.

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Dear PFurr,  Thank you for the generous review!  All the staff at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is glad to hear the you have enjoyed your stay with us and that they have been helpful.  Florence is indeed and wonderful city and our location is perfect for the guest that love to be central and explore the city but still enjoy some peace and relax.  We can not wait to welcome you back to our hotel, and please, do not hesitate to contact us for any further information.  Best Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Lovely
review: We had a great stay at the Golden Tower.  The hotel was clean, staff was friendly and the location was conveniently located.  Their spa was wonderful too.  The free 'happy hour' with a drink and food was unexpected and much appreciated.  Breakfast was great.  This hotel was by far our favorite during our Italian travels.

title: Golden Tower is fabulous!
review: Dear Allison P,  We are so thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us.   It is an honor to be considered your favorite hotel and we couldn't be happier to know that our service and our little touches have been much appreciated.  We are sincerely looking forward to welcome you back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Kind Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Perfect staff!
review: Great location and service.Within walk of all sights and short walk to many good resturants.Excellent breakfast, only issue was bar was lacking ambience lowering the Lights would have made it more welcoming

title: Great hotel
review: So glad I found this hotel. It was a pleasure to stay here. Staff were super friendly and helpful and recommended some fab places to eat Rooms were lovely Good was great Location was perfect for sightseeing

title: A birthday treat
review: Dear barneymelarney,  After this great review we are indeed glad you found us!!!  It's always a pleasure to hear that a guest enjoyed his stay with us and that found our suggestion helpful!  Thank you for the very nice words you wrote about the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, and we sincerely hope you will be staying with us again!  Do not hesitate to contact us directly if you ever come back to Florence.  Warm Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: New Year in Florence
review: My husband took me to Florence for my birthday and we had the pleasure of staying at The Golden Tower. The location is ideal, with many attractions being just a few minutes' walk away. The hotel staff were lovely, very friendly and helpful. Our room was great with a big bathroom which was spotless. Within minutes of arrival we received complimentary prosecco and snacks. We were made to feel very welcome. The choice at breakfast was very good, with lots of healthy choices (as well as cake!).  We used the spa twice and loved it, a real treat after all the walking. The outstanding feature of this hotel however is the customer service and the little touches the staff add to make you feel special. I would definitely recommend it.

title: OUTSTANDING HOTEL!!!
review: Dear Amanda OR,  Thank you ever so much for your nice review.  At the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa we try to make our guests feel special, we truly enjoy what we do and when we hear that our services have been appreciated we feel nothing but happiness!  Thank you for staying with us for such an important occasion as your birthday, and we hope we will be your choice again in the future if yourself and your husband will ever come back to Florence.  Kindest Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: very nice hotel
review: Excellent hotel, extremely helpful staff, great food and a lovely New Year's experience in the hotel restaurant. We shall definitely be going back there probably for another New Year but for a longer stay.

title: Perfect location, fabulous staff
review: My husband and I stayed at the Golden Tower on our second stop on our honeymoon in Italy.  We were most impressed by the helpful and extremely friendly staff of the hotel... from the front desk staff (Alessandro) to the lady in charge of all the wine (Fabiola), and the breakfast staff as well.  Our room was not huge, but spacious enough and laid out well.  The breakfast buffet was a great start to the day - we did not try the restaurant for anything other than the wine tasting that was really great!!  We also appreciated our honeymoon gift from Fabiola, who personally delivered us a bottle of Prosecco with a fruit plate.  The location of the hotel was perfect - just a short walk to all the sites of Florence, with plenty of nearby restaurants to choose from.   Thanks to the…

title: Liad back, stylish and well located. Dont stay anywhere else.
review: Dear lexiejo2016,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  Our main goal is to make our guests feel welcome and happy to have stayed with us, knowing that Alessio and Fabiola have been so helpfull make us proud of our service.  We are indeed settled in the city centre, within walking distance from all the main attractions of Florence, which make us one of the perfect place to start your Florence adventure!  Thank you for choosing the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for your stay and for your honeymoon, and we are looking forward to welcome you back next time you will visit Italy!  Best Regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Very helpful stadd
review: A great, enthusiastic and friendly team up running a small boutique hotel in the heart of Florence.  The location is perfect, just a few hundred meters from anything you need to see in Florence. The rooms are spacious and clean, quiet and thoughtfully equipped.  The place to sat in florence

title: Christmas in Italy
review: Dear Glen H,  Your feedback made our day!  We like to hear that our friendliness and enthusiasm have been appreciated!  We try  to make all our guests feel welcome and when we received  such positive feedback like yours we feel proud of our service. We are indeed in a convenient location, close to most of the Florence attractions and we would like to sincerely thank you for the suggestion you gave to not stay anywhere else! We truly hope you will be back in Florence and that we will have the chance to welcome you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Kindest Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Close to the Arno, Close to the Uffizi
review: Had a very nice stay here. Staff in particular very helpful and spoke excellent English. Room very spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was very good. Dinner a bit less amazing but there are lots of options nearby.

title: Awesome hotel
review: This hotel was centrally located in Florence. The staff was awesome. The rooms were modern and the spa was a great place to relax after a day of sightseeing. Only negative was the breakfast. I’d definitely go back.

title: december in florence
review: Dear doctornavid,  Thank you so much for your nice review.  We are disappointed to hear that the breakfast was not up to your standard, but thanks to your feedback we know that we have to work on it and make it better!  We are glad to hear though that it didn't change your opinion of the hotel and the staff.  We hope you will be back in Florence and at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa in the near future.  Kindest Regards  Sara Carniel Front Office Manager

title: Excellent city break
review: this was a birthday trip for my wife. We were delighted with the location and the quality of the hotel. The staff were first class and went out of their way to ensure their guests' enjoyment.  Nothing was too much trouble. The room was excellent quality and impeccably clean. We are seriously considering a return trip here.

title: Perfect
review: Dear glenh930,  Firts ao all, the staff at the Golden tower Hotel & Spa would like to thank you for the very nice words and for the great feedback you wrote.  We always try our best to make our guest feel welcome and satisfied, and when we know that we succeded we feel nothing but happiness.  We are sincerely looking forward to welcome you back to Florence, and please do not hesitate to contact us when you have a date in mind!  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Excellent hotel in middle of Florence
review: A fantastic hotel our second visit and we will definitely come back, the service was great and the staff are fantastic. The location is also very convenient in the centre walking distance to all the amenities/ museums and shops. A lovely boutique hotel.

title: excellent journey
review: the best stay i had ever passed, sure ill come back again whenever i have the opportunity to visit italy, warm hospitality, excellent care, very good treatment, very nice people and very helpful staff

title: Surprised and impressed
review: Dear Awsanalkubati,  Thank you so much for the fantastic review.  We are so pleased to hear that your stay with us was the best you ever had, and we can not wait to welcome you again to Florence and to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Tuscan Tragedy
review: Pleasantly surprised at this hotel . It looked "old school"  from the photos online, but I ended up being extremely well kept and in the case of our two floor suite even new. We were greeted with complimentary coffee and  beverages. Friendly accommodating staff everywhere. Our suite was very clean and I'm certain very recently renovated. Clean spacious bathrooms, USB outlets, Etro brand both products, even a gift of ambiance fragrance worth 100$. Complimentary glass of proseco and good quality small snacks for happy hour, complimentary high quality European breakfast. If I had to complain about 1 thing it's that the second floor which had the bed and smaller bathroom, didn't have much space to walk around, even came very close to hitting my head on the wood beams on the ceiling…

title: Delightful retreat in the center of Florence
review: Dear Rob B  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  We are extremely glad to hear that you have enjoyed yuor stay with us and that you woud stay again.  To give our guest the best possible service and comfort is our priority , your feedback and appreciation makes us feel happy, and even though there is always room for iimprovement we know now that we are on the right path!  Thank you again Rob B, we are already looking forward to welcome you back to Florence and to the Golden tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Best service ever
review: We had big expectations for this highly rated hotel. Unfortunately, our experience was not pleasant.    During our first night, the lights in our room kept flickering and the safe kept resetting and beeping. It took the staff many hours to determine it was an issue with the hotel and not user error.  I don't blame the staff for the problems, but I would've appreciated being informed of the issues and/or perhaps offered something small (e.g, a bottle of wine) due to all the lack of sleep.  It wasn't until we called Expedia that anything was done for us.  During our second night, the noise from the pub across the street kept us awake.  We were not pleased.  Considering this is a high-end hotel, we had higher expectations. I won't stay there again.

title: Solid choice for central Florence
review: Location is superb, staff are friendly and attentive. Breakfast room is small but perfectly functional, with a good choice of foods and lovely service from waiting staff.   Rooms are well appointed but I would say more equivalent to a UK 4 star rather than 5. The hotel may well have awarded itself the extra star due to the spa provision, which we did not use.  The only one negative is that we stayed at the end of February and it was quite mild but the heating was on and cooking us! Upon raising this with the hotel staff, it seems that Italian Govt have strict rules about heating in winter. We were able to have our heating turned off, but were not permitted to have the air conditioning on. Therefore our room was still warm due to having a room towards the top of the building…

title: Fiftieth in Florence
review: A short walk from the train station, we found the Golden Spa Hotel in a beautiful square, a stones throw to one designer shop after another, from Cartier to Stella McCartney.  Very close to the Uffizi Gallery & the Ponte de Vecchio, and easy walk to the covered Market, Michael Angelo's David & the Da Vinci museum.  The Hotel was lovely, great room, superb Jacuzzi, and great breakfast.  I would thoroughly recommend it.

title: A great trip
review: Dear Jonathan S,  Thank you for your nice review.  We are happy to know that you have enjoyed your stay with us and extemely glad you would highly reccomend us.  We hope you will be back in Florence and that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Our stay in Florence
review: By far one of the best and nicest people in the hotel. At the front desk they helped us finding nice places to eat every night. The complimentary first drink every night was very nice with food. all the people that worked there were very helpful and nice. They would go out of there way to help us and find answers on all our questions. The free mini bar was also a very nice touch.

title: Anniversary trip
review: Dear rlobel25,  Thank you for the great review.  Here at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, we want our guests  feel welcome and we love to help them as much as we can so that they can have an amazing time in Florence, that is why I am extremely glad to know that you have appreciated our services.  We hope you will come back to Florence and to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful hotel for a romantic stay in Florence
review: This hotel is magical, it is well situated, in the heart of Florence, you can walk to all the main attractions. The personnel at the reception is very friendly, helpful and professional. The breakfast is really good. The spa is perfect for relaxong at the end of the day.

title: 2017 Summer Italy Trip
review: Dear SabrinabM1430WH  Thank you for the wonderful review!  It's always a pleasure to know that our guests had a nice stay with us, even more when our hotel is defined magical!  Thank you for the nice words about the staff as well, i am sure they will  all appreciate your kindness.  We hope we will have the chance to welcome you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office manager

title: Best hotel in Florence
review: This hotel was at the end of a 17 day stay in Northern Italy and the Alps. It was very relaxing and a good value. The staff was friendly and helpful. They offered suggestions for things to do and coordinated visits we had to the property. I would go there again.

title: Wonderful Hotel in a Wonderful City
review: Dear Frank C,  Thank you for the nice review.  We like to hear that we have been helpful during your stay and we are sincerely looking forward to welcome you back to Florence and to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Kindest Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Great service and great location
review: My husband and I were thrilled with both the accommodations and the service during our 3 night stay! Room was comfy and elegant and the evening happy hour and daily breakfast was more than we could have ever asked for!

title: Great Stay in Florence
review: Hotel is very well situated and very good value. Service, food and cleanliness all all top notch. Would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for good value in Florence. The street location was easy to find for the taxi driver but pay attention to the location when going for your site seeing when walking.

title: とても良かったです☆
review: Dear Stephen T,  Thank you for the great review!  We are happy to know that you've enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for reccomending us!!  We hope to have you back at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Best Regards  Elisa Costoli-Back Office Manager

title: Golden Tower in Florence
review: 部屋も綺麗でしたし、広々としていて高級感がありました‼︎朝のモーニングビュッフェも美味しかったです‼︎初めてのイタリア旅行だったのですが、お陰様で素敵な思い出が沢山出来ました‼︎スタッフの方の対応も親切で好印象でした‼︎ Thank you for your friendly service. Morning buffet is nice! Room is clean and classy.We had a good time here.

title: Golden trip - Golden tower
review: Tremendous central location.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Great accommodations.  All of these aspects made our stay at the Golden Tower Hotel the highlight of our trip to Europe!  Wonderful breakfast each day and wine in the evening.  Walking distance to everything in the city.  We're looking forward to staying there again!

title: Fantastic hotel!
review: Dear Dan R,  Thank you so much for your words!  We are delighted to know that your stay with us was the highlight of your trip to Europe, and happy to hear that you've appreciated our services. We are looking forward to have you back next time you decide to come to Europe!  Kindest Regards Elisa Costoli-Back Office Manager

title: hospitality
review: The service cleanliness and hospitality was excellent and it is very well located and the food was delicious  ,I recomend it very much.The people who attend you is very kind and the place is so beautiful,when we come back to Firenze we are sure to go there , we can go by walk to visite every interest place in Firenze ,it is near puente vechio ,and near Uffizy gallery ,and when we walk on the street outside ,we can imagine to be in middle age ,it is a very amazing sensation

title: Way great,
review: Dear yolamendoza,  Thank you for your nice review. We truly love to know that our service has been appreaciated and that you will be our guests again next time you come to Florence!  We can not wait to welcome you back!!  Kind Regards  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Four Ladies in Firenze!
review: Service was amazing!  room small but great! Requested vegan help before visiting,they acknowledged at check in as well as had chef make special vegan breakfast offerings -they should call Waldorf Rome Cavalieri and explain how service is done.

title: 30th Wedding Anniversary Trip
review: Dear JimmyJL,  Thank you for your "great" review! We also would like to thank you for let us know your food preference. We always have some vegan and vegetarian food in our Buffet breakfast but we are always pleased to prepare some extras for our guests! We look forward to welcoming you again for your next trip in Florence and please do not hesitate to contact us back!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Wonderful Visit
review: Damsels in Distress we were not, but Alessio at Golden Tower Hotel and Spa made our stay 100 tines more delightful! His dinner recommendations, sightseeing tips and final send off to the Tuscany region were personal and well received and our stay in the beautiful city of Firenze will always be a highlight of our 10 day “girls” trip!

title: One of the best hotels in Florence!
review: We arrived to the hotel late in the day tired and hungry to be greeted by one of the nicest front desk people we meet on our whole trip. The room was like something out of a movie ( we had a suite and would pay extra for it again) velvet couches, a bathroom that was basically a spa and the crowning jewel was the soaking tub on the balcony. Being tired from the days travel we decided to order room service and we were not disappointed! Breakfast is served in what looks like a Victorian cafe straight out a book and the food was delicious. I can’t wait to go back and will definitely be staying here again.

title: WOW!
review: Dear Amber W,  We are very delighted in reading your fantastic review! We feel very proud in being one of the best Hotel in Florence , we always try to do better and thanks to your feedback, we understand that we are going in the right direction.  We look forward to welcoming you again and please do not hesitate to contact us directly!  Kindest regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Beautiful stay 😀💜😍
review: Superb hotel in every way! Would definitely stay again. Everything was perfect.... just perfect. The Super king bed was heaven, the staff amazing and the whole hotel had a gorgeous aroma of Florence De Flor - a must to visit whilst there!

title: Just Wonderful!!
review: Dear Graeme C,  Thank you for your Wonderful words for us! We always try our best in order to satisfy all our guest's needs and we feel proud when we realize that you had a perfect stay! We hope to welcoming you again soon and please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Gem in the heart of Florence!
review: My mother and I stayed at this lovely hotel in the summer! The service was impeccable, location fantastic and facilities great!  Florence is a wonderful city and we throughly reccommend a visit. We already want to come and stay in this fabulous hotel again!

title: Amazing experience
review: We stayed at the Golden Tower on our last night in Italy before our flight home from Florence. The hotel was beautiful and they offered a wonderful happy hour with delicious food and sparkling wine. The front desk associates were incredibly welcoming and gave us a fabulous recommendation for dinner which also ended up being our favorite meal of the trip. My only complaint was that we didn't find them sooner and stay longer! We stayed in the tower suite which was huge and had a spa bathtub and rain head. Will definitely come back next time we are in Florence.

title: Best place in Florence
review: Dear David L,  Thank you so much for your nice feedback. We strive in offering the best possible service,and hear that you felt so welcome and that the reccomendation you've been given ended up to be the best meal of your trip makes us feel nothing but proud of all our staff members! We hope we will see you again soon at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Kind Regards Elisa Costoli- Back Office Manager

title: Perfect in the midst of everything!
review: The hotel and staff were fabulous. Great location. Great recommendations. Great customer service. The room was beautiful and comfortable. The bar/restaurant food was very good. The staff provided us with a sack lunch twice. Once for a day trip and our final day leaving early in the morning. We would definitely stay there again and recommend this hotel to others.

title: Flornce Italy, Excellent Hotel
review: Dear stambj,  Thank you for your kind words.  We are honoured to be considered by yourself the Best Place in Florence, and the whole team is delighetd to know that you've appreciated the service you've been given duting your stay. We look forward to welcome you back at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Kindest Regards Elisa Costoli-Back Office Manager

title: A LUXURY BOUTIQUE HOTEL
review: This small boutique hotel is a hidden gem. Just steps from the center of town, it is on a quiet courtyard. The staff is welcoming, the rooms are charming with fine linens and the breakfast buffet is delicious. We had a wonderful visit and will certainly return.

title: Fantastic accommodations wonderful staff
review: As with many hotels in Europe this has multiple room designs.  Our room was a two story with the master suite upstairs.  We were there on a wine tour and used this hotel as our base of operations.  Wonderful bar and morning breakfast.  Nearby to most of the main attractions which make Florence so much fun.

title: Flawless Service and Experience, and Terrific Location
review: Dear Gornking,  Thank you for your fantastic review. We are glad to hear that you've appreciated our staff and our services and we hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you  back to the Golden Tower Hotel  &  Spa.  Kind Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Flawless and friendly
review: I can't say enough about the experience my wife and I had at the Golden Tower Hotel 2 weeks ago. From the moment we checked in, outside of walking to the elevator, there wasn't much for us to do as all of our needs were attended to during our stay. The ambience was classic, without feeling stuffy. And any hotel positioned in the old city is a perfect location.

title: Great location to explore
review: Dear TravelingBuffs,  We sincerely thank you for your kind review. We strive in offering the best service to our guests and we are extremely happy to know that you felt welcome and enjoyed your stay with us. We hope we would have the chance to welcome you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, in the meantime we thank you again for your nice feedback.  Kind Regards Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous hotel
review: This place was complete luxury, and the staff made us feel nothing but welcome. It seems like most elegant establishments are not able to make their guests feel at home, but this place is an exception. The room was gorgeous.  The whole hotel was beautifully appointed.  The joint was Super Clean. The food was amazingly delicious. And the people on staff were inexhaustibly gracious.   I plan to return next year with my mother, now that my little sister and I have fallen in love with the tower of gold.

title: A Jewel in Florence
review: We hope to return to the Golden Tower in the future. We had such a wonderful time there.  The professional staff responded to every request in a pleasant and efficient manner. The rooms were most comfortable and the food was delicious and well presented. We especially enjoyed happy hour each afternoon with fellow travelers.

title: A Golden Hotel helping to create Golden memories.
review: Dear SusanneS,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to know that your stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa met your expectations and that our staff and our services have been appreciated by yourself. We hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you again in our Hotel, in the meantime i would like to thank you again for your kind review.  Kind Regards Sara Carniel- Front Office Manager

title: A Nice Hotel, Except for Dangerous Unhygienic Practices!
review: This 5 star Hotel with Spa is situated in the heart of the fashion district with high end stores trying to tempt you away from the beauty that is Firenze (Florence).  A warm welcome from the staff with our receptionist, Alessio Toloni, warmly greeting us upon our arrival and sitting us down with a complementary drink and welcoming chat about the hotel and its facilities while our luggage was taken to our rooms.  Everyday the staff welcomed us warmly asking how our morning or evening went. Our room was cleaned daily with the addition of a turn down service every evening.  The rooms are clean and compact, ideal for a city break or longer visits. With only 27 rooms spread over 4 floors, it is never overly packed.  Breakfast is freshly served and again the service first class.  The…

title: Above and Beyond!
review: Dear ShaunBoland, Thank you for your kind review. We are sincerely pleased that you've enjoyed your stay with us, and we will share your review with Alessio and with whole team, who will be extremely happy to know that their services made you feel even more welcome. We are glad to know that you've appreciated our SPA and our little buffet in the reception area,and, as our hotel strive for offering  the best possible service to our guests ,to kinow that you left with some Golden Memories makes us proud. We hope we will have the chance to welcome you again at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, but in the meantime we would like to thank you again for your feedback. Kind Regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Amazing
review: Ordinarily I would write a fairly glowing review on the Golden Tower hotel since it is conveniently located a tiny bit away from the tourist throng, has comfortable rooms and even boasts a spa, but we discovered a very troubling unhygienic practice and strange attitudes about it.   Sometimes a generous sized basket of fresh fruit is placed in the rooms upon a guest's arrival or departure. We received one and ate only a little of ours. Then the next morning we wanted to eat some more fruit but it was gone. Upon my inquiry the front desk clerk said it was only a "welcome" and that whatever was not eaten the first day was removed and served to other guests!!!!   That means the fruit you eat may have been exposed to the germs of others. In this age of fast airplanes where people…

title: Superb
review: It's an expensive hotel but you don't mind paying it once you've stayed there. The staff are exceptionally polite and professional, the rooms are excellent, breakfast is very good indeed, the location is perfect and I liked the spa. Not one thing to knock about this hotel except that the hot water in the shower (room 506) was quite difficulty to keep warm. I think that was because it was so high up. The Foodballer pub next door is great for a pint, there's a fantastic pizzeria within 50 meters and it's just such a good hotel to relax and feel secure.

title: luxury
review: Dear Cheshireguitar_1976,  Thank you for your amazing review. We are so glad to read that you really appreciated our Hotel and our Service! regarding the hot water in the room, we confirm that we had a temporary pressure deficit but everything has been fix immediately.  We look forward to welcoming you for your next visit in Florence and please conatact us directly,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Brilliant Hotel with Fantastic Staff
review: Is an expensive hotel, but some times you deserve to give yourself a treat, and spend the night in a place where everything is just perfect. The sheets, the mattress, the pillows, just dreamy. Umbrellas in the reception if it starts to rain, a snack in the lobby if you couldnt make it to breakfast, which in fact was really good. It does´nt matter if the room is small, the bathroom is still big and great.

title: Awesome stay, beautiful grounds...Only one small issue
review: Dear Andrea h,  Thank you for your lovely review. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa has been furnished with luxury materials and our beds are " heavenly beds " certificted to ensure the most comfortable sleep to our guests. We are 24 hours available for our guests and we try to guarantee them a great experience in Florence, as comfortable and possible.  We hope to welsoming you again and do not hesitate to contact us directly!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Excellent stay and wonderful staff
review: Recently stayed for 3 nights on B&B basis. Arrived Saturday lunchtime in time to catch football in Fashion Footballer Sports Bar next door. On arrival we were offered a complimentary drink from the bar and given details of the hotel. In the evening there is a happy hour from 18.30 where we had free prosecco and a finger buffet. On returning from our night out we asked the night porter for a nightcap and asked if he could put it on the room tab, only to be told that they were complimentary as well. Breakfast is excellent with a wide variety of choice plus prosecco if you want it. The hotel is spotlessly clean and the staff can't do enough for you. Location is also excellent within walking distance of everywhere. I would certainly recommend this hotel and will stay here again if I…

title: Best hotel in Florence
review: Florence/Firenze is one of the most beautiful cities I've seen, and the Golden Tower Hotel is the best hotel in Florence. The rooms are perfect, and the breakfast is delicious. If you want a special couples stay check out room 501, which has an hot tub.

title: Excellent smaller  hotel and spa with personalized service
review: Dear Manuel B,  Thank you for your wonderful review. You stayed in our Luxury Junior Suite with Jacuzzi which is a very romantic room for specail occasion. We have been very happy to host you during your visit in Florence and we hope to welcoming you soon!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Great Location, Welcoming staff, Nice Breakfast
review: The reception and the staff are most helpful. The rooms are very nice and the housekeeping staff are superb. The breakfast was rather limited but the food was of excellent quality. The juice was fresh and delicious. On our departure date Andrea from reception was a great help in finding transport for us because an accident had caused a traffic jam and we had difficulty getting a taxi. The location of the hotel is on a narrow street which is closed to traffic on one end so the hotel is quiet despite being only 3 minutes walk from the river Arno. We will definitely stay there again if we cone to Florence.

title: Perfetto. An enchantment of gracious hospitality, sumptuous food , and exquisite service
review: Dear retinadoc52,  Thank you very much for your review. Andrea and all the Staff have been happy to assit you during your stay till your departure. As you described, the Godlen Tower Hotel & spa is located in the heart or Florence, in Piazza Strozzi, in a pedestrian area very nearby to all the main attractions.  We hope to have the pleasure to welcoming you again in the future and please feel free to contact us directly for your next stay!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Great location and service. Recommend.
review: Superb location within 10 to 15 mins walk of all the major sights. Welcomed to hotel by lovely desk team and offered a glass of prosecco whole they chatted to us about the hotel and the location. They gave us a good feel for the main sights and offered to help out. All gently done. Room was very clean and well appointed. Good aircon and triple glazing (no real noise from the street). Breakfast was well prepared and staff were both friendly and quick, but did not hassle you. All in all an excellent quiet space near the centre but away from the hubub.

title: Golden Tower Hotel in FlorenceSa
review: Stayed one night in September 2017 with my wife.  Great location in the heart of the historic district. Difficult to drive to the hotel, but was able eventually to drive right up to the front door.  Highly recommend using the Valet service to take car of your car, 35 euros.   A garage will cost just as much.  Room was impeccable.  Great bathroom.  Lots of hot water.  Big shower/tub.  Very comfortable bed and pillows.  Quiet.  Air conditioning worked well. Included breakfast was very good.  In the evening there is a free glass of Prosecco and quite a large spread of hors d'oevres.  One could almost make a dinner of them.   Unfortunately for our entire visit the hotel WiFi was not working.   I had a miscommunication on the telephone about getting our car in the morning.  Be sure…

title: perfect for thise also with brain problems
review: Dear  jeffreyhubley, First of all, thank you so much for your comment about Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, very detailed and of course very appreciated.  We are very proud to hear that we have met your expectations, and you have appreciated quite everything about our Hotel. Regarding the WIFI, unfortunately we had some problems for outside causes independent of our will.  We look forward to welcoming back in the next future, and remain with our  best regards, Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great service and perfect location
review: the staff are so wonderful, my mum has a terminal brain disease, so I picked the hotel as the reviews were great. I emailed in advance to let them know we have issues and the staff were wonderful to my mum which made my stay perfect. Thank you to all of the staff for making my mums dream trip to Florence enjoyable and relaxing for us both

title: Great hotel and staff
review: Dear brenda_shelley, we are more than happy when we read reviews as yours because it means we have achieved the goal which is the satisfaction of our Guests!! Thanks to you for these wonderful words. I am going to share your review with all the team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and in the meanwhile we send you our  Best Regards, Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Perfect stay
review: Very generous room space. Staff were very accommodating. A lot of extra no- charge touches made it a great experience.  Location is close to all main sites.  Highly recommend this property when visiting Florence

title: perfect hotel and staff
review: we got really looked after for the 3 nights we stayed here. all the staff seemed like genuinely nice people and really made you feel welcome. hotel, room, food and service were the best we have ever stayed in. definately will stay here again if we visit florence.

title: Fomby Anniversary & Ewing Birthdays - Florence 2017
review: Dear phillip r, we thank you very much for your "perfect" review and really look forward to welcoming back soon. All our best regards,  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Superb
review: Once again our service was 5 star!  My husband and I stayed here in October 2016, and we were so pleased with Alessio and the other staff, that we refused to stay anywhere else.  Alessio was on vacation, however he came by the hotel to  see us..........so considerate. This time Andrea Pagni took really good care of us.  He was amazing........... kind, patient, gracious, helpful, courteous, and ALWAYS provided service with a smile!  I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice ambiance, kind staff, great food, city center location (1 mile to the train station and lots of restaurants and shops nearby in walking distance) and service with a smile.

title: Charming hotel with very caring staff!!!
review: Dear  katinalane2017, thank you so much for your wonderful review and for choosing the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for the second time!!!  One of our aims is to be focused on our guests, in order to make their experience unforgettable. So, thank you once again for your amazing feedback regarding the staff, Alessio and Andrea, they all will be informed about your amazing words.  We look forward to welcoming you for the third time in the next future, and remain  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Highly recommended
review: A great welcome in a special hotel.  We spent 5 days here and enjoyed every minute.  The staff were lovely and the location is perfect for central Florence. It would be difficult to find a better place to stay.

title: Great stay!
review: Very classy boutique hotel right in the heart of Florence. Very close to Ponte Vecchio. Notable were the nice breakfast buffet and the 6 à 8 apéro where they serve complimentary Prosecco and little appetizers.

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Dear Yvonne K,  thank you so much for your review. We are very happy to know that you have had a great stay with us and you appreciated all of our services, above all our breakfast and our happy hour.  Thank you again and hope to welcome back soon, Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Loved it!
review: This is the 1st time my daughter and I have visited this hotel.  We will certainly stay again.  Staff were excellent, pleasant and helpful.  Food was great and the hotel was in a lovely location, very near the shops which was a bonus for us!!  Easy walking to all places of interest.  Would recommend.

title: Great hotel in perfect location
review: Dear Mrs maureenp824, we thank you very much for your great review. We are so happy to know your stay with us has been "Wonderful".  We are very proud of our job, expecially when it is paid off with comment like yours.  We really hope to welcoming back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and in the meantime we remain with all our best regards,  Sara Carniel - front Office Manager

title: The place to stay in Florence
review: This is my 2nd visit to the hotel. It's just lovely. Cannot recommend the staff and the hotel enough! The spa is delightful and a warm welcome was provided. Very respectful and accomodating. Some lovely little touches like a biscuit or sweer left on your pillow each night. How lovely is that!

title: Fantastic stay
review: A great, central location. Very friendly and helpful staff, rooms are immaculate and breakfast was good. Didn't eat dinner in the hotel, but the concierge were great at getting us a last minute reservation on our first night. Visited the spa area twice and it was quiet both times. The afternoon drinks/ snacks offer a welcome break from the busy Florence streets.

title: Absolute perfection
review: Dear Philip R,  Thank you very much for your review! We are so delighted you had a " Fantastic stay" with us and we hope to welcoming you again soon.  We remain at your full disposal,  Best regards,  Elsia Costoli Back Office Manager

title: A fabulous retreat in Florence
review: Well, where do I begin describing this beautiful hotel.and its wonderful staff. We flew into Pisa Centrale and got the train down to Florence, the hotel was a lovely 10 minute wall from the station through  the beautiful streets of Florence. The moment we arrived at the hotel we were warmly welcomed by Alesso who was throughout our stay friendly, helpful and very knowledgeable. We only.arrived with hand luggage but this was taken from us and after being shown around the hotel we were taken to our room. We had a twin room which was beautiful, the bathroom was gorgeous and there were slippers and dressing robes all ready for us to use the beautiful spa if we wanted to. The rooms were very well air conditioned but extremely quiet as i am a light sleeper i was a little worried the…

title: Golden Tower Hotel Florence
review: Dear Jodie T,  Thank you very much for your lovely and detailed review! Alessio and all the staff has been very happy to assit you during your stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and we hope to wleocming you back again soon!  BBest regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Luxury at its best
review: Our stay was absolutely perfect.  The location on a large open plaza was walking distance to shops and attractions.  Our room was beautiful and we thoroughly enjoyed having our breakfast and Happy Hour in the delightful bar/lounge.  The staff was helpful, courteous and gave us great information on restaurants.

title: AMAZING HOTEL
review: Amazing hotel in the center of it all. Impeccable detail to details. Beautifully decorated rooms and suites. The entire staff is soooo nice and helpful in every way.  This is our second stay at this beautiful boutique hotel, and will continue to come back. Just minutes to everywhere you want to go This hotel is a giant diamond!! Say hello to Andrea at the front desk and the rest of their Golden family  Enjoy!!

title: 5* Luxury in a Central Location
review: Dear Webgd,  Thank you very much for your " Amazing" review! Having you back  in our Hotel has been a pleasure for us and we hope to do always better for your third visit at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa! Please do not hesitate to contact us !  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Fantastic Hotel in the heart of Florence
review: This is a lovely Hotel just a stones throw from all the shops, restaurants and tourist attractions. Our room was spacious, beautifully presented and the breakfast was second to none. We would highly recommend staying here as you won't be disappointed.

title: Simply amazing
review: Dear marky323, thank you so much for your positive review and for your recommendations.  We are glad you spent wonderful time with us and really look foward to welcoming you back in the next future.  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Superb Location
review: A Fantastic Hotel centrally located in the heart of Florence. All the major attractions such as the Duomo, the Uffizi Gallery etc. are a short walk away from the hotel. We received a free minibar with our Junior Suite, a first for us. Also, free drinks and snacks were offered in the evening happy hour, which was excellent. The staff were excellent and couldn't have been more helpful. The only fault, was that the Sauna could have been slightly hotter, but didn't really matter considering the overall enjoyment of our stay at this wonderful hotel.   One word of advice - Do not Drive in with your own car to the hotel unless you are familiar with the roads in Florence, as there are no directions to the hotel on its website.

title: The best hotel in Italy
review: The hotel is very good located, very beautiful and clean, the best is the staff, everybody is very kind and warm, we felt like in home. The beds are amazing, the room size perfect, a very comfy living room to seat there, relax, read a book or enjoy a glass of prosecco. Absolutely recommended!!

title: Four Star Hotel
review: Dear CharmyF,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review! Being the best Hotel you had in Italy makes us feel so proud and happy of our job and more entusiastic in keep going on the right direction. We hope to welcoming you again in the next future and please feel free to contact us !  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Lovely hotel, great location
review: My second visit and my second review with lots of differences in a negative ways  First and most important their is no five star hotel in the world that puts one person only to manage the hole hotel in the night shift Not even a security person  Second the breakfast is less than average for so called five star hotel  Also the hotel needs renovation  Still recommended if you are ok with four star hotel  Great location for shopping and exploring the city

title: Simply Superb..The best doesn't have to be the biggest..!
review: We stayed here for 5 nights in June 2017.  This is a great hotel, with very helpful staff.  Our room was very large, very clean and had a comfortable seating area.  Complimentary bottled water and various drinks in the fridge was a very nice touch.  The bathroom was beautiful, large and very modern.  Our stay included breakfast in the morning in a beautiful  dining room.  There was a good selection of hot and cold food for breakfast which was excellent.  The location was perfect, in a small plaza, quiet but close to all the tourist spots.  I would definitely stay in this hotel again and highly recommend it.

title: Wonderful hotel and outstanding staff!
review: Dear Floatie,  Thank you for sharing you experience at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa with other people in TA. As per your description, our Hotel is located in the city center walking distance to all the most important masterpieces and shopping of Florence, but it is also a very quiet area. We ar happy you also have appreciated our breakfast wich has been renovated with a lot of selections of hot, cold, vegetarian, vegan and gluteen free dishes.  We hope to welcoming you in the future and please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Service with a smile
review: This was our second stop for our family trip to Italy.   We travel several times a year and found the people in Italy to be a bit curt and not very welcoming. However, when we got to the Golden Tower Hotel and Spa in Florence an intern named Catalina Exner welcomed us very warmly and made our stay in Florence a pleasure.  She provided excellent service and knowledge with a genuine smile.  The hotel is very clean and bright.  Daily room service was extremely detailed.  It was nice to return to a clean and organized room after a day of excursions.

title: Outstanding
review: Dear mowsfour,  Thank you for your lovely review! Catalina is very happy to know that she has been very helpful for you and she ensured you a pleasent stay. As you mentioned, our housekeeping service is available twice per day and is one of our strongest point.  We hope to do better and better in the future and we also hope to welcoming you again,   Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Quality in the heart of Florence
review: Great hotel,super clean,fresh,brilliant staff can't help enough,it's a small hotel 27 rooms but this was ideal,so quiet,rooms are refreshed twice daily!  Spa area has sauna,steam room & big jacuzzi but no pool!  Spa staff great & massages brilliant,virtually no traffic at hotel street as one end is a dead end!  Only small criticism is you pay €10 extra for poached or scrambled eggs & €12 for French toast,I pointed out this to hotel but don't know if it will change!  The hotel is so central for shopping,bars & site seeing the major places!  Definitely would go back!

title: One of the best
review: Dear Peter C,  Thank you for spending time in reviewing our Hotel! We are so delight to read that you have more than appreciated our Hotel and our services. Regarding the extra cost for breakfast we would like to precise that our Buffet breakfast is included for all our rooms and it provides hot and cold dishes such as boiled & scrumbled eggs, bacon, sausages, cold cuts, salmon, little sandwiches, bread and toasts, homemade cakes, croissants, yogurts, cornflakes ect... Moreover we also have an extra breakfast's Menu on the table for who wish a special express cooked dish such as omelettes and poached eggs. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa also have a Beauty Center which help to guarantee an extraordinary stay as you had.  We hope to welcoming you again and please contact us directly for your next stay in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Excellent experience
review: From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, the team at the Golden Tower went out of their way to provide whatever we needed - and they did it with personality and a smile. From the recommendations on restaurants (which were great!) to the happy hour with free drinks / snacks to resolving every query we had, on it made the stay that much more enjoyable.  The hotel doesn't sell itself on being large and flashy - what it provides is a great location and real quality in its staff and its facilities.  I would definitely stay there again if I return to Florence.

title: Deserves at least 10 stars!
review: We stayed here for several days on a recent trip and can't say enough good things about the staff here.  The standout for us was Matilda, but everyone was fantastic.  It is not a huge hotel, we really appreciated that.  Our room was wonderful, by far the best on our month long trip.  Our daughter was with us and the fact that the room had two bathrooms was fantastic for getting ready in the mornings.  The breakfast was really very good, and again the service was super friendly.  The hotel greeted us with a folder that included a great map, day trip and restaurant recommendations, museum and attraction hours, etc.  The front desk made reservations for us and the location of the hotel is perfect, we will be back and we will definitely make a point of staying here again.   We…

title: Fantastic stay, wonderful staff!
review: Dear jjp333,  Your review is absolutely one of the most energizer one for all our Staff! Matilde is very happy to read that you appreciated her help as well as us. We always try to make our guests' stay one of the best they never had and we are so proud when we realize that we got it! We keep going in the same direction and hopefully we do also better, so please contact us for your next trip in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Gorgeous hotel with lovely staff
review: As we flew in and out of Florence for our recent Italian vacation, we stayed for 2 nights in a Family Room at the beginning of the trip and for 2 nights in two non-adjoined rooms for the last 2 nights.  Although both were great, the Family Room in particular was excellent for our family.  It is two full rooms that share a common entrance door.  It was very convenient as we had a lot of space but easy access to our teenagers.  As mentioned in prior reviews, it is the staff that makes Golden Tower outstanding.  Everyone was extremely helpful, from assisting with museum tickets, to restaurant suggestions and reservations to arranging transportation.  The restaurant and bar staff were also wonderful. The evening happy hour is a great way to unwind prior to heading out to dinner…

title: A golden treasure
review: Dear lisacR5297KK,  Thank you for your " fantastic" review and for your nice words for our Staff! As you well described, the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa offers Family Suite accommodations upon request. Our Family Suite are the perfect solution for family which wish to stay connected but without renouncing their own privacy. Infact, it is 2 adjoining rooms with a common area between and their own private bathroom.  We hope to welcome you again for your next trip in Florence and please feel free to contact us in order to guarantee one of our Family suite again!  Best regards,  Elsia Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Perfection
review: We stayed here for three nights. The location is absolutely perfect; close to all the shops and attractions but yet felt private.  The staff were the best I've ever experienced; friendly, attentive but not overly in your face. Our room was gorgeous and always well presented and cleaned.  Having the spa was just perfect; we used it as an escape out of the mid day heat. The canapés and procesco was a lovely touch and canopes changed every evening which was really good.  The breakfast was also fresh and again the staff in the restaurant were very professional and friendly.  Would highly recommend this hotel and will be back! Thank you to the team for making our stay so PERFECT!

title: Truly golden
review: Fantastic hotel. Wonderful amenities. Peaceful and tranquil. Large rooms with modern bathroom. Lobby is presidential. Breakfast is elegant . They offered slider sandwiches and nice cakes upon entry . Staff were very pleasant. Wifi was high speed (and truly high speed: important for those connecting with family abroad, especially facetime ).

title: Perfect stay
review: Dear Saurabh,  thank you so much for your wonderful review. In a few lines you have touched all of our most important our main strengths. Breakfast and WIFI are, despite what other hotels do, are included in the room rate.   We look forward to welcoming back in the next future and thank you again,  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - front Office Manager

title: Golden tower
review: This was the most perfect accommodation in the most perfect location. Very central. The hotel was spotless, the staff friendly and helpful, breakfast delicious and a free minibar! When we revisit Florence, which we most certainly will, this is where we will stay!

title: Very charming and great location
review: Dear lfox2801,  thank you so much for your "perfect review". We are very glad to have met all of your expectations. All of us believe in our Job and we try to do it the best possible to satisfy our Guest's needs and we are very proud to know that in your nxt visit in Florence you want stay again here. THANKS!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the next future, and remain  Kindest regards Sara carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Hot summer days in Florence
review: Very kind staff Really efficiency and helpful Hotel vey good place in city and very quiet Hotel very nice to be Very pleasant Recommend  to be in this place at Florence You can go everywhere very easily The hotel is very clean

title: Nice hotel, great location
review: The location is great, in the centre and most main attractions within walking distance. Hotel staff friendly. All areas of hotel clean and looking fresh. I was slightly disappointed with the size of the room for a 5 star on international standards but (having only been to Florence once) I am guessing that it is average size given the central location in the historic city centre.

title: Delicious breakfast!
review: Dear Paul B,  thank you for your comment. As pointed out the location is great, our Hotel is settled in the heart of Florence and most main attractions are walking distance. Moreover, the Golden Tower is a "boutique Hotel" inside in a medieval building and this is why we do not have huge common areas (lobby, breakfast room, spa) and some of our rooms (for example classic rooms) have standard size.  We hope to welcome you again in the next future and we remain our, best regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel in the heart of the city
review: Beautiful hotel and very friendly staff. Clean and minimal design on the heart of Florence. The breakfast was delicious with a wide range of top quality food and drink and lots for the vegetarian. The only downside was we didn't have time for the spa. Next time.

title: Great service
review: Dear Richard R, thank you so much for your positive review. We are glad to know that you appreciated our Breakfast, we are working hard to improve it. It was a shame not have used our jewel, our beautiful SPA but it will be an excuse to come back. Thanks again!  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Best hotel I have been to in a long time!!
review: Friendly staff, amazing location and clean rooms. Great afternoon snacks and individual service which makes one feel special. Breakfast was good but selection was limited. Would definitely recommend in Florence.

title: 5 Star Luxury and Exceptional Customer Service
review: Far and away our favorite hotel in Italy.  STAY HERE... you will not be disappointed.  Every employee went above and beyond to make us feel like VIP guests.  It was our honeymoon and they surprised us with Prosecco and a fruit platter one day, the next day perfume, chocolate, and cantoni biscuits.  The breakfast was amazing and we enjoyed the evening happy hour.  I highly recommend staying in a suite.  The one we stayed in had a jacuzzi and a balcony.  The hotel is centrally located and within walking distance to great restaurants and shopping.  I want to thank each and every employee for making our honeymoon stay at Golden Tower memorable.  We look forward to seeing you again.

title: Can't wait to come back!
