review: Dear TXfoodwinetravel,  Thank you very much for your " exceptional " review. We also would like to thank you for having done with us your Honeymoon. We are always excited when our guests decide to share with us a such special event of their life. Please do not wait long time to come back... We look forward to hearing form you soon,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: We are impressed!
review: I spent many hours choosing just the right hotel for our special trip to Florence to celebrate my daughter's 18th birthday - and I can say that all that research paid off. Absolutely perfect in every way, from the location to the wonderful breakfast buffet and apertivo in the evening. The spa was gorgeous and I got lucky and had it all to myself for two night's running - heaven after a long day's sightseeing. On top of all that plus a very comfortable, clean room I'd like to give a special mention and thanks to all of the staff who were at all times friendly, polite and professional and made us feel so very welcome. I would not hesitate to come back here and would definitely recommend it to anyone thinking of visiting Florence - you won't be disappointed!

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear Brettingham,  Thank you very much for your wonderful words spent for us! We are very proud to have been choosen by you for a such special event! We hope to welcoming you for the next occasion and please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Beautiful property, lovely people!
review: I do not want to tell how comfortable, clean, cozy, luxury and conveniently located this place is. It is expected from a 5 star boutique hotel in the center of Florence. You get what you paid for. The real treasure of this place is the STAFF. Somehow the Golden Tower team manages to create very warm and friendly environment. It feels like you finally visit old friends after long time being apart.  Thanks a lot to everyone for making our stay in the Golden Tower so unforgettable! Sara, Alessio, Fabiola - I hope we'll meet again! Grazie molte! And EXTRA THANKS to Fabiola for designing a fabulous cocktail for my birthday!  We would definitely stay in Golden Tower next time we are in Florence.

title: Amazing service!
review: The impeccable service of this hotel is what makes it 5 star!  They love to cater to your every need.  Thank you Golden Tower for a memorable 4 night stay!  Cocktail hour in the evening and a lovey catered breakfast.

title: Went there for a couple of nights to celebrate our 30th Wedding Anniversary
review: Dear sarahyu15,  thank you so much for your positive review. We are so glad you spent wonderful time with us. We appreciate it very much. Our Happy Hour is ideal to relax yourself after a day spent to visit our beautiful city and our rich and various Buffet Breakfast is the best way to start the day.  We look forward to welcoming you in the future, and remain  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous experience
review: We had a junior suite on the 5th floor, it was really nicely appointed, and very clean, the room had a spa bath which was great, the bathroom had a double shower cubicle, bidet and toilet. The mini-bar was stocked with plenty of drinks which were free and not charged to the room, it was restocked each day. The staff very friendly and they just could not do enough for you, nothing was too much trouble, each night they sent us up top quality prosecco with snacks. They even sat us down upon arrival to explain what to see how to get there and what to do during our short visit. I would highly recommend the hotel.

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear alancaddy,  thank you so much for your wonderful review. What you describe is our Junior Suite with jacuzzi, one of our most romantic and special room.The minibar is included for all rooms except the Classic rooms and it is restocked all days.  Thanks also for the wonderful words dedicated to the staff, We do our best to make our Guest's stay as pleasant as possible. We are really very happy you enjoy your stay and for recommend us to other guests.  We look forward to welcoming back in the future, and remain  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Rude reception, tacky decor
review: Our room was on the 5th floor.  Spotlessly clean and amazingly comfortable.  The hotel is ideally situated for all the local sightseeing and shops.  It is in a quiet location.  The staff just couldn't do enough.  They were so helpful and friendly.  Would highly recommend a stay here - it's great.

title: Charming
review: Delightful hotel on a quiet side street with small spa and exceptional service. Spent a two night break from our Airbnb to have a real bathroom with a real shower. Nothing wrong with a little luxury or a working wi-for.  Breakfast room charming. Movie theater across the street and an excellent pasta restaurant within steps of hotel.

title: Wonderful break
review: Dear Stephanie J,  Thank you very much for your review. We are proud to have been helpful to rescue you from your previous stay. As you said, we are placed in a pedestrian small street in the most a exclusive area of Florence in Piazza Strozzi, very nearby to the main attaractions and activities of the city.  We hope to welcome you again in your next trip in Florence,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Awesome Hotel!
review: We booked a Deluxe room via BA with the flights and we find this is always good value for money. We were celebrating our 33rd Wedding Anniversary and the hotel obliged with a free bottle of Prosecco. We didn’t eat in the hotel, but they do have some small tasty bits to eat from 6.30 in the bar with a free glass of prosecco. The room wasn’t huge, but very well kept and quiet. They include an overview of where we are when we checked in and where the main sites are, but it still took us a couple of days to get our bearings. The position though is great, very central. (Taxi from Airport was 29€ and to the Airport €35). There is a free mini bar, cold soft drinks mainly. There is a ‘turn down’ service in the evening, with a sweet on the pillow and a bottle of water. We looked around…

title: Impeccable service and comfort.
review: Dear dekka57,  Thank you for having chosen the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for a such special event! We are glad that you hade great time with us and that you appreciated our services and our Staff.  We hope to welcome you back also for your next Anniversary!  Please feel free to contac us,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Golden tower hotel and spa
review: Had a great stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa!  The staff, facility, room, location and even food were perfecto! We enjoyed the added little touches such as the turn down service and evening proseco.

title: Check in Process Horrible - Hotel itself is lovely
review: The hotel itself is very conveniently located, and the room itself is nice, although a bit small. This review is specifically about the check in process.   We arrived from an overnight train so we were exhausted. We came to the hotel at 9:30am and were informed it was booked, so we took a stroll around the city.  At noon I was falling asleep in my cappucino so we came back to the hotel and the receptionist showed me the status of our room on their computer system. It showed a logo of a maid in the room and the receptionist promised we would be able to go upstairs and rest as soon as it was ready.  We waited for 2 hours, intermittently sleeping on the couch in the lobby (it was rather awkward). I kept checking in, and each time the receptionists very pleasantly informed me the…

title: 4 Star Hotel with a 5 star rating
review: Dear Mrs. Nguyen,  We are very sorry to read your review, probably affected by the exhaustion resulting from an overnight train, as well as writing on the same check-in day and then still staying at the hotel.  Although the check-in time is well communicated in all web sites, besides Expedia where you booked, when possible it is a pleasure for us to assign the room before 3 pm.  All our staff is trained to provide the best welcome to all guests, as you can easily infer from most of our reviews and also in your case we have been working to make your stay as enjoyable as possible but unfortunately the first approach was not the best.  We are in very high season and fortunately the hotel is often fully booked, for this reason sometimes we cannot offer alternatives.  You arrived to the Hotel at 9:30 am asking if the room was ready. You were informed that the room was still busy with the guest in house and would not be ready before 3 pm. Anyhow the staff took your mobile phone number in order to inform you promptly in case the room would be ready in advance.  Our Staff did the check-in, they offered you the Breakfast and took care of your bags.  After a walking, you came back to the Hotel a few minutes after 12 pm. At that time the previous guest had just left the room and the maid started the first step of cleaning at 12.19 pm (all the accesses were recorded) and ended At 13:04. At 13.05, the second bellhop, (moquette cleaner and marble cleaner), entered the room and worked till 13:48. You entered in the room at 13.50 instead of 15.00, even if the carpet was not completely dried properly yet.  From 12:00 to 13:45 you came to the reception desk at least 3 times asking if the room was ready and to speed up the cleaning operations.  Considering your priority to have the room immediately our Staff proposed you the only room available at the moment, but unfortunately with 2 separate beds.  Nevertheless The staff assured you that the room would be ready in 5 minutes  Mrs. Sara, our front office manager, has been working with the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa since the opening (2009). Until today she has always been recognized by the guests, as well as being praised for their knowledge and professionalism.  Where did we go wrong? .... maybe in wanting to assign you a room with impeccable cleanliness?  Usually the cleaning time of a room is about 1 hour and half,  but upon every departure the situation could be different and these operations required more time.  Since your are still our welcome guest, we remain at your full disposal for any clarification information and / or necessity.  At the same time, we think that ratings/reviews, especially if negative, must first be constructive and should also be written at the end of the stay, evaluating their stay permanently.  Kindest regards  Lorenzo Mini (General Manager)

title: Romantic
review: This hotel is truly amazing. When you first enter it, it is in a side street off a Piazza - however once inside it takes on a whole new meaning of quality and service. We were met by two reception staff, and taken to the lounge and given a personal pre prepared folder with everything you wanted to know about the hotel, excursions, and excellent places to eat in the evening - even though they had their own resteraunt. At the briefing we also had a glass of Vino (complimentary).  We were then shown to our room - which was on the smaller side, however it came with a Balcony that you could sit out on. Breakfast was excellent, and all the staff were so friendly from the housekeeper to the General Manager. In the evening there was a happy hour and special thanks needs to be given to…

title: A memorable experience , wonderful Hotel in a great city
review: Dear Malcolm B,  Thank you very much for your review and we need to precify that The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is a 5 star Hotel indeed! We are very happy you had a wonderful stay with us and we went beyond your expectations.  We hope to welcome you again and please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: A gem in a wonderful location
review: The hotel has a very good location. You can instantly get into the Florentine ambiance. It is very nice decorated, very clean and the staff are very interested in serving and advising us. The breakfast is delicious, the happy hour is also included.  It has a small spa, very nice and relaxing. Everything is walking distance.  I highly recommend it.

title: Beautiful Hotel in the Heart of Florence
review: Amazing hotel in the heart of Florence. We stayed here for 3 nights and it was located in the center of everything. 5-10 min from all major sites (duomo, academia, etc) Rooms were great and service was amazing.

title: Could not have asked for better
review: Dear dnisenson,  First of all we thank you for sharing your feedback on tripadvisor. The Golden Tower Hotel is located in the city center deeply connected with history, art, monuments and also shopping. We are very happy to know you had a great stay with us and that you appreciated our room and our services.  We hope to welcome you back soon and please feel free to contact us,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli back office Manager

title: All round fabulous hotel
review: Front desk staff excellent, location excellent, accommodations excellent, attention to detail excellent, restaurant excellent. From the juice, water, and snacks in the lobby, to the complimentary wine and snacks in the restaurant, to the wine tasting, to the excellent house keeping, everything was geared towards the pampering of the guests

title: A Wonderful Hotel in the Center of Florence
review: Dear mrmch2001,  Thank very much for your " Excellent" review. As you wrote we are focalized in pampering all our guest because we like to make unique their experience in Florence and at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  We hope to welcome you again shortly and please feel free to contact us,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Sublime
review: Very convenient, clean and comfortable with exceptionally friendly and helpful staff. Situated in a quiet street just a few minutes walk from the Duomo this small hotel epitomised hospitality. Nothing was too much trouble from the staff and there were nice little touches like the free glass of prosecco in the early evening when you returned from a hard days sightseeing. If there is any complaint it would be that the wifi could be difficult to connect at times especially in the upstairs bedroom.

title: great hotel, good value too
review: excellent location with everything in walking distance. Loved the room with the balcony and enjoyed the spa. The staff is very helpful and friendly. Breakfast is good too. Would not hesitate to go back.

title: A highlight of our first trip to Italy
review: Dear Nicola P,  Thank you for your review. We are so happy you had a great time with us and you loved all our services. Please do not hesitate to contact us for your next stay in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Great location
review: Golden Tower in Florence was a true highlight of our vacation to Italy.  The room was spotless.  Turn down in the evening actually appeared to be an entire cleanup of the room again!  The desk staff was terrific.  Cocktails in the reception/lounge area were wonderful.  The restaurant staff was superb.  Breakfast buffet was great and we had one dinner there which was also extremely good.  We spent 4 nites there and although our hotels in Rome and Sorrento were terrific as well, the Golden Tower stood above them all due to the 'family' feel and attention to all details to make the experience wonderful.  THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU.

title: Fabulous Florence
review: Dear jblair490,  Thank you, Thank you,Thank you so much for your magnificent review. It makes us feel so proud of ourselves and it encourage us to keep going in the right directions. The Family feeling is exactly the one we wish spread to welcome and assist all our guests. We will be happy to host you again and please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Great hotel
review: Loved this hotel.  The location is amazing.  You can walk to great shopping, historical sites, and restaurants.  The service was also great.  The room was clean.  The staff were very nice.  The breakfast that was included with our room was also very nice way to start the day.

title: great service in the middle of a nice town
review: great Service, Best location, nice service, clean and modern rooms, great bathroom, nice bar and extensive breakfast, the Restaurant ist very good with a modern menue,Friendly ud restrained staff, good information at the front desk

title: Excellent Service and Accommodation
review: Dear Thomas M,  thank you so much for your "GREAT" review. Beautiful words that describe us from all points of view.  We really looking forward to welcoming you back, and remain Kindest regards  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Excellent service and location for a Florence Break
review: Stayed for 3 nights with my daughter.  All the staff were polite, friendly and extremely efficient.  The room was spacious and clean with excellent facilities.  The spa area was a lovely extra and the sauna and steam room were very nice.

title: I can't wait to come back
review: Dear FabFrankB,  thank so much for your wonderful review and we are more than happy you spent excellent time with us. All the Staff thank you for choosing the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Best regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Superb service
review: We stayed in two rooms over Easter weekend at this charming boutique hotel. Everything was immaculate and very Italian - lots of gold, marble and white leather. Rooms were smallish (it's a historic building) but well kitted out. The beds were extremely comfortable and the bed linen was top notch. Made me put Frette on my "buy list"...  The morning breakfast was lovely and had a wide selection to meet everyone's tastes. We also appreciated the welcome glass of prosecco at cocktail hour.   I never made it to the spa so can't say anything about it, but the hotel tv commercial in your room featuring a day at the spa for a glamorous couple gave us endless amusement.   The location is hand down perfect. A short stroll to all the big sites, and around the corner from the high end…

title: Fantastic Stay !
review: This is a very stylish boutique hotel located 10 mins from all major attractions. Straddling two of the main ' Rodeo Drive ' shopping streets and a stones throw from alfresco dining on the beautiful Plazzas...what more could you ask for ? Except wonderful, attentive staff who are the real selling point of this superb hotel where every member  of the team were polite, professional and couldn't do enough for us.. Special mention to Melenia who waited on our every need at breakfast and always met us with a smile. The rooms were beautifully appointed, excellent facilities and free minibar for us to enjoy !! We recommend this wonderful hotel to everyone, you won't be disappointed.

title: A very pleasant stay
review: Dear hbrooks27,  Thank you very much for a such fantastic review. We always try our best in order to guarantee a lovely stay to all our guests and we are so glad to read that you got it. Milena is very happy to read that you rember her and she really thank you. All the staff is pleased to know that you appreciated our assistance and we will happy to welcome you again in the next future.  Please feel free to contact us.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Excellent service and location
review: A very nice hotel with its friendly and helpful staff and comfortable and clean rooms. Just a few minutes walk to all the touristic attractions, museums and the train station. The breakfast is excellent with all the Italian delicacies. In the evenings the happy hour treats with a glass of Prosecco take away your exhaustion of the day.

title: Excellent hotel close to most attractions
review: Dear birsuc,  Thank you for you time spent in writing your review. Exactly:  the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is central located and we are happy to assist all our guests in making restaurant, museums and other reservations to get more easer their stay. As you mention, we try also to ensure a good start with our renewal Buffet breakfast and then we pamper our guests with a nice happy hour in the evenings.  We hope to welcome you again for your next trip in Florence and please feel free to contact us.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Superb
review: The staff at the Golden Tower are awesome!  The location of the hotel is surrounded by shopping. The room service was quick and the food was yummy.  We also had breakfast included.  Everything was in walking distance, which was great.

title: Best, Most Friendly Staff...Ever!!!
review: The physical accommodations and amenities were fabulous, but what distinguishes this visit was the service. Seriously, the best, most honestly friendly humans ever and we've stayed at 5-star Four Seasons and Ritz's around the world.

title: Best place to stay in Florence
review: Dear FredLang22,  Your review makes us feel so proud of ourselves and we thank you indeed for your magnificent words for us. As you said, we are humans beings and we try to spread all our positive attitude and friendly feelings to our guests in order to grant them an unforgettable stay in Florence! We got it and we are so happy!  We would like to welcome you again and please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Welcoming hotel in a great location
review: The hotel is gorgeous with a fantastic restaurant. I didn't have time to try the spa but it looked terrific and the entire hotel has a nice spa-like atmosphere (it smells wonderful everywhere you go!) The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful and the location of the hotel is perfect. I have stayed at several other hotels in Florence and this is the one that I will return to.

title: Perfect location on a  cute quiet street
review: Dear beccarod1,  We look forward to welcome you again shortly. You have the excuse to try also our Spa facilities! Thank you for your review and thank you for choosing the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa as your favourite Hotel  in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Outstanding!
review: My daughter and I stayed for 3 nights on a much needed short holiday.  The staff were welcoming, helpful and friendly.  Service was courteous and unobtrusive. Breakfast included fresh fruit, a plethora of pastries and cakes, cold meats and cheeses, and hot food. Little touches we would expect from a five star hotel included a glass of prosecco in the evening, bottles of water in the room and in reception, chocolates on the pillow at night, but most importantly, the room we had was spacious, clean and very comfortable. The only improvement we would make, would be not to have the big screen tv in the dining room switched on in the morning - probably because our little break was to 'get away'. I have a hunch that if it had bothered us that much and we had asked for it to be…

title: Great location for a luxury boutique hotel
review: My husband and I stayed here for a week and had a wonderful experience ! All the staff were friendly, courteous, and helpful. Breakfast buffet was a superb assortment of Italian and American breakfast items. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was gorgeous! The only thing I didn't like was we had no independent control of the room temperature and would've preferred it to be cooler. Then, when we decided to open the windows to let the cool air in, the passersby noises and smells came into the room with the cool breeze. Otherwise, great place to call second home in Florence !

title: Professional Staff, Great Location, Clean Rooms (twice daily!)
review: Dear Queences,  Thank you very much for your review. We have been work hard to improve our brekfast buffet and we are so happy to read that you find it " superb"!  Regarding the temperature in the room we apologize for the inconvenience but the temperature in Florence last week has been hotter than average.  We hope to welcome you soon and please feel free to contact us.  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: The Best
review: My wife and I are celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary and as part of our celebration we decided to visit Italy (the first time for both of us). Our first stop was Venice (5 star hotel was just okay - very musty). The 2nd stop was Rome (5 star hotel was clean, but staff was SNOBBY!!!). The final stop was Florence at the Golden Tower Hotel. The staff that works at this hotel are by far the most friendly, professional, kind, helpful, throw in whatever positive adjective you wish at this point that we experienced in Italy! The service in the bar/breakfast area was professional and courteous. The front desk folks were extremely helpful from sight seeing locations to getting us to the airport with a full belly. For us Americans, this is not a 5 star hotel that we are used to in…

title: Florence Hotel
review: Dear Iktlmann,  We cannot stop reading your review...it makes us feel more than proud! We really enjoy in being helpful and ensure the best experience to all our Guests! We hope not to wait such a long time ( 20 years)  to welcome you again!   We remaina t your full disposal for your next visit in Florence,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Awesome place to stay
review: Best hotel in town for city center life styles everything near by shopping near by best resturants near by I can't realy forget to thank the staff who made my stay so wonderful and charming I probably going back there next year

title: Amazing Location, Amazing People
review: My wife and I stayed here for three nights and loved it. It's walking distance to everything and boasts a good-sized room with great amenities. It includes breakfast and free snacks and a drink every night. The staff was super helpful and spoke great English. This was our favorite hotel on our 10-day Italy trip-we will definitely be staying there again.

title: A boutique hotel with great personality!
review: Dear clj1625,  What an honor is it to be your favourite hotel in Italy! We would like to thank you for your wonderful words for us and we will be very happy to welcome you again! Please feel free to contact us for your next trip in Italy!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Great location in heart of Florence
review: This is a small boutique hotel, recently renovated, with five floors and less than 10 rooms per floor. We stayed in one of the Junior Suites, which was setup in two levels, with a living room at the main level and the bedroom and bathroom in the mezzanine. It was quite comfortable, and the staff was always very professional. We can't praise the staff enough. A very tasty breakfast was included, and so was the happy hour with prosecco at 6pm. On the lower level there is a well-appointed spa with dry sauna, steam room and a custom jacuzzi, a fun place to wind up the day. Excellent location, just a couple blocks from all main touristic attractions. We definitely recommend it!

title: Superb Experiance
review: Dear Geraldo F,  Thank you very much for your review. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is a Boutique Hotel of just 27 rooms and different type of rooms. Junior Suite on two levels, as your, are the best solution for those wishing a special comfort, with a little linving room, a large bedroom, double bed + sofa bed. We have been very happy to host you and we hope to welcome you again for your next trip in Florence.  Pease feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Charming, small hotel near everything.
review: We were only in Florence for one night, but this hotel was centrally located to all the sites that we wanted to see, and we did whirlwind tour of the city in that one day, all on foot.  The accommodations were beautiful and luxurious.  Based on this limited time that we were there, our experience was good.

title: Great hotel
review: Super location,staff lovely,would go back,but to a bigger room if staying longer than a week..food very nice,breakfast continental style...nice bars and restaurants nearby..didn't use the spa this time but would next time..hotel nice and quiet no outside noise when we went...a nice touch is aperitif in the small restaurants...and nearby hotel does truffle hunting and tasting fantastic...love Florence it's a great city so much to see and do friendly people.

title: Luxury in historic Florence
review: Dear saliorjerry,  thank you so much for posting this wonderful and detailed review. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is a boutique Hotel of 27 rooms divided in 11 different categories... For sure you will find the best solutions for your needs!  We are very happy we have met all of your expectations and we have contributed to make you stay in Florence an unforgettable experience.  We look forward to welcoming back in the next future, and remain   Kindest regards   Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Outstanding hotel and staff
review: The welcome prosseco & fruit was a nice touch.  Concierge made reservations at excellent restaurants. The location is perfect for all historic sites. The breakfast was delicious and the 6:30 prosseco with creative hors d'oeuvres was enjoyable.

title: Wonderful hotel central Florence
review: Dear JerryCarol,  Thank you very much for your review! We are happy to know that your stay met your expectations and you have appreciated our services.  Please feel free to contact us for your next trip in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Superb Hotel and service
review: Absolutely amazing place. The spa was amazing, the room outstanding, the staff made us feel welcome and nothing too much trouble. Friendly, clean and fantastic room - the bed was huge and really comfortable. Can't praise this hotel enough - it should be rated as 5 star hotel.  Food was delicious and service was top class. Location is fantastic for visiting all tourist landmarks in Florence but is situated in a quiet side street. Absolutely amazing place and we will definitely be returning. If you're staying in Florence this hotel is a must stay.  Can't recommend the hotel enough.

title: Good quality for the price
review: Was there on St.Valentines Day. The staff is very nice and we received complimentary prosecco twice: during the happy hour in the lobby, and also in the evening in the spa.  BTW, the spa is very small, but has everything you need and because of boutique style it is not overcrowded. On St. Valentine's evening (6 p.m.) we met only 1 couple there. Considering there are 2 types  of saunas (steam room and hot sauna) and 2 types of showers (tropical one and ice-cold) - we were completely ok rotating. The jacuzzi was good enough to take 6 people, I think. Everything was working fine.   The price that we paid for the hotel completely corresponds to a 5-star hotel without "grandeur" but having all the features that a 5 star category should have.   He location is really awesome - around…

title: Great Hotel, Great Location
review: Dear Lifestyle Resor...P,  We really appreciate your time in reviewing our Hotel. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is a Boutique Hotel of just 27 rooms and a cozy Spa with Jacuzzi, steam bath, turkish bath and aromatic showers. The Spa is free for all our guests and is possible to book it also for private use in case of special occasions... We also have a beauty center to offer to our guest the best relaxation after a long day among monuments, galleries and museums!  We hope to welcoming you for your next trip in Florence and please do not hesitate to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: One of the best ever!
review: Great location, walking distance to the Ponte Vecchio bridge, The Palazzo Pitti, Piazza Duomo, and Piazzale Michelangiolo. Happy Hour at 6:30 is a must and the free appetizers take the edge off. The free breakfast and cappuccinos are a great way to start the day.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear Stephen T,  Thank you very much for your review. As you simply described the Golden Twer Hotel & Spa is located in the city center very nearby to all the main attractions and masterpieces of Florence. After a day visiting Florence you can relax in our Spa or alternatively in our Lounge, tasting some Italian delicacies before dinner with a glass of prosecco offered by the management.  In case you will come back in Florence please do not hesitate to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Charming little boutique hotel
review: We were there on vacation and booked a junior sweet. We have stayed in many great Hotels in the past in many countries, but nothing really compares to the experience we had at this hotel. The room was kept extremely clean and well stocked. The staff are the friendliest ever, and the most helpful. We had an issue with WiFi reception in our room, and complained about it to the front desk. Within hours, we had a temporary new WiFi router installed in our room. The free breakfast buffet that was included in the room fee was great value and inclusive of juices and coffee ..with a really great variety of food types and deserts. The location was just perfect; walking distance to everything. Will be back at this place whenever we go back. I highly recommend it.

title: First Class Boutique Hotel in Centre of Florence
review: Only stayed here 2 nights with my wife and daughter but could have stayed a lot longer! The hotel is small but very well decorated in true Florence style. The bedroom was spacious, clean and well furnished and the food we had was very good. But it was the quality of service from all the staff that made this a special stay, you are made to feel welcome all the time and they had this overwhelming desire to meet your requirements and make you feel comfortable. Would definitely return here!

title: Perfect!
review: Dear pmw2017,  thank you so much for your detailed and positive review! The Golden Tower is an historical palace where the Strozzi Family lived and in which guests can see the true Florentine style with their own eyes. You are right!  We are more thank happy we have met your expectations and beyond of all the staff Thank you!!!  We look forward to welcoming back in the next future, we remain with our best regards,  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great Hotel made even more special by the people!!
review: Great base for a long weekend in Florence. Perfectly situated for all the museums, churches and places of interest. Hotel is spotless and the staff are warm and friendly. Surprised me on my birthday with a cake and bottle of fizz! Can't wait to go back.

title: Florence one of the best Weekend breaks ever!
review: Dear Mobilerach,  Thank yo for your wonderful review. We can't  wait to welcoming you back to surprise you again!  Please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: GreatHotel
review: The hotel is truly an amazing place. But it really is the people who work there that make your stay in Florence such a memorable and unique experience. I surprised my wife by booking a 3 night stay in Florence, Golden Tower. Nothing was too much trouble and the hotel maintained a very warm, comforting and friendly environment. The perfect hotel to return to after a long day visiting the sites and experiencing the sounds of Florence. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a boutique hotel that has everything and leaves nothing to chance. Thank you Golden Tower for making my memories of Florence even more special. This Hotel definitely deserves no less than the 5 star rating and all this and we didn't even try the on site spar!! simple brilliant!!  Mr and…

title: Amazing!
review: This hotel is amazing, and the customer service is unbeatable! I highly advise The Golden Hotel to anyone who is traveling in or to Florence. They definitely helped to make our trip memorable! If we come back to Florence, we will be staying at this beautiful hotel, no doubt.

title: A unique Hotel
review: Dear Ekelso1214,  We are so happy to know that we reach our goal in making your trip memorable! We always try to do our best and we are so proud to know that we reached your expectations. This help us in doing always better and better ...   For your next trip in Florence please contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back office Manager

title: Best hotel I've ever stayed in!
review: When I return to Florence I shall be returning to this hotel. It is in a superb location. The rooms are very comfortable and the restaurant breakfast excellent. However, it is the staff that make this hotel so special. THE hospitality is genuine; their interest in caring and doing all that they can for you is authentic. I really felt as if I were family without any of them being intrusive.

title: The best hotel in florence for me
review: Dear Bernardoneill0,  you could not describe our attitude better than as you did. Thank you for those wonderful words about us. We are waiting for your return and please feel free to contact us!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Don't miss this wonderful hotel!
review: 3 nights in this wonderful hotel in this beautiful city was my lovely hubby's present to me for a special birthday.  It is only 5 minutes walk to the Uffizi and Ponte Vecchio.  It was everything you would expect from a 5 star hotel.  We stayed in room 504 - the one they use to promote the hotel.  Just lying and admiring the ceiling is worth it.  The original old features made it really very special.  The staff really spoilt me and made my stay even more memorable.  I cannot thank my hubby enough.

title: The golden standard
review: A truly golden standard from check in to check out. Many hotels should be calling Golden Tower and taking lessons in hospitality and customer service. Take it from an experienced traveler. Most attentive reception and restaurant staff made us feel like home. The room was spotless clean, and every detail was virtually flawless.

title: Florence Fun!
review: Dear Steve D,  this is a Golden review!!!! We are more than happy to read that you have had a perfect stay, and you have never met a Staff like ours. Your words make us very proud of our job!  THANK YOU  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful hotel
review: This location is ideal! Easy to walk to all the points of interest. The hotel was very nicely appointed and the rooms comfortable and charming. We had a loft room and it fit 4 comfortably. The staff was pleasant and always helpful. We are breakfast at hotel and the buffet offered a wide variety of fresh options. Would definitely recommend!

title: Great location, customer service, and prices - a gem!
review: Dear Amf226,  We thank you for your feedback. We hope to welcome you again, try to do better and gain a 5 points!  Please do not hesitate to contact us back for your next visit in Florence,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Fabulous hotel in this wonderful citu
review: We really enjoyed our stay at the Golden tower, we had a luxury room and it really was, 2 large single beds, a love seat, lots of storage, and a huge bathroom. In our room on arrival was a fruit bowl and a box of biscotti a nice selection of tea and coffee, ( including decaf that I normally have to request) the mini bar was free and was kept well stocked during our stay. Also a turndown service so every night returning to our room we were greeted with a sweet surprise. We used the spa facilities, which apart from the steam room not being very hot were  really good, the hot tub had lots of different jets, very welcoming after a day walking around Florence! We just wished that it was open later, 14.00-20.00.  Breakfast was buffet style with lots of choice cold meats and cheeses a…

title: Amazing!!!
review: The staff was absolutely amazing! Great prices, food, and service. I recommend this hotel to anyone who travels to Florence. If we are ever back in the area, we will absolutely be back for another stay. The Spa was also great!

title: Fantastic Service and Great Location - Suicase Destroyed by Airline
review: Dear Leslyn K,  thank you for your short but efficient description! We thank you also for your wonderful words! We look forward to host you again in our Hotel and please contact us directly  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Very friendly and helpful
review: The Golden Tower Hotel was fantastic as a small boutique hotel with about 26 rooms.  The location about a block from the Repubblica Arch is perfect.  Far enough away from the heavy crowds but still a couple minute walk into the center of it all.  Well within the no-drive zone of the city, makes it a safe choice as well.  The taxi cost to the hotel from the airport is fixed for Florence, 26 Euro in the evening and it was 27 Euro early in the morning for two of us.  Don't bother requesting a driver or reserve a car, just use the taxi from the airport.  The front desk service team were all fantastic.  One of our suitcases was destroyed on the flight, and the front desk had several recommendations for us to buy a new large suitcase for our trip home, ended up with a beautiful…

title: Great location and staff
review: Dear Dan R,  Thank you for your amazing review. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is located in the city center in a quite and luxury area to ensure a wonderful rest and a luxury experience for all our guests. We all are happy that you had a great time in Florence also thanks to our assistance. We hope welcoming you soon again and please feel free to contact us.  Best regards, Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: march 2014
review: The staff on the Reception are friendly and always willing to help. Our room was spacious (the bath/shower was sunken which was a bit disconcerting). Breakfast offered a good choice (you can order extra bits for a price if you wish). There is a happy hour each evening, with a free drink and nibbles. Very good location, within easy walking distance of everywhere!

title: Short Break in Florence with Friends
review: I am a travel agent and have just returned from a long weekend in Florence with friends.  The hotel is in a fantastic location.  In the heart of Florence!  All the designer shops/restaurants within a stones throw.  The hotel (only 27 rooms) has a sense of calm and tranquillity to it away from the hustle and bustle.  The staff were amazing, so welcoming and professional and gave the impression that nothing was too much trouble - definitely they went the extra mile with service.  We stayed in a junior deluxe suite.  Split level, but most comfortable with the added luxury of Egyptian sheets on our bed.  Free minibar with water/beer and soft drinks as well as fruit. As an additional  welcome gift I had the most wonderful bottle of perfume from Firenze laid on our bed on arrival. …

title: Top class stay in Florence
review: Dear Mrs Newman, We are such happy when we read reviews like yours because it means we have achieved the goal which is the satisfaction of our Guests!! We would like to thank you for describing our Hotel in all the details together with your feedback. Thank you so much again and we hope to welcoming back again in the very near future,  Kindest regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Fantastic stay over New Year's Eve 2016
review: The room we were given in the tower was the best we have ever stayed in. Superb considering the cost of it. All of the staff were extremely helpful, especially the lady tending the bar in the evening. We were given a free bottle of Prosecco and a selection of fruit when we arrived. There was also a complimentary mini bar in the room and free use of the spa facilities (sauna, steam room and jacuzzi). Each evening there was a happy hour in the bar that included a glass of Prosecco and an array of snacks (freshly made each day and varied). The breakfast was excellent each morning and they also did an early one on the day of the Florence marathon. The hotel is conveniently located and we will definitely stay again.

title: What a gem!!
review: Dear BranstonPlymouth,  We thank you very much for your wonderful review . We are so proud of our job, expecially when it is paid off with comment like yours.  The room you choose for your stay is a lovely room in the most ancient part of the building: the tower of XIV century. This is why we called those rooms "Tower ". We are glad to read that you really appreciate our Breakfast and restaurant services together to our Golden Team.  We would be happy to host you again in your next trip in Florence and please contact us.  Kindest regards,  Elisa Costoli BAck Office Manager

title: Friendly boutique hotel in heart of Florence
review: This boutique hotel has excellent service. A wide array of breakfast foods and complimentary champagne at Happy hour with treats. We did upgrade to a tower room and it was fabulous with the wooden beams in the ceiling and more space. The fruit basket and water was a welcome addition. If you need a gym to exercise, this hotel does not have an exercise facility. However, it does have a relaxing sauna and Spa area that is open at certain times. We were too busy sightseeing and enjoying Florence. A wonderful stay in a centrally located area, convenient to all sights and terrific restaurants.

title: Great end to a perfect honeymoon!
review: My husband and I stayed in the suite with a jacuzzi for the last part of our honeymoon. The staff brought us up champagne to celebrate upon arrival... of which we enjoyed in the hot tub with a nice little view of Florence. It rained most of our trip and we were always excited to get back to the room and get in the hot tub. The bathroom has dual shower heads and is probably one of the nicer hotel bathrooms I've seen. Normal sized, but very well done. And for all the girls out there... the blow dryer actually works!!! They had a great free breakfast every morning and a happy hour every night around 6:30 with free appetizers and a glass of prosecco. I never thought we would take advantage of this since there are so many places to see in Florence but we went every morning and every…

title: Spectacular Choice and Location
review: Dear Torre H,  We would like to thank you for your lovely review. Our Luxury Junios Suite with Jacuzzi is one of our gem and also in the winter time is very appreciated. We are so happy to read that you enjoyed our Hotel and services and we hope to welcoming you again for your next trip in Florence.  Kindest regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: best hotel ever!
review: Excellent hotel, very nice room, excellent service staff in the hart of the city, easy access to everything, two thumbs up for this place should be 5 stars, location, location. Great SPA, and includes a great breakfast and snacks and drinks in the evenings.

title: Kind staff, amazing location!
review: Dear mamamary63,  We really appreciate your kindness for writing your feedback. Please feel free to contact us for your next visit in Florence!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Wife and sister had time of they're life
review: we went on short break for about 5 nights, absolutely no complains. Breakfast is to die for, happy hour in the afternoon provides drinks and snacks which is additional benefit. Close to almost all the attractions, food places. Staff very friendly, cooperative and ready to help and guide! Will definitely recommend and  stay again if  went to Florence again!!! 5 star😁

title: Wonderful stay, highly recommended
review: It is difficult to fault this hotel.  It is an excellent hotel in a wonderful location.  It feels small and intimate but the facilities are great.  The Reception staff could not be more helpful, with advice on where to visit, eat etc.  They booked some tickets for us and advised us to book the Duomo ourselves to save queuing.  Our room was lovely, overlooking the street and very quiet, good size, lovely bathroom and comfortable bed.  The porter and breakfast staff were also extremely friendly, pleasant and helpful.  The spa is an added bonus after lots of walking and climbing steps, very relaxing.  The free glass of prosecco and buffet were also very much appreciated.  Could not recommend this hotel highly enough, great stay.  We walked from the train station as we flew to Pisa…

title: Great Staff
review: Dear SunnyRita,  We are very happy to read your review! We always do our best in order to grant an unique experience to our guests and we feel proud when we got it. We hope to welcoming you for your next trip in Florence and we will happy to give you more advice!  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Immaculate hotel, very well situated and excellent customer service from Francesca
review: OK, not what we would call 5star in UK but a great hotel nonetheless. Best staff I have met in a very long time. Immensely helpful and eager to make your stay the best it can be.  I'll stay here again next visit to Florence.

title: Great Time
review: Dear AnothER32,  Thank you very much for your wonderful words for our staff. We have been very happy to assist you during your trip in Florence.  Please feel free to contact us when you will visit Florence again,  Best regards,  Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: General Impressions
review: Immaculate hotel, very well situated in Florence - close to all major attractions.   Excellent customer service from Francesca who assisted us with our lost luggage.   An iron/board in the room would be been a welcome addition but we appreciate the hotel offers a laundry service.

title: Great location, friendly staff and clean rooms!
review: The hotel is located in a great part of town.  Easy walk to Ponte Vecchio, the Duomo, Santa Croce, San Lorenzo market and surrounded by amazing shopping.  The staff was amazing, especially Francesca.  They were always willing to provide recommendations for shopping, gelato and restaurants.  The rooms are on the small side but are well furnished and very clean and you don't hear a lot of hallway noise.  The funny thing about the room was I kept thinking my husband was going deaf and turning up the volume on the tv when we discovered the bathroom had a speaker in it.  Hands down a great hotel.

title: Highly recommended!
review: Dear g0ngj00liz, Thank you for the great review, location is one of our point of strenght. We are located in the historical centre of Florence. The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa is a Boutique Hotel, so we always are attentive to details. We hope to have the pleasure to welcome you soon. Best regards Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: 25th anniversary
review: Stunning hotel in a fantastic location. Situated on a quiet street a short walk to all the top attractions. Staff really friendly and helpful - the free glass of prosecco every evening is a lovely touch

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear martinsN6241OJ, Thank you for the beautiful words you chose to describe the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. For us it's a pleasure to offer our guests a glass of prosecco to enjoy their evening. All staff will be glad to welcome you again, should you decide to come back to Florence. Best regards Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Lovely Hotel & Service...Spa a gem
review: This hotel exceeded expectations before we even were completely checked in!   The staff greeted us warmly and efficiently.  The reservation host explained to us that our Rooms  werent ready but would be at three.  She then showed us a map and pointed us to the mercato to get some lunch.   When we came back our rooms were ready.  She then escorted us to our rooms where our luggage was laid out nicely for us.  She then pointed out all of the amenities in the room and the hotel.  We then went to the spa.  The spa was nice.  Not what i was used to but. Very clean.  The turkish bath was very nice and the aromatic showers were lovely.  Back to our room we headed and we get a phone call from the bar.  Fabiola the bar hostess was calling to say she had a surprise from the bar for us. …

title: Good rooms but bad service
review: No house keeping available at night. Arrived with a friend told us no room with two beds available the truth is there is no house keeping to separate the bed into two  beds in the evening( we were told u don't need to change the room as tomorrow morning we will separate your bed but we don't have room service now at 6pm) .Next day a couple arrived and they were told that only two beds available for you. Laundry service takes time and expensive and not to standard.  Great location great friendly staff but very few staff . I would give it less that a 5 star rating .

title: 5 Star Excellence at it's best!!!!
review: Dear Mr. Ahmed12344321, Thanks for your time.  We have carefully read your review and we are very sorry as different from reality.  You've booked the room today for today and the only available was a double. The next day, following a start, you are assigned to room with separate beds  The laundry return within 8 hours and the shirt that you think was bad stretch was lauded.  We are amazed that we have written his review just arrived and not at the check-out.  Best regards LM

title: Golden Experience!
review: The Golden Tower Hotel was 5 star at it's best. The staff, especially Alessio went above and beyond, & was always willing to help.... excellent customer service!!! The general manager made us feel like a king and queen. This was my first time there, and they made the last eight days a time to remember. The rooms were beautifully decorated, the location was definitely centrally located, but still quiet. They sent a fresh fruit arrangement & a bottle of their best Moscato Bottega for my birthday. To top it all off, we had an early flight before breakfast was served, & they had prepared a to go breakfast to take with us. Who could ask for more....the price & the trip was absolutely worth it!!! Can't wait to go back.... definitely a 10 out of 10!!!

title: A gem of a hotel close to all attractions
review: Dear katinalan, Thank you!! We appreciated so much your beautiful review. Alessio and all the staff members always try hard to make your stay a memorable one. We are happy to read that your experience here was excellent. Your words help us in doing always better. Please do not hesitate to contact us, should you decide to visit Florence again. Kind regards, Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: The Finest of Florance
review: We arrived just in time for some happy hour prosecco! What a perfect welcome to this lovely hotel!  I traveled with my mother and chose this hotel for its highly rated accommodations based on trip advisor reviews and its close proximity to all of the big hits of Florence.    We had a classic two twin bed room which was beautiful, clean and quiet.  The bathroom was elegant. NOTE: The tub/shower was a large step down into the tub which discouraged my mother but she was able to pull herself up after bathing. This should only be noted for future travelers if anybody has mobility issues. And I am certain that the hotel has other rooms available without that setup but I forced my mom to rally!  The breakfast was delicious and full of wonderful surprises such as a different sweet…

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Wonderful Hotel. Beautiful luxury room, nice bathroom and excellent whirlpool bath in our terrace. Very friendly staff. Excellent location. Good breakfast, nice restaurant. Very good experience. Next time when we will visit in Florence this will be our hotel.

title: Wonderful boutique hotel
review: Dear Jaana, This beautiful reviews make us happy and motivated to always do better. The Junior Luxury Suite that you had is the only one with a private Jacuzzi on its little terrace and we agree with you: it's a jewel! Please do not hesitate to contact us, should you decide to visit Florence again. Kind regards, Elisa Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Peaceful retreat in the heart of Florence
review: Rooms are small but bright and clean. The bathroom is large and the shower was wonderful. The service was off the chart great! The breakfast and happy hour was delightful. Location of the hotel is perfect to walk to everything. I would stay here again. It's a little hidden gem!!

title: Very impressed with this small hotel.
review: Dear Renee B, Thank you very much for your positive comments about our hotel.  We are a boutique hotel that prefers quality, charm and exclusivity and we are honored to feel your satisfaction. We created the happy hour to let our guests feel at home and we are glad to read that you appreciated our invitation. Looking forward to welcome you the next time   Best regards E. Costoli Back Office Manager

title: Excellent experience
review: From the minute you arrive at Reception you know this is a special place to stay.  Set in a pedestrianised area, it is very quiet and peaceful.  We were welcomed with friendly, professional courtesy which was repeated in every area of the hotel.  The staff are lovely and very helpful, especially the Receptionists.    Our Classic room was spacious by Italian standards and vety well designed.  The bathroom was small but adequate.  The cleanliness and attention to detail in every area is outstanding.  The linens and towels were fresh and excellent quality, as were the complimentary toiletries.  The breakfast buffet was superb, good choice, good quality and tasty.  Happy hour in the bar is worthwhile too, especially the complimentary glass of Prosecco.  I can't recommend this hotel…

title: Comfortable and excellent location
review: Excellent located hotel with comfortable rooms. All important Florence locations within walking distance. Tranquil area. Ideal location for running routes across the Ponte Vecchio. Shopping possibilities around the corner with known Italian designers and other international brands. Broad selection of restaurants in the neighbourhood for any taste and budget.

title: Classy boutique hotel in great location
review: Don't be fooled by the odd, non-Italian sounding name.   This is a lovely boutique hotel on a quiet street, but just a few minutes walk from the everything -- the Piazza Republica, the Duomo, the Ufiizzi museum, and the bridges across the river.  Beautiful room, with gorgeous wood floor and beautiful bathroom.   Very pretty bar/restaurant offering complimentary evening prosecco and a very nice breakfast with a wide range of choices.  Front desk staff very helpful and buttoned-up.  Not a single negative thing to say about this place.

title: Walk to Everything from this Boutique Hotel
review: Dear ALK555,   Thank you so much for choosing our Hotel for your stay in Florence and for taking the time to share your wonderful review.   We are happy to hear that we met your expectations, and please, contact us directly if you are planning another holiday in Florence, will be a pleasure to have the chance to welcome you back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.   Kindest Regards  Sara Carniel-Front Desk Manager

title: Beautiful boutique hotel in Florence
review: Golden Towers  This is the hotel where I was reminded of what a genius Alfred Hitchcock was as I watched The Birds with the sound off since it had been dubbed in Italian.  It is centrally located in Florence within easy walking distance of all the major sites.  Our room was a bit odd in that we entered it on one floor and then climbed a set of spiral stairs to reach the actual room.  Because we were (as near as I can figure out) in the attic, our window was high up on the wall with no hope of seeing out of it because of our own vertical challenges (my niece and I are on the short side).  As it turns out, that made for a very quiet room which was a blessing in disguise (in other words, we slept well every night).  The room was lovely, clean, nice linens and large enough for us to…

title: Fantastic in every respect.
review: Dear NancyL,   Thank you so much for choosing our Hotel for your stay in Florence and for taking the time to share your wonderful and detailed review.  We are happy to hear that we met your expectations, and please, contact us directly if you are planning another holiday in Florence, will be a pleasure to have the chance to welcome you back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.   Kindest Regards   Sara Carniel-Front Desk Manager

title: Glorious Florence
review: The Golden Tower Hotel is ideally situated to reach all points if interest in the city. The advice given in arranging tickets fro all amenities was excellent and the hotel itself is of a very high standard.

title: Florence - 10 Year Anniversary
review: Dear Brian J,  Thank you for writing such a kind review. The location is one of our strong point, we are located in the historical city center, everything is walking distance! We are very happy that you appreciated our amenities.  We look forward to have you as guest again, Best regards

title: Wonderful!
review: I took my wife to Florence for our 10 year wedding anniversary. The city is wonderful and very romantic, as its very small its easy to walk everywhere.   The Golden Tower is a lovely hotel and made our city break very special. Food and accommodation was fantastic and the spa was a lovely treat at the end of the day after a day walking around the city.   Hopefully we will get back soon and would recommend it to everyone.

title: 2 nights stay
review: Dear markT4749WS,  We really appreciate that you spent time in writing us a review   It is true, Florence is one of the most romantic city in the world. we are happy you enjoyed it so much. We are very happy that you had the chance to use our Spa, and that you liked our food and room.  We really hope that you will be back so that you can enjoy another fantastic stay with us again.  We remain at your disposal, Best regards

title: Little gem
review: Loved everything about the hotel & our stay. Great location. Beautiful room.  Staff friendly & helpful. Would thoroughly recommend. Didn't have dinner in restaurant but free prosecco & buffet every evening in the bar a lovely idea.

title: Very clean. Right in the center. Nice staff, very kind everyone. Foarte curat, personal amabil, in special toti romanii.
review: Very clean. Right in the center. Nice staff, very kind everyone. Foarte curat, personal amabil, in special toti romanii care lucreaza acolo. Localizat exact in centru. Atentie la cei care parcheaza masina.

title: amazing hotel
review: Dear Musetticaffe,  Thank you for spending your time to write us a review. Our guests feedback is very important for us.  We are very happy you ebjoyed your stay with us and that you appreciated the staff and the location.  We look forward to have you as guest, Best regards

title: Beautiful Property in a great location
review: amazing service, location, staff, cleaness and everything overall. the spa as well was perfect, there are lots of restaurants around the hotel and shops.  the city bus tour is 10 minutes walk from the hotel.

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Dear Shatha A,  Thank you so much for your feedback.  We are very glad you found our Hotel amazing, the location is great, we are placed in the historical city center, but since is settle in a pederìstrian zone is also very quiet.  Thank you for nominate our Staff cleaness and spa, we are happy you enjoyed them.  We remain at your disposal, Best regards

title: Beautiful room and central location
review: This is an absolutely wonderful property right in the center of everything Florence has to offer.  The rooms are luxurious and large by European standards.  The staff is incredible attentive and service oriented.  Breakfasts offer a wide variety of options almost all of which are delicious.  The price point is on the high side, but I would say this hotel is worth it.

title: Friendly staff great location
review: Located near all the important places, rooms were a good size , staff was very friendly. Would say there again. You can walk everywhere from this location, museums and train stations as well as shopping and food all within 10 minute walk of hotel. You won't need a taxi here unless you want one

title: Fantastic staff!
review: Just spent 3 nights here, but what a place!  Staff has to be some of the best we encountered in Italy.  Beautiful rooms and treatment from the moment we showed up to the early departure.  Breakfast buffet included and excellent.  Spa was amazing.  All the restaurants that were recommended were fantastic.  Great location if you want to be in the heart of the city.  Would definitely book here again!

title: Shopping trip to Florence
review: We stayed 5 nights in this hotel right in the heart of Florence. Great location and walking distance to most points of interest. The hotel staff are very friendly and welcoming, in particular Matilde on reception, Melina at breakfast and Fabiola in the bar.   Rooms are very comfortable and clean and have tea/coffee making facilities which was a must for us. All in all, great place to stay.

title: Beautiful city visit
review: Enjoyed the excellent location of this hotel.  Very near the shops, but also very quiet.  We are all light sleepers, but I never heard a peep of road or hotel noise.    We had 2 luxury rooms for our family of four.  Both were our largest we stayed in during our European Holiday.  Beds were comfortable.  The bathrooms were American sized also, awesome!  Two sinks and a "real sized" vanity.  Enjoyed the free mini bar.  Breakfast was definitely ample and tasty.  Would recommend, and would stay here again.  Price was good for beautiful city of Florence.

title: Excellent Stay!
review: This hotel was top notch in every way!  The staff was professional, friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. The property was beautiful, clean and had all the modern amenities. Breakfast was excellent!    We were only there one night, but it was the best night of our 10 day trip to Italy.  If you go to Florence, you must stay here!!!!

title: Excellent
review: We stayed at this boutique hotel for 5 nights in July with our young daughter and were most delighted by the level of service provided. The staff were very attentive and eager to ensure that our stay was as comfortable as possible. The suite was lovely with a comfortable bed for our daughter. The location of the hotel is excellent for exploring Florence.

title: Beautiful hotel in Florence
review: Stayed one night here on our whirlwind tour of Italy, and it a wonderful respite during our trip. The staff and room were great, and the spa was a pleasant surprise. Even though the hours for the spa were limited, it had amazing amenities like a waterfall for your neck and shoulders, and a jetted lounger. Definitely would stay there again!

title: Beautiful
review: Centrally located in Florence, this hotel and spa is a delightful, quiet retreat from the very busy historic areas. Staff are friendly and helpful. We had a tower room which tastefully decorated had the benefit of a jacuzzi in the bathroom, very welcome after the humidity outside! Would recommend.

title: Great Room for Disabled Traveller in Florence
review: We had a fabulous stay back in march at this hotel. As any disabled or permanent wheelchair user knows finding suitable accommodation can be a bang your head against the nearest wall stress test. Once I called a large hotel in Morocco to be asked 'what was a wheelchair' when requesting such details. So keeping this brief, This hotels has a fabulous well equipped room. There are in fact two bathrooms, one normal well equipped room and the other adapted for wheelchair users. The hotel is located in a great location within easy reach of all the attractions. Word of caution though, Florence can be hard going with all it's cobbled streets. I'm a twenty year in paraplegic and struggled on by ok. Though I have to say our four day stay was enough as I was worn out at the end. Great Trip…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel six years ago and returned this month because we liked it so much. This hotel definitely does not disappoint. The hotel staff is very good and it is in a great location. Centrally located for walking to everything.  Breakfast has a nice variety with excellent cappuccino!    Bathrooms have a shower and tub all in Carrera marble.  It is beautiful.    All staff are attentive and courteous.  We plan to stay here again when we return to Florence

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: We were extremely impressed with the Golden Tower and Spa. We spent 6 perfect days there with our 13 year old daughter who didn't want to leave. We had a duplex junior suite with 2 bathrooms. The hotel is in mint condition and we looked forward to returning each night. Breakfast was nice and served by very friendly staff. A special call out to Marianna who took care of us every day with a smile and the best cappuccinos. We highly recommend this hotel. Perfect location too.

title: Amazing place in Florence
review: We unfortunately only stayed one night as we were going to a villa in Tuscany.  Beautiful hotel and staff went well out of their way to make our brief stay enjoyable.  We ate dinner at the restaurant and were treated like royalty.  Already planning a longer return next year.  One of the best hotels I have ever stayed at!

title: Just loved it
review: The staff did absolutely everything they could to make this a special and memorable vacation. Always making sure we had everything we needed, helping us make reservations, comfortable room and perfect location. They made our stay comfortable and easy. Thank you! I can't wait to go back!

title: Great rooms, location but not a good looking hotel
review: Upon entrance we were greeted by Francesca, a very very nice frond desk clerk.  The lobby entrance is very modest, not 5 star rating.  Whe overall decoration of the hotel is very badly decorated. It does not have one style. Leathwr seats in a sitting area with very ornate courtains and chairs, it just looked old and not updated at all.   1.  Rooms: we had a very very beautiful room, big spacious two big double beds, great linens, perfectly decorated.  Nice tv.  2. Bathroom was very spacious great amenities, and bathrobe and slippers.  3.  Breakfast:  buffet with scrambled and hard boiled eggs, fruit, cereal pastries, cold cuts hams and cheese.  Extra payment for eggs made to order.  4. We ate dinner there but the food was not good. We knew we needed to go out, but were too…

title: Nice hotel but wished we stayed elsewhere in Florence
review: We were disappointed by the room - yellow/gold hues for both walls and furniture appeared tired.  No view at all from window, except into neighboring office bldg.  We will go back to Florence but will book at Westin Hotel.  We spent New Years eve on their rooftop and swore when we will return! However the Golden Tower did have very attentive staff and the breakfast was excellent.

title: Best Hotel in Florence
review: Look no farther for a hotel in Florence! We spent 10 day traveling in Italy and this was the highlight of our trip. The room are breathtaking and the service is top notch. We ordered room service one night just to stay in and enjoy all the hotel had to offer. Perfect in every way!

title: Perfect
review: I thought this hotel was perfect for couples since it's more romantic than familiar. The restaurant area is little so it gives the guests more privacy, but for breakfast time it gets crouded.  The location is amazing, it's near every important street or plaza.  The service was really good as well as the rooms. According to the internet, it can be available in rooms, although you have to grab it at the lobby so it works correctly.

title: Great location, very comfortable
review: PROS: The hotel was perfectly situated nearby all the site in the centre of Florence. It has a great buffet breakfast including scrambled eggs, bacon and sausages as well as the other usual items such as fruits, bread, pastries and yogurt. At 6pm there is a free glass of prosecco as an aperitif in the lounge. For the spa you can access the sauna, steam room and small hot pool for free. These were amazing after walking around for a few hours and not busy during afternoons. Other spa services were available but these are additional charges. There is a computer and printer that you can use freely in the lobby to print tickets you may need. Great aircon in room.  CONS: The room was a 'Classic' size, and comfortable and clean. However it was back-facing on the 3rd floor, so our view…

title: Luxury hidden gem of a hotel
review: Stayed at this fabulous hotel in June with my niece.Central location all main attractions and sites within 5 to 10 minutes walking distance. Rooms and bathroom luxurious. Lovely and quiet with rooftop views over the city. Spa great very quiet during our stay we had full use of the pool and sauna to ourselves.Breakfast good and a wide variety of buffet items. Staff very helpful. Would recommend and definitely stay here again.

title: Unforgettable and dreamy
review: Wonderful hotel.Very silent and clean. Kind and friendly personnel. It felt like home. Perfect position. Very close to most of Florence attractions. You can leave the car in front of the hotel and they will.park it for you.

title: Great hotel in a great location
review: Loved to stay there for a few days. In the heart of Firenze, ideal to have a town trip in a great place. An exclusive hotel with very professional and polite crew, only a few steps away from all touristique places to see. Absolutely to recommend

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Cüneyt Ç, thank you so much for your great review! We are very happy we met your expectations and you enjoyed your stay with us.  We really hope to welcoming back in the future.  Kindest regards, Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Centrally located luxury
review: This was a family vacation with my husband and two daughters.  The hotel is located in by Piazza Strozzi a few blocks from the Duomo.  It is centrally located but is on a quiet side street.  The hotel is extremely clean, has spacious beautiful rooms and wonderful service.   The champagne breakfast buffet is very nice, with extremely fresh foods and a good variety.  The hotel restaurant/bar has a complimentary apertif and happy hour every night with an open and friendly staff. We also utilized the hotel's room service, a nice plus.  The room was immaculately clean and the staff vacuumed and cleaned every day.  They have sky TV in the room, which allows you to change the language for specific channels to English. This was great for my kids when they would rest before going out to…

title: Not the Best & Not the Worst
review: Very comfortable quiet hotel on a small street within a short couple blocks of the central squares. Very friendly helpful staff. Loved the spa. So relaxing at the end of the day to hit the saunas and the Roman bath jacuzzi. Wifi was kind of spotty and shower head could have been more stable. Otherwise excellent.

title: Special Birthday, Special Hotel.
review: Dear luckygirl_2011,  thank you so much for your review. Our spa is a jewel and is really ideal to spoil yourself after a day spent exploring our awesome city.  We are very happy to know that your stay overall has been very positive.  We all look forward to welcoming you back very soon,  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - front Office Manager

title: Lovely room decor
review: Upon arrival in the room, there was a welcoming fruit basket and a couple of treats. The bedroom is sunk in with beautiful wall decor. It's exactly as stated on their web. Location was great. Easy walking access to all the shops, restaurants, museums, etc. Breakfast was very nice. Friendly staff. The second day we were surprised with fresh strawberries and champagne in our room. They had complimentary happy hour every night with appetizers. The room and the bathroom were immaculate. The staff were always happily to assist us with suggestions and tours. We stayed here for 3 nights I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Amazing Hotel You Should Book
review: This is an amazing hotel! We had a triple room that was as large as an apartment! It was large, very clean, and had very nice furniture and decor! The most amazing part of this hotel was their customer service!!!!! As we traveled through Italy and Sicily there was no other hotel that even compared. Upon arrival we found fresh fruit and beverages in our room. The mini bar in our room was stocked with beverages and snacks each day. This was free!!!  The breakfast was very good and they worked very hard to meet our every need. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!!!  I would rate this hotel as exemplary in every area other than the spa. The spa was nice and the staff friendly but the massage was average. Although I booked a deep tissue and talked to the receptionist about…

title: Comfortable and accomodating in the perfect location!
review: Very friendly staff, comfortable rooms, very clean.  The buffet breakfast was delicious with a large selection of food.  Perfect central location in walking distance to sights, shopping and restaurants while being on a nice quiet side street.

title: Good Location
review: Dear Barbara M, thank you for your positive review! We are very delighted reading your nice words and happy to know that you loved staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon,  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel,wonderful location
review: This is a good hotel for shopping. It's right in the centre. The bed is a quite small but it's very comfortable. The breakfast is very good too. The hotel is a bit hidden though! If your driving, becareful as its hard to find.  Call ahead of time, as someone from the garage will come. Takes about 30 minutes.

title: Wonderful service
review: Small hotel with large rooms. It was clean and modern, great sheets, nice lighting and all the amenities you should need, fabulous desk service - very happy to help out any way they can. Nice little spa area (jacuzzi with waterfall function, steam, sauna). Aperitifs from 6.30 with gorgeously fruit-decorated glasses of prosecco and lovely range of finger food.  Central, so very close to major sights, but also a little noisy due to the bars at one end of the street.

title: A Few Areas for Improvement
review: I had a decent stay here for 3 nights, but there were some areas that caused inconveniences.  For the very high price that this hotel charges, I was slightly disappointed, and will try a different hotel next time I'm in Florence.  PRO's: - Free snacks provided in room - Breakfast included - Prime location - Nice decor - Comfortable bed  CON's: - Staff was not very friendly - Very slow and glitchy wifi in room - Room temperature control had no heating capability in early June, and my parents got cold at night.  The other hotels in Italy we stayed at on this trip had full room temperature control. - Very dark room, not enough lights, felt grim - Sofa bed for the 3rd person was uncomfortable - Very little counter space in bathroom - Shower door did not close fully - Toilet ran…

title: Best Italy Experience
review: Stayed in Rome, Florence and Venice and this Hotel by far was the best. Location is perfect to attractions and shopping. Staff went out of their way to make our stay incredible. Room was very clean and the daily service kept it that way throughout our stay. Can't wait to go back.

title: Great hotel and location!!!
