review: Great hotel! The service is amazing, the rooms are clean and good size. The location is incredible because it is in the heart of Florence. It is close to everything but off the main streets so it is quiet. I would recommend this hotel.

title: Great staff and location
review: This hotel is a very well managed, small hotel with the amenities of a large "brand name" hotel. The location is about as good as it gets as you can walk to everything. It was very clean and the restaurant had terrific food for breakfast and happy hour.  The next time we go to Florence, we will be staying at the Golden Tower.

title: Beautiful!
review: Stayed here on a 4 night break beginning of June for my first time in florence, and my stay here was fantastic start to finish. On arrival the concierge took our suitcases straight from us, the check in was so quick and the staff were beyond friendly and polite. Our Deluxe room was beautiful, huge bed and the room was immaculate. We had full access to the mini bar which was restocked everyday and included everything you could need. We also had turn down service every night which was a lovely extra. The breakfast included everything you could wish for and the food was lovely and fresh. We had no problem every morning getting a table and anything we needed from the polite staff. Going on to location, it could not be better! You are a few minutes walk to Piazza Della Repubblica…

title: Great location, hotel and staff
review: This has to be one of the most central locations i have ever stayed at - minutes from Duomo, 5 min walk to the Ponte Vecchio and 5 mins to the station.    The hotel itself is lovely, good sized rooms and a beautiful large bathroom.  Reception staff were great and on-hand every time we had a question with helpful advice and tips.  Good solid wifi as well!  Breakfast was included and the only downside is that the breakfast room is quite small so you need to be there early if you are a large party or you'll have to sit separately.  Food was usual continental selection but also had limited hot breakfast.  Lots of cakes though :-)   Lots of bars restaurants and shopping on your step.  Overall, i would def stay again, if only for the super central location.

title: 5 Star & so much more!
review: Dear RchVys,  Thank you for your nice review.  We are very proud of the services we offer and knowing that you have appreciated our staff, amd most of our breakfast, makes us feel happy and satisfied.  We are settled in the heart of the Florence city centre, within walking distance from the main attraction of the city, and surrounded by faboulous restaurant and bars where our guests can experience the real taste of Italy.  Once again, thank you for your kind words, and we hope we will have the chance to welcome you again to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  Kind Regads Sara Carniel-Front Office Manager

title: Florence city break
review: We stayed here for 3 nights while on our first trip to Florence. The hotel was nothing short of amazing and we have definitely been spoiled by staying here! Not to mention, the location was perfect between everything we wanted to go do/see! Fabiola works at the bar and was nothing but beyond amazing and welcoming to us. My boyfriend went to get drinks while we relaxed and she included some snacks and fruit w/ chocolate one day even! I couldn't suggest this hotel enough to anything coming to Florence. And I couldn't recommend Fabiola enough to make an amazing drink and a welcoming environment with beautiful suggestions! Definitely coming back when we return to Florence!

title: Golden spot in mid-Florence
review: Dear mandymorari,   thank you so much for your 5 star review!!! We are very happy in reading the your appreciated all of our services and above all Fabiola thanks you for the wonderful words.  We look forward to welcoming back and in the meantime, we wish you all the best  Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: Great location!
review: Stayed for 3 nights. Fabulous location, walking distance to everywhere.  Great service and nice touches like bowl of fruit and prosecco on arrival.  Friendly and helpful staff, especially Alessio on reception.   Room 207 was clean, spacious and quiet.  Would definitely stay again!.

title: Great location
review: Dear Caris1000,  thank you very much for your positive and detailed review.  We are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us and you appreciated our services.  We look forward to welcoming back in the future, and remain  Kindest regards Sara Carniel - Front Office Manager

title: The place to stay in Florence walking distance to everywhere...... Quiet but central
review: Beautiful hotel. We stayed 5 nights  Walking distance to all the major meseums. Friendly staff and good breakfast and happy hours from 6:30 to 8:00 pm. Manager Antonio is very nice. We truly enjoyed our suite for 5 nights.

title: Bellissimo
review: Dear Begonian, thank you so much for your positive review, I remember you and how so nice people you are. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and really hope to welcome back in the near future, all my best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Location!!!
review: This hotel is an absolute gem of a place in Florence and I highly recommend it We stayed for 3 nights initially but because of some personal issues we needed to stay an extra night and the guys accommodated us and we're so understanding and helpful The hotel was so clean beds amazing and food great - happy hour can be highly recommended  On a personal note I must thank Sarah and Franchesca on reception and a wonderful lady who managed the bar ...... They helped me in my hour of need and went the Syria mile for me thanks so much guys

title: Fantastic - Nothing less !!
review: Situated in the heart of the city in a beautiful location off a pretty Piazza.  The staff are welcoming and very helpful, nothing is too much trouble and their knowledge of the area, attractions and information is invaluable.  The restaurant is lovely, the staff warm and welcoming, the food is delicious.  The spa is one of the best I have ever visited.  The sauna and steam room are amazing.  Try a treatment for yourselves.  The hot stones massage is wonderful - a must !!  Yes, this hotel is at the top end of the budget, but it is worth every penny and will make your visit of Florence even more memorable.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Sutty278, many many thanks for your fantastic review, we appreciated it very much. Also very glad you used our spa and treatments, which is our jewel, and our Spa manager and her staff are very proud of their job. Looking forward to welcoming back soon, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great location and superior service in boutique hotel
review: This is a wonderful small hotel in a great location. All the staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Rooms were lovely, sophisticated, fresh and clean with all the comforts you could want for. I really couldn't fault this hotel and would certainly recommend staying here.

title: Very average hotel in terms of food, service and the room itself, though excellent location.
review: Dear Emily H, thank you very much for your positive review and for recommend us to your friends. Hope to welcome back soon, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Golden Tower Hotel & Florence
review: Golden Tower Hotel and Spa is a newer hotel, sophisticated in its interior,  using expensive fabrics and linens in public  and guest rooms.   From our check-in, through breakfast and evening dinners, the staff was friendly, attentive, and focused on service.  The spa has a wonderful wet area which includes steam room, sauna, and large water pool with the selection of waterjet treatments.  The bathroom in room 407 is luxurious and large with a three person whirlpool surrounded by marble and chrome.  The hotel functions wonderfully for both personal travel as well as business travel.

title: Fabulous Florence!
review: This hotel was absolutely perfect, we had the tower room which was stunning. The staff were lovely, especially Fabiola who works in the bar and went over and above to look after us. The complimentary evening prosecco & buffet is a really nice touch, as was the Easter egg put in our room :) With the location, which is very central and convenient for all the sights, this hotel ticks all the boxes for a great mini break.

title: Excellent service and location
review: Dear Guest, thank you so much for your positive review, all of us appreciate it, in particular Fabiola, she love her job! Hope to welcome back soon, in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fabulous Location, Perfect Family Room, and Wonderful Service
review: Our visit to Florence was enriched by the quality of service and ammenities at the Golden Hotel. Meals in the motel were reasonably priced and the rooms were spacious. It is in easy walking distance of restaurants and major attractions

title: A fabulous tuscany treat
review: Dear Guest, thank you so much for posting a positive review and we are very proud to enriched your visit in Florence. We look forward to welcome back, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Just returned to UK from 2 nights at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa
review: We loved our stay at this special hotel!    Great room - We had booked a room for my husband, teenage son and I.  The room was amazing!  My son had his own loft room with full bathroom - very special for a teenager travelling with his parents.  The room also included a large walk-in closet which was helpful for storing our bags.    Location - The hotel is convenient to everything we wanted to visit. We walked everywhere and loved being in the heart of the tourist area.  (Even though we were in the heart of it all - our room was quiet.)  Staff - The hotel staff were friendly and helpful.  Our room was very clean with special turn down service nightly.  The front desk was always quick with a restaurant recommendation and suggestions.

title: Great Hotel with great location
review: I travel frequently and I normally chose American chain hotels, but I couldn't find one in Florence and I am glad I didn't. This hotel is so nice and extremely well located, just steps from major attractions. All staff is very friendly and helpful, the two girls at the front desk, the gentleman at night shift and the girl at the tea time really made a difference making sure that our stay was pleasant. I will definetely recommend it and stay there for future trips.

title: Long weekend in Florence
review: Dear Guest, many thanks for posting a positive review, we are very happy we met your expectations. We really hope to welcome back in the near future and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Highly recommended
review: The hotel was truly 5 star in approach - small but neat and very friendly.  The staff approach was exemplary, without exception.  They all spoke several languages, and could not have been more friendly and helpful.  I was most impressed.  The hotel is situated ideally to explore the city without needing taxis or buses.

title: Great Location, friendly staff
review: Dear Guest, many thanks for your very positive review, we are more than happy you spent wonderful time with us. We really hope to welcome back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Central Hotel
review: I stayed with my family last August for five days. Very good location near shopping area but if you are driving beware  that it is difficult to reach even with navi and Google map. Large rooms, excellent staff and good food. Boutique coze hotel

title: Ideal base for seeing Florence
review: This hotel is excellently situated for seeing the main attractions in Florence with the added bonus of the spa after along day out sightseeing, I must just ask what the marks are on the steam room ceiling is it a pattern or more likely black mould, if it is not there on your visit you can assume it was the later, all in all a great plaace to stay with freindly staff who pay attention to your every wish.

title: Perfect location!
review: Dear Guest, many thanks for your positive review and are very glad you spent wonderful time with us. As for he steam room ceiling, because of the strong humidity , we have to re-paint at lest twice a year even if it isn't mould. We are keep into consideration to use a different one, something like water-proof. Hope to welcome back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great location and staff
review: Ideal location, really friendly staff, very clean room and quite good service. Really good massage services! The only thing I can admit that doesn't match the hotel expectations is the breakfast..poor variety, not something special.  However, I would definately stay there again in my next visit to Florence!

title: Amazing location and service
review: Dear Guest, we thank you very much for your review and are glad you appreciated the massage. As for the breakfast, which is complimentary, is prepared on a "little" buffet. Unfortunately, as I am sure you have noticed, we do not have so much space to exposure our products  and it could seem that there are a few ones. But, believe not only us but all other Guest's review, all our product are very high quality ones. However, thank you for your suggestion which for sure will help us doing much better. Hope to welcoming back in the near future, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great hotel - amazing location!
review: Boutique hotel in a fantastic location.We have been to Florence many times and this ranks up there with the best. Nice little. Touches like the complimentary spa and a free happy hour just give it that personal touch. Special mention to Fabiola who attended to our every need and provided some great restaurant recommendations.

title: If you go to Florence for goodness sake stay here.
review: This hotel is wonderful. Hands down. It is secluded, yet right in the heart of the city. You cannot hear a thing outside apart from a distant church bell chiming on the hour. Bliss. The rooms are very tastefully decorated and the bed is so comfortable. The staff are, without exception, fantastic. So helpful and friendly and they speak very good English. Every evening they have a complimentary 'happy hour' with very tasty snacks and prossecco. A great way to start the evening off before heading out for fun in the city. We were served by Fabiola who is a credit to the hotel as she so clearly loves her job and exudes enthusiasm and charisma. The breakfast is very nicely laid out and vey tasty. A good way to start the day before heading off to see the wonders of Florence. You cannot…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Mark D, Many many thanks for your wonderful words, really, all of us appreciate them, especially Fabiola, she is more than enthusiastic about her job. We hope and look forward to welcoming back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Amazing weekend & hotel
review: Beautiful hotel rooms, clean and good size. Nice breakfast  Very convenient location for sight seeing and shopping. Hotel staffs are friendly  Problems were solved very efficiently  If I visit Florence again, will definetely be back

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Dear Jill K, thank you very much for your positive review and are very glad your stay was beautiful. We look forward to welcoming back and we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Honeymoon
review: This is my first ever review on Tripadvisor but after our amazing stay at the Golden Tower i felt it was only fair to make the effort and post one. What elevates this hotel above others we've stayed in was the staff, which is such an important asset for any hotel. They were all courteous, friendly, spoke excellent English and helped us our with restaurant reservations and sight seeing. I cannot speak highly enough about them and the hotel management must be very proud of them. Regarding the hotel itself it is beautifully designed and maintained to a very high standard. We were upgraded to a suite as it was our 10th wedding anniversary and it is without doubt the nicest hotel room we have ever stayed in. I could go on forever talking about what else we loved about this hotel but…

title: Highly Recommend this boutique hotel
review: Fantastic location for seeing all the famous sights of Florence. Room was fabulous with some special touches including a turndown service in the evening. Peaceful hotel being only 27 rooms meant you get that personal touch, staff friendly and couldn't do enough for you. Breakfast was a very good standard, something for everyone and quality produce. Cosy spa with steam room, sauna and splash pool, just what you need after being on your feet all day. Certainly will go back😀

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear JoA415, thank you very much for your positive review and very glad you appreciated our unique services. We really hope to welcome back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Very pleasant
review: Having just spent 3 nights at the Golden Tower with my partner all I can say is we had an amazing time where the hospitality and service were excellent. While we were there it was our anniversary and they put fruit and prosecco in our room while serving us an an amazing cocktail before dinner. The room was spotless and very comfortable with breakfast being a mini feast. Elena and her team were great as was Fabiola behind the bar. We would definitely go back...

title: The Hotel to go in Florence
review: Dear Carl0803, thank you very much for your positive reviews, above all Elena & Fabiola appreciate your comment. We try to do our best to render any moments memorable at Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and comments like yours encourage us to going on this way. Thank you, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Less then normal
review: Very nice hotel. Polite staff, nicely done rooms (a little warm and the climate control would not switch on). Happy hour was great. Breakfast buffet lovely. It just could have been a bit less international... switching off the huge tv in the bar and losing the piped music would have made such a positive difference to the atmosphere. Really good, but could easily have been better in our view. .

title: Martin
review: Excellent hotel and the friendliest staff I have ever had the pleasure to meet. We will definitely return. The room was quiet and comfortable and the location for all the major attractions was excellent. 15 to 20 minute walk from the bus station  Just great Martin

title: Wonderful stay at the Golden Tower
review: Dear weebs2, Martin, thank you very much for your positive review, all of us appreciate it very much and really look forward to welcome back soon. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Centrally located and great overall hotel
review: We had a very nice stay at the Golden Tower.  Our room was spacious and clean.  The bathroom was immaculate.  The staff was extremely professional.  They provide guests with a complimentary glass of prosecco along with food treats at 6:30 pm each evening.  The hotel is located in an area that has very upscale stores.  The hotel is very near the train station - perhaps a 7 minute taxi ride.  I would recommend this hotel to others and definitely come back.

title: Very good little hotel!
review: Dear Sheila L, thank you very much for your positive review, we appreciate it vey much. We really hope to welcome back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: a Brief stay in luxury
review: Stayed here for our honeymoon and this hotel did not disappoint. They are centrally located. The hotel staff were friendly and very helpful. The hotel is beautiful and our room was clean & spacious. We had a massage at the spa and it was very relaxing. The hotel is only a couple of blocks from the leather market and lots of great restaurants and a short walk to the Ponte vecchio. The hotel offered complimentary breakfast and a free flute of Champaign every evening at 6:00. Highly recommend the hotel, it was the total package for me.

title: True Luxury
review: Terrific location, quiet, well appointed rooms.  Walked everywhere.  We had breakfast included and it was abundant and delicious.  Also included was an appetizer and cocktail buffet in the early evening.  Again - delicious.  The staff was polite and extremely helpful - contacted a tour for us when we were delayed and gave great recommendations for dining. Highly recommended.

title: Great location - a disappointingly cramped room - 406
review: Dear LINDA G, thank you very much for your positive review and are vey happy you spent wonderful time at Golden Tower Hotel. Hope to welcome back very soon, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Wonderful!
review: We had four nights here at the beginning of October in this 27 room boutique hotel.I booked a 'deluxe room' and whilst not wishing to sound negative I am not sure what the 'basic chic' rooms are like.  Perhaps it is me in that I am not used to boutique hotels but our room 406, was some way short, in my view of a 5* room which I am used to. My first reaction on opening the door was how small and cramped it was - it was a struggle to squeeze between the end of the bed and the wall and often you had to wait for your partner to walk by which isn't really acceptable. It had a comfortable bed and nice personalised accessories.  There was a large bathroom with a nice double headed shower but no bath which I would expect to find in a 5* hotel. Disappointingly there was very little room…

title: Great location
review: Dear Andrew B, thank you for your review and  we realized that your stay hasn't been excellent. We are a "boutique hotel", we are not like an Intercontinental hotel, and this refers to rooms, to all common areas (lobby, breakfast room, spa, ), in addition our room are normal european standard sizes and  booking a deluxe, as you have read, includes additional services which Classic not includes. Moreover, as a boutique hotel built inside a medieval building all rooms are different and should you come next time you will be given, for sure, a different one. As many hotels room in the world some are with shower, some are with bath tub, some with both. We could change the room if you asked for, maybe the day after check-in. We also try to meet our guest expectations. We sincere hope to welcome back and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fantastic Hotel in a great location
review: We stayed at The Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for seven days, two weeks ago.  It's a small boutique hotel, very well located, only blocks away from all the visiting places in Florence.  The staff is great, they take care of you from minute one (Federica at the front desk was great).  Rooms are spacious, modern, clean and silent.  The hotel smells great (They use fragrance diffusers from Aqua Dell'Elba). I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Great Boutique Hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Highly recommend this well located boutique hotel. The breakfast is the best we had in Italy and the happy hour appetizers were delicious! The desk staff were friendly and helpful and the room extremely comfortable!  My only complaint was that the room temp was very warm at night for us and we did not have control of the air conditioner. We we opened the windows to try to cool Down the room, the mosquitoes got in and made a Snack out of us. Other than that- It was wonderful!

title: Lovely boutique hotel right in the old town centre of Florence only a couple of minutes from Uffuzi, Ponte Vecchio etc
review: Dear Kolbz, many thanks for posting a positive review and are very glad you spent wonderful time with us...apart from the mosquitos. We really look forward to welcome back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect location, wonderful hotel & spa
review: We spent a week in the Golden Tower hotel, which was excellently located in a quiet square next to the Palazzo Strozzi only a couple of minutes walk from the Uffuzi Gallery, Ponte Vecchio, 5 minutes from the Duomo etc. For those who like luxury shopping, it is right in the heart of that part of Florence. The hotel is boutique with only around 30 rooms, and therefore didn't feel on an 'industrial scale' like some hotels do. The staff were all very friendly and helpful, and breakfast was a good varied buffet. Each evening a free glass of Prosecco and free canapes from 6.30 p.m. was a nice touch. The room was modern and clean and quiet. We didn't get time to use the Spa, but saw plenty of other guests using it.

title: Great place to stay
review: Dear Andrew M, thank you very much for posting a positive review, all of us appreciate it. it helps us doing much better. Looking forward to welcoming back soon and next time you should try our Golden Spa, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Service and location!
review: We stayed here for 2 nights and wish we could have extended our stay in Florence, and particularly this hotel. The location is PERFECT. The hotel is lovely. We really enjoyed visiting the spa each afternoon to relax and unwind after a long day of sight seeing.

title: Wonderful stay!
review: We spent four nights here in September 2015. Located on Piazza de Strossi, this boutique hotel was just lovely! The room was quaint and well appointed. The dining area and bar were very nice. We enjoyed the breakfast buffet each morning and often enjoyed a cocktail or Prosecco in the bar. They staff was very friendly and accommodating. The location is in close proximity to many good restaurants.

title: Wonderful Boutique Hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Dear 980Happywanderer, thank you very much for your positive review, we are very happy your stay was good at Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. Hope to welcome back soon, we remain with  our best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Excellent/full service 5 star
review: We spent 4 nights at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa at the beginning of September. The staff at the hotel go above and beyond to ensure your stay is excellent and that your needs are met as a hotel guest. I've traveled quite a bit and these are some of the best hotel staff I've ever encountered.  The hotel rooms are beautiful and very comfortable, the beds were great and the bathroom was large.   The evening happy hour snacks are extremely tasty and if you ever find yourself unable to wait till later hours (9:30 & 10) for a restaurant reservation, the dinner menu at the restaurant is very tasty. After a very long day, we popped in and had a delicious meal of tenderloin, cheese, salad, and delicious wine.  The location is extremely convenient. You're a 10 minute walk to the train…

title: Nice hotel, great service
review: Dear TX_Sci_Teacher, Thank you very much for your positive review , we are more than happy to read that you have never met a Staff like ours. Very proud of this. Hope to welcome back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Magnificent!
review: We spent four nights last week at Golden.From the moment you arrive,one is greeted by a warm and knowledgeable staff. Hotel and rooms are beautifully appointed.Everyone,from front desk,porters,kitchen staff,room service and tour advice was first class.Hotel is 10 minute walk to anywhere in Florence.Excellent restaurants chosen by staff exceeded all expectations.We can't wait to return.

title: 10th anniversary paradise
review: We stayed here for our 10th anniversary and had a wonderful time.  We got a suite on the second floor and it was fantastic.   Service was excellent and morning breakfast was very very good.  (OK I'm running out of synonyms for excellent)  This hotel is perfectly situated just a short half block from one of the major plazas and walking distance to everything.  We did not get a chance to enjoy the spa.  Mainly because the room was so great. Shower was interesting because it had to stations.  Great for a honeymoon. I honestly could not make any suggestions on improvement.  The room we had was even nicer than the professional photos suggest.  (I'll post four pictures of our room)

title: Well-located boutique hotel
review: Dear Tenzo, many many thanks for your positive review and are very very happy your stay was top-notch at Golden Tower Hotel & Spa for your wedding anniversary. We wish you all the best and hope to welcome back soon, best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Everything one could hope for from a hotel
review: All the major sights are a short wall from this hotel. The hotel was quite cozy, and the updated room was small but well-furnished. The staff was friendly and the breakfast buffet was ample. Having the spa on site was a plus; I treated myself to a massage after a long day of sightseeing, My only complaint was a smoke alarm over the bed with two red lights that flashed constantly. At night, it was bright enough to disturb my sleep. Such alarms are standard in hotels, but I've never encountered one that flashes.

title: Good value mid range hotel
review: Dear SteveVA69, thank you very much for your positive review and sorry for the red-light of the smoke alarm but as I am sure you can imagine it is beyond our control as we must follow european lines in terms of safety and security. Hope to welcome back very soon, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Exceptional Hotel!
review: The Golden Tower Hotel and Spa is a beautiful hotel in a beautiful city. Almost perfectly located, the hotel is a ten minute walk from the Academia, Uffizi Gallery, the Ponte Vecchio, and a whole slew of fantastic museums, shops and restaurants. The staff was friendly and gave good advice about the city and the Tuscan region. Our rooms were large, well decorated and provided to all of our needs. We used the relaxing and rejuvenating "spa pool" and sauna downstairs and were very impressed by the modernity of the facilities. The only downside was the breakfast. Limited options in a tiny, somewhat cramped room. This hotel is a good choice for families as there are larger rooms and suites and nice for couples too.

title: Fantastic stay in 5-star hotel
review: We stayed here as part of our honeymoon, and we were delighted to be upgraded and got a great room with a jacuzzi and balcony, and came back to a lovely surprise of prosecco one evening as well. The room was perfect, comfortable bed, spacious, nice bathroom, and of course the jacuzzi. The view from the balcony was just of the buildings across the way, but could see the Florence skyline, and some towers etc. Breakfast was very good, wide range of foods in the buffet. The location is great, only 5 mins walk to the uffizi, duomo, etc.

title: The hotel is top notch!
review: Dear niamhccc, we thankyou very much for your positive review and are very happy you had a memorable stay. Looking forward to welcoming you back, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Definitely not 5-star
review: The hotel is top notch!  We took the train from Rome to Florence and the hotel is about a 10 minute walk from the train station.  The train station is called Santa Maria Novella train station.  The hotel is about 10 – 15 minute walk from all major sites in Florence (the Uffizi Gallery and the Accademia that has the statue of David).   This was the largest room that we had during our visit to Italy.  The room was very spacious, it had a couch and sitting area.  We had a very nice Hot tub (Although we used it as a Cold Tub because it was 100 F outside) and a lovely balcony.     The air conditioner worked well, it was a very clean and looked recently renovated.  The bathrooms were very large, clean, nice and modern.  The hotel had a very large lobby area.  They had a nice bar,…

title: Cute place but dated and small
review: Dear Bdd1989, thank you so much for your positive review. I found it very helpulf,of course not only referring to  our hotel but also for  all tips you gave to people, well done. We are very happy you spent wonderful time with us and really hope to welcome back very soon. In the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manage

title: Fabulous Florence
review: I checked in around 5pm and was offered a room with twin beds even though I was a solo traveller. I was told this was an upgrade , though I had specifically requested a room in the tower. There was a noisy unpleasant exchange by the staff in furious italian. It was not a warm welcome. The decor is dated, the bed was not comfortable, and the breakfast was limited. The airconditioning was not cool enough but I was given a fan.The hotel is clean and centrally located. The front desk staff eventually thawed and were professional. They offered excellent dinner recommendations. I did not enjoy my stay. I will not be back.

title: Great value, luxe touches, quiet sleep
review: Apart from a rather less than warm welcome, things rapidly improved here to be one of the best value hotels I've stayed in. We had a room on the top floor which had its own mezzanine - and two bathrooms, for roughly A$300 a night. There is a happy hour each evening and the lovely Fabiola really looks after you with a generous pour of prosecco. The snacks during this period vary in quality but are quite decent. Breakfast is great and the coffee is excellent. Wi-fi also worked well and the beds, like everywhere we've stayed in Italy, are firm but fine for sleeping, with good quality pillows. All the main sights in Florence are very easy walking distance, as is the main railway station.

title: A GREAT HOTEL
review: Dear thefoodieworld, thank you very much for your positive review and above all Fabiola appreciate it. She loved her job. We love our job and review like yours gives us the stimulus to going on this way and doing better. Thanks again and hope to welcome back soon, all our best, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Central location quietly hidden on a side street
review: I thought this was an excellent hotel.  We have started staying at the high level hotels in our old age and I would definitely say, from our experience our room was great.  I am sorry but this review is from about 10 months ago!  The only problem was the front desk was not very helpful at arranging side excursions.  One front desk clerk had no idea what I was talking about, and when I was walking out of the lobby, there were brochures of exactly what I wanted, so I guess they are not reading their own brochures  He was just not motivated to help at all.    The carpeting in the room was kinda stained which I thought should not have been for the price we paid.  All in all, I would stay here again.  The gentlemen that made the remark about tipping:  I find it perfectly acceptable…

title: Unexpectedly and happily surprised........!!
review: Dear ctolstad, thank you for you review and unfortunately after so long (10 months) it is difficult for us to find  out who was on duty during your stay even if it sounds strange that we were not able to recommend. I am afraid he was a "stagiaire" (trainee), usually we receive them form the local Hotel School. Hope to welcome back, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great city centre hotel, very quiet and comfortable
review: I stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and could not have had a better experience. The location was excellent. It was located in the heart of Florence, a few minutes walk from the Duomo, but was on a side street so the hotel itself was away from the foot traffic and street noise. You could walk to anywhere within the city centre in less than 10 minutes.   The staff went above and beyond on multiple occasions to help us feel welcome and make our stay as comfortable as possible. We had a few requests while staying there. For example: asking for help with meal reservations, directions to places and also help renting a car. With each request, the staff responded with a smile and didn't hesitate to take on our request and help. They were such a pleasure.   The interior of the room…

title: Wonderful
review: Nothing to add to the reviews, the staff make this a fabulous hotel, friendly and welcoming. Didn't think we'd use the spa much, but used it most evenings as a wind down to pounding the pavements of this beautiful city.  My only warning is the restaurant they recommend to new arrivals, it's lovely, but VERY expensive, we had a great meal (yes we did it too) but around double the price of similar local establishments.

title: Beautiful Hotel in great location
review: Dear Plumit, thank you very much for your positive review. We are very happy you spent wonderful time with us. Thanks also for informing about the price of the restaurants which we only suggest but it is good to know. It is a shame you did not mentioned the name. Hope to welcoming back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Stay elsewhere!
review: Stayed 3 nights at the Golden Tower. Our room was really lovely - very nicely decorated, clean, comfortable and thoughtfully designed. The staff was friendly and helpful. There was a nice breakfast in the mornings which we enjoyed. The location was great - an easy walk to everything we wanted to do in terms of sight-seeing. It was also a lovely place from which to take a walk in the evenings. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Fabulous Fabiola in Florence
review: Dear 3girlsBethesda, we want to thank you very much  for your positive review and are very very happy you spent wonderful time with us. We really hope to welcome back soon and wishing you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Beautiful Luxury Hotel in the Centre of Florence
review: First night in Florence stayed in Airbnb apartment without air conditioning so wanted to reward family by staying in five star hotel. My 23 k 21 year old sons needed two twin beds and therefore received upgrade to a "delux" room.  My wife and I however ended up in a "basic" room.  Wow what a difference!  Our bathroom reminded me of a cruise ship bathroom!  I had a typical American build for Man in his fifties and was unable to close the shower door!  Finally after some maneuvers was able to slide door closed. The toilet would not stop running after flushing and A/C thermostat was not controllable. When discussing with front desk I was told they could unlock thermostat for me however it did remedy problem also the toilet issue was never addressed.  Experience worsened by front…

title: Silver Wedding Celebration
review: We were a late arrival after horrendous re routed flights in difficult weather. On arrival, feeling tired, we received a wonderful welcome at reception and a surprise upgrade to a super junior suite on the 5th floor. Room was very well appointed with free mini bar. Bathroom and shower spotless and great for revitalising the senses after a long day. The spa is a haven of peace and quiet - so quiet, it's easy to fall asleep! Great place to drift off and recharge the batteries. Small restaurant is cosy with warm greeting at breakfast which offers excellent choice of warm and cold meat dishes. Great range of coffees - don't forget to ask and go for broke starting the day with a Buck's Fizz - just help yourself! This hotel is so centrally located that all the main sightseeing…

title: Fantastic 5 star hotel
review: Dear EremoDelFate1, thank you very much for your positive and detailed review., people will appreciate your suggestions. We are so glad you spent wonderful time with us and hope to welcome back very soon. Wishing you all the best, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great spot
review: I just returned from 5 glorious days at the Golden Tower in Florence and it was fantastic!!   The staff was very knowledgable and gave us great recommendations for shopping and restaurants.   The location can't be beat.  It's right in the heart of the city and a few minutes walk from the Duomo, Ufficio, etc.  We walked everywhere and never needed a taxi. I also booked a massage at the spa which was heavenly.   Breakfast was delicious and there was so much of it we had to skip lunch most days. Five star service from all the staff from the reception to the barista.   The room and bathroom was beautiful and spotless!!   I highly recommend you try it.  I will definitely return.

title: Favorite Hotel in Italy
review: Dear Lisa S, thank you so much for your wonderful review. We do our best to render the stay of our Guest memorable and appreciate vey much when reading review like yours. To do this job you must love it as you have to do it with passion and to be honest all our staff seems to have this characteristics. It couldn't be different,  otherwise you'd be  the first to let us know. All our best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Would recommend this hotel every time!
review: We were staying for 2 nights in Florence and the location frankly couldn't be better amongst any of the 5 star places in the town. You are ideally situated for all the sights and the shops. Though word of warning if your wife has a weakness for Armani you're in for a tough time.  We were given a room upgrade so I can't comment on the deluxe room we booked, but I can say the suite was amazing. Lots of space, great double shower and the bed was supremely comfortable.  I understand some of our party had rooms which they thought were far too small for the price, so I would imagine it is like a lot of historic, town center hotels in that the room spaces vary a lot but I can only comment on ours which was utterly fab - so thank you GT. It made a special weekend even more so. The…

title: Wonderful hotel in the centre of Florence
review: From the moment we stepped in the door this was a great stay. the staff were welcoming and helpful. The hotel is beautifully decorated and spotlessly clean throughout. They have a daily 'happy hour' with 1 glass of prosecco and some great local home cooked nibbles. The breakfast was simple but fresh food, local sausages, fruit and bread.  The hotel is well located and around a 10 minute walk from major sightseeing landmarks and in the middle of the shopping and restaurants. We walked the whole time we were there, never needing any form of transportation.  We didn't have time to sample the spa which looked great

title: Amazing stay in Florence!
review: Dear Wendy K, Thank you so much for your positive review and we are more than happy we met your expectations. We look forward to welcoming back very soon and in the meantime we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: The best stay during our honeymoon!
review: We had an amazing 4 night stay at the Golden Tower Hotel and Spa in Florence. Friendly front desk staff who gave us great restaurant recommendations. Beautiful, luxurious, and quiet rooms, delicious breakfast. The location is amazing, among all of the high end shops and boutiques. Highly recommend!

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Dear mreddy2015, thank you very much for your positive review and very proud to be up your expectations. Looking forward to welcoming you back, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Awesome Hotel and Staff!
review: We visited Italy for 2 weeks for our honeymoon and finished out in Florence. This hotel made the end of our trip so amazing. We stayed in a Deluxe Tower room and is was absolutely beautiful- very unique and comfortable. It felt like we were in a room at the Strozzi palace :). We walked into the room with a fresh fruit basket waiting for us and such nice little touches like this throughout our stay. Francesca at the front desk is a GEM! She was so great, friendly, always smiling and never was a request too much for her.  She also offered great restaurant recommendations. Fabiana in the bar/restaurant was equally wonderful! She sent us champagne one night for our honeymoon celebration. Truly, I would not stay at another hotel within the city of Florence because of the service like…

title: Luxury with great staff
review: The staff were great, very welcoming and helpful. The facilities were always immaculate, and the spa was great. Our junior suite was delightful, with a separate sitting room and plenty of space. The hotel was really convenient for sightseeing and restaurants.

title: 5 Star Service
review: Dear Hilary B, thank you so much for your positive review. We are very happy we have been up to your expectations. Looking forward to welcoming back in the near future, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: elegant, convenient
review: My husband, son and I stayed at this property for four nights.  While the hotel is rated a 5 star hotel, I would have to respectfully categorize it as being more along the lines of a 4 star hotel (by U.S. standards).  The service however, is where they are 5 star!  I can't say enough wonderful things about the staff at Golden Tower, and that service began before we even arrived.  Traveling with a toddler I had a lot of questions and requests.  Each email was responded to promptly, and with every request I was reassured that we would have everything we needed upon arrival.  They NEVER dropped the ball on any details.  Standout staff members include Elena, Fabiana (in the bar/restaurant), Francesca, Federica.  They were friendly, efficient, quick to help and offer suggestions, and…

title: Our best stay in Italy
review: Dear ACLosAngeles, Thank you very much for your positive review. As for the rating, 4 rather than 5 star, to be honest with you I would like to understand more, as while reading the review we have been 5, it is not clear the criteria for comparison. As for the wi.fi connection, we discovered there were a problem in an access point close to your room, it wasn't easy but "thanks" to your advise we solved the problem. The wifi line is the same in the lobby. On behalf of all staff, in particular the ones you mentioned, thank you. Best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Excellent reasonable hotel in Florence
review: the hotel rooms are mostly done in neutrals, beige on beige, there are scent diffusers in the hallways, and bathrooms are well appointed with a 110 and 220 V plug. There are speakers in the bathroom which connect to the TV.

title: Fantastic hotel and location
review: Beautiful hotel in centre of Florence. Quietest room ever stayed in (402). Breakfast excellent with plenty of choice. Didn't have dinner in hotel purely as so many beautiful restaurants around. Used the spa which was very relaxing after sightseeing all day. Staff were always very polite and helpful. Would definitely stay here again and would recommend this hotel without hesitation 😄 also first hotel I've stayed in where the WIFI connection was 100%.

title: Great Hotel, Ideally Situated For The Wonders Of Florence
review: Dear megmoo1721, thank you so much for your excellent review and are very happy your stay was wonderful and everythings was ok. We look forward to welcoming back and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: great repeat stay
review: My wife and I stayed in this hotel based on a BA recommendation and used it as a base for exploring the wonders of Florence. We were not disappointed.  The hotel is well located within the classic cobbled streets of the city and is within reasonable walking distance of all the major attractions. The main railway station is within easy walking distance also, and is also a good place to catch one of the many "hop on, hop off" bus tours of the city.  The hotel itself is clean and modern with classic Italian marble finishing in the public areas. The rooms are spacious and comfortable (at least ours was) with a large bathroom more than capable of accommodating two adults in the various stages of sunscreen/aftersun application 😉  We personally found the bar area a little quiet,…

title: Fantastic location
review: Dear GaryMenzies, Thank you so much for your positive review which is important not only for us but above all for those ones have to choice an accommodation in Florence, exactly as you said. We are glad we have met your expectations and hope to welcome back very soon. Best regards, antonio pellegrino - direttore generale

title: one of the best ever
review: This was our second time visiting Florence and our second time staying at this hotel. After an extensive search for a luxury hotel with a great location and somewhat reasonable price, decided to book it again. It was as nice as we remembered. It was clean and quiet and our room was large and had the bathroom on the top floor and then some stairs down to the sleeping area. Booked directly through their website and had breakfast included, which was helpful on the days we didn't feel like going out for breakfast. great location which allowed us to easily walk around.  What I was most pleased about was that the front desk was very responsive to my emails before our stay and were very kind to call to secure dinner reservations for us even before we arrived! Highly recommend this…

title: Great Hotel in the right place
review: Nice hotel in the centre of Florence, excellent service, with friendly staff. Used the excellent Spa each day to relax after walking all day in Florence. Will use the same hotel next time I come to Florence!

title: Wonderful Birthday present
review: Dear Len D, thank you very much for you positive review and really wait for you when decide to come back to Florence. All our best, antonio pellegrino -  general manager

title: In the Heart of Florence, no ifs and buts
review: My wife treated me to a holiday in Europe, in a city of my choice. I selected Florence, and by perfect chance decided on the Golden Tower Hotel. This is quite simply, the best Hotel I have ever had the pleasure of staying in. All the facilities, meals etc. are magnificent, but what sets it apart are the staff. They all speak very good English and are always cheerful, friendly and helpful. They even think of things they can help with that one hasn't even asked about. Of course, one has most contact with the reception staff, but I must comment on the thoroughness of the the ladies who clean the rooms, and make the beds etc.. The amaretti biscuit on the pillow each night was a lovely touch. The staff who serve the breakfast each morning also do great credit to the hotel, and give…

title: Great hotel in central location
review: Dear Michael N, we thank you very much for your positive review but above all we thank you your wife for choosing us to spent your holidays on Florence ;-) All of us are involved seriously to the satisfaction of our guests and we can reach these results only because we love this job and could not be different. Thanks again and hope to welcome back for your next Birthday, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Amazing and unique
review: Just a 10 -minute walk from the train station , next to the charming Palazzo Strozzi , I discovered a boutique hotel in a carefully restored medieval building of 1000 . We are in the heart of Florence , surrounded by boutiques and the most beautiful museums in the world . A few steps and you are overlooking the Arno . Here kindness Italian ( that sincere ) is the host since check in . The rooms are all unique and well appointed . Small but complete Spa , you can rest in the "living room " of the hotel with a book or to make a drink well aware that a 10 minute walk or bike to get anywhere in the city . The five stars are well deserved for the location, renovation , furnishings , breakfast and not least the kindness and professionalism of all staff . see you soon

title: Italian Charm and Beauty
review: I found the Hotel to be Friendly and Charming as well as Professional. Our Room was upgraded to a Junior Suite as I originally booked a Deluxe Double Room. I was impressed and completely satisfied with the Staff's Professionalism. Very accommodating Staff and knowledgeable. We had dinner in the Restaurant and the Waitress was very helpful with our choosing a suitable wine for our dinner. She explained the subtleties and nuisances between the Wines. She had been to visit a Vineyard to expand her wine knowledge and was more than happy to share with us what she had learned. The Restaurant had a small Menu selection but it was overwhelmingly delicious and impressive. Perfect location for visiting all historical Landmarks. Great Location!  Housekeeping was also top and I can only say…

title: great hotel located in the center of florence
review: Dear julienne m, thank you very much for your beautiful review which I have read twice. It gives me a great pleasure reading what exactly is the sense of our job: Passion, professionalism, competence and genuineness. Thanks a lot and we wait for your next trip to florence, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: A lovely hotel in a great spot for sightseeing
review: I cannot over-exaggerate the great experience that we had in this hotel. It is centrally located close to all main attractions of Florence. The staff is most friendly and efficient. The rooms might be average in size, but they are so beautifully kept and the beds are most convenient. Breakfast is luxurious. Everyday there is afternoon tea offered to the guests of the hotel. Highly recommended. We definitely will come back to this hotel the next time that we are in Florence.

title: Stop looking! This is where you want to stay.
review: Dea gilaofer79, thank you very much for your positive review and don't be worried about the exaggeration, if  you feel we have met your expectations , it is right to let us know. Thank you again and looking forward to see you soon, Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent
review: This lovely hotel was perfect for our 6 nights in Florence. In the city centre it is close to all the major attractions such as the Uffizi, Pitti Palace, Il Duomo, Ponte Vecchio, Basilica Di San Lorenzo, plus many restaurants and bars. Beautifully kept and maintained with nice touches such as a turn down service and chocolate s or biscuits left on the pillow each night. There is a happy hour every night with a complimentary small buffet and prosecco for guests. The breakfasts are lovely with a selection of breads, cakes, croissants, fruit, meats, cheeses, cereal, smoked salmon, eggs, sausages & juices.   My husband used the spa facilities and said they were great, he particularly liked the steam room.

title: A wonderful experience!
review: We stayed at The Golden Tower for two nights.  I wish it was longer!  The location was fantastic, an easy walk to all the major attractions.  Our room was spacious and well appointed.  The bathroom was huge and had the best shower of the four hotels we stayed at in Italy.  Our room and bathroom were very clean as was the lobby, breakfast area and lobby bathroom.  The front desk staff was fantastic, especially Francesca and Alessandro.  They gave us restaurant suggestions and told us where to see the best view of Florence and how to get there.  They were 100% correct and we enjoyed every suggestion they gave us.  I cannot say enough about how much we liked this hotel.  You will love it if you stay here!  Remember to ask for Francesca or Alessandro if you want suggestions, they…

title: Simply the best
review: Dear 15Lovetotravel15, thank you very much for your very positive review especially Francesca and Alessio will be very glad to read about them. We hope to welcome back very soon and thank again, best regards, antonio pellegrino direttore generale

title: Lovely hotel, poor attitude from some staff
review: The hotel is superb by any standards. Its location, within 5 minutes walk from the Duomo, Piazza De la Signoria and Uffizzi, is perfect.  We had a junior suite; the room was huge, split level, very well appointed and decorated. Cleanliness is and maintenance are exemplary. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The Spa is beautiful; relatively small, but sufficient for the hotel guests. We will definitely stay in this hotel whenever we come to Florence; it is in the top three hotels we stayed all over the world. The only fault I could find is that it does not provide an espresso machine in the room, just instant coffee. To drink instant coffee in Italy is a crime for me.

title: Excellent location!
review: Dear trbuksxdk, we thank you very much for your excellent review. We are very proud to be one of your best hotel you stayed in Italy. As for he espresso, I agree with you even if we have Guests come from all over the world and not all likes espresso and we have reached a compromise :) Hope to welcoming back soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great service and brilliant location
review: My wife and I stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel and Spa for a short minimoon. The room and bathroom were a reasonable size for Europe and were decorated nicely. The breakfast buffet was appropriate for the size of the hotel and had plenty of options and varied slightly each day.  The hotel was within easy walking distance from Firenze SMN (12mins) and was surrounded by a number of high end fashion retailers, which placed the hotel in an ideal location.  We were also within a short walking distance to the Florence must sees; Acadamia Gallery, Cathedral of Santa Maria del Fiore, Uffizi Gallery and Palazzo Vecchio.  Our favourite part of the hotel was the spa, which was a must when we were searching for a hotel for our stay.  The staff were kind and helpful, the spa facilities were…

title: One of the perfect hotels in Florence
review: We stayed at this hotel for a few nights and couldn't be happier. The rooms were spacious, clean and well maintained. It is conveniently located next to all the luxury brand name stores in the city and almost everything/everywhere is within walking distance. The breakfast a good and offered much more than a simple continental breakfast. The hotel also has a neat little library of books (including tour guide books!) which lets guests borrow them during the stay. Unfortunately, there was too much to see and do in Florence that we did not get a chance to try their spa. If and when there is a next time, we will surely come back to this hotel and try their other amenities.

title: Amazing hotel In a great location - book with confidence
review: Dear DTL919, Thank you very much for your more than positive review. Be one of your perfect hotels in Florence is give us great satisfactions as all of us love this job...it couldn't be different. Thanks again and hope to welcome back, best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Gem in Florence!
review: From  email exchanges before we left  home to check out, this hotel proved to be an excellent  choice. The  deluxe room we chose was on the first floor very well appointed and very spacious for a city  centre hotel. Breakfast was excellent with a wide choice of continental fare as well a  bacon, sausage and scrambled eggs. Happy hour 7pm -8pm with free proseco and canapés was made special by the welcome from Fabia. That said , all staff really friendly and couldn't have been more helpful. We are not spa people, but loved the spa, not busy and great to relax in after a busy day. Only minor irritation was taxi arranged by hotel from airport was €60, taxis outside €24 - choose wisely.

title: Wonderful hotel in wonderful Florence
review: Dear rmtkol, thank you very much for your detailed and positive review. Fabiola will be very happy for your mention, she loves this job. As for the transfer, as I am sure you know, it is completely different service from taxi, I mean, the transfer wait for you in the airport; Taxis, as often happens, may be are not there when you arrive  and you need to wait for them longer. It happened to me. This is worldwide. We hope to welcome back and in the meantime, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: You won't be disappointed
review: I spent one night at Golden Tower on March 19th.  I wish I had stayed longer.  What a lovely hotel.  Service was great.  The room was so nice.  Great bed!  They knew it was my birthday and send a bottle of Perseco to my room with food too.  Thank you so much!  What a treat. I had a pedicure at their spa and it was a great pedicure.  I recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Florence.  It's in such a nice part of Florence too.  I can't wait to go back!

title: A tip top hotel in the centre of Florence
review: We booked the Golden Tower hotel in Florence for a city break and to learn about the history of Florence. The staff were very friendly, very efficient and nothing was too much trouble booking dinners and drivers for us. The breakfasts offered considerable variety and the evening snacks were excellent. Our room was very comfortable and well appointed, the location was right in the old city centre close to all the sights, shops and restaurants, a memorable stay. Thank you to the Golden Tower Hotel and the staff.

title: Golden Touch
review: Dear Jim D, thank you very very much for your positive review and we are so proud that your stay was so memorable. Let me tell you, this is the best gratification which we could aim for. Thanks a lot, best regards, antonio pellegrino  general manager

title: Nice
review: Golden Tower Hotel was the 'perfect' hotel to stay in Florence. It would be impossible to complain about this tasteful,comfortable, generouse hotel. All the staff were impeccable, friendly helpful and professional. 4 days was not enough. Once you have dragged yourself away from the fabulouse breakfast and away from the hotel, you can visit many of thelocal attractions which are close by. I would go back tomorrow!

title: Fantastic Hotel & Service
review: Dear Jenny W, we thank you very much for your very positive review and really hope to welcome back very soon. All of us wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Perfect winter break
review: we had a great family holiday here - our suites were a good size on two levels with 2 bathrooms - lovely and clean with excellent house keeping. the spa is super and the location fantastic. staff very friendly. the breakfast good. the only thing that isn't that great is lobby and bar - it's very dated. we had a drink one evening in the bar and were bought warm beers and I was served a warm tonic water in a smelly glass. from there on we didn't use the bar and had drinks served in our rooms.  all in all I would recommend a stay here- sitting in the spa after a long walk around Florence is just great.

title: 'Fantastic Hotel'
review: One of the best hotels I've stayed in. Excellent rooms, spacious, comfortable and stylish. The staff are fantastic especially the bar staff and reception. The spa facilities are very relaxing after walking round the sights of Florence which are all very close to the hotel. The breakfast was brilliant with Buck Fizz  and a huge variety of food to choose from.There are many restaurants very close by including Il Parione which is excellent.

title: Quality Hotel - Great Location
review: Dear Marjorie T, thank you very much for your wonderful review. We are very proud to be one of your best hotel you have stayed in. We really hope to welcoming back in the near future and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Birthday Celebrations started 15th Feb...................
review: The hotel was situated within the main shopping district of Florence which was very convinient. The staff were very professional and considerate of all our needs. The breakfast was tasty and the dinner served at night was delicious.

title: Great location
review: Dear Ivan T, many thanks for your positive review and are very glad you spent wonderful time with us. Looking forward to welcoming  you back, we remain, your sincerely, antonio pellegrino  general manager

title: Excellent location and accomodation
review: We are a group of friends that arrived in Florence to celebrate the 60th birthday of and two other birthdays of a group of eight of us.  The welcome we received from the reception staff was so warm and helpful, nothing was too much trouble. Rooms and location great so couldn't get much better.............but it did. Then we met Fabiola who insisted that we have complimentary Prossecco before we went out. This was repeated every night and I cannot tell you how much her sense of kindness and fun was appreciated by us all. The warmth and kindness extended go us will not be forgotten and we will have no hesitation in recommending this outstanding 5 star hotel to our friends and family. To my shame I have cannot recall the breakfast staff names but they were quite outstanding in…

title: Awesome hotel, confusing to find, but great location
review: My best friend and I went to this hotel when we visited Florence this past weekend. It was amazing. It was about a 10 minute walk from the train station, but it was not easy to find walking from the train station. I recommend taking a cab, or using an old fashioned map. The GPS does not work when using your cell phone for walking directions. Once we located the hotel, the reception took our bags until we were able to check in and provided us with complimentary coffees. We were able to go to the SPA and book our appointments and go sight-seeing while we waited for our check in time. Very convenient! Once we returned our bags were in our room and we were able to head to our SPA appointments. The hotel offered free appertif which was amazing! I recommend the Rossini! We also ate…

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear Ashley, thank you very much for your positive review and above for recommend us to everyone which is for us the maximum. We really look forward to welcome back and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fabulous hotel in a great location!
review: Went last summer, splurged on this hotel which ended up being the best time ever! Such a great location, great rooms (ours had a Jacuzzi), great staff and food! What i enjoyed most were the restaurants and bars around the hotel which were very lively and fun. Also the pool downstairs was pretty cool, small but still very nice.

title: Lovely hotel in an fantastic location
review: Dear jh_teela, many thanks for remembering to leave a positive review since your last stay which was in august and are very glad you spent wonderful time with us. Hoping to welcome back again, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Recommended
review: This is an amazing hotel! After travelling to the Amalfi Coast and Capri, my husband and I ended up in Florence for a two-night stay, primarily for shopping.  Of all the hotels that we stayed at during our trip to Italy, the Golden Tower was by far our favourite and definitely the best value.    The location is amazing and everything you need is walking distance from the hotel. The staff is wonderful and incredibly helpful.  They speak fluent English and the hotel has a beautiful spa with complimentary facilities available.  They also have a great cocktail hour which is not to be missed.    On the morning of our departure, we had an incredibly early checkout and the morning staff were kind enough to prepare a morning takeout box for our breakfast which we thoroughly while…

title: Very Nice
review: This is a very nice hotel and in a great location. The room was lovely and immaculately clean. The staff are very helpful and the service was wonderful. Despite being in the heart of the city the room was very quiet.

title: Lovely
review: Dear Andrew P, we thank you very much for your positive review and are very glad your stay was excellent at Golden Tower Hotel. We really hope to welcome back soon and in the meantime we wish you Merry Christmas and Happy New Year. antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Luxury in the center
review: Gracious and helpful staff; beautiful, elegant, immaculate, and quiet rooms; deluxe marble bath; fantastic location, in walking distance to shopping, sights, and restaurants; great breakfast. Could not ask for more.

title: Pure luxury
review: Dear 52Leah, many thanks for  your positive review, we are very happy to read you spent wonderful time with us. Looking forward to welcoming back, we wish you a merry christmas, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Good location....but no double beds.....!!
review: A wonderful luxury hotel right in the center of Florence.The staff is very helpful,the rooms are amazing ,the pool is lovely.Everything is perfect,you will enjoy a lot staying there.A little oasis to visit Florence.

title: It only gets better
review: I am fascinated ! I spent 3 days at this great Hotel , not only they have the most amazing and unique rooms, location is only few steps away from all the places of interest , but their staff is the the real Golden in the name. keeping the sophisticated theme , they are all impeccably dress in suits , their chef is the best, my pasta and artichoke was melting in my mouth,they are all ready to service the extra mile at all times. If I ask for any information , everything I request or asked was pleasantly answer and follow up with phone calls and everything in their power to my completely satisfaction , it blowed my mind one afternoon , when I needed water as I started coughing . I couldn't really speak and Fabiola not only help me with water , she went ahead and fixed me a lemon…

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Dear CessyMeac, All the Staff and I thank you very much for your very kind and positive review. All of us try to do the best possible in order to render the stay at Golden Tower Hotel unforgettable and sometime we succeed. Thnaks again and hope to welcome back very soon, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Very good hotel with large rooms but problematical reservation staff
review: We visited Florence for my Wife's birthday. Only a 10minute walk from the Santa Maria Novella station to this excellent hotel. From the moment we walked in the door to the moment we left it was up there with the best hotels we've ever stayed in.  Friendly staff, efficient service, spotlessly clean, decor that fitted the city with a relaxing comfortable feel to it. Breakfast was great. The Spa definitely worth a visit if you've been walking around the city all day. All the front desk staff were very helpful, especially Francesca who checked us in. Our room was beautiful. Comfortable bed, great lighting and a very smart bathroom.  This hotel is modern but retains the old world charm in keeping with the city it's in and really does earn it's stars.  Definitely going back!

title: Excellent Hotel with good services
review: Dear Bill R, many many thanks for your "lovely" review. Francesca and us are more than happy you spent wonderful time with us and really hope to welcome back very soon. In the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Tutto Perfetto
review: First the good.  This hotel is nicely decorated in a quiet plaza location perfectly located for exploring Florence.  The reception staff are very friendly and helpful, although I was reminded that check in time was 3pm when I arrived around 1:30 and had to wait for a room.   The room was very large by European standards.  The bedding was excellent and the bath large was well appointed, although the shower was small. There is a large bath tub, which we never used.  Breakfast was excellent.  The hotel is just off a plaza in an area where there are no cars. In fact our taxi driver dropped us off on a street 1/2 block from the entrance because he couldn't figure out how to get to the front door.  But that wasn't a problem for us.  High end shopping abounds in the area and you are a…

title: Excellent hotel in florence
review: We spent four nights in florence and absolutely loved our hotel. The staff was very attentive to our many questions. Breakfast in the morning was delicious- offered the traditional Italian breakfast along with bacon eggs and sausage and well as prosecco and many juices.  Beautiful spa in the basement with a jacuzzi, steam room, sauna- used the facilities daily- just be sure your room selection includes that if you want to use those  facilities.   Excellent location. Close to piazza de republica- geographical center of town. Three blocks to Arno river. Walked to all big tourist hotspots. Also very easy to get across river onto south side of river- with much less tourists.   Room was spacious for European standards. Very clean.

title: We went back - again!
review: Dear Dewlu, thank you very much for your positive review. We are very glad you enjoyed our spa and our breakfast which  consist of very high quality products,l  even if showed on a small buffet. Hope to welcome back in the near future, we remain with our  best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Charming and well situated
review: In my first review of this hotel back in 2011 I said that it was a great hotel but the service let it down. I feel that I have a duty to correct that now.  We have been back to this hotel twice since that first review, the last time in August this year and the service was just superb. The hotel is charming, fantastically located and the staff could not have been nicer or worked harder to make our stay more enjoyable. We love it and will be back again and again no doubt!

title: Beautiful hotel!
review: Dear dirvine26, First of all thank you for coming back, seocndly thank you for posting a positive review. This is another interesting aspect, that is you came back and you changed opinion about us and we are of course more than happy you found everything in order with your stay. Thanks for giving us another chance. In italy we use to say, there is no 2 without 3!! So, we wait for your for the 3rd time! All our best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect!
review: Golden Tower is a small hotel with 25 well appointed rooms and great bathrooms. Clean and charming with all the modern conveniences, including a small refrigerator. They serve a fabulous buffet breakfast downstairs. Easy walking to everything.  Fairly quiet location.  Wonderful staff and service who were always welcoming.  You won't be disappointed.

title: Centrally located, excellent comfort
review: I picked this hotel through Trip Advisor and I could not believe what a find it was!  The location is unbelievably good; the rooms and beds are comfortable - very. And there are excellent restaurants very close. We were jet lagged when we arrived and the staff were wonderful and accommodating. Definitely a keeper.

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Dear Elisabeth M, thank you for your positive review and really glad you enjoyed your stay with us which you booked after reading our Guest reviews.This is proof of how they are true! Hope to welcome back very soon, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Hotel and Location
review: Just got back from a great 3 day stay at this fantastic hotel.  We were extremely pleased.  Was upgraded to a 2 floor suite, and it could not have been more charming.  Clean, comfortable and cozy.  You are close to everything, all the culture and shopping are within easy walking distance.  Friendly helpful staff make this an easy choice that, if returning to Florence, we would immediately book at the Golden Tower.

title: Lovely hotel with great location
review: Dear Tim L, Thank you very much for your wonderful review which make feel us very proud of our job. We really look forward to welcoming back and wishing you all the best, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect
review: Just enjoyed a 3 day stay at the hotel in a deluxe room on the third floor . Spotlessly clean and well maintained, very pleasant and obliging staff . Room faced the little roadway just off Piazza Strolli where a couple of trendy bars were located but noise was not an issue. Breakfast  room was quite small and busy at times but food more than adequate . Spa was small and intimate.Location of hotel is excellent with everything very close by. Certainly  recommend this hotel.

title: Fantastic location but don't expect a fantastic service
review: We stayed at this hotel in May for 4 nights and we had a group booking which created some problems for the reception staff, they had a mix up with the rooms... When we arrived around 1pm we had to wait around until the check in time even though we were there with small children. Reception staff had an argument in front of us in Italian (and gesturing) about our booking which we thought it was quite rude and arrogant. No one was smiling. So this was our welcome, not a pleasant start I'd say. We stayed at the deluxe room in the Tower and it was a really nice room with a good size bathroom. Wifi was a bit of a problem though. We didn't dine at the hotel restaurant only had breakfast there which was OK. We really like the location of the hotel but service lacked hospitality. It's…

title: Superb Service
review: Dear jet7r, thank you for posting a positive review even if something was wrong with your stay. As per our private messages, I asked for more information (remember what happened almost 5 months ago is very hard) such as arrival date, room number, with the only purpose to focus on what happened. I always investigate and  listen to my staff's version before reply. You didn't send me these information and I am not able to reply. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general  manager

title: Unexpected good luck
review: Stayed here with Ms. Ntsoelengoe for four nights courtesy of a BA rewards program.  The service at the hotel was fantastic - the staff always had a smile and helped us with dinner reservations, a private Tuscany tour and our train tickets to Milan.  The location could not have been better.  Inside, our spotless room had a huge bed, a charming view (rooftops and washing lines) and a lovely fragrance.     Sure - this is not a sleek minimalist hotel that seems to delight many Trip Advisor reviewers but bear in mind you are in Florence - cradle of the Renaissance!  Really enjoyed the breakfasts too.  One tip:  even if you don't book a massage, definitely take advantage of the spa facilities.  They make a nice break from the hordes of tourists besieging this ancient city!  Thanks to…

title: Lovely old world hotel in the center of Florence with a great spa!
review: Dear Ntsoelengoe, many many thanks for your positive review. We really are glad that Golden Tower Hotel met your expectations!. We wish and hope to welcome you again at Golden Tower Hotel and in the meantime we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Special place
