review: Fabulous hotel; great service; lovely staff...and so central to everything and quiet. Easy walking to any key sites and good restaurants . Perfect after a long flight. The rooms are comfortable and well appointed. The bathroom is huge - wifi weak in some areas. Substantial breakfast and even a happy hour!

title: Amazing service throughout our stay!
review: We stayed here only for two nights but I have to say the service was wonderful !!  From the moment we arrived with our hire car the staff were on stand by to help direct us to the right place for parking. We were given reccommendations on where to eat as we wanted to make the right choice for our first night in Florence.   The location was perfect right near the river and surrounded by some beautiful shops :) So picturesque.  The room was beautiful we had been given a gorgeous suite that was clean and tidy. The bed was very comfy - this was a essential due to us leaving our 13 month little girl for the first time !! lol  The breakfast was delicious a lovely choice of freshly cooked and cold foods. The coffee was yummy.  We would love to come and stay here again !! I am working…

title: Very nice place with great service
review: Dear Travelmad, thank you very much for your positive review and are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you will work well with your husband so that you can caome back very soon ;-)) Wishing you all the best, we remain, with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Convenient and well appointed quiet hotel in Central Florence
review: The only reason I did not give 5 stars is that is reserved for the very top in everything   The Golden Tower personnel are top notch and were always helpful and courteous.  Even some 5 star hotels don't do as well.  The room was very nice.  We had a tower room with a queen bed with the bed area a few steps down from the entry and the bathroom.  Everything was very clean.  The spa tub looked very nice although it wasn't the best from a functional standpoint.  I am sure when it was purchased it looked impressive.  The fact is the bubble jets in this round tub were raised and not comfortable if a bath is taken. The tub also has a small circumference.  With this said this a minor issue.  The only other minor issue is only that and only is an issue if you travel and need to conduct…

title: Very nice stay, great location
review: Dear Paul C, thank you very much for your positive review as it is  very important for us your point of view. Concerning the staff, thanks I full agree, I always say you need to be 5 star inside to work in hotel, I mean you must have passion for this job! As for he spa area, in winter we are going to do some maintenances. Regarding wifi, it could sounds strange but is beyond our control, in fact when it happens (rarely)  it doesn't work we promptly call the Operator who provide us the line even if we have a back-up line promptly to substitute the bad one. Thank you and hope to see you soon, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Very good hotel in a perfect position
review: The Golden Tower Hotel is convenient and well appointed and located in the centre of Florence. The staff were very friendly and we had a very pleasant stay for 8 nights. The breakfast service was good and there was an excellent selection available.

title: Birthday
review: We spend 5 wonderful days at the Golden Tower. All the staff especially Marco and Andrea were fantastic, so was the Breakfast and the girls who served it. We are looking forward to see you in May 2015.

title: Stunning!
review: Dear Hermiehopa, thank you very much for your positive review and above all for have named some of the staff. You cannot immagine how this make their feel happy and proud of their job.  We look forward to welcoming back in May and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino  general manager

title: Perfect hotel to stay in
review: Had a fab week at the Golden Tower Spa in Florence. People couldnt be nicer and more helpful. I also gad use of the spa and 4 treatments which were amazing. Very friendly and food was good too. I really would recommend tge hotel and a 5 min walk to the main piazza. Will be going back!

title: Where to start...
review: Dear Tracy R, Thank you very much for your positive review, in particular for emphasizing our Florence Garden Urban Spa & Beauty Center which is managed by Jocelyne and if you have time you have to try! Thanks a lot again, all our best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent Location - Fantastic Hotel
review: My fiancée and I stayed in this hotel for 8 nights.  The staff were extremely courteous, sweet, and very helpful!! The location was perfect and our room was beautiful with a nice marble bathroom.  The bed was unbelievable, we slept great!! The staff were all extremely nice and helpful. Elena at the front desk helped me with a problem with my boarding pass, ALL the receptionists were wonderful and helpful. How can I forget Veronica who had my decaf cappuccino waiting for me every morning she was there. The buffet breakfast was great from sausages to champagne.  We look forward to our return to the Golden Tower Hotel andSpa P.S. The Hotel was the cleanest I have ever been in. Spotless!!

title: Golden Tower Hotel, Florence
review: Wonderful hotel in a terrific, central location. Terrific staff, friendly and helpful. It remains our top choice hotel in Florence. I would highly recommend this hotel for individuals, couples and families.

title: What a joke! Five Stars? More like NEGATIVE 5 Stars!!!!
review: Dear Joe V, many many thanks for your "terrific" review. We are more than happy to read you had wonderful experience in our hotel. All of us thank you and wait for your next visit. All our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfection in Florence
review: For all you American tourist that's thinking of staying here and you're used to the "American" definition of "5 star luxury" -- St Regis / Four Seasons / Mandarin Oriental / Andaz quality of hotel luxury, STAY AWAY FROM HERE!!! 1. wifi is nonexistent! Yes, think dial up quality! 2. Staff: snotty as hell. For a moment I thought I was back in Paris since they're rude and smiling is not in their vocabulary! 3. front door pinned my mom twice and guess what the front desk people did... NADA!!! No apology or didn't even ask my mom if she was okay. Yup, 5 star right? 4. The room that we booked... supposedly a double suite felt like a standard! Oh, there's no cold water, pure scalding hot water! 5. The stupid tv won't turn off! If you turn it off, it automatically pops back to their…

title: Awesome stay!!
review: Dear Shiloh_Green, if I were one of the 629 guests (98%) who have written thier "positive" reviews, I would feel offended! Are you sure that everyone has had a blunder ??  It wouldn' t have been  better write a constructive review rather than offend everybody who work here?? It wouldn't have been better ask for the manager on duty  instead of  revenge writing unreadable review? (also on Yelp) Why didn't  you mention that at chek-in (very late) we realize that your forgot to book your parent's room and fortunately we were able to accomdate them??? However, we believe in our job and we will continue to do it with passion as witnessed by our Guests. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Wonderful stay
review: My husband and I stayed at The Golden Tower and Spa for 3 nights. We chose the hotel based on Tripadvisor reviews. They could not have been more accurate. The excellence in care began when I called to discuss the accommodation options. The front desk staff were friendly, helpful, patient and fluent in English. Our room was very large with a separate  foyer; immaculate, refurbished and although facing the side/back, had a view of the sky. The AC was powerful, important since Florence is very hot this time of year. Breakfast was delicious. Special thanks to Veronica for preparing a tray of espresso to take to the room, Matei for helping us with the schlepping, and Elena for working feverishly to arrange a trip to the countryside. We cannot wait to return to the Golden Tower!!!

title: Nice Boutique Hotel in an excellent location
review: Although we were only staying at the hotel for one night we really enjoyed our stay! The receptionists were wonderful and very helpful. Our room was really spacious and the bathroom was quite nice! The only complaint is that our window didn't let in very much light. Also, the breakfast offered was mediocre. Other than that, I would recommend this hotel for the value and location.

title: Great location , excellent hotel
review: Dear lsahney, many thanks for your positive review and are glad you enjoyed your stay. We are located in the medieval part of the town and probably you will be assigned a room inside the tower dated back XII century where the windows are not like our modern ones. While, as for the breakfast, we have only  high quality products and,  unfortunately,  due to the small buffet area we cannot show items  in big quantities. This is why it could appear "poor" but it is not,  as witnessed by our Guests. Hope to welcome back soon. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino

title: Excellent Location and Excellent Boutique Hotel
review: Beautiful boutique hotel, very close to main shopping streets and sightseeing attractions..spacious rooms ,with big bathrooms too,polite staff... , prompt service, Very good experience!! Will definitely stay again...

title: well worth the price, immaculately clean
review: Dear Usharangnani, we thank you very much for your positive review and really look forward to welcoming back soon. All our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: GOLDEN TOWER
review: We spent five nights with this hotel after coming here on a spur-of-the-moment decision.  We had originally reserved an apartment in Florence which did not work out at all.  This hotel completely changed our holiday for the better.    We had two rooms, one for our two children and one for my wife and myself.  The rooms are as shown on there web site, clean, well appointed and very comfortable.  The rooms do vary in size from one to another but both were ample, especially considering the proximity to all the attractions in Florence.  The location is great!    Even though we booked at the last minute, the price was in keeping with the comparable hotels in the area when making our original arrangements,... no last minute gouging.  It included a very nice breakfast and an apperitivo…

title: Lovely stay
review: My husband booked this hotel for my 50th birthday.  When we handed over our passports one of the receptionists commented that it was my birthday next day.  A really nice touch would have been a complimentary bottle of Prosecco in our room but no. Not a big deal though.  Mini bar prices were high - 5 Euros for a small bottle of water when you could buy a 1.5 litre bottle for about 1.50 at any bar or shop. The rooms aren't cheap so water should be complimentary at least. We did have a complimentary glass of Prosecco at the bar on the first night - seems from other comments we could have had that every night but we weren't told about it.  The staff were nice and polite and didn't impose themselves on us.  The bedroom was lovely.  Breakfast was really good. Central position close to…

title: It felt like home
review: Dear Juliette, thank you very much for your review and above all glad you spent a lovely stay. As for your birthday, we do excatly what you mentioned, that is we offer a bottle of our best Prosecco whishing happy birthday and if this have not been done with you we are really really sorry for this misunderstanding. For sure the receptionist forgot to send the infornation to the Bar. Regarding the minibar, it is totally complimentary booking a Deluxe or Junior Suite. We really hope to welcome back and so sorry for the misunderstanding, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Super hotel with perfect location
review: Our experience with Golden Tower hotel did not start well; we had serious trouble reaching the hotel due to the Florentine Sunday afternoon traffic jam and downtown maze. Hard to reach by car, would not do it if I knew all the trouble. Yet, the hotel staff replied immediately and guided me accurately over the phone right to the nice little piazza in front of the hotel where a bell boy waited for us and took care of our luggage. The nice atmosphere, the smiling and very polite staff, and relaxing air freshener and the hotel's marvelous medieval style made our mood right away. Location wise it is just a short walk from everything you might want to see in Florence, but still away from all the busy roads and areas. Breakfast is very good and room service (24h) has few yet tasty…

title: Chic Boutique
review: Dear Konstanti, Thank you for your positive review and of course we are more than happy that "you felt like home". This is for us the maximum recognition we may have from our Guests. Regarding driving in Florence, it is not easy being a medieval town with the biggest pedestrian zone in Europe and we are inside this area. Everything we do we do it spontaneously and could not be different than this if you want do this kind of job. Thanks again and really hope to welcome back in the near future, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Super hotel with perfect location
review: Spent 2 nights in the hotel as celebration of our silver wedding anniversary. Location was perfect, central location but also very quiet. Staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Breakfast was high quality and happy hour with complimentary Prosecco was a lovely start to the evening. Room was very comfortable and a good size for a city centre hotel. We would not hesitate to stay here again or recommend it to others.

title: Outstanding hotel and service
review: Terrific boutique hotel in great central but quiet location in Florence. We stayed for 4 nights recently. Excellent breakfasts and happy hour reception every evening. Service from reception staff was outstanding. Expensive but worth every Euro!

title: Great Hotel!
review: Dear Roger H, thank you veruy much for your positive review. We are glad to read your stay was wonderful at Golden Tower Hotel and really hope to welcome back in the near future. Whising you all the best, we remain with our beat regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Golden Tower Hotel
review: Fantastic room, great location, and excellent staff!! The room we stayed in was actually a Suite, including a separate bedroom and a very nice shower. The price is a little high, but worth the money. 10 minutes from the train station.

title: Excellent hotel and super friendly stuff!
review: Dear Ggmoor, we thank you very much for your wonderful review. When a Vip Guest stay in our Suite and leave a review like yours, this make us feel very very proud of our job. Hope to welcome back very soon, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Beware of double bookings at this hotel
review: We stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel for 3  nights  recently,  and overall enjoyed our stay.  Although our room rate included a free mini bar that was a bit of a joke with only one bottle of beer and the rest where all soft drinks!!!  The spa is a little tired and would benefit from a coat of paint and a good clean down. The rooms are very comfortable and we could not fault them. It's in a great central location and well worth a visit.

title: wonderful stay
review: We were there for our anniversary.  The hotel gave us a complimentary upgrade to the Presidential Suite and a bottle of champagne.  Location was wonderful--quiet but near everything.  Although the suite was first floor (104), we heard no street noise.  The front desk help was exceptional--especially Sara and Elisa.  We didn't use the spa.  Every night the hotel has a happy hour with nibbles and complimentary Prosecco.  Breakfast was good.  Overall a lovely stay in a very quiet and spacious room

title: Average, book an apartment
review: Dear dorjifan, thank you for posting a positive review and above all Elisa and Sara will be very happy in reading their name on it. We appreciate it,  as we try to do our best to render the stay of our Guest so Unique. Looking forward to welcoming back, we remain, your sincerely, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Wonderful Night in Florence
review: I usually prefer to stay in one of the old city apartmenst in Florence, but this time all of my preferred options were all booked out, and I wanted to give a Firenze hotel another try. A missed one, as it turned out.  To keep it short, if you do not want to spend a significant chunk of your daytime in the property, just opt for an apartment. If you do, fetch the one with a park and plenty of space around, like Four Seasons. Otherwise, it's just a waste of your money.  I hold nothing in particular against this specific hotel, it just how the accommodation landscape looks like in Florence.

title: Wonderful stay in Firenze
review: Dear Kostiantyn, Thank you for your review even if we realize you have not been very much satisfied. To be very honest with you , we do not understand what was wrong and the reason we have been rated only "3". You probably booked  a wrong hotel, you looked for  an aprtament with garden but Golden Tower is a 5 star boutique hotel located in the heart of Florence and does not have neither apartments nor garden. The Reviews should be used to emphasize or criticize something in particular instead of generalize. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: perfect spot on lovely piazza
review: We only stayed one night at the Golden Tower on our way back to Paris from Siena, but found the staff, from reception, bell desk, and restaurant, to be top notch.  The front desk staff were very fun and nice to my 7 year old.  We booked a Deluxe Room through Expedia which offered a reasonable rate (relative to Florence).  The room we had was very spacious with a large soaking tub for 2 people.  We didn't have a chance to use the spa facilities, which are open to adults only, but they looked fabulous.  The location is very convenient.  One street over is Via de Tornbuoni and all of the Italian and French luxury brands shops, including the Ferragamo Museum.  A couple streets the other way is Piazza della Republica and Piazza della Signoria.    We enjoyed dinner at the hotel…

title: Gem of a hotel in the warm heart of Florence
review: A fabulous, boutique hotel with less than 30 rooms nestled on the side of Palazzo Strozzi, in the historic Piazza degli Strozzi -- few minutes' walk from the main Florentine attractions. The decor is luxurious, classic yet with a delightful trendy mix at the same time. Lovely breakfast and a delightful aperitivo, with the daily compliments of the management, after 6.30pm. Beautiful rooms and nice friendly staff. Boutique at its best!! Will be back.

title: Wonderful hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Dear Maltesetr, All of us thank you for your wonderful positive review. We try to render special every moments at Golden Tower Hotel and reviews like yours tell us we are on the right way. Thank you again and hope to welcome back soon, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Location and Amenities
review: Fabulous hotel. Ideally located in the centre of Florence for shopping, dining and sightseeing, but on a nice quiet street. Beautiful, spacious rooms, tastefully decorated. Great bathroom and Etro toiletries. What really made this hotel extra special was the discreet but friendly service and the extra touches like the free glass of prosecco and aperitivo every evening, and the complementary drinks and snacks from the mini bar (it's definitely worth paying the extra for a deluxe room). The breakfast also had a great range of fresh fruit, meats, cheeses and pastries. Would love to stay again as soon as possible!

title: Fantastic Hotel!
review: Dear njthetortoise, all of us thank you very much for your positive review. We are really glad we came up to your expectations. We hope to welcome back very soon and in the meantime we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: excellent hotel with excellent service in Venice
review: Stayed for 3 nights and enjoyed our stay. Hotel included breakfast every morning and the happy hour in the evening was a nice touch. Very comfortable & quiet rooms. Centrally located, so was easy walking distance to most sites and shopping. Would highly recommend!

title: Loved it!
review: It's on a little side street away from crowds, but it is centrally located & a quick walk to Duomo & just about everything else. Room was a good size, clean & bed very comfy. Great breakfast every morning & 'happy hour' every evening (1 glass of proseco & some nibbles). Staff very friendly & helpful w/directions & recommendations. Would absolutely stay again.

title: Fabulous Hotel in a Beautiful City !
review: Dear Debbie Es, thank you very much for your positive review. We are very happy to know we were up to your expectation. Looking forward to welcoming back, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino

title: A little  palazzo
review: My wife and I came to stay here for 4 nights in Mid May, for our wedding anniversary. We were not disappointed ! The hotel was only about a 2 minute drive from the railway station, to Palazzo Strozzi, which is very central and has some lovely designer stores and bars.  The hotel is literally 2 doors down from Emporio Armani and about 100 metres form Louis Vitton.  Check in was easy and the polite staff took our bags to the room for us. We upgraded to a deluxe room, which i would recommend, as not only is the room bigger, the mini bar is included in your rate as well as the spa access.  Not long after we arrived in our room, we had a knock at the door and were pleasantly surprised to be given a bottle of Prosecco and crisps as a little anniversary gift from the hotel, which was a…

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Ridgeyrid, many many thanks for your detailed wonderful review and are very happy you spent fabulous time with us. People will also appreciate your advice about what happens at the Train Station even if it is well known to the Police. As you did not use the Spa, it will be a good excuse to come back. Thanks again, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: golden tower is a  gem
review: Really enjoying staying at the hotel. Great location, with all the designer stores close by and also close to all the places of interest.  Our room was perfect, all that we needed - very clean, good quality bed linen. Staff were really helpful, particularly Milena at breakfast. Had no problem with the air con, no problem with wifi nor noise. Just simply a perfect extended girlie weekend Really loved Florence & this little Palace, will definitely return.

title: Great location
review: This is a lovely hotel - near to all places of interest, shops, restaurants, a few minutes away from the bridges. The staff are all very friendly and helpful and Fabiola in the bar is delightful. Guests were treated to an early evening glass of Prosecco. The room was very clean with fresh white bedlinen and a spacious bathroom. I would definitely recommend this hotel - it has a comfortable feel about it - I cannot fault it.

title: Great location; Do not expect air conditioning or wifi
review: Dear Diane S, thank you very much for your positive review and in particular Fabiola will be very happy to read her name. She just  joined us a month ago and are very proud of her. We look forward to welcoming back and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Lovely hotel in the heart of Florence
review: This is my second time to stay at the Golden Tower in Florence and I was impressed the first time, hence my return. This visit is disappointing. Air conditioning is limited and the room too warm to allow for good rest. Internet intermittent. Great location, but not responsive service to correct air conditioning problem.

title: Best Location-Great Staff and Amenities
review: Dear LSPen, thank you for your review and, believe us, very very sorry for the inconvenient you had with the air conditioning in your room. As for the wifi, to be honest, it seemed it worked, as any guests complaint about that. Anyway, we will check carefully. Hope to welcome back. best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Five star hotel with six star service!
review: We chose this hotel based on the good reviews on Trip Advisor and we were not disappointed. We chose a deluxe room which was small but beautifully formed. There was a large leather winged chair, a dressing table with chair, wardrobe and a small upholstered bench at the end of the bed with 2 bedside tables. The window was quite narrow but tall and did not let a lot of light in. The bed was super comfortable and we enjoyed the use of the free mini bar, tea and coffee making facilities and a wonderful turn down service at night. We requested a quiet room which is exactly what we got, it was so peaceful. The room was spotless and although we never saw any of the cleaning staff they were certainly doing a super job. If I had to make a suggestion it would be for more storage in the…

title: Beautiful Hotel in a Beautiful City
review: I have recently returned from a 4 night stay at the Golden Tower Hotel with my partner. The location is perfect and within walking distance to all of the major tourist attractions within the city. The rooms are tastefully decorated, I was in room 502, the rooms are immaculately maintained, the housekeeping team do a fantastic job along with all of the staff in the hotel. The reception team were professional, attentive and efficient and the waiter/waitress service at breakfast were friendly and very helpful.  The breakfast was delicious with a varied menu and the sitting area was beautifully set out.  I have already recommended this hotel to friends who are visiting Florence in October and will without doubt return to this hotel. The bottle of champagne delivered to our room on…

title: top hotel in Florence!
review: Dear Allison D, we thank you very much for your wonderful positive review. We are utmost glad to hear you will come back for sure in October and we really look forward to welcoming back as the wish of any  hoteliers is to have "repeater" Guest. Thanks also for having detailed our services, we have appreciated it very much. Thanks again, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: A Jewel in the Crown of Florence
review: Great location, the staff was excellent Breakfast was very good. I was in Florence for business meetings and I found it perfect as it's in the heart of Florence but without any noices.  I hope I could go back there soon.

title: Hotel Heaven
review: Dear Silvia M, we thank you very much for your positive review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and hope you will come back but for leisure and for more days. Thanks again and best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: perfect, quiet, central location
review: We have just returned from a long weekend break in Florence to celebrate our wedding anniversary.  The Golden Tower Hotel is a wonderful haven of comfort and tranquillity in this busy city.  Only a few minutes walk from all the major attractions it was ideal for us 'unfit' travellers.  The friendly and helpful staff are most welcoming and nothing is too much trouble.  From the stylish rooms with quality linen, to the fresh and delicious breakfast in sumptuous surroundings everything makes this small, exclusive hotel 'A Jewel in the Crown of Florence'.

title: Fleur in Florence
review: We stayed for the extended weekend, it was not our first time at Golden Tower.  Although located in historical centre, easily reached by car. Coming with good previous experience, this time they surprised us with the room-upgrade to suite. Simply beautiful, furnished with touch of class, High bed and linen quality, excellent bathroom. Thank's, we loved it. Friendly stuff, helpful with local advice. Perfect location, shopping or visiting most sites within easy walking distance. Although rather expensive, this is where it pays off. Spa is rather small, but quality service. In summary: not a budget hotel, but worth the price - you do get, what you pay for. Perfect choice for our purpose, we'll be back. Soon, I hope.

title: Almost faultless
review: Dear iggyLjubljana, we thank you so much for your positive review and we are very proud of it, above all because you came back to Golden Tower for your stay in Florence. As is said, there no 2 without 3, we wait for welcomig back very soon and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Nice location and friendly staff
review: Just returned from three nights in Florence. We stayed in room 504, one of the deluxe tower rooms. Beautifully furnished with great attention to detail. A lovely bowl of fresh fruit on arrival and complementary Prosecco. The staff were very helpful but what really makes this hotel is its location. It's no more than five minutes from all the sites and is a wonderful quiet oasis from the hustle and bustle. Our room was very quiet and very comfortable, if a little on the small side. The bathroom was fitted to the highest standard. The spa is small, but when we visited it was not particularly busy. The breakfasts were buffet style with a great range of meats, cheeses and pastries. Although this hotel is not cheap it acts as a very good demonstration of the fact that you do get what…

title: Left a bad taste in my mouth
review: Dear Simon S, we thank you very much for your great and positive review. We are very glad to have been able to meet your expectations.  To be recommended to other Guest is the dream of every hotelier! Thank you! We hope to welcome back and in the meantime we wish you all the best, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Amazing Hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel two weeks ago based on the reviews we saw here on tripadvisor.com.  We were not disapponted at all.  Room and bathroom were big.  We had a problem with wifi in the room for two nights and they finally fixed it the last night we were there.  As one reviewer has said, it can get noisy late at night if your room faces the street/alley.  We also can't seem to control the temp in the room so we had to open the window to let some cool air in.  Hotel is close to everything so it is very convenient.  Breakfast was included in our rate and it was pretty standard fare.

title: Book this hotel
review: There is little I can add  to what was said by previous visitors. We booked the Golden Tower Hotel as all reviews were so positive . It's a fantastic hotel in a fantastic location and fantastic staff !!!!!!!!! We visited Florence many times and stayed in a different hotel but this hotel is by far batter and we look forward to staying there again in the future.

title: Romantic Place
review: Dear Josephine, thank you very much for your positive review. We are more than happy you spent wonderful time with us and look forward to welcoming you back! We wish you all the best and remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino

title: Fantastic hotel and spa
review: I recommend this place when you are out in a honeymoon or simply staying with your one true love.  The ambiance for romance in Florence is at its peak and the Golden tower hotel is certainly the hotel to be when you want to be in a romantic city and while you’re enjoying the view of the place.  The lounge is perfect.  The rooms weren’t as big as I was expecting from the searches I did on the internet but I have no complaints about the service and the staff.  Very helpful and friendly.  I recommend this hotel to visit when you are with a partner because it accommodation and the city is the perfect place for romance for locals and for tourists.

title: Pleasantly Surprised
review: Dear T JakeL, many thanks for your positive review. We are very glad you spent wonderful time in our city and above all in our hotel which has contributed to render your stay in Florence so special. We hope and look forward to welcoming back very soon and in the meantime, we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fantastic Experience
review: We stayed four nights in this lovely hotel and Spa. All the staff were lovely and extremely helpful. The room was clean, spacious and the housekeeping was faultless. The large bed was very comfortable and the sweets on the pillows at night intriguing. There was a fantastic choice at breakfast every day and the spa area was clean and fun to use.  The staff spotted one of us were celebrating a birthday and we were given a complimentary bottle of bubby, which was brought to our room!   This hotel is centrally located but tucked away. It is in easy walking distance to all of the main attractions to visit. We would highly recommend this hotel and if we return to Florence we would book to stay there again.  One small point to note is the evening dinner menu was limited and did not…

title: Wonderful place to stay in Florence
review: We stayed here for four nights over Christmas with our two grade-school age kids. It is a wonderful boutique hotel in the heart of Florence and we highly recommend it. It was somewhat more expensive compared to other options, but it was a nice Christmas splurge for the family.  It is right downtown in Florence and we walked everywhere, so we didn't need to use a taxi or tram. We had two of the "classic" rooms, one facing the street and one facing the rear courtyard. Other reviewers have noted that the rooms on the street are noisy at night, and we found that to be true -- the front-facing rooms can be noisy with the nearby nightclub and early morning street cleaning. The windows do a good job of keeping the rooms quiet when they are closed but (as with most european hotels) in…

title: Good hotel in central Florence
review: Dear webbseil, many thanks for your positive review and are very happy you spent wonderful time with us. As for the noisy, it happened that during Christmas time was held some event in the beautiful Strozzi Square, but normally the Bistrot Bar near t the Hotel at certain time they turn down the volume and as you said our proofed rooms work very well. We hope to welcome back again and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Good position,service nothing speciali
review: Good hotel Excellent service Good breakfast Very central Do not stay in rooms at front of hotel - noise from nightclub till 3am then rubbish collection at 5am changed rooms to back of hotel - no noise, a good night sleep. would stay again but at back of hotel

title: Nice hotel in a heart of Florence
review: Dear Liz M, thank you for posting a positive review and are glad to know you had a wonderful stay with exception of a little noise ouside the street because of christmas time! We hope to welcome back in the near future and in the meantime remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: ottimo hotel- attendimento scarso
review: It is really good position in a old core of city but quiet and pleasent.service and crew are trying to do there jobs well.spa is for maximum 3 people at the moment and it is hard to find hotel if you are coming with own car.not bad at all but too expencive

title: Luxurious, impeccably clean and great location!
review: I have to say I can be hard to please..but even with the minor hiccups ... We still loved it here. My husband and I have been travelling for our honeymoon and checked into the Golden Tower Hotel in Florence.  We arrived at 1.30p, and our room wasn't ready, we were given complimentary bubbles and snacks while we waited in the beautiful foyer/lounge area. We booked through a travel agent a double room including breakfast. We were told on arrival that there was confusion with oube booking and the outcome was that we had been given a twin share room with 2 beds instead of a double bed. The hotel was booked out on our first night there so there was nothing they could do.... Mhmmmm  a little disappointing to hear that since we were on our honeymoon! We were told we could try and…

title: Luxury in the heart of Florence
review: Dear MissDanie, we thank you so much for your wonderful review and for your suggestions. We are so pleased you spent wonderful time with us. We hope to welcome back in the near future and in the meantime we wish you all the best for the coming year, antonio pellegrino general manager  p.s.: As for the gym, we are thinking about to have a small one....maybe next year!

title: Very Pleasant
review: I have a difficult time being comfortable in hotels, regardless of the class, due to high people-traffic, but I felt right at home from the moment I stepped through the doors of the Golden Tower Hotel and Spa.   Although my room wasn't ready upon my arrival, I was seated in the hotel's lounge area and given refreshment.  The ladies at the front desk were accommodating in terms of changing my spa appointment, and making attraction and restaurant reservations.   The room was clean, the bed was very comfortable, and the bathroom was a sufficient size.  I looked forward to going to my room for a nap pre-dinner (usually, I look for any reason not to be in a hotel room).  The hotel is also well located, and I always felt safe in that area.  Even though I didn't do too much shopping in…

title: The cream of Florence
review: Dear Victoria, thank you very much for your positive review and very proud to be your best hotel you have ever stayed this year. We really hope to welcome back in the near future and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Flawless service in an island of peace
review: The hotel is ideally situated in the centre of Florence, within walking distance of all the major downtown attractions. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel is very well maintained. As the hotel is central in such an old city, don't expect big lobby etc.. much of the hotel is compact. But the room we had was more than adequate with a nice small balcony. Also don't expect major views as the hotel is in the middle of a crowded ancient city.  The breakfast was nice. The spa was small but relaxing. I'd recommend this hotel.

title: Nice stay in Florence
review: We were a needy group of 5 and the hotel was nice about helping us through some difficult predicaments.  The  basic rooms were very clean and pleasant but the junior suite was significantly nicer and really gave the feeling of being deluxe and had a lot more character.  The breakfasts were nice, the location wonderful and the spa was a fantastic place to relax in the late afternoon after days exploring Florence.  One improvement would have been more ease with the internet.One bonus is the hotel was right around the corner from a wonderful restaurant opened until late.  We loved it so much we ate there 3 of 4 nights!

title: wonderful stay, Hotel staff are super helpful
review: Dear Jody L, thank you very much for your positive review and so happy you and other people spent a wonderful time with us. We really hope to werlcome back in the near future, Best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great choice
review: very cozy hotel in city center location, walkable distance to major sightseeing attractions.  Hotel front desk is super friendly.  Kudos particular to Andrea at Front desk,  very very nice, went beyond to help, and recommended us good restaurants.  Will definitely stay again for next Florence visit

title: Wonderful Stay
review: Dear Chris L, many many thanks for your positive review. Our Staff will be very proud of it. We hope to welcoming back and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Had a wonderful stay and an upgrade to a suite was wonderful
review: Just been there for a long week end with all my family and all of us have been extremely satisfied. The location is just perfect, in the very center, close to everything. The hotel is cosy, the staff extremely nice and helpful, everything makes you feel very comfortable and at ease. We took the family suite, which is a real treat: two large bedrooms with two large bathrooms and a small living room for reading and relaxing, with enough room even for a large family (we've got four children). Cannot say anything on the spa, as it is not allowed for children. The breakfast is also great: it may seem quite standard at a first glance, but the quality of every little thing is just superb. Only two (minor) negatives: 1) the large plasma screens in the breakfast and in the dining rooms…

title: Excellent!
review: My wife and I stayed here for three nights during our honeymoon in Italy.  We absolutely loved it!  The central location in the heart of Florence is perfect, just a short walk from everything.  The hotel is gorgeous and all of the staff were exceedingly helpful and attended to our every need.  They even treated us to a complimentary bottle of champagne to celebrate our recent wedding.  I'd recommend opting for a deluxe room, which comes with full access to the mini-bar and spa.  The included breakfast buffet was delicious too!  The Golden Tower rightfully earned every one of its five stars in this review.  We can't wait to come back!  Dan

title: I would highly recommend this hotel!!!!
review: Dear dan_mlnm, thank you very much for your positive review. All The Staff appreciate your words. Looking forward to welcoming back, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: 5 stars don't do it justice
review: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights.  The hotel has a lot to offer. A continental breakfast that was filled with an abundance of food. A welcoming box of cookies, happy hour hors d'oeuvre and Prosecco. The hotel is decorated in a beautiful decor and is well kept up. The staff are very helpful and pleasant. The hotel is centrally located to all the shopping and historic sites.

title: Beautiful hotel, great location
review: Dear Doreen3_2011, thank you very much for your positive review and let me tell you that we are very proud to be recommended to others. Thanks. Hope to welcome back again, best regards,  antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect Place to Stay in Firenze
review: This was the most amazing hotel we have ever stayed in. The staff were beyond friendly, the hotel was stunning, the location perfect. We took advantage of the spa, and it truly does look just as it shows in photos. You feel transported to some secret, underground relaxation chamber. It's incredible. The rooms are very well appointed, and ladies-the hair dryers include voltage converters for any other tools you might have with you!

title: Excellent Stay
review: It is seldom that we feel we can give a five star rating but this hotel is certainly an exception. In our opinion it definitely ticks all the right boxes. We went as part of my birthday celebrations that took in Rome and Florence. Our stay coincided with the World Cycling Championships which meant that many roads were closed to vehicles. However, ahead of our stay we were contacted by the hotel with the permitted times to get to the hotel by car as well as a walking route from the station. Given we were arriving by train we took the walking route which was easy to follow and took about 15 minutes at the most. Check-in was easy and the reception staff were extremely welcoming. We were told that there was a happy hour each night where free Prosecco was served. So that was a good…

title: Great location to everything
review: Dear Charnwood, I want to thank you very much for your more than positive review. Let me say, it has been really a pleasure in reading it. All of our Staff appreciate it. As you said, you have an excuse to come back and we will very happy to welcome you, all my best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great location, junior suites are very nice
review: The hotel is located on a side street but so close to shopping, the Ponte Vecchio, the Duomo. The staff is very  friendly especially Andrea.  We made our reservation at the last moment so they only had a suite.  The suite was huge with a double shower that is very modern.  The hotel offers a good room service if you do not feel like going out after a long day on your feet.  It is the same menu as the restaurant.  It is not extensive but good. The Orata was fabulous.  The buffet breakfast has something for everyone and it is really good by Italian standards.  My only complaint is that the bed is too small as we are both tall .and our feet hung over.    There is also a spa.  We had a massage and it was fairly good.

title: Fab location
review: Dear Chili, many thanks for your positive review. We are glad you spent wonderful time with us using our restaurant , room service and our spa treatments.  Hope to welcome back in the near future, we remain, yours sincerely, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Top Notch Service
review: Pros  Location is perfect - you can walk to anything that matters and there are a thousand great restaurants ... Golden View gets a special plug (not affiliated with hotel) - they are on the Arno river just over the bridge - hotel can give you directions. Rooms are good sized and clean (junior suite) Fruit in the room - nice touch Free mini bar and coffee maker (with junior suite) was nice Nice shower - good water pressure Lot's of plugs Maid service is excellent  Cons  Breakfast was ok - not terrible, not great Front desk staff was ok - not overly friendly ... accommodating but not out of their way friendly Don't both with room service - food not good Bathroom does not have a lot of room to put anything Internet spotty but probably expected given location  General  There is a…

title: Excellent Luxury Location
review: We stayed at The Golden Tower for four nights while we visited Florence and I would agree that the hotel is in an excellent location with a great staff and luxurious accomodations.  The front desk is always manned and the lobby and dining area are very clean, spacious and elegant in the old-school way.  The dining room has a superb white-linen breakfast every day with extensive choices should one decide on light or heartier fare.  The room we stayed at was very spacious with a king bed, flat screen television, ample closet space and even a remote control skylight(!).  The marble bathroom was also very spacious with a glass enclosed double shower, large sink, bidet and toilet.  There were toiletry amenities, oversized towels and a hairdryer as well.  On an interesting energy…

title: Excellent
review: Dear Captain_J, many many thanks for your positive and detailed review above all for emphasize our "green" policy. We have appreciated it very much.  Looking forward to welcoming back , we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Elegant and Lovely
review: My wife and me have shared our honey-moon in the Golden Tower Hotel and we are very happy with our experience. The spa, the room and specially the staff are perfect. We enjoyed a room with jacuzzi and it was amazing.Perfect and strongly recommended

title: Very bad service for 5*
review: Dear David P, we thank you very much for your excellent review. We have appreciated it very much! We really hope to welcome back in the near future, Best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Upscale hotel in great location
review: On the second leg of our tour of Italy we chose the Golden Tower for our stay in Florence and were so happy that we did. The front desk staff was sweet as we arrived and escorted us to our room which was quite lovely!  On the first night of our stay (Friday) there was some street noise -- mainly singing pedestrians who had a little too much to drink. When we commented on this at the front desk the next morning the staff was eager to not only offer a different room but to take us on a tour of two rooms that were available so we could have our pick. We chose one with a view of the courtyard. The staff moved our bags for us and made sure we were happy with our choice later. The breakfasts in the restaurant were first rate and delicious. Fresh fruit, awesome pastries and great…

title: Awesome Hotel.
review: Great location, wonderful breakfast buffett, and attentive staff. We were upgraded to a suite, and it was massive! The bathrooms are unbelieveable, huge tubs, marble everywhere, a toilet and bidet, very clean and the location is prime. Located within 5 minutes of the train station, and pretty much every site you want to see - as well as amazing shopping literally all around the hotel. This is definately a gem of a hotel, and give it 5 stars for sure....Oh forgot to mention they have a spa that is free..Steam room, sauna, and a turkish bath.

title: Great Hotel!
review: Dear ppoursha, thank you very much for your positive review. All of us are very enthusiastic of our job and review like your help us doing much better. Thanks again and look forward to see you back very soon, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect Florence Location
review: Fabulous hotel. Very centrally located in the City Centre, this hotel is for those who enjoy the finer things. An awesome spa, stunning rooms, wonderful service and a visually beautiful hotel. If you can afford this hotel, make it your place to stay when visiting Florence.

title: A luxurious hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Dear John S, thank you very much for your positive review. We are so glad to read you spent a fabulous time with us. We hope to welcome back very soon and in the meantine we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Wonderful, wonderful,wonderful - did I say it was wonderful?
review: Stayed at the Golden tower for 5 nights on our honeymoon! Yes we did it!! The hotel is located within walking distance of everything you will need whilst in Florence. The air con is second to none and we really appreciated the cool room after a hot day walking around the historic town. The staff at the hotel are very helpful and nothing was too much trouble - a special thank you to the lovely man on reception - so sorry i forgot your name :-( The bar staff are vey quick and helpful, the breakfast is better than a Brit would expect and hot and fresh too. Use the Golden spa - its so worth a visit. We have stayed in many good hotels in Italy including the best that Venice had to offer - none came up to the standard of this one!! Thank you for having us and for the glass of sparkles…

title: Luxury in the Heart of Florence
review: Dear Liz H, many thanks for your wonderful review. We are so happy to read that you spent a fabouolos time with us. We really look forward to welcoming back, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: One of the nicest hotels on our trip
review: I will get my only complaint out of the way-and it's not the hotel's fault.  Driving in old Florence is not meant for tourists.  Our car's navigation system tried to get us to turn the wrong way onto one- way streets.  It seems that the municipality changes the direction of traffic every few months just to keep people on their toes.  I suggest guests driving to the Golden Tower call the hotel as soon as they cross the Arno River and have the helpful staff guide them in.  The staff parked our car in the valet garage (somewhere in the area) and we did not retrieve it until we were leaving Florence. The hotel is a beautiful boutique hotel in the heart of Florence's fashion district and an easy stroll to the Ponte Vecchio, the Uffizi Gallery, and the Duomo.  We stayed in one of the…

title: Great Location Excellent Hotel
review: Dear Elvis Mem, we thank you very much for positive review and the important thing is that you enjoyed the stay with us. As for driving here, it could seem difficult as Florence is a medieval town and we constanlty update the information on our official website despite the navigators that mot of the times are not updated. Looking forward to welcoming back, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Will definitely be returning
review: Golden Tower was a great place to start off our honeymoon.  We arrived here via train from Luca in the end of August.  We took a short taxi ride to the hotel from the train station but it was 15 euro....if bags are light, just walk it.  The rooms are not ready until 3 so after arriving at 12 they recommended a good lunch spot around the corner.  The hotel is centrally located so it was not hard to kill time while we waited.  Once we did get to the room they sent us a complimentary bottle of Proseco, which was really nice.  The rooms were stunning.  Any views they lacked were made up for with the luxurious bathrooms, beddings, the list goes on.  The room was extremely clean and so was the bathroom - I've never seen maid service that cleaned up so well.  They even straightened out…

title: Lovely and beautiful hotel
review: Booked this hotel via tripadvisor and had some initial issues with credit cards where they wouldn't accept a credit card number via telephone. But eventually all of that was sorted and when we arrived at Golden Tower, we somehow scored a free upgrade to some form of suite! The suite was huge for Italy standards and included an outdoor spa, which was very much appreciated. The bathroom itself had double showers. I was overall very impressed with the room and the bed was also very comfortable. There is also a kettle and coffee/tea facilities which I always appreciate.  The breakfast options were not bad and their sausages are pretty yum! However, I wish they would do eggs to order instead of having scrambled eggs sitting in the hot food section, waiting to get dry.   The staff…

title: Great location, very nice rooms
review: Dear susumooyin, many thanks for your positive review and are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us. As for the credit card, for security reason we do not accept by phone, as anyone could use it. Looking forward to welcoming back soon, we remain, yours sincerely,

title: Fabulous- in centre of town and wonderful staff.
review: Stayed here for a couple of nights and enjoyed Florence very much. The hotel was very decent, got a very nice and spacious room and breakfast was also quite good. Location is great, since it is walking distance to anything worth seeing in Florence.

title: Perfect Stay
review: Dear Patrik M, thank you very much for your positive review and are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us. Looking forward to welcoming back soom, we remain, yours sincerely, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Gem in Firenze
review: Location This could not be in a better location. It is about 5 minutes walk from all the major attractions. However it is still quiet and peaceful at night.  Staff Quite simply the best. Recently I have noticed 5 star hotel have upped their game in the quality of staff and their desire to help. In this hotel I get the impression the staff are genuinely proud of their hotel and go the extra mile to ensure your stay is stress free. They booked and advised on several visits ( although some you should pre book before coming to Florence- but they managed to get us an 8.30 am to David on the last day of our stay.) Their English is superb. However I will be eternally grateful for the competent and cool way the directed me in to the city.  The manicure and pedicure I had in the spa was…

title: Excellent location, good service
review: Very well located and close to Dumo and several galleries and attractions, this hotel is clean with small, but very well appointed rooms. The breakfast is very good, with a pretty wide selection of quality food. Service is friendly and the front desk staff did all they could to make our stay memorable. Driving in Florence is always a challenge and finding this hotel as we drove in was rather difficult as it is in a  narrow alley - a small annoyance. We would certainly stay here again.

title: Hidden gem, fabulous staff
review: Dear Pradeep_Sagar, many thanks for your positive review. We are very glad you enjoy your stay with us. As for the location, as you titled "excellent", because we are in the heart of the medieval Florence and sometimes could be not easy to reach even if on our website there are very updated information how to arrive. However, we hope to welcome back and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: excellent
review: After looking at the reviews on TA, we chose to stay at Golden Palace. In an excellent location, short walks to piazza reppublica and piazza vecchia, but without the tourist throngs. The staff are the treasure of this hotel. Prior to staying, we emailed to request that they reserve restaurants for us, which they did.  They were helpful and interested in making sure everything was as needed. The breakfast reflected the hotel's style - provide tons of variety in a small amount of space.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and wanted to thank them for making our stay in Florence magical.

title: Luxury clean, great location
review: Dear Minxlogistics, thank you very much for your positive review which have been really appreciated from all our staff. As you said, we try to render the stay of our guests "magical" . Hope to welcome back soon, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Amazing hotel!
review: I have never been in a more beautiful und luxury hotel all over the world! The staff ist very friendly und the room was furnished exquisite! I'll recommend this hotel to all of my friends, if they want to stay in Firence!

title: perfect !
review: great location, it's very central but very quiet as well, located in a beautiful and luxurious area, great staff, everything was perfect, amazing massage.... we'll return to this hotel if we have the chance to go back to Florence one day!

title: A fabulous find
review: Dear gery B, thank you very much for your review and also for emphasizing the massage which we will be very appreciated from our professional spa manager. Looking forward to welcome back very soon, we remain with all  our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great stay
review: We booked last minute for a five day break and found this hotel. It is so conveniently placed for all major sites and in a quiet part of town.   Our plane was delayed from London by five hours and we arrived at gone midnight however we were warmly met by Andrea who showed us briefly where everything was, explained the breakfast times and explained that they have happy hour at 6.30 so we had a fantastic welcome after a long delay for which we were welcome despite the late hour.   We booked a suite which was on two floors and spotlessly clean with big beds and clean sheets daily. We also had two bathrooms which worked well with three of us.  We didn't visit the spa however it looked lovely. Breakfast is relaxed and very efficient with lovely staff. A mixture if cooked and…

title: Fabulous hotel in Florence
review: Dear Creditspree, Many many thanks for your "brilliant" review. All of us, expecially the one you named "Andrea" appreciate your comments because, as already said in a previous response, we do this job with Passion. Thanks again and hope to welcome back in the near future, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fantastic hotel in a great location
review: We stayed at the Golden Tower for the first six nights of our holiday in Tuscany and couldn't have asked for a better hotel from which to start our trip.  The location is perfect, only a few minutes' walk from almost everything in Florence but tucked away so that it stays very quiet.  The rooms are very fine, standard amenities, good en suite and very clean. I can see that to some they may seem small for the price but we never felt cramped at all.  We did not use the spa or the restaurant but the breakfast was good and the free nibbles and prosecco in the evening is a great touch, just the way to start the evening before heading out.  As others have said, the staff are what make this hotel truly memorable, they sorted everything for us that we needed and when I took ill, they…

title: The Ideal location in Florence
review: Dear JAc A, we want to thank you very much for your positive review and for being so detailed. All of us appreciate it because, very honestly, we take care of our Guests with passion. Hope to welcome back and in the meantime we wish you alla the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Staff & Location
review: We stayed here for 6 wonderful nights.  The staff was courteous and very helpful.   The room on the 3rd floor was quiet and very comfortable.  We were only minutes from the major sights and many great restaurants.

title: Location, location, location...
review: Dear MSMS51, many thank thanks for your positive review, staying 6 nights with us and receiving a review like yours make us feel very proud of our job. Thanks again and really hope to welcome back in the near future, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Friendly, warm and helpful staff in a fantastic location
review: The hotel is ideally situated.  Easy walks to all major attractions.  We had a deluxe room and it was very nice and there was very little noise from outside.  The staff (especially Marco) were outstanding.  Restaurant recommendations all turned out to be excellent.

title: Long Weekend In Florence
review: Excellent location right in the heart of the City.  Very helpful and friendly staff.  Immaculately clean throughout. we stayed for 4 nights and would use this Hotel again but would request one of the larger rooms.  we did not have time to use the Spa but maybe next time!

title: Short break in Florence
review: Dear ChristineM, Thank you for your positive review and for emphasizing the cleanliness of our hotel which is really true thanks to our houskeeper manager "Gabriella" & her staff . As for the room, we have different sized ones, but once you will come back you will be upgraded in bigger one. All my best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: excellent hotel, great staff
review: Outstanding hotel in Florence, right in the heart of the main visitor attractions in the city. Excellent service both room, food and help from reception.  Room was first-class, very spacious, tidy, well laid out, very well appointed, quiet and spotless.  Would definitely stay here again, 4 nights in Florence was just not long enough.

title: Great stay in lovely Florence
review: Dear David F, many many thanks for your positive review, we have appreciated it very much. We look forward to welcoming back in the near future and remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Wonderful accommodations - A short stroll from Piazza della Signoria and the Ponte Vecchio
review: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights for our anniversary and loved it. The staff were more than helpful, and even recommended and booked an amazing restaurant with a view for us nearby, ensuring we had an excellent table with a view (thanks Andrea!) The room was spotless and big and the location is perfect for sight seeing and shopping. We also enjoyed massages at the spa, where the staff were very accommodating in altering a massage to suit me as I am 5 months pregnant. The actually spa is also beautiful, we loved the jacuzzi pool and flavoured showers. Thanks again to all the staff, we will absolutely be back (once baby is born and old enough for travel haha) Elena

title: Perfect location and real luxury at affordable price
review: My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights in June-July 2013 as part of a 2-week honeymoon across Italy and France. I  originally booked primarily because of its outstanding locations, just south of the Duomo and just north of the river. In addition, the level of luxury exceeded my expectations and was a nice touch for a special occasion. Our room was spacious and included a jacuzzi with a showerhead and hose faucet. We also got free access to the spa, which includes a large heated pool and scented showers; treatments like massages cost extra and we didn't spring for any. Our stay also included a free breakfast every morning, which was by far the best we had during our trip and included different types of breads, meats and cheeses, salmon, bacon, eggs, jam, juices, champagne, and…

title: Very nice hotel in a perfect location
review: Dear BradB, we thank you very much for your positive review and so well detailed. We really have appreciated your words. For sure, you should come back for the anniversary and we will wait for you. In the meantime we wish you and your wife all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect Honeymoon
review: The hotel has an excellent location in the centre of the city - near some of the most breathtaking monuments. The rooms were very clean and the bed of good quality. In Italy the breakfast is very often not too good, but the breakfast at this hotel was outstanding. Not too many different things but the things they offered tasted well and were of fine quality. In this regard it compares favourably to many of the big chain hotels were I have stayed were the number of products offered were large, but were the quality did not convince. The spa area is also very nice and one can be there for hours and hours. One of the best hotels I have every stayed at.

title: Very good Stay
review: Dear Anastasios1980, Many many thanks for your positive review. We have appreciated your comments about our breakfast and it is really the same what we said in the past responses. The "problem" is that we do not have so much space to show our products and it looks like a buffet with a few ones.  We hope to welcome back very soon and remain with all our  best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: As promised
review: Recently back from this hotel after staying there for a week on Honeymoon. There is nothing I can fault with the hotel and its staff, who were all extremely helpful. It is in a fantastic location right in the heart of the historic city and and close to the major tourist sites. Only had breakfast there which was a perfect start to the day with a wide choice of hot and cold dishes served buffet style, you could also order additional dishes. It is not cheap to stay there, but you do get what you pay for, and I would definately go back.

title: A superb hotel ideally located within Florence centre
review: This hotel is excellent with great facilities and the rooms are reasonably sized and well appointed. We were able to walk to all of the main attractions and there are many restaurants and bars within easy walking distance. It is not the cheapest but the extra cost shows in the facilities and amenities

title: Fabulous location in Florence
review: Dear AlanJUK, many thanks for your positive review, all of us appreciate and very glad to hear you spent wonderful time with us. Hopefully you will come back in the near future and in the meantime  we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Wonderful hotel !
review: Great location, this boutique hotel provided perfect accommodation in Florence. Very efficient staff, excellent breakfast. Rooms very comfortable but no scenic views. Has very good beauty and spa centre. Would highly recommend.

title: Perfect!
review: Dear Trurab, many thanks for your positve review, it has been really very appreciated. We hope to welcome back again and in the meantime we remain, yours sincerely, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Stylish Hotel. Great Location
review: This hotel is in a great location, close to all the main upmarket shopping and a 5 minute walk to the river. It sits on a pedestrianised Piazza and so has no car noise at night. It's a stylish boutique hotel with friendly staff and all the usual 5 star amenities except a fitness gym. The spa is rather small but clean and modern.  We stayed in a deluxe room at the front of the hotel, which had novelties such as his and her sinks, sunken jacuzzi bath with rain shower over and steps down to the bedroom area. All very nice and comfortable but a little dark due to only having one small window in the room which looks upon the wall of the adjacent building, thus giving not much natural light. Breakfast is continental buffet style with all the normal choices, but as with most of our…

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Dear Jiima333, thank you for posting a positive review. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. As for the room, we suppose you had one of our tower deluxe ones, which is inside our medieval tower (XII century) with windows they used to have in that period. Yes, It is very particular and very authentic with high ceiling, incredible large stone wall. Anyway, when you will visit us back again, which we wish, you will be given a different room with a different exposure  We look forward to welcoming back and remain, yours sincerely, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Vacation
review: Fantastic hotel, great location, warm & very friendly staff. Stayed there with my 10yr old daughter & had a wonderful time.  Breakfast selection was superb catering for every taste and appetite. Visited in February this year but only just got round to writing a review! I am used to staying in 5star hotels in England & in comparison this exceeded most! I would HIGHLY recommend staying at the golden tower.

title: Great Place
review: Dear Dioxon, thank you very much for your positive review. We have appreciated it very much because it is important to be compared with other hotels in the world, we found it very useful. Many thanks again and hope to welcoming back in the near future, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Just what the doctor ordered.....
review: We stayed at the Golden Towers Hotel at the beginning of April 2013 for a mini break. I had googled street map the location before hand and so was slightly apprehensive, we needn’t have been, as the hotel was excellent….pity google don’t do inside view as well as street view.  The room was perfect, and provided the evidence for a bit of luxury. We even had complimentary mini bar. I have stayed in some fab hotels in my time and this was a first !  The staff were very polite, attentive and added to the experience.   The spa facility was used every day and again made the stay all the more better.  Although we didn’t have a meal in the restaurant, we thoroughly enjoyed the breakfast, with an excellent choice of hot and cold.  The hotel is a perfect location making all the key places…

title: Luxury in a convenient location
review: Dear Carterfamily, We thank you very much for posting a positive review and .....for following the doctor's indications.  We are also  happy you appreciated our breakfast which consist of high and fresh quality products.  We look forward to welcoming back and remain, with  all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Not 5 Star
review: We stayed 5 nights in April at the Golden Tower.  It would normally be out of our price range, but by booking directly with the hotel well ahead we got a room and breakfast rate that allowed us to stay there.  The hotel is relatively small and is a modern renovation of an older building.  Our room was large (but not enormous) comfortable and modern.  The bathroom was modern and well laid out.  The hotel is located adjacent to the Palazzo Strozzi but slightly along the street so that it seems quieter.  It is very convenient for walking to most of the tourist attractions of Florence.  The staff was extremely helpful and helped us with bookings for attractions and restaurants.  We investigated the rooms ahead of our trip and asked for one overlooking the courtyard.  It was…

title: Very convenient and high quality - perfect for full Florence experience
review: Dear retire698, many thanks for posting a positive review. We are very glad you spent wonderful time with us and above all for emphasizing the fact you booked directly with us which is  really most convenient. We hope to welcome back in the near future and in the meantine we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Lovely hotel in the heart of Florence
review: My wife and I have just returned from a 3 night stay at the Golden Tower Hotel. Starting on a positive, the hotel is extremely well situated, very central and within walking distance of most of the many wonderful attractions that Florence has to offer.  In addition, the staff were very attentive, polite and helpful. Elisa (on the front desk) recommended and organised dinner at two restaurants and both were superb. The lovely bar girl (sorry, but can't recollect the name) was also great.  The jacuzzi and spa are extremely pleasant and provide a nice way of chilling for an hour or so (although it should be noted that they have limited opening hours).   Unfortunately however, there are a few negatives:  1. The hotel is not small as in "boutique” but small, as in not big. There is…

title: fantastic stay
review: We spent 4 wonderful nights at this absolutely fantastic hotel. Me and husband could not think of a bad word to say. The location was perfect. The staff were helpful and our room was a home away from home. It was my birthday during our stay and I was blown away by the unexpected acknowledgments given by the hotel staff. They really helped to make the day even more special. We stayed in the deluxe jacuzzi room which well appointed, clean and comfortable. When we return back to Florence in the future we will definitely be staying there again.

title: Absolutely First Class
review: Dear Farrah867, many thanks for your positive review. We are very happy to hear you spent wonderful time with us and for having contributed to make your stay memorable. We wish you all the best and looking forward to seeing you in the future, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent location, good value
review: There are a number of things about this hotel that make it stand out from others we've stayed in. The first is definitely its location. It is within easy walk of the rail station and perfectly situated for wandering the beautiful Florence streets, and within 5-10 minutes of all the major attractions. It also has two of the best restaurants we've ever eaten at just around the corner (see other reviews!), and a number of bars if that's your thing.  The staff are polite, helpful and helped us with everything we asked of them (dinner reservation, champagne glasses in the room etc...).  The rooms are well appointed, spotless and faultless, including satellite TV with about 200 channels, not that we spent much time watching TV - so much to do in Florence.  The hot and cold breakfast…

title: What a good hotel!
review: Dear Moosola, we are very excited about your very detailed review  and all of us thank you very much. It stimulates us to going on this way doing our best to meet the expectations of our guests. We really hope to welcome back again and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect Stay in Florence!
review: I researched extensively on where to stay in Florence...  This property, versus other similarly priced upscale boutique hotels...  I am happy with this choice.  Excellent location, Do NOT stay on a street front room, for i was in the back, and still heard kids singing late into the night... Great breakfast, awesome massage, great staff... Would not hesitate to stay here again.  THX!

title: Fantastic Stay
review: After staying in more 3-star type hotels throughout Italy, we thought we would splurge for a few days and stayed at the Golden Tower.  What a fantastic experience, particularly in comparison to what we had just come from.  The reception staff were attentive, professional and friendly.  The rooms were luxurious and such a treat.  The location was right in the heart of Florence and we had a wonderful time.  The included breakfast was delicious.

title: Perfect small luxury hotel in Florence
review: Dear tanyawilson27, many many thanks for your review. We are so glad you spent wonderful time with us. We appreciate it very much. We hope to welcome back in the near future and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Staff is average. The building is excellent
review: Friendly staff.  Perfect location right in the heart of the old town.  Lovely updated rooms and bathrooms.  Quiet.  Wonderful breakfast and happy hour.  We've found a home away from home in Florence!!  Every effort was made to help us make plans, secure a reservation at a restaurant, and make us feel welcomed in Florence.  Just steps from the best shopping, the historic sites and best restaurants.

title: Fabulous Hotel and Staff
review: Dear Debbymiller, thank you very much for your positive review. We are very happy and very proud of our job after reading review like yours. Thanks again and looking  forward to welcoming back, we remain with our  best regards antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Golden Tower a Cozy, Cream Toned Pleasure
review: We stayed in a junior suite and were two female friends... This shocked the reception as a man was expected.. The hotel was so hard to find.. We drove from Austria to Florence and it was exhausting to find it.  Specially by car.. We were helped with the car as they have valet parking and  once we got to our destination we were very happy about the choice of location.. One is here really at the heart of Florence.. We were greeted as two females , brought to our room.. The room was very nice.. Cousy clean old style but also modern .. Low sealing .. Watch out in high heals.. We were offered champagne with some amazing strawberries.  The fruits have been throughout impeccable.. The sleep was great ..our bedroom was on the inner part of the hotel.. So it was very peaceful..the…

title: Good location with helpful staff
review: Stayed there during my trip to Florence. Very very good and safe location, surround by busy commercial area, very close to good restaurants and shops. Clean rooms and helpful staff. the only down point is a little hidden with the location. I had a little difficulty to find it at beginning, but once you know there, it is actually close to everywhere...  The night club was a little bit of noisy...

title: NICE HOTEL - PERFECT LOCATION
review: Dear Abby_welle, thankl you very much for your review. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us. As for the location, it might be difficult to arrive because of our very central position and for the fact that Florence is a medieval town with very small streets. We hope to welcome back and we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Take Ear Plugs!
review: Went there last weekend for a short break. Very nice hotel in a the best part of the city and close to all the restaurants and shops, and the famous Ponte Vecchio.
