Really helpful and friendly staff. Nice breakfast as well. I would have given this a 5* rating if not for the fact that I personally found the bed to be extremely "firm" so I didn't sleep very well.

title: Fantastic service - highly recommended!
review: Dear gerryld, many thanks for your review even if we understand you did not sleep well because of the beds. It was a shame. To be very honest, it is the first time we hear that one of our guests did not find our beds comfortables. Anyway, thank for your advice. Hope to welcome back in the near future, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino

title: Loads of potential but the staff really disappoints
review: We recently stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel Florence (10th April) , it is a lovely hotel but drinks are very expensive 9 euros for a glass of wine! Also unfortunatly there is a night club about Thirty metres up the square which is fine if you are that way inclined, but if you are tired after a busy day exploring Florence we didnt really appreciate the extremely loud music which is played from Thurs thro til sat night until 2am! Be warned take ear plugs!

title: Fantastic place
review: I had looked at a number of locations in Florence for our honeymoon.  My wife (then to be) had always wanted to go there and so I spent some considerable time looking for an ideal venue.  I had found another hotel initially but hadn't booked it, and in one of those final (almost final) searches I came across the Golden Tower.  We arrived by private chauffeur, and you cannot get a vehicle right outside but the driver walked us round to the entrance.  Set on a relatively quiet street, yet very close to all the key sights, the hotel is well presented with attentive staff.  I had seen a room online that I wanted to book, and the staff reserved that room for us (in the tower) and when we arrived there was a gift of Prosecco in our room.  Each evening there was a free glass of…

title: Ticks all the boxes
review: Dear Martin G, many thanks for posting and sharing your positive and detailed review. We are very glad you enjoy your stay in this beautiful city and above all for choosing us. Looking forward to welcoming back in the near future, we remain with  all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great location
review: Stayed here on our honeymoon 21st to 23rd March.  Staff very helpful.  The spa area was superb and great when you book for exclusive use - champagne and strawberries laid on. Bed very comfortable, room on 3rd floor facing street,  Although on saturday night there was a booming soubnd system from a bar down the street, the sound proofing is so good you barely hear it. Aircon very good and noiseless. The only downside really is the bar area / relax area.  Just a bit plasticky and bright and they really should remove the large tvs on the wall - it's not a sports bar.  Could altogether be made more cosy. But other than that highly recommended.

title: Short Break in Florence
review: Dear Guests, thank you so much for your positive review and are very happy you enjoy the stay with us. As for the music in the square, which is beyond our control, as already said in a previous review, we have contact the Autorithy in order to control. We wish you all the best  and remain with our Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: A great boutique hotel in central location
review: The hotel has an excellent location for exploring Florence. Staff are friendly - especially in the breakfast room where they are very welcoming. We had a delux room - not in the tower. It was a fair size with a very large comfortable bed. The bathroom was big with bath and shower. The room is nice and clean. The spa is a welcome treat after walking round the city. We received some added extras, as it was our honeymoon, of a bottle of prosecco on arrival and a free mini bar which was very welcome! We were also given an Easter egg as it was Easter which was very good. The evening menu is more limited in choice but the orange duck is excellent and you mainly want to be eating in Florence anyway.  I agree with some other reviews that it is maybe 4 star not 5. I think if you are in a…

title: An Excellent City Hotel
review: This is a great hotel. It's located centrally in Florence, close to the Duomo, the Uffizi, the Ponte Vecchio and also within walking distance of the Santa Maria Novello railway station which is the main transfer from Pisa Airport. The staff were great - bright, helpful and friendly. The spa in the basement is good, though the jacuzzi could have been hotter. The buffet breakfast is excellent. It is a truly lovely hotel and perfect for a few days doing the galleries in Florence. We warmly recommend it.

title: Perfect location & wonderful staff
review: Dear Guest, many thank for your positive review and for recommend our hotel to others which is the best important thing for us, there is no better way of advertising than how the guest does. Than you so much, we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Lovely stay
review: We have just returned from a three night stay at this hotel and had a wonderful time. The location is perfect, walking distance of all the attractions. The staff were really helpful and so friendly and accommodating. We had a classic room which we were more than happy with, comfortable bed & sumptuous bathroom. Breakfast was good, plenty of choice and great that this is included in the price for a five star hotel. We would recommend you pre book tickets for museums as the queues are v.long! We enjoyed the Boboli gardens, great views over the city. If the weather is good and you can handle the 463 steps then a must see is also the view from the top of the cathedral/dome. We would most definitely recommend this hotel and hope to return again in the future.

title: Good location
review: Dear Guests, we want to thank you for your positive review and very proud to have succeeded in our aim which is the satisfaction of our guests. We really hope to welcoming back in the near future and in the meantime we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent Hotel - Service and Rooms were Outstanding
review: I stayed here for four nights with my husband in March. It's in a fantastic location, very central but also quiet. It's a boutique hotel rather than a large hotel which we liked. The rooms are lovely and very clean, they even turn the bed down at night and put a biscuit on your pillow!  The staff are very helpful and friendly. We booked with Travel Republic and got a fantastic deal compared to the rack rate of the hotel and were also upgraded to a deal where we could eat and drink anything from the mini-bar which was great! We also had free access to the lovely spa in the hotel. Breakfast was really nice, a wide choice of fresh food, juices and hot drinks.  It rained the whole time we were there so we really appreciated the hotel's umbrellas in reception!  We had a shock when we…

title: Almost perfect!
review: Starting with the positive, our room was immaculately clean, comfortable, well furnished and well equipped. Our deal included free use of the minibar, but the minibar contained only beer and soft drinks. I would have been prepared to pay more for the usual spirit content.  The staff were charming and helpful. The spa was inviting, although there was no member of staff in the spa itself to help with adjustments to heat and steam.  Our disappointment was with the breakfast. Whilst the selection of food is adequate, is poorly laid out. On our first breakfast (we stayed for two nights) the toaster was not working. There was a selection of bread alongside it which could not be toasted. On our second breakfast, there was no toaster and no bread selection. When I enquired I was told…

title: Perfect location
review: Dear Mr William K, thanks  for posting a review . We are sorry for the electrical problem suddenly occured with the toast machine which was out of order only one mornig, not two. As for the minibar which its content is free of charge , you obviously could ask for any other items you wished to drink ( wine, champagne, whisky) . Regarding the Spa, the Sauna & Turkish bath are fully automatic while the absence of members was probably due to the fact there were engaged in doing treatments. Concerning scramble eggs, in a big hotel use a package product  whereas  we use ONLY fresh eggs. This is a substantial difference in how they may appear.  We hope to welcome back and thanks again for your suggestions, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Relaxing oasis in the city centre
review: Wow great find.  Perfecto location.  Very nice rooms clean and a friendly staff.  I will be staying here again. I got a great price on Priceline name your own price for a 5 star hotel.   Couldn't beat this place for that price.

title: Wonderful cultural break
review: Dear TommyL, thank you very much for your review. We are glad you spent wonderful time with us. Looking forward to welcoming back soon, we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: goldentowerhotelflorence
review: My husband and I stayed here for three nights and it was lovely. It's right in the middle of Florence, so everything is walking distance and you soon get to know your way around. Easy to pop back too, if you need to drop things off/pick things up. The staff were all really friendly and helpful.  The room was really comfortable and very clean and every so often we'd come back to find a little something there for us - a packet of biscuits, or individual biscuits.  Just nice little details that make you feel welcome.  The Reception staff were really helpful and kind.  The spa was great - we even had it to ourselves the day we went together, and it was just me the other day (the rugby was on the tv!).  We would fully recommend this hotel.

title: Perfectly located
review: Stayed for 3 nights in early Feb and thought the hotel was great.  It was in a perfect location, set amongst all the (fabulous) shops and a very short walk to all the main sites.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful and we enjoyed the prosseco happy hour every evening.  Our room was beautiful and always kept spotlessly clean.  Although at the front of the hotel, we were far enough away from the nearby nightclub for it not to be an issue, but I can see that you might experience some disturbance at the opposite end of the hotel.  There's no traffic going past so it was lovely and quiet.  Finally, the breakfast buffet was a great start every morning - plenty of fresh fruit, freshly baked cakes, pastries, smoked salmon, hams and cheeses, cereals and mueslis and a few hot…

title: Perfect!
review: Dear Sarah P, we want to thank you for posting a very positive review. We are so glad you spent wonderful time with us and have appreciated all our high quality product on buffet breakfast. Looking forward to welcoming back, we remain with  our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Lived up to expectations
review: Just a perfect hotel!Nice location in Firenze. we had a very pleasant stay. The spa area is small but nice and the breakfast is cool. The only bad detail is that we couldn't stop the heating during the night but we will come back for sure and we truly recommend it!

title: Excellent hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Dear JulieSerlieS, many thanks for posting a positive review. We are more than happy you spent a wonderful time with us. As for the heating, it sounds strange, becasue it can be, obviously, stopped from the guest. However, we will check soon if there is any problem. I do not know if you informed the reception?? Anyway, we hope and look forward to welcome back again in the near future and we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great hotel in central Florence
review: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in December and could not fault it. Brilliant location for walking all around Florence. Very comfortable room and bed, marble bathroom. Friendly and efficient staff.

title: Perfect choice to stay in Florence
review: Dear Noreen K, thank you very much for your positive review, although concise it sent an excellent message. We are glad you spent wonderful time with us and hope to welcome back in the very near future. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Thank You Golden Tower
review: We stayed in this Hotel for three days and I would say we just loved the hotel.The staff was very polite and helpful.Prefect Spa treatments,very relaxing.The room is also very comfortable,especially the bed is very comfortable. Good choice of breakfast. Excellent location,all good restaurants near by.I would definately come back to stay in this hotel again.

title: Superb Hotel
review: Dear Deepti-tourisim, thank you very much for posting a positive review. We are very happy you spent wonderful time with us. We look forward to welcoming back and we wish you a prosperous year, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent value in Florence
review: My wife and I stayed 4 days in October.  Excellent service with a great location.  The helpful and friendly staff make the Golden Tower a superb choice.  My cell phone charger broke in travel, the Golden tower provided a loaner when I asked the front desk where I could buy one.  I found that we walked everywhere in Florence so believe me when I tell you that I found the whirpool, steamroom and sauna invigorating before setting out for the evening

title: Outstanding, Highly Recommanded
review: We had a lovely stay in Florence at the Golden Tower Hotel. We stayed 8 nights so we had the time to get to know the hotel and its facilities very well. Not only is the hotel greatly located (just 5 mn to the Duomo, the Palazzo Vecchio, the Uffizi Gallery, the Ponte Vecchio...) but the service there is oustanding. The staff is extraordinary kind and speaks very well English, French and other languages. Everyone there makes your stay a perfect dream holiday! Special thanks to Marco and his colleagues at the reception who have been very kind and helpful giving us advices for local restaurants, museums and bars.

title: Fooled once
review: Dear Soupalonyon, we thank you very much for your excellent review and are very glad you found our services "outstanding" and you spent wonderful time with us. We hope to welcome back soon and we wish you a wonderful 2013, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent location and 5-star quality
review: Chose the Golden Tower based upon the reviews on Trip and very disappointed that I did.  Trip is a flawed rating service because of the many different levels of travel experience and the various levels of taste.  That's not a shot at Trip, it's just a fact.  Five stars to some, vjust "ain't" five stars to others.   The Golden Tower is an OK hotel....in my opinion, it's  about as far away from 5 stars as I am now sitting from the hotel (I'm in NY).  I suppose it's targeted at the young and hip and although I'm not THAT old, too young and too hip are sort of a turnoff to me when staying in a premium hotel.  If you like the Soho Grand in Manhatten than you'd probably like this place.  If on the other hand you perfer a Ritz Carlton than choose perhaps the Savoy or Four Seasons when…

title: Perfect
review: Dear James G, we thank you for your comment even if  do not hide our surprise while reading it because we do not have  understood where the "critical" is. Indeed, we believe that the reviews made ​​by our "Qualified Guests", of which 95% excellent / good left not only by  "young and hip",  have to be taken into consideration  because is  the result of their life experience and how they interface with "luxury" .  The reviews are important when are constucrtive! As for the live music in the square we respond to what happen inside the hotel even if we have taken measure against the "bar" outside involving the police in order to check the "decibels".

title: Just beautiful highly recommend
review: The hotel is a centrally located in a quiet street, a few minutes walk to the Duomo, Uffizi and all the other main attractions of Florence. - you don't need to bother with a car or public transport, as the city is so accessible. Outstanding friendly service is provided - nothing is too much trouble.   We booked a classic room, which was very quiet, overlooking the internal area. These rooms are smaller than the deluxe ones, and the bathroom has a large shower but no tub. But space is quite adequate, decor very attractive, and the large bed provided a  comfortable night's sleep.. Free wi-fi, and tea/ coffee making facility in the room, and a minibar (which was not free, as others had suggested). Excellent buffet breakfast with hot and cold options.  All around the hotel are…

title: Simply perfect
review: Not my first time in Florence, but first at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, I LOVED IT!!!! I've seen and experience many other Hotels, but the Golden Tower has it all, the location allowed you to  be in shops, Piazzas, restaurants in no time being in the heart of the city, but feel secluded in the privacy of your suite with "fireplace" , state of the art bathrooms, flat screen TV, automated lights in halls, and closets, healthy and delicious  options for breakfasts, is priceless. The staff takes care of every detail, from the moment you arrive, you feel the concierge service at its best. I will recommend it to everyone, being confident their experience at the Golden Tower will remain forever in their hearts as it was for me.

title: A luxury hotel in the perfect location
review: Dear CessyMeacham, Thank you for your wonderful review, it encourages us to going on this way. All of us appreciate your comments. We hope to welcome back in the very near future at Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and in the meantime we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fantastic
review: We stayed here for a long weekend in November. The hotel is in the heart of Florence, a short walk from many of the main attractions and surrounded by high end shops and lovely restaurants. The hotel itself is quite small and was perfect for us. The deluxe room was well decorated and very comfortable, it felt secluded and there was no noise heard from outside. The restaurant/bar area is also very nice and the food was excellent. The spa is a fantastic addition and feels like a sanctuary, with steam room, sauna, jacuzzi and specialised showers. I recommend having a massage or treatment, which all seemed reasonably priced. The staff were always very helpful and friendly and overall I would highly recommend the hotel.

title: 5 star relaxing holiday
review: Dear ClaireB700, many many thanks for your positive review which was also very detailed and above all for emphasize our sound proofed rooms beacuse when it is said by the Guest it appears more truthful. Thank you also  for mentioning the SPA which is managed by two delicious guys: Jocelyne and Matteo who are very competent. Hope to welcome back soon, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Why did no one tell us about the noisy bar across the road?
review: Just returned from a 4 night fantastic stay at this hotel....I can not fault any part of it. On arrival we were upgraded to a suite as we were celebrating my husbands 50th birthday. The room was amazing and on his actual birthday a bottle of champagne was also delivered to the room. The Spa was lovely and relaxing and the breakfast was more than adequate. In my opinion definitely worth the 5 star rating.

title: Perfect end to our honeymoon
review: I entrusted my husband to make the accommodation bookings for our honeymoon and it is fair to say he is firmly in the good books for a long while!  The hotel is centrally located but surprisingly very quiet.   In my opinion the photographs of the lounge and dining area do not do this hotel justice, it is airy and fresh, I have to also say very clean.  There seemed to be always someone ensuring the floors were polished and clean.    The staff are amazing, courteous and extremely helpful. We ate at the restaurant they recommended and we were not disappointed.  We took dinner at the hotel on arrival, don't be put off by the small menu as what they do have is well cooked, presented and tasty.  The breakfast is lovely and there is a very good selection to suit all tastes.  I did use…

title: We Loved Our Stay at The Golden Tower!
review: Dear Piscurfield, We are very delighted and thankful for your positive review. All of us try doing the best to render the stay of our Guest "memorable" and reviewlike yours make us feel very proud of our job. Many thanks and really hope to welcome back in the near future, antonio pellegrino general manager

title: Excellent
review: We stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel for an entire week. During that time I found absolutely nothing to dislike about the hotel. The staff is wonderful and accommodating, especially Elisa at the front desk and Polly at the restaurant. The rooms are well-furnished, comfortable and clean. The location is fantastic. We walked to everything in Florence that we could possibly want to see.   Even though the hotel is rather expensive (what isn't expensive in Florence?) when you consider the lavish breakfast buffet, free internet, central location, comfort, cleanliness, and staff I feel it was money well spent. I will definitely return to the Golden Tower Hotel whenever I'm in Florence.

title: Amazing hotel in the heart of Florence!
review: Dear thebestbeach, Thank you very much for your positive review and for appreciating our free in room-rate services. As for the price, to be honest, it depends on the season and usually in winter is less expensive than the summer. We really hope to welcome back in the near future and wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: perfect in every way
review: It is an excellent choice in Florence. The location is great just close to the historic center. The room is nice and clean. Could be a bit larger, but it is OK. The SPA is amazing! It is new and with excellent structure! Staff is educated and well trainned. Excellent choice !!!

title: A real jewel in Florence
review: Great location - private and quiet but only minutes away from Ponte Vecchio, Republic Square and Ufizzi Gallery and in the heart of the high fashion streets. The rooms in this small (27 room) boutique hotel are modern, clean and comfortable while still maintaining an old world charm about them. The decor is just so pleasing and airy. The breakfast is very nice without being over the top. The service (house keeping, front desk, restaurant, bell desk) is beyond compare - Unobtrusive but remarkably efficient performed by a small group of friendly staff that makes you really feel welcome. it is as if they anticipate your needs. These are the service levels that other hotels should aspire for. I have been travelling in Europe and Asia for over 35 years and this was the hotel for us.…

title: Fantastic Luxury
review: Dear JairajH, many many thanks for your positive comment. Our staff and I are more than happy to read you review as we are very proud of our job. Thanks again and really hope you will come back to Florence. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Tour of Tuscany
review: Having looked forward to visiting the city of Florence, one of our highlights was the stay at the Golden Towers Hotel.  The staff were discrete, but very helpful, the breakfast was high quality and  plentiful, the rooms beautifully appointed and the bed extremely comfortable.  It was perfectly placed, centrally located to tour the city on foot providing access to all of the main attractions, shops, bars and restaurants - its worth the money!

title: The Lap of Luxury in a Great Location
review: Dear 848JudithH, We thank you very much for your comment. We are happy to read you enjoy your stay with us. As for the breakfast, yes, we only have high quality product and we wish we would to display in a larger space which we do not have. We look forward to welcome back and meanwhile we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect for a relaxing weekend break.
review: We had just finished a 7 day motorcycle tour though Tuscany and we were really looking forward to some major comfort. As soon as we walked in the Golden Tower we greeted with a warm welcome...our bags were taken care of and we were offered a seat and refreshments. We were taken to our room when and were told that they upgraded us and they hope we didn't mind. Oh my goodness the room was excellent! It was a large room, with 2 full bathrooms, a living room, complimentery wet bar,loft bedroom, large closet. The bed was so comfortable with plenty of fluffy pillows. Downstairs there is a spa with a Roman and steam bath along with a sauna. The use of the spa is included in your stay. Front desk staff were wonderful....gave us recomendations for absolutly excellent restaurants, took…

title: Very nice and quiet!
review: The staff were very nice and helpful.  When we checked in we were immediately given a map of Florence as well as key sites to see.  Our room was very nice and quiet.  We had a nice skylight in our room as well.  The free breakfast was very good!  Location was nice too...lots of restaurants and shops close by and everything else was a short walk away.  Overall, a great experience and stay

title: Luxury "perfectly located" in Florence
review: Dear Lovetotravel469, we thank you very much for your positive review and are very happy you had a great experience at Golden Tower. All of us wish you the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: First time stay
review: My wife and I recently spent two great nights at the Golden Tower.  The staf was extremely welcoming and tended to our every need.  The hotel has an ideal location only 5 minutes walking in any direction to almost anything you would want (shopping, restaurants, uffizzi gallery, acadamia gallery, town center, train station.....) The room was very comfortable and well appointed, and the complimentary mini-bar was a welcome surprise, especially since we paid about 6-7 euro for just a water at other hotels in Rome and Venice.  The breakfast was fantastic and the staff there was also very accommodating.  The spa is very small,  but was a great place to unwind after a long day of sightseeing.  We definitely have the Golden Tower on our list to re-visit.

title: What more could you want at this price point?!
review: Dear DavidLab319, many thanks for your positive review. We are very happy you spent a wonderful time with us and really hope to have the opportunity to welcome back very soon. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fabulous hotel in heart of Florence
review: Excellent experience overall. Nice, small boutique hotel with very comfortable accommodations and a great breakfast buffet! A little on the expensive side perhaps.  They were very understanding when my arrival was delayed by one day as a result of a flight cancellation. One quirk: no irons in rooms...."laundry/pressing service". I gather this is common in Italy.  Friendly front desk staff could not have been more helpful. Pleasant bar/breakfast staff e.g "Polly".  They do need to decide whether they want guests to frequent the bar as a bar (no bar stools) or as a lounge only.  Would stay again.

title: first class hotel
review: We stayed here for five wonderful nights.  Hotel was immaculate, comfortable, quiet and very convenient.  The staff helped us to plan our days, and a really nice touch was a bottle of Proseco they sent up to our room as a surprise for my husband's birthday.  The breakfast was more than adequate, but agree about the bar this is not a place where you would want to spend much time.  Would not hestitate to stay here again.

title: Little Gem in Florence
review: Dear Elaine U, many thanks  for your review. As you said, with our little touch try to render the stay more memorable. As for the Bar, as we are located in the hearth of Florence, then surrounded by a wide choice of bars, this is the price we pay to be in downtown. Hope to welcome back very soon, we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Amazing!  Thrilled with my choice!
review: Stayed recently for 2 nights at the Golden Tower.  We found the refurbished Hotel to be of an excellent standard.  Its location right in the heart of the old town of Florence is perfect for all that walking which is how one sees Florence.  We had a Junior Suite which was excellent, although being on a spilt level with the sitting room  and another bathroom upstairs in a loft style, we didn't really get full value from the suite.  Breakfast which was included was also excellent and the free Wifi was also a bonus.  There is no onsite parking, which is normal for Florence, so we used the hotel valet service which was expensive at Eur 38 for a night, but the service was good.  We found the staff excellent, at checkin/out and with other tourist type of info.  The Hotel is a little…

title: Over-rated and unhelpful
review: Dear rustycyle, thank you so much for your positive review and thanks also for the advise about GPS. The problem is that in downtown, recentky, have changed a lot of direction so that the most GPS are not updated and above all because the center is medieval once with a lot of little streets. Looking forweard to see you very soon, all of us wish you the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent choice
review: was very impressed with the Golden Tower!  I paid to upgrade the room and it was so worth it!  Breakfast was great, spa was fabulous after a long day of sightseeing ... the glass of Proseco at happy hour along with snacks was a nice touch.  Our room was spotless and well maintained with turn down service.  Water pressure in the shower was great too.  The room was big for European standards - the beds very comfortable!  I don't know if you could get a better location - we did not have to take a cab once and walked everywhere -- just around the corner is a great restaurant and if you turn left outside the hotel there is a lively bar too.  I can't wait to return!  Thanks to Polly & Alessandro for making us feel so welcomed!

title: Hotel excellent...Restaurant????
review: Our Hotel was very beautiful inside...The service we received was excellent. Our room was very nice if somewhat very dark (Tower deluxe room).. If we could have had a balcony to sit out on, this room would have been perfect.. The hotel is kept spotlessly clean at all times. The selection for the continental breakfast was excellent, but after seven days a little variety or even a change of pastries would have been appreciated.. The location is perfect for strolling out and is very central to most places...Very noisy building work taking place all around...Double glazing was very good, but could not open the windows at all or the noise was awful... We ate in the Restaurant on the first night. It was by far the worst meal we had during our whole week in Florance...The fish started…

title: Great Hotel & Location
review: Dear Patricia M, thanks for posting your review which we realize you were satisfied with the hotel but you had "orrible" experience with the food. We are of course very sorry for this and soon we have investigated what could be happened because we are honestly astonished about this. Other people had dinner and the menu was the same. We hope to welcome back and meanwhile we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Wonderful Experience
review: We stayed in a Deluxe Room that was beautiful and spacious.  All of the hotel staff were incredible. As stated by other reviewers the hotel is located in the heart of Florence, an easy walk the best restaurants and shopping.  I would highly recommend this hotel to fellow travelers.

title: Location Location Location
review: Dear  George, many thanks for your positive comment  and above all for emphasizing our Staff, they will appreciate very much, as they are very proud of their job. Looking forward to welcoming back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: no bathtub in a 5 star hotel
review: My husband and I were treated like royalty during our two night stay at the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa.  We were upgraded upon arrival and showed to our room right away.  Strawberries and Proseco was delivered to our room to celebrate our "26th Honeymoon".   The room was beautiful, clean and bright.  The marble bathroom was beautiful and spacious.  Like other reviewers have said, the location is PERFECT!  Breakfasts were wonderful with plenty to choose from.  Unfortunately, we didn't get to use the spa.  We simply ran out of time.  We had a tour on our last day there and they kindly held our luggage for us after check out.  We would love to return to Florence one day and we would definately return!

title: All the reviews are correct- fabulous hotel
review: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights in a 1 bedroom suite. From the moment we walked in, we were made to feel welcome. They delivered strawberries and champagne to our room after we checked in. The hotel is in Strozzi Square which is like 5 th ave in New York City. It is very convenient to everything you would want to see in Florence. The rooms are ample sized, the included breakfast has a large variety and after a day of touring, it is a quiet oasis. The spa also offers a hot tub, sauna etc which is included in the room rate and feels great after a day of walking. The front desk staff especially Marco were helpful in their dining suggestions and directions. This was our 2nd visit to Florence and we will definitely return here again. Truly fabulous.

title: Excellent!!!
review: Dear Suzeyes, We Thank you (expecially Marco )  very much for your positive review. We are so happy you spent wonderful time with us and yes, all the reviews are correct because are real. We hope to welcome back again and meanwhile we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect Stay!
review: Golden Tower Hotel and Spa rolled out the red carpet for us during our stay in Florence, Italy!! The property is wonderfully renovated, yet keeps its character. The room we were in was beautiful, with a huge bathroom and jacuzzi tub....all marble, too. This hotel is in the heart of the city, so we walked everywhere. And the best part of our experience was the courteous staff. Very friendly and helpful!!! Florence is a wonderfully city and I'm so glad we stayed at this location.

title: Memorable experience
review: Dear Wisdom40, Many thanks for your positive review and we promise we will roll out the red carpet again once you come back. Thanks again, we appreciate it very much. We wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Very good experience
review: We loved this hotel. It was pristine, new, clean, noiseless.  They upgraded us to a better room without our asking, at check in. The bed was very comfy, the room spacious and the bathroom well appointed with good quality toiletries.  The breakfast food was delicious, of excellent quality. Hotel is located in close proximity to all the attractions, within an easy walk, in a quiet street nevertheless, surrounded by nice stores and a couple of fun bars.  If you walk 2 blocks, you meet a street market that sells amazing leather goods at bargain prices.  Check out was easy and fast.  Overall, a place worth returning to, without a doubt!

title: Great location brand new hotel
review: The location of this hotel was amazing and very central to all tourist attractions in Florence. The staff was really friendly and helpful, checking in and out was a breeze. The room we had was large with a huge bathroom for hotel standards and the cleanliness would appease even the biggest germaphobe. The hotel is however very tricky to find, and if you happen to be driving it's especially difficult. It's much easier to park in the area and walk to find the hotel, their staff will go and park your car for you in the hotel parking area, which you will be thankful for as the driving in Florence is very tricky. Breakfast was included and it just so happen to be delicious:)

title: Great stay!
review: Dear  Melissa M, we thank you for your positive review and for suggestions about driving. Florence is a medieval town and sometimes can be difficult to drive and also because sometimes the navigator are not updated. Anyway, as you said, it is preferable to call hotel instead of  driving around and aorund so will be able to guide our  Guest in the right direction. Looking forward to welcome back again, we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: A Week in Florence to Remember
review: We were on a short 2 night trip in Firenze and we stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel and Spa.  The hotel is in a GREAT location with short walking distances to all the old town attractions and great shopping.  Our room was small (typical of Europe) but beautiful, clean and comfortable.  The bathroom was extremely large, updated and clean.  The staff were great and were accommodating to any questions or concerns we had.  I think we got a lot more than what we paid for in this hotel.

title: Perfection in Florence
review: Dear hbayat, many thanks for your positive review and are very glad to know we have been up to your expectations. We hoep to welcome back in the very near future and meanwhile we wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Perfect
review: My wife and I, together with our son and his girlfriend, stayed at the Golden Towers for our week's vacation in Florence. The hotel is beautifully appointed and the staff helpful but not fussy (just the way we like it). We paid a little extra which gave us free internet and free use of the minibar (juice, water, beer and snacks). The breakfast buffet is excellent with both continental and bacon-sausage-and-egg options. What really made was firstly the location - nothing more than ten minutes away, including the main railway station - and the spa to relax in after a day yomping around Medici territory. A day trip to Pisa is easy via a 45 minute fast train ride while Sienna only takes an hour and a half. Back to the hotel - everything worked in the room from air conditioning to…

title: Outstanding
review: Picked based on reviews here and not at all disappointed.  Staff could not have been more helpful.  Room (one up from basic) was excellent, spacious, well appointed, etc.  Excellent breakfast included.  Happy hour.  Free spa.  Brilliant location for weary feet.  All round top notch.

title: Excellent hotel and in the right location
review: Dear Barga Tim, Thank you so much for your positive review, it will help the hesitant customer to book  Hoping to welcome back very soon, We wish you all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Luxury in Florence
review: This was the largest rooms we have had on our 17 days european trip and the staff were polite and friendly.  The rooms were very clean and loved the free stocked (constantly) bar in the room.  Breakfast was good and the service was again good. Easy to walk to all of the main sights and do not miss buying fruits from the local market and have your lunch there - very cheap and a cultural experience and it is about 5 minutes walk.  They have an in house spa - the massage was ok - wished the therapist paid attention to what the client needed rather than just following the "program"

title: Incredible hotel
review: Dear Singthan, thank you for your positive review and for your suggestions which we are sure other Readers will appreciate. Thanks also for emphasize the professionalism of  our SPA Staff which we already know they are very good and contrbute to render more plesant the stay of our Guests. Hope to welcome back soon, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Stewart and Amanda G.
review: We stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel and Spa for four nights in the middle of August; a real oasis of calm in the middle of a sizzling Tuscan summer. Surrounded by all the top designer shops that you can think of (and some you can't), the hotel reflected the chic elegance of the west of the city. It was perfectly located, a walking distance from all the major sights, and had a range of bars and restaurants close by (though they were as expensive as you might expect). The room we had was fantastic, with a sumptuous bed and much appreciated air-conditioning. We also had a jacuzzi in our bathroom - highly luxurious. Breakfast was just right before a busy sightseeing day. The spa in the basement was a wonderful addition. A sauna and Turkish bath after a busy day roaming the streets…

title: Wonderful hotel
review: From the moment we entered the hotel you made to feel welcome and the suite we were fortunate enough to stay in was INCREDIBLE! Huge living room, bathroom and seperate bedroom. Comfortable bed full bathtub, bidet, shower and large make-up area for the wife. This was a ROYAL expierience and was worth every nickel! The food in the restauarnt wasn't as great as some of the Trattoria's we found in the city but the service through-out the hotel was second to none. At this point in our trip we had been to London, Amsterdam and Paris staying in equal caliber hotels in those respective cities but none of them compaired ot the Golden Tower Hotel in Florence. Make your trip unforgetable to Florence and stay here, you won't regret it!

title: Beautiful hotel in super-central location with friendly service
review: Dear Tranatraveler, many thanks for your positive comment and are very glad you had an unforgettable experience at Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. We look forward to see you very soon and we wish all the best, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: wonderful location,relaxing, friendly atmosphere
review: My wife and I stayed here for two nights on our recent visit to Florence. Everybody was very friendly and couldn't have been more helpful, and we were upgraded to a beautiful 2 floor junior suite on arrival. My wife is pregnant and lactose intolerant, which we told the hotel a week before our arrival, and as a result (and without us ever having to remind the staff) they ensured that soya milk was available for coffee and cereal in the mornings. One of the waitresses at the restaurant called Milena was particularly helpful and friendly. Milena went out of her way to make us comfortable and ensure that my wife was taken care of, checking each of the cheeses and letting us know which ones she could eat, and always welcoming us and attending to us with a big smile in the morning.…

title: A truly fantastic experience
review: Dear James T%, first of all thank you for your positive review and we are so happy you spent wonderful time with us. The care and the attention to all details is very important, exsecially during the stay. We strongly believe in our job and review like yours make us feel very very proud of it. We wish all the best for your wife and for you and hope to welcome back with the baby, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Never been to Italy before but staying in this hotel would love to go again. The location is central yet amazingly quiet. The staff spoke excellent English,( if you don t speak Italian,) nothing too much trouble, booked tickets for us, happy to provide any information. The rooms are immaculate yet not ostenacious which allows you to relax and feel spoiled. The little touches such as a biscotti on your pillow when you return to your room, a beautiful spa,and a well served breakfast with plenty of choice, serving til 11am !! Would reccomend this to friends every time.

title: The perfect hotel in Florence
review: This hotel has the most perfect location, and I cannot recommend this enough. We stayed for two night in a Tower Deluxe Room (the one with the brick walls), and the room is just amazing! The best bed you can imagine, and the decor is just fantastic. It has plenty of space, and a large bathroom. It would be our first choice should we visit Florence again.

title: Luxury Hotel and Spa
review: Dear Grethel, many many thanks for your positive review and glad to know that Golden Tower Hotel & Spa will be your first choice should you come to Florence. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Absolutely wonderful, couldn't have asked for more!
review: We stayed here one night on our honeymoon and it was a great experience. Very kind staff from check in to check out and we got a deal for an upgraded room. The included happy hour and brunch were more than ample in terms of food and drink and the room was definitely high end. The best part of the hotel was the Spa/Pool which had a waterfall and huge Jacuzzi jets as well as a rainforest shower, steam room and sauna. The location couldn't be any better as you can walk to all the sites and shopping.

title: Great hotel, highly recommended.
review: Dear Evan_DC, thank you very much for your positive review and very happy that we contribute to render your honeymoon more memorable even if only for one night...but we are sure, next time,  you will come back for more nights and of course we will be glad to welcom back. All our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Lovely boutique hotel
review: We went for our honeymoon and this hotel was honestly fantastic. The staff were really lovely and very efficient, all insisted on speaking (wonderful) English and generally couldn't do enough for us. The whole place felt flash and special without being too pretentious or creepy. The room was beautiful (we had a superior one, wasn't huge but fine for a city break), the spa was lovely and everything was generally fab. Highly recommended.

title: A welcome bit of luxury
review: My 18 year old nephew and I stayed here during a trip to Rome, Florence and London and it was the nicest of all the places we stayed.  The location was perfect - we easily walked everywhere.    Our room was a little unusual.  It was on the 5th floor (516 I think) - a deluxe twin room.  You open the door to a spiral staircase that goes up to the room - I was very thankful for the bellman who carried our bags up the stairs.  The only disappointment was the lack of a view.  There was one small window that (think an attic room) with a step stool but all you could see (if you made the climb) was a brick wall.  There was one evening that one of the restaurants in the Piazza was having a party with loud music which we could hear in our room, but thankfully, it ended shortly after 10pm…

title: Excellent location and friendly staffs
review: Dear Trobinsons220, Thank you for your review! We are honoured to know that Golden Tower Hotel & Spa has been the nicest place of your trip. This make us feel very proud!! We really look forward to welcoming back and meanwhile we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent hotel, our favorite in all of Italy!
review: The hotel is located at Piazza d. Strozzi, just a five minutes walk from all major attractions in Firenze.  The room is very clean and have a 'firenze'-like marble decor.  Staffs were very pleasant and helpful.  I would certainly return to this hotel if I ever have a chance to come back to Firenze.

title: Stunning hotel, excellent location.
review: Dear Tirex 0818, many thanks for your review and we sincere hope to welcome back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellant First Class Hotel
review: Please stop looking at other hotels and just book this one! We stayed at other lovely 5 star hotels in Sorrento & Rome, but this small hotel even outdid them. Firstly, you are on a quiet side street with not a lot of foot traffic. You are also close to everything you need to see in Florence. Check in was smooth and the staff is very friendly and accommodating. We were promptly brought to our room which was the most updated and cleanest hotel room in all of Italy. It had a lovely smell to it too! They serve breakfast daily which had amazing Nutella croissants. Perhaps our favorite part was how cold the rooms would get. They didn't put a cap on how cold you could make the room which was a lifesaver for me who was 6 months pregnant. All our other hotels wouldn't allow you to lower…

title: Location, location & service
review: We stayed here because of past reviews - and are not disappointed - only our second night at the property - The room is perfectly fine - good location - the front desk recommends great restaurants and can answer your every question -breakfast is great lots of variety - the staff is fabulous - glad we choose to stay here -

title: Location, Location, Location
review: Dear Smitten, thank you for your positive review even if we read the second night mybe was not so good. If you wish you can send me a private message in order to better understand what the problem was. However, we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and lookk forward to welcoming back, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Totally worth it!!!!
review: Great location, beautiful boutique hotel.  Included breakfast very well done.  We visited in July, prices were at peak - probably a bit too much for the room.  Nonetheless, I would recommend this hotel if you enjoy the boutique feel with the convenience of location.  You can walk from the train station.  If at all possible, avoid driving - besides the unorganized roads, and random one way and/or construction - there's a ZTL or no traffic zone area in which you need approval to drive in or your car will get photographed and a ticket will be in the mail (up to a year later.)

title: BEAUTY AND CONFORTABLE
review: Dear Georgia G, We thank you for your review and happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us. As for the traffic,  you said, we are located in downtown which is a Limited Traffic Zone and arriving by car you should be carefull not to drive through the Buses Lines to  to avoid get the ticket, but on the other cases Hotel's  Guest are authorized to enter and once they arrived we provide to trasmit the car's number on a white list. Thank you again and hope to see very soon, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great hotel !
review: My husband and I spent a week in Italy for our honeymoon and, and of the 4 places we stayed, this was our favorite hotel by far.  It couldn't possibly have been more perfect!  The room was so unique and impressive.  The spa was amazing and our couples massage was fantastic.  Also, they perfectly executed our request for a surprise champagne, rose petals and chocolate gelato to be in the room for our arrival.  I have no idea how they timed it but the ice cream wasn't melted at all by the time we got there.  Although I didn't take any pictures of it, the bathroom was the most amazing bathroom I've ever seen.  While it was a bit more pricey than other places we stayed, it was totally worth it!

title: loved the golden tower
review: i stayed for 3 nights in a deluxe room and found the location to be excellent .the room was a good size and was very clean .the bed was wonderful.free wifi worked well and breakfast was fine.......typical continental fare. i also found the staff to be very friendly and helped us with resturants and tours etc .i didnt try the spa so cant comment .overall i would stay here again as i really enjoyed the calmness and luxury the golden tower offered.

title: Very nice time in Florence
review: Dear armagh222, many thank for your review and we are glad you spent wonderful and relaxing time to us. All of us love our job and reading review like yours makes us very proud of it. Thanks and hope to welcome back very soon, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Nice, clean, comfortable, great location, new and friendly
review: This hotel is ideally place near all the main places of Florence. The service was perfect, the spa gave us the opportunity to leave the hot hours of the day. We both really enjoyed our time there, and made the visit to Florence so much nicer. It was worth the money.

title: A jewel among the rocks!!
review: Dear rosalieL83, your review make us very very happy because you will have a good memory of Florence, not only of Golden Tower Hotel and this is what we wish for all the ones who visit our city. Thank you so much and hope you will come back to visit Florence...of course staying to Golden Tower Hotel & Spa. Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Peace and quiet
review: We really enjoy our stay. This is a very nice and clean hotel, looks new and it's very. Loved my room. Breakfast was included. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Plan your route if you get by car since hotel is in a downtown narrow street. Excellent location. I would return with no doubt.

title: Charming hotel
review: As aptly stated by the other reviews, the Golden Tower is indeed the perfect hotel to stay in Florence: the location cannot be beaten, it is perfect! The hotel itself is very charming offering modern amenities in an in an old world atmosphere and the staff are warm and professional. The only suggestion I have for them is to have better pillows, from the 6 pillows in my bed, I could not find one that suited me, but this is a minor issue. I will be back and have already recommended to my friends.

title: The ratings on Tripadvisor are true!
review: Dear Chevanne, Thank you very much for your positive review and for your recommendation. As for the pillow, we are sorry to hear you did not found the one suitable for you and as you said, we have 3 trhee different pillow per person. We look forward to welcoming back to our hotel and meanwhile, we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: The Golden Tower is "golden"!
review: I did a lot of research for hotels in Firenze before going for Golden Tower, and had very high expectations. Well, it turned out that the hotel was at least as good as expected. The location is perfect, and the place itself is great. I had quite a few requests, one being a silent room (inner yard), and all other requests were met, too. Excellent beds, btw! We enjoyed the spa, breakfast, complimentary minibar etc as part of our package, and also had some good massages. The staff was great, and the helped us with restaurant and museum reservations, as well as general information about the city. And no, I can not find anything negative to say about Golden Tower!

title: Great Place and Great Staff
review: Dear HeGeKH, Thank you very much for your positive review and for underline that what is reported on Tripadvisor is "True". Yes, as you said, all of us do our best to render the stay of our Guests so "memorable" and you can reach suh a reasult only if you believe in your job, like we do. Thanks again and look forward to welcoming back to he golden Tower Hotel & Spa, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent Hotel in Wonderful Location
review: My husband and I had the pleasure of staying at the Golden Tower for one week during our trip to Italy. It is an outstanding hotel: the rooms are gorgeous, the staff is beyond helpful, the breakfast was excellent. The location of the hotel is convenient to all of the sites in Florence and walking distance to the train station for day trips. The staff was helpful when we attempted to learn our way around the city and with securing reservations at the popular sites (The Academy, The Uffii) I highly reccommend this hotel. Should I return to Florence, I would stay there. Its location on a quiet street, yet it is in the center of the city  -- an added plus. Stay at this hotel!

title: Florence Luxury
review: Upon arrival, we were given a room upgrade to their best and biggest suite (without asking). This was a HUGE suite with a massive living room that had a gorgeous arched cieling. The bedroom was also large, and the bathroom was fit for a king/queen. They gave us champagne and a fresh fruit platter. The spa is AMAZING. The breakfast was mediocre, but I did not care because I like to get up and get moving without being weighted down with a huge buffet. The lobby and breakfast room are absolutely gorgeous. There is a very nice business "center". The location is just adjacent to Strozzi Palace, whish is immediately next to both Piazza Republica and the famous shopping avenue, Via Tournabuoni. There is a great "bar" accross the street with everything from Gelato to champagne. The…

title: Amazing Hotel small and friendly very Luxurious
review: Dear HighOnTraining, we thank you you very much for your review. We have been so excited hearing you have spent wonderful time with us. Regarding the Breakfast, as you may have noticed, unfortunately we do not have so much space to exhibit even if on the buffet you can find fresh and high quality products. We really hope to welcoming you back in the very near future, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Nice Room, Uneven Service
review: We stayed in this Hotel from 24 - 27th May for my Husbands 40th Birthday. The service was impecable, the staff were very friendly at all times. the room was great. breakfast was also lovely, so much choice. The hotel is situated in the centre of the city and everything is close by. I would highly recommend this Hotel as well as the resturant La Posta which is very close by. we had a wonderful meal there.

title: Awesome Experience
review: Dear Orla F, We thank you very much for your review. We are more than happy when we succeed in satisfy the expectations of our Guests. Thanks a lot and really looking forward to welcoming back!! All our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Very good but pricey
review: The difference between a 3-star and a 4 or 5-star hotel is how the management responds to complaints. Mr. Pellegrino responds with guns drawn, although I must admit that he did apologize by sending my husband and I a fruit basket, this after he realized we were not trying to get our bill reduced. The sink stoppers do not stay closed because the hotel does not want anybody washing out their clothes; the laundry charges 6 euros for one pair of undies and about $25 U.S. to iron a dress. I know this because my request for an iron was met with the response that it is not allowed in Italy, which is untrue.   Our room was adequate for two people and had comfortable pillows and mattress, but when we turned down the bed, we realized the quilt was not clean. Any 5-star hotel would have…

title: Decent 3 star hotel
review: While this hotel may technically have the facilities for a 5 star rating, in actuality this is a 3 star plus hotel.  There is no lobby, no doorman, the restaurant and bar are not staffed and literally never open, except that a very nice buffet breakfast is served in that space.  We were made to wait until the clock struck 3, the official check-in time, despite the fact that the room was ready earlier.  Fine, but not 5 star service.  In fact, the only service at the hotel is provided by the surly clerks at the front desk, who seem put out by the simplest request.  Both evenings of our stay we returned to the hotel after dinner and nobody was minding the store at all.  We were told that no laundry service was available during our two night stay because of a holiday.  When I…

title: Good Hotel - Disappointing Breakfast
review: Dear Kft421, thank you so much for your review! Actually we are surprised about some of your considerations:  about our staff ( surly ) just because we have informed you that our check in is at 3 pm?;  about our Bar and Restaurant ( not staffed ) maybe if you weren't able to see our staff they were busy doing something else...it is impossible to manage a hotel without Staff;  about check in time,  in our hotel is at 3 pm obviously we have to consider our check out time for all guests but normally if we are able to grant it in advance we do that;  about the maintenance of the room at night, our housekeeper found out the information DO NOT DISTURB sign;   about your taxi delay,  we can be sorry but we are not guilty about a taxi driver delay. About laundry service, our hotel ( as a 99% of the hotels in Italy ) uses an external laundry service and during holiday days it is closed. Anyhow,  we tried our best to satisfy your request and we found out a solution, as we always do,  it is our philosophy...it is not magic  Your review will be for sure a cause  for reflection, because we believe in our job and above all because we weren't able to satisafy your expectiations. antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Stay !!!
review: This was a good property let down by a disappointing breakfast offering.  The rooms are nice, modern, and have all of the amenities that you would like and expect.  Having a coffee-tea capability was nice.  The location is central to all of the main sights in Florence.  The spa is a nice touch after a day of sightseeing.  It pales in comparison to the facility at properties such as the Nun Relais in Siena.  Breakfast - disappointing.  We had much better selections at smaller properties throughout Italy.  The cut fruits never changed - pineapple, melon, and strawberries.  A limited selection of pastries.  The croissants were sad.  Breads - virtually non-existent.  Meats - usually one salami and ham - no proscuitto.  No olives.  They have a pan with scrambled eggs and some very…

title: Great, great place to stay!
review: As previous reviewers said. This is a great place to stay !!!!  Great Service, Great Location... An Absolute joy. You can't go wrong here.

title: Already looking forward to returning
review: We stayed three nights at the Golden Tower and absolutely loved this hotel. It's conveniently located to everything in Florence; we had no problems finding anything from the hotel. Our room was wonderful; very spacious and the jacuzzi bathtub/shower was out of this world. We selected a deluxe room and was upgraded to a unique room in that the bedroom was down a few steps with the closet and bathroom on the main level. We quite enjoyed the uniqueness of the room and felt like we were in our on little apartment. The staff was very friendly and helpful and always welcomed us back when we returned from our excursions. The breakfast was very good and offered an excellent assortment. This was probably the best hotel on our entire trip through Italy. We will be definitely returning to…

title: What a Start to Our Italian Honeymoon!
review: This place was extraordinary!!  We arrived and were greeted very pleasantly.  They showed us to our room, where we learned that we had been upgraded for free to a two-story suite! (They knew we were honeymooners - I presume that was the reason.)  When we returned from our first dinner, we found, awaiting on our bed, a free bottle of champagne, biscotti and a nice note from the hotel.  Top notch!  The location was amazing, the staff was incredibly friendly and treated us like royalty, and the breakfast included in the room was top-notch and a perfect way to start the day.  I can't imagine a better start to our honeymoon, or better hotel to stay at in Florence.  This place was superb in all regards.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear AttyJoe75, we thank you so much and are more than happy reading your review and above all, for have been able to render your stay so pleasant. We really look forward to welcoming you back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, and meanwhile we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Culture and Relaxing
review: Great hotel in the historic center of Florence. Perfect location, only 5-10 minutes walk to the main tourist attractions. The Hotel staff was very kind, helpful and service minded. The hotel was really clean and had free WiFi, great breakfast and a very nice little SPA with jacuzzi, waterfall, steam sauna, and more. The only minus was that they had really hard beds, at least in our room. I really recommend this 5 star hotel ;-)

title: ......a truly great place to stay in the centre of Florence....
review: Dear Musirull, thank you very much for your review. We are more than happy your stay with us was wonderful with exception of the beds which, to be very honest, have surprised us, beacusem most of the Guests appreciate them and we are so sorry for this inconvenience. Anyway, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Golden Tower & Spa and meanwhile we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: This lovely hotel is in the heart of the old city of Florence. It is small with a nice style. It's the perfect hotel for a city trip. Every culture hotspot is easy accessable by feed and the hotel offers a parking. The parking is as expensive as it is in every old city of Italy. In Florence you better by food than by car. After doing the whole day some sightseeing you can relax in the small but lovely spa of the hotel which is a great plus. The room was cozy with a comfortable double bed, bathroom had a lot of space, everything was clean, the mini bar was included  in the price and there was a little present on the table as we arrived. The breakfast is perfect and you'll find from fresh salmon to a variety of bred, fruits, cereals etc.  It is definitely an expensive hotel but…

title: Perfect
review: We stayed at this hotel for a week-end trip to Florence. It was my birthday present, so I didn't get to pick the place, but I was extremely happy about my bf's choice. The room wasn't huge, but perfectly adequate for our short stay, and it was very nicely appointed, clean and comfy. But above everything, location cannot be better! Service was excellent, breakfast very nice as well (not the best i've ever had, but honestly, given the price, it was perfect). Would definitely recommend!

title: A magnificent hotel with wonderful service and excellent location
review: Dear DKB_France, thank you very much for your positive comment. We are very happy to hear your stay with us was excellent. As for the breakfast, unfortunately what penalize us is the lack of space for our buffet, even if there is various selection of fresh and high quality food. Thanking you again and looking forward to welcome back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, we remain, with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: SPETACULAR LOCATION
review: Thank you for the wonderful stay and accommodations.   We had a lovely time in your outstanding hotel.  A special and big thank you to Angela and Marco for helping us solve a problem due to our flights being cancelled.  We owe both of these quality employees a debt of gratitude.  When we return to Florence, the only place we will stay at is The Golden Tower!  We will recommend you highly to anyone we know that is traveling to Florence!  With appreciation,  Joe

title: You'll get exactly what you see (on the homepage)
review: Dear Joseph S, many thanks for your kind and warm words. This is exactly what I ask to my staff:  kindnees, smiling, solving every kind of problem to our Guests. It seems to be taken for granted, but doing it with passion , make the difference! Thnak you again for recommend us to everyone, we appreciate it. Of Course, we look forward to welcoming you back, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: was the best ever
review: This is a total renewed hotel, with a excellent location, you can walk trought the historical center and all the stores that you whant are there....I recomend

title: Great Everything!
review: Great location, great breakfast and great room.  Everything was to our satisfaction.  The beds were very comfortable with good linens,  the bathrooms were marble with waterfall shower heads and the breakfast included, scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon besides chocolate cake, spinach quiche, along with crossiants, plain and flavored, three or four different kinds of fresh fruit, fresh juices and your made to order coffee or cappuchino.  The location was great, as you could walk out of the front door and "be there" but you were not on such a busy street that it was wall to wall crowds.  All the sites were within a very short walking distance.  The staff was most helpful, polite and informative!  Would definitely recommend staying there! Perfect in everyway.

title: Fantastic location in this lovely boutique hotel
review: Dear sulu0_6, many many thanks for your "GREAT" review. We are very proud of our job and comment like yours make us feel very happy. Thanks a lot and hope to welcome back in the very next future, best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: great location, friendly staff, comfy rooms
review: Beautiful boutique hotel.  The room was a decent size, the bathroom was large, the shower was powerful.  The complimentary breakfast was great, a good selection of hot and cold food.  The beds were also comfortable.    Our room overlooked an indoor courtyard, so not great for a view.    The spa area contains a large sauna, large steam room and a large jacuzzi.  The jacuzzi could have been hotter.  It was possible to have massages in the massage rooms just off the spa area.    The hotel could not have been in a better location.  Just moments from the shopping area and hte river.  The bar was lovely but did not have much atmosphere, better to head over the road for a pre-dinner drink.    I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: still excellent
review: Dear TravelBug47648, We thank you very much for your positive review and suggestions. As for the Bar, I think  it is because the Hotel  location, that is, Guests prefers to have drink in Piazza Strozzi or Piazza della Repubblica instead of have in our Bar, which is "empty" all the time! Thank you also for recommend us to all your friends and hope to welcome back in the next future, we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fabulous and great location
review: My teen-aged daughters and I spent four days in Florence.  The Golden Tower was a fabulous central location - walkable to EVERYTHING.  The breakfast was nice, the rooms were comfortable but what made the hotel special is the excellent staff - from the desk staff to the restaurant, they were charming, courteous and professional.

title: Great location and staff-highly recommended
review: This was my second stay at the Golden Tower, and this time I stayed much longer- five nights rather than two.  The location was great- very central to everything, and right next to the Palazzo Strozzi, which is having a great show of Sargent and his circle, which was the reason we were in Florence- (we loaned some paintings to the show, so being next door was ideal-the show is fantastic, and really a great reason to visit Florence in the next eight weeks!). Pros to the Golden Tower: Location, great staff, breakfast, quiet rooms and great sleep. Cons: no gym, which would be fine for 2 nights, but if you are staying longer would be nice-especially since they advertise a Spa.  The spa is not really a spa by American standards- a nice whirlpool, very lukewarm-not hot enough to…

title: great hotel in a central location
review: Dear tripali, double thanks, for coming back and for the review. We use to say in italy, there no 2 without 3, so we hope to welcoming back for the third time. As I am sure you can imagine, in Italy, and expecially in Florence, a medieval town, the spaces have another dimension different than in USA, so does for Golden Tower Hotel. We are the only one  with, even if  little, a Spa inside it and with, even if little, a beauty center, able to do various body and face treatments. As for cost, this one is included booking a deluxe room , or Junior Suite, or Suite. We look forward to welcoming back again and meanwhile, we remain with our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Excellent hotel
review: We stayed here for 3 nights in early Oct 2011. The location was wonderful, easy to walk to all sights and restaurants. The room was also very nice, with a great bathroom. The only complaint was the view from our window was not ideal, as there was construction going on at the building across the street. But that may be gone by now.  Overall a wonderful location and if we ever return to Florence we would stay here.

title: Great Experience
review: Dear chicago12chicago_IL, first of all thank you for remembered to leave the review and for your recommendations. We, of course, would be very glad to welcoming you back. Secondly, concerning the refurbishing work of the building in front of us, unfortunately the did not stop yet, even they make progress and there is no more scaffolding on it. Hope to see you again, we remain with  all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great Pick
review: Our first trip to Florence and this hotel fully met our expectations.  It was exactly as described, luxury boutique hotel in very central location, a few doors from Palacio Strozzi.   Bedroom excellent, very good breakfast and staff couldn't have been more helpful and welcoming. Strongly recommended.

title: Eccellente!
review: We recently returned from Golden Tower Hotel in Florence which was recommended to us by friends.   Overall the hotel was perfect for us, with a great central location and excellent standard of accomodation. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful and made us feel welcome. This included the reception team, porter, and the girls at breakfast.  We highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting this beautiful city.

title: perfect !
review: Dear MrMrsCKY, thank you very much for your review and for your recommendation. We look forward to welcoming back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Outstanding hotel, oustanding service
review: what to say, it's not that often you end up in a place where you find everything great. By that, i mean beautiful rooms (at least ours was), peace and quiet, kindness of the staff and proximity to the center of town. More than anything, i enjoyed the discretion and the professionalism of the staff. We wanted to treat ourselves and it was a success. Thanks to the Golden Tower team. My weekend was great and i wish there were a lot more hotels like yours. I'll definitely come back if i get a chance.

title: A wonderful hotel
review: Dear Mayan1371, We thank you very much and of course are more than happy  to hear you r stay with us was excellent and even we hope you will have another chance to come back. all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Great, Fabulous, Outstanding service...
review: We have just returned from 3 nights stay at this hotel, I can't recommend it enough. The service was fantastic, friendly and very attentive, we were thoroughly spoilt by Polly every breakfast service, a true asset to the hotel.  The spa was clean and very relaxing, however be prepared for no ruling on clothes being required!!!! If you are looking for a relaxing time in a 5 star hotel this is the place to go, fantastic location.  Thank you to all the staff, we hope to see you soon. Nicola and Kris

title: Good Size Room at Fabulous Location... oh.. and great services too!
review: We spent 3 nights here with my parents. We stayed at deluxe rooms with complimentary drinks in mini bar which are very cosy.  The first impression of the hotel is great location (right next to everything central) and clean and tidy decoration.   Most impressed me is the "Go-Beyond" services by all the reception staffs - Gorgeous Yanni , fabulous Marco, beautiful and informative Elsa, they all made our stay like home while away.. happy to provide us literally whatever we need from all the information and recommendations around the city and organizing all the transportations.  Tips: it's about 50 euros for a 7 seater airport transfer and about 250 euros for a day trip to all the Fashion Outlets close by.   Next Time, I will definitely go again in summer and stay at their Tower…

title: Pretty cool hotel with EXCEPTIONAL Location
review: Dear RolandChu, we are more than happy when we read reviews like yours beacuse it means we have achieved the goal which is the satisfaction of our Guests!! Thank you so much and hope to welcoming back again in the very near future, antonio pellegrino - general manager

title: Fabulous Florence
review: Really like the hotel location. For Florence you can't go wrong! you literally walk out your door and are lost in time.  Thought about staying at St. Regis, Helvetia, etc....and glad  i stayed here!  The hotel has something that i have never seen before - and i stay in hotels about 60-80 nights a year....satellite tv with automatic language conversion. This is AWESOME! and one of a kind in Italy. Kudos to the staff for delivering this!  I will say the construction noise early in the morning was pretty loud. Once that is finished I'm sure everything will return to normal  Pros - location, great breakfast, nice staff, deluxe rooms with free drinks/snacks cons - really couldnt find any fault with the hotel except some construction noise.  Super easy to WALK from Train Station and…

title: Treated for 4 days with no resprect  by a waitress staff
review: Dear S1Alex, We thank you very much for your wondferful review . We are so proud of our job, expecially when it is paid off with comment like yours. As for the noise coming from the building in front of our hotel, even we cannot wait to see the end.  Fortunately, the noise is not costantly!! We really hope to welcoming back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and in the meantime we remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: BE REALLY KIND AND DO NOT GIVE ROOMS IN THE CORNER.
review: We have just stayed 3 nights in this lovely hotel.  All the staff were delightful, especially those on reception who made us feel very welcome.  The hotel is very quiet and in a great position for seeing most of the sights (but in Florence everything is walkable).  The room was good and the bed was very comfortable.  After all the walking it was great to have a soak in the tiny pool and use the sauna at the end of the day.  My only small gripe was instant coffee in the rooms, I would expect better in a 5 star hotel.  A great place to stay.

title: Fantastic vacation!
review: Wonderful hotel, excellent staff. Our trip to Florence was probably my favorite trip ever.  The staff made perfect recommendations for restaurants, bars, and sites.  Great location for touring Florence.

title: Beautiful hotel, location and service
review: Dear Krista G, Thank you very much for your wonderful review, we are so happy to know your stay with us was so pleasant and enjoyable. We really hope to welcome back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Location !
review: We ended up staying a few more nights than intended as we loved it so much. The location was perfect, with shops and restaurants right there. Parking was a slight inconvenience but the valet eased that.

title: Excellent Newer Five Star Hotel - Central Firenze
review: Dear mycaptainchris, we thank  you very much for your review and we are so happy to hear that your stay with us was wonderful.
