As for the parking, as we are located in the heart of a medieval town like Florence, to be sincere, it is not easy to reach but once you did it, our amazing location will compensate the difficulties you had with the car. We hope to welcoming back to the Golden Tower Hotel & Spa and remain with all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Happy, positive staff, great location
review: We stayed 4 nights in this hotel nestled in a quiet street just a few hundred feet from everything in Florence. The rooms are big, internet is included, and the spa is great for a relaxing time after so much walking and museuming. Concierge was also very helpful for recommendations - great hotel all around !

title: Excelente Hotel
review: Ubicado a pasos de lo mejor de la ciudad, el personal muy ateno, las habitaciones son excelente, super limpias y muy lujosas, lo mas complicado fue llegar hasta el hotel con el carro ya que la vias las mayoria estan cerradas, luego de esto no utilizamos el carro mas porque puedes llegar a todos los lugares caminando lo unico es que es un poco costoso. te incluyen entrada al spa, y el desayuno esta inlcluido al igual que el WIFI

title: Great hotel
review: Estimado Señor Adauria,  Le agradecemos mucho por su comentario y somos felices que todo ha sido de su agradecimiento. Como usted confirma el Golden Tower Hotel se encuentra en el centro de Florencia, ciudad Medioeval, y todas las actracciones turisticas alrededor no permiten llegar con el carro con facilidad. Todo el personal espera darLe la Bienvenida una vez màs muy temprano. Saludos Cordiales. Antonio Pellegrino - director

title: Great hotel! In a Great location!
review: The hotel is great, luxurious and beatiful and it's location is just perfect. The room was very nice and the bathroom was spacious . The staff was friendly and willing to satisfy all our needs, i really enjoyed staying there. Looking forward to the moment i will go there again.

title: Location
review: Dear VeselkaI, We thank you very much for your review. We are more than happy your stay at Golden Tower have been faboulos and really looking forward to welcoming back. All our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Great, central hotel
review: This is a small boutique hotel that is located in a great location. We were within walking distance of all the major sites which was wonderful. The hotel was very clean and a wonderful staff. The room was great and very quiet! We would stay there again!

title: Fabulous hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Thanks to Trip Advisor reviews, we chose this hotel for our first trip to Florence, and we could not have made a better selection.  Beautiful, comfortable, large rooms and bathrooms.  Fabulous staff.  Great buffet breakfast.  Short walk to all major sites.  Can't wait to stay here again!

title: You won't find better!
review: Dear RTTejas, Thank you for your review and thanks to it, as you said, you will help other Guest to decide booking our hotel.  This is the proof what our Guests write is absolutely the truth! Thanks again for your comment and look forward to welcoming you back to the Golden Tower, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Terrific Boutique Hotel
review: My wife and I stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel for 4 nights.  From the moment of our arrival to the moment of departure, the stay was perfection.  We stayed in one of the junior suites which was exquisitely decorated, immaculate, and had a private indoor/outdoor jacuzzi and outdoor balcony with lounge chair.  By European standards, the room was quite large.  Breakfast each day was pleasant and of above average quality.  The location of the hotel cannot be beat, very close to the Arno, the Uffizi, and the "5th Avenue of Florence."  The spa was a welcome treat at the end of busy day, very clean and very relaxing.  I cannot say enough great things about this hotel.  We will definitely stay again if our travels take us to Florence.

title: Best of the best....
review: Dear Glen S, We thank you very  much for your comment. We are more than happy hearing you and your wife have had a "wonderful stay" with us. This is the only think we take care about, our Guest, their stay in Florence, their stay with us , which we try  to render more plesant possible. As for the description, you cannot do better than this:  Room: You stayed in one of our beautiful room, a Junior Suite with Jacuzzi inside. Location: we are very very centrally located. SPA: it is our jewel Breakfast: Even if we do not have such space, on the buffet you find fresh and high quality product. Thank you  again and hope to welcome back in the very near future, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Amazingly clean and modern.
review: The Golden Tower is a wonderful small hotel in a terrific location.  It is only about a 5 minute walk to the Duomo and the Ponte Vecchio and close to many restaurants and upscale shopping, but the hotel is on a very private and upscale street.  It has only been open for 2 years and the rooms are luxurious and modern.  The staff was wonderful from the front desk who were very helpful with suggestions and reservations, the waitstaff at breakfast, and the manager.  All were very professional and friendly and eager to please.  The room (we had a deluxe) was excellent, with plenty of room, a modern bathroom, wireless internet, and complimentary beverages.  There are better known hotels in Florence but i doubt they are better than the Golden Tower.

title: Great experience.
review: My wife and I stayed eight nights, checking out October 8, 2011.  We had a great stay.  The room was spacious and well appointed with an all-important comfortable bed and powerful shower.  The common areas were inviting.  The breakfast (included) was bountiful and delicious.  The staff was at once professional and approachable.  They attended expeditiously to our every request.  Moreover, their recommendations were spot on.  The location is ideal, just down from the Palazzo Stozzi.  I recommend it without qualification.

title: Excelent hotel
review: Dear Tar23tuffe, Thank you very much for your positive review. We are more than happy hearing that your LONG STAY with us was a GREAT EXPERIENCE!!!. All of us believe in our Job and we try to do it the best possible to satisfy our Guest's needs. Thanks again!! Best Regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Great amenities in a terrific location
review: We have been for 5 days in Florence, hotel Golden Tulip. It was a wonderfull experience, the wright value for money for a 5 stars hotels, the room was big, very nice and very clean. (and we choose the classic room). For sure, we are planning to return to Florence as is one of the most amazing cities in Italy and we will stay at Golden Tulip again! Great location , amazing restaurants around it, we enjoy every moment of our staying!

title: Hotel Golden Tower Florence
review: Dear Rodica P, thank you for your review!! We are very happy your stay in Florence and at Golden Tower Hotel has been "wonderful experience". We add,  it has to be repeated !!! So, we look forward to welcoming back to our hotel...... all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager  P.S. The exact name is Golden Tower not Golden Tulip..... ;-)

title: never again!
review: My son and I spent 5 nights here and loved the experience.  The location is excellent-like being in the center of Rodeo Drive.  Every high end store you could dream of shopping at is within a couple of minutes of the hotel.  The highlights of a trip to Firenze, like the Duomo, the Uffizi, the Pitti Palace, and the Ponte Vecchio are all within easy walking distance.  The hotel is beautiful with large, modern rooms and great bathrooms.  The beds are very comfortable.  The breakfast is excellent with tons of selections including eggs, bacon, fruits, breads, even desserts.  The service is terrific.  The front desk is super helpful and were able to get us into our room many hours before check in time and for the few minutes we did wait they were offering us breakfast.  The staff in…

title: A gem in Florence
review: We stayed in Florence for 6 nights in August 2011.  The Golden Tower is in a great location with very easy access to all the main sights of the city and only a short walk from the railway and bus station.  The front of house staff all spoke perfect English and the hotel as clean as any we have stayed in. The continental breakfast was first class and staff extremely courteous and helpful.  We would definately return to the Golden Tower if we ever went back to Florence.  Top tip 1. The roof garden-bar at the Hotel Continental, which is open to the public (on the Florence side, next to the Ponte Vecchio) is well worth a visit, particularly at night.  This overlooks the city and is simply a lovely outside location in which to enjoy a glass of wine.  Top tip 2  when travelling on the…

title: Strongly recommended
review: Dear QueenSandarina, We thank you so much for your comment.  We try every day and with every guest to render more pleasant  possible his stay with us and sometimes we succeed..... ;-) We really hope to welcome back. All our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Great stay and would highly recommend it!
review: We're a Spanish family and we've been in Florence for four nights.   The location is excellent, the facilities are very good and all of them are accessible for disabled except for the spa (which could get better). The Junior Suite in which I've been with my brothers was a duplex very cosy and totally equipped, with one bathroom in each floor.  It is possible to ask for celiac diet and it is always varied. The staff is really nice. Another thing which could be improved is the quantity and variety of breakfast served in room but, without question, we strongly recommend Golden Tower Hotel to everyone.

title: Wonderful everything!
review: Dear mery_c5, Thank you very much for your comment. As you said, we always try to render the stay of our Guests more pleasant possible, meeting their needs in alla aspects! Hoping to welcome back soon, all our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Outstanding location, wonderful boutique hotel
review: My husband and I stayed at the Golden Tower Hotel last week for 3 nights with our two teenage sons.  Our check-in was lovely and speedy and our room was ready early.  It was a perfect location and we never took a taxi anywhere except to the train when we arrived and departed.  We had the family suite which I believe was called the Leonardo.  The rooms were elegant, chic and clean.  The bathrooms were very modern and the shower was amazing.  The AC worked and was soundless and the area was quiet at night.  The front desk recommended a few local places for dinner and they were all great.  The front desk staff was young and really nice and helpful.  The English lady who ran the breakfast was great.  She remembered how we took our coffee and brought it to us without us saying a…

title: We enjoyed our stay with Golden Tower!
review: Love the hotel location! This boutique hotel is situated in a quiet street but just 2 minutes away from the Duomo. (Florence is quite safe to walk around even at night so no need to worry if it is too quiet....)   All the designers stores are nearby if you would like to enjoy a shopping spree.....  Despite the hotel rooms have no view because it is situated in a small alley, the hotel interior is very new and the two rooms we've booked are decently clean.  Bed are comfortable with different choices of pillows, toilets are spacious with powerful shower, all toiletries are from "Etro".  The hotel provides Sky TV  so there are a number of English Channels for kids as well.  Breakfast is okay but I think they can do better with the choices as a five-star hotel.  Hotel staff are…

title: An amazing hotel in the heart of a beautiful city
review: My wife and I stayed at The Golden Tower Hotel this summer and did not know what to expect.  What we found was one of the most beautiful hotels we have stayed in Europe.  The rooms are spacious and very modern with many amenities.  Sara, Elisa, Yanni, and Angela were very helpful and friendly.  They really enjoy their work.  The hotel is tucked away in a nice, quiet area in the Piazza Strozzi.  You can walk anywhere from here.  The shops around the hotel are very charming.  We did not take advantage of the SPA...we will have to go back and do so!

title: What a great hotel!
review: We stayed here for 2 nights. The room was a nice size (if slightly on the small size but this didnt bother us). There is no view but this didnt bother us either. The beds were really comfortable and firm, room was dark, quiet and air con worked well - so we had great sleeps.   When we arrived we didnt realise that our room didnt include the access to the spa. We wanted to find out if we could upgrade our room to use the spa, and the lady at reception said there were no rooms available so she offered us free access ot the spa which was really great of her. So afte a hard days walking all over Italy the spa was welcome.   The reception, lounge, internet station, breakfast room and service were all fantastic. The location was also fantastic.  Will definitely stay here again.

title: Fantastic place
review: Dear tarryn222, thank you for your comment. We are very glad to know your stay with us has been Great!!! ... and as you said, we will wait for you your next visit. All our best, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Brilliant stay plus stupendous service including last-minute Uffizi tickets
review: beautiful hotel well situated in the middle of Florence. Staff very helpful and friendly. Spa facility superb. Will return to this hotel for sure.

title: The Most Incredible Hotel Stay
review: My husband & I stayed at The Golden Tower & had a fabulous experience.  We were treated like royalty.  Our time there has left an impression that I'll never forget.  The room was absolute perfection from the quality of the materials used in the construction of the hotel itself down to the quality of the linens & toiletries.  The staff was friendly & approachable, making our stay both relaxing & enjoyable.  I wouldn't have changed a thing- it was magical.

title: Wonderful Hotel Experience!  :)
review: Dear rachel80, We thank you so much for your positive comment and really hope to welcomeing you back to the Golden Tower. All our best regards, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Amazing Experience, Absolutely Wonderful, Excellent Service, Great Value
review: My husband chose this hotel for our 3 night honeymoon stay in Florence based on all of the wonderful reviews!  To begin, Yanni and Elisa from the front desk were so great!  They were warm, friendly, and helpful.  They gave great dinner recommendations and made reservations for us telling the restaurants it was our honeymoon.  The room was clean, beautiful, and romantic with the taste of Florence included in the furniture and style.  The large TV was a nice addition, along with the variety of tv channels and programs in various languages.  We loved the robes and slippers and welcome gifts!  The included mini bar was a huge treat.  It was so nice having water, juice, soda and beers available throughout the day to take with us during our tours of the city.  The included breakfast…

title: Perfect hotel in perfect location!
review: It has been a totally surprisingly wonderful experience with Golden Tower. My family and I stayed for 4 nights in Florence and we had absolutely great time at the hotel. My great experience started from the moment when I made the booking with great help from Mr Yanni and Ms Elisa. When we arrived, we found the hotel very new, clean, and with style (classy but modern). The room is very tidy and spacious (with big twin beds) and the bathroom is also very big and clean. We had the best breakfast (free of charge and with champagne and high quality food selection !) in the very nice restaurant with enjoyable environment. The minibar and the spa is also free which is great for value ! Location of hotel is excellent at the higher end (and quiet area) but within walking distance from…

title: Amazing hotel amazing location and amazing staff.
review: Dear VykChan, Thank you so much for your beautiful comment, it gives us a great pleasure because all of us really believe in our job and your words demostrate it. We wish you and all your family all our best, antonio pellegrino - manager

title: Amazing experience
review: This is an amazingly beautiful hotel in the heart of Florence. Hotel front, lobby and dining room are all beautiful, as was our room. The room was incredibly clean, the bed was amazing, shower was great. Nice amenities in the bathroom and complementary drinks from minibar. We used the spa for almost and hour and a half around 5-6pm, and were all alone. We felt like kings! When we came back after dinner in the evening, we found cookies and a lullaby on our bed. Breakfast was really good, continental style but with an obvious Italian touch. I'd recommended it to everyone!

title: Top class hotel in great location
review: Dear Markdrost, first of all, thank you very much for your comment.  We are so happy when our Guests enjoyed their visit in our beautiful City and contribute to this, make us feel very proud of our job.  Thank you and hope to welcome back,

title: Wonderful experience all around
review: There is no doubt that this is a 5 star hotel. The location is surrounded by top end boutiques. The hotel lobby is beautiful and the rooms are really well decorated and big. Free drinks from the mini-bar mean that you are not playing check-out roulette when you go to pay on departure. Not very cheqp but for what it is, it is worth every euro

title: Nice rooms
review: Dear davidj1970 , We thank you for your comment and sincerely hope to welcome you back to Florence, there are a lot of things to visit and of course you should stay with us!! Meanwhile, we remain with all our best regards,

title: Peaceful Luxury
review: Upon arriving we noticed the construction across the street and we're a bit worried and then when we were given a room directly across from it (and streets are narrow) we thought oh geez here we go, but frankly we didnt hear much at all and we were there four nights.  Work seemed to start later in the morning and the hotel windows were quite good that I can honestly say it never woke us up.  As well if one can say this about construction - it had a certain charm - century old buildings being renovated ...even that has a certain flare in Florence!   Onto the hotel itself -you can trust all the previous positive reviews -this is a wonderful hotel (and believe me I am picky! ..from staff to carpet stains).  The staff is all amazing - no question is too much and if they don't know…

title: Lovely hotel, fantastic location !
review: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights in July after doing a lot of research on the internet and reading many reviews.  The Golden Tower is exactly our sort of hotel, small and very friendly with excellent service.  Our lovely room looked out onto the street in front of the hotel and yet there was no noise at all, breakfast was superb with a great selection available.  The staff at the hotel were very helpful and Angela was particularly helpful with her excellent choices of restaurants and also booked them for us too (Quattro Leoni - cannot guarantee the spelling (!) was one of our favourites).  Would recommend to anyone and have to stress how superb the location is, central and walking distance of only minutes to every fabulous site Florence has to offer.

title: Absolutely fabulous!!
review: Dear MrandMrsY, we thank you very much for your words, these make us feel very proud of our job. Hoping to welcoming you again to the Golden Tower, all our best regards,

title: A good pick
review: We stayed at the Golden Tower in late May and it was fabulous.  I have been to Florence many times and by far this is the best boutique hotel I've encountered.  The rooms are beautiful and the staff amazing.  The breakfast was first class and we also found dinner in the restaurant excellent.  I usually don't like the food in hotels but the Golden Tower has a great chef.  The food was so good we ate dinner there 3 times.  I had the most amazing homemade pasta and the tiramisu was unbelievably good.   Also, the location is the best.  It's steps from the Duomo and the best shopping in town.  We walked everywhere with no need for taxis which was so convenient.   I'm hoping to go back next summer. Enjoy!

title: Beautiful decor, friendly staff
review: Dear lpstone, first of all,  we thank you for your comment and we are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We really look forward to seeing you in the very next future, all our best regards,

title: Great location with modern spotless rooms albeit slightly small
review: This hotel was conveniently located, clean, comfortable with welcoming and friendly staff. The rooms were larger than some hotels that I've stayed at in Europe.  They had a nice breakfast in the morning. They have a Turndown service and housekeepers did a nice job as well. I think that this hotel is probably one of the nicest in Florence...at least from the others that we saw from the streets.  We enjoyed our stay and I would recommend it to anyone staying in Florence.

title: Rude and Unintelligent Staff!
review: I payed 900 euro a night to be treated like a dumb tourist. The staff do not understand the services they offer. The staff do not understand how to work the television. The staff will make you feel like you are putting them out when you ask for/about anything! The hotel is beside a  construction site. You will hear workers shouting at each other and jack hammers in the morning! Their debit card machine broke and they didn't care that I had to run around town looking for ATM's that will allow me to take out a huge amount of cash. When I voiced my disappointment....one of the females laughed at me. Don't stay here!

title: Truely Great Hotel
review: Dear Suhvive, Thank you for your comment on Tripadvisor, it allows us to explain.On Booking.com, where you leave the same comment, is not possible. We are very sorry for your unhappiness about our hotel. I think there was a big misunderstanding about your check-out, the staff (two girls) were trying to minimize your embarassement  when your credit card did not work out after several times, NOT our machine which worked very well. In fact, you went to Cash-Machine in order to pay the bill. That's it.  Our "debit-machine" are completely automatique, they work in the same way worldwide. As for the construction, it refers to an ancient building in front of ours, which is subject to a big refurbishment work. Of Course, we cannot avoid it. It is not our Building, they are not our workers!!

title: Great Hotel but service let it down!
review: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights and Florence and thoroughly enjoyed our visit.  The hotel is just off the thoroughfare enough that it's quiet and not crowded, but still very close to walk to all the major sights in Florence.  The hotel was very clean and the rooms were modern and basically like a typical North American hotel.  The staff were extrememly friendly and helpful to us during our stay, recommending places for dinner and answering our various questions.  The complimentatry breakfast was probably the best we had in two weeks in Italy, and we were impressed by the options we had available to us.  In general I cannot say anything negative about this hotel- and would highly recommend it for your stay in Florence.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear jaj_jen, Many thanks for your comments. We are so happy  to have been able to render your stay so plesant and really look forward to see you in the very next future. All our best regards,

title: Very nice but very expensive.
review: To be honest, we had a great time at this hotel - it's central, clean and very comfortable - cant really fault it. However we flew into Pisa and organised the hotel to meet us at the airport  in what we were told was a 'luxury car'. It in fact turned out to be an old mini-bus with no suspension and driven very fast and dangerously. My wife was upset and sick. When we explained this to the hotel reception staff they said "it was nothing to do with them and we had to pay the full amount". Even though the hotel advertises it as a service on the website and it is booked directly with the hotel they took absolutely no responsibility. Very bad indeed for what is otherwise a 5* hotel. It spoiled what was a great holiday !

title: Great hotel in a great location
review: The Golden Tower is a fantastic hotel near all the sights in Florence. It is within walking distance of the train station as well as the Uffizi, Academia, Duomo etc. We walked all over Florence without any issues.  The service was equally great and the front desk set us up with tours of the major sights as well as fantastic restaurant recommendations.   The hotel itself is absolutely lovely!

title: Unforgettable Stay
review: Our Guests are lovely...... thank you so much for your comment. We try to do our best to satisfy our Guest's needs. Hope to welcome  you back to Golden Tower, all our best regards,

title: can't wait to come back
review: I let my agency to arrange the 9 days Italy trip for me.  For Florence, she chose Golden Tower.  It is proven that she is right.  We come here 4 persons for 3 nights. We live in presidential suite which is really nice to stay for my valuable vacation after hard and stressful work.  Breakfast is also better than the last 2 hotels.  The location, I can say, is the best in Florence.  Attraction and shopping are just few steps away.  The reception front desk, Yanni and Elisa, are so helpful with their willingness to serve the customers, explaining Florence, booking for gallerias and restaurant, guiding for shopping.  One lasting, free wifi internet in the room.  In conclusion, thanks for Temmy, Viva Alar cart, of arranging the wonderful stay in Firanze.  : )

title: A hidden gem
review: This was our first trip to Italy and we can highly recommend this hotel! Everything was perfect, staff, hotel, spa, food and location. Please take advantage of a massage if you get chance, it was amazing.  We hope to be back soon!!

title: we loved it and would love togo back
review: ..... and we can't wait to welcoming back again!!! Hope to see you very soon. Thank you so much. All our best regards,

title: We don't have enough superlatives.
review: The finest hotel we have ever stayed in. It was faultless - there is simply nothing that you could say could be better.  Whatever you asked the staff was "No problem". The breakfast was exquisite - in looks and taste! The rooms were very plush, the beds were extremely comfortable and the bathrooms were palatial.  Location is brilliant; Florence generally is chic and smart and this is located in the sleekest part!  We would recommend this to anyone.  We would go again at the drop of a hat -  if we had the chance!  We don't have enough superlatives.

title: Beautiful hotel, perfect location!
review: ...... and we do not have so much words to thank you. We are really happy to have been able to satisfy the expectations of our Guests. We enjoy our Job. Than you again and look forward to welcoming back to Golden Tower.

title: The Best of the Best among the Best within 25 years of traveling
review: The location of this hotel is just perfect.  If you enjoy staying in the center of the city without the traffic and noise, than this is the hotel for you.  It is tucked in a small and very quiet piazza just steps away from the major attractions and shoppes.  The staff is exceptionally friendly and helpful, breakfast is delicious and just around the corner is a fantastic Italian restaurant, serving traditional fresh Tuscan food.  The rooms a beautiful with a comfortable charm and another plus is that you can open the windows.  I will definitely book a room at this hotel on my next trip to Florence.

title: A gem of a hotel...
review: Brand new hotel in the hundreds years old magnificent building conveniently located in the center of florence right near the river close to Ponte Vechio bridge with state-of-the art bathroom, lights, TV, etc. The best attitude of the staff which is very very proactive and extremely helpful.

title: Great Hotel.  A Gem.  Will stay there again!
review: You are very kind and make us feel very proud of our job. Thank you very much and hopefully welcome you back very soon

title: Best hotel we have stayed in Italy
review: The hotel staff from the outset were incredible polite, helpful and friendly. This extended to all the staff, bar, restaurant/breakfast staff and the housekeeper who all could not do enough to ensure your needs were met.  The bedroom and bathroom was very spacious and extremely clean. Breakfast which was excellent. There was a good variety and everything was fresh, tasty and regularly replenished.  The entire hotel was very clean and well maintained and it was a pleasure to be there. The hotel is centrally located to reach all the historic sites but in addition to this within a short walking distance there were 3 excellent restaurants and a couple of really nice bars. Due to being within a pedestrianised area the hotel is very quiet.

title: Beautiful hotel in great location
review: We really hope to welcome you back to the Golden Tower Hotel. Thank you so much!!

title: A REAL GEM!!!
review: Very comfortable beds!!! Beautiful marble bathroom, but the lighting was not good!! And there was no full length mirror anywhere.  We had an interior room so it was very quiet.  Breakfast was good, but if you want a latte, make sure you say cafe latte, or you'll get regular brewed coffee  with milk.  Cannot comment on the spa, which was closed when we were there. There is free wifi, but the signal strength was really too weak to work in our room, so one finds oneself down in the lobby, having to log on to the network each time with a password.

title: Excellent hotel, efficient and very helpful staff
review: We've stayed here for 3 nights while vacationing around Europe (UK, Spain, France, Italy). This was by far the most relaxing and comfortable experience we've had having stayed in Sofitel Grand and other 5 star hotel on our way. From the friendly reception to the valet parking and very unique SPA downstairs this property is a real gem. They say location is everything and yes, it really is in this case. Thank you and all the best! KR

title: Second time this year
review: A second stay at this very, very centrally located hotel. It isn't cheap - but it is extraordinarily comfortable and very well situated for galleries, tourism and shopping. As noted in the headline the staff are very helpful and welcoming - which makes the place even more charming.  Breakfast was good - didn't eat in in the evening - nor did I use the spa.  No hesitation whatsoever in recommending the place - I will use it again later in the year.

title: Beautiful hotel in a perfect location
review: My sister and I took my mother on a surprise mini-break to Florence for her 70th birthday in May and we chose this hotel as we were looking for something small, luxurious with on-site spa facilities.  The hotel lived up to our expectations with great service, facitilies and food.  The spa is great (and most welcome after a day walking around Florence) and the service was top notch.  We would definitely recommend this hotel for a stay in Florence.

title: Luxury this is not!
review: Sayed here 1 night after a meeting. The room was small and basic, even though I had paid extra for luxury. The night reception was miserable... And huffed whenever I asked for anything... Like a travel adaptor, wifi login etc. During the night there was a smoke alarm with a strobe light that flashed all night and the aircon does not turn off. To cap it all, on leaving the automatic doors of the hotel closed on me and gashed my head! Cheaply done up... Not good, don't bother

title: Wonderful experience in all aspects.
review: Very good location. Excellent service and very helpful staff.

title: A bit disappointing
review: We were slightly disappointed with the golden tower. Yes it is cool as boutique hotels often are but it lacked that something. Firstly we were given a twin room which we did not ask for (40 something married couple), the complimentary mini bar was a con, two beers and that was about it, and these were only replaced in the morning. We asked whether they could replenish the bar while we were at dinner but nothing happened. Air conditioning did not work and the wifi was more hassle than it was worth. However location is fantastic, 5 min walk to the sights. Would not stay here again as I am sure there are better hotels for the money

title: Friendly, comfortable, convenient, quiet!
review: Thanks to you and your wonderful staff, we had an exceedingly wonderful stay at the Golden Tower. Very accommodating, eager to assist with dinner reservations, maps, locations, travel plans; in short fully capable and friendly services.   In fact one of our many traveling friends, will be booking with you, based on our high praise.  Many thanks for the wonderful memories and experience.

title: Great find in Florence
review: We stayed here for 4 nights and found the hotel to be excellent.  Its well located with a 10 minute walk from the train station and in a good area. Plenty of good restaurants nearby. About 10 mins walk to the Pont Vecchio and on the way a great leather market.  We stayed in a deluxe room which was beautiful.  Free mini bar and internet was great.  Staff were very friendly.  This is a very nice boutique hotel, small but with everything you need.  Breakfast was also terrific.  Only negative was that the room airconditioner was a little noisy.  We would definitely stay here again and have no hesitation in recommending this hotel. One of the best we have stayed in.

title: Wonderful Hotel in a perfect location!
review: This was our favorite hotel of the four we visited in Italy.  The beds were very comfortable, as well as the sofa in our room.  The bathroom was spotless and nice.  It's in a great neighborhood, down the street from good restaurants, designer shops, and the Palazzo Strozzi, which had a fabulous Bronzino exhibit.  We walked to all of the sights and were just around the corner from the Santa Trinita and Ponte Vecchio bridges.  Best of all, the staff in the reception area was warm, friendly, and always willing to help with suggestions, directions, reservations, etc., especially Alessandro, who couldn't do enough for us.  When we checked in, he found a driver to take us to Siena, San Gimignano, and Chianti the next morning!  He was gracious and helpful and made it a very pleasant…

title: A good place to stay
review: The hotel is small and cosy. It is located in a quiet place, near the center, within walking distance of all the attractions. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and elegant. The best place for us on our "away from the kids" extended week - end.  The breakfast was ok. Could do better.  On Sunday morning the small restaurant was crowded and the staff appeared to be a little out of rithm. Room service may be improved. The menu for room service was not  fully available when we tried to order :three out of four dishes were missing.Something to do with a "new menu"not yet in place.  Nevertheless, all in all it was  a pleasant experience. Did not use the spa. We'll try it next time.

title: A delightful, perfectly located gem of a hotel
review: Everything about my stay was perfect.  The greeting at the front desk, the helpfulness of staff, the comfort of my room, the lovely buffet breakfast.  However, the most important part if the location!   It is a 2-5 minute walk from almost everything.  Piazza Strozzi is the center of fine shopping and literally a two minute walk from Ponte Santa Trinita which will give you a wonderful photography opportunity of the Ponte Vecchio.   The people at the front desk could not do enough for you.     I had a wonderful room (Room 407-see pictures) which is two levels  and has an original painted ceiling and makes you feel that you are sleeping in a room from in another century (with the exception of the massive bathroom with Jacuzzi :)   The only down side of that room is, after you…

title: Good location but very average hotel
review: Considering the mainly positive reviews on Tripadvisor, this hotel did not meet our expectations.  Our deluxe room was very small, the bathroom was badly designed (only one small hook to hang your bathrobes, no shelves, the door opens straight against the toilet so that you always had to lock the door). The breakfast had the smallest selection and the least fresh produce we ever came across in a 5 star hotel. The actual breakfast area is small and crammed, only one stressed waitress was looking after all the guests (took their coffee orders, made the coffee freshly and bring it to the tables, re-filled the buffet).   The quality of service we received was mixed. Although we were welcomed friendly, once we had a complaint (our aircondition did not work) we felt more like a…

title: Great hotel - agree with other reviews
review: This is a great hotel in an ideal location.  Florence is actually quite small and you can easily get around the centre on foot.  We had one of the smaller rooms which I see others have said is small for a 5 star.  It is small but very luxurious - the bathroom is great, normal size with a brilliant shower.  I didn't take any shampoo/conditioner and used the hotels - hair was fine with it - so obviously decent quality.  The hotel was very quiet - we slept well.  The spa is small but very good.  Two small minor niggles - the staff in the spa were a bit stern and the maid kept playing games with us - e.g. we ordered extra milk (yes there is tea and coffee making in the rooms very unusual for Italy) and the maid kept removing it!  She/he also kept moving my toiletries for the hotel's…

title: Super location
review: This hotel has been renovated and therefore the rooms are very nice. Great location as you can walk everywhere and the Duomo is only about a ten minute walk away. There are lots of good restaurants closely. Service was good and really nothing negative to say about our stay here. They also provide free wifi.

title: Great hotel and fantastic spa
review: We went there for the 2nd leg of our honeymoon and couldn't have been happier.  It was a little pricier than other hotels in the area, but totally worth it.  After the stress of the wedding and 3 days in Rome, we both had a great massage and used the spa facilities.  It was the perfect way to relax in one of Italy's most beautiful cities.  The staff was very friendly and helpful and the location was perfect.

title: Fantastic location, very nice clean hotel with great bathrooms
review: I would definitely like to return to this hotel.  My husband and I stayed for 1 night in September and were upgraded to a duplex junior suite, therefore we had 2 bathrooms, with beautiful marble, fantastic showers and Etro branded bathroom products.  The location of this hotel is brilliant, we were able to walk from the train station to the hotel and out to restaurants and shops that evening.  My only complaint is that the coffee at breakfast was undrinkable!  I can't remember the last time I got a nice cup of coffee in a hotel.  However that won't stop us booking it for our next visit to Florence, hopefully in 2011.

title: Perfect
review: My husband and I stayed at this wonderful hotel last summer (yes, I'm catching up on my reviews) whilst in Florence.  The location is perfect.  Tucked away in a quite cul-de-sac, but steps away from the activity.  The lobby is beautiful and the rooms are gorgeous.  Granted the hotel was almost brand new when we stayed there, but the furniture, bedding, carpets, bathroom was just in perfect condition. The room is very quiet and makes for a great night's sleep and quite big by Europen standards.  Breakfast was nice and the service fabulous.  There is no concierge per se, the staff at the reception desk help out; some of the women were a bit terse, but overall this was one of my favorite hotel experiences.  Also, definitely give Il Latino restaurant a try, get there early though,…

title: If you want to enjoy the beauty of Florence by day and find yourself in a dream place by night, look no more...
review: We just came back from Florence yesterday afternoon from our trip to Italy.  After spending 12 days traveling in Italy, we spent 3 nights at the Golden Tower Hotel, and it was a truly amazing experience for all of us. The location is perfect, really, can’t be better; it is without any doubt 5Star hotel where you are being treated with all luxury you can dream about, and, simply, our recommendation is: if the hotel rate is in your budget, reserve a room and... ENJOY!! We did a lot of sightseeing and traveling during our vacation, and Florence was our last stop. We came back feeling wonderfully rested, and surprisingly after all our busy time there our 13 year old daughter is ready to go back again! We want to say "thank you very much" to all staff at the hotel for this, and,…

title: Perfect & romantic. Wanted to stay for ever
review: We stayed here on the romance package for the 1st 3 nights of our honeymoon in August and it was truly perfect. The staff were very friendly and helpful - they recommended a great restaurant and must see areas. They were very attentive but not intrusive.    You can tell that the hotel is new  - the rooms & bathrooms are very clean & the turn down service with the poem  was a nice touch. Free minibar was also welcome  - water, soft drinks and beer suited us nicely.  If you are going to Florence you should consider this hotel, small, friendly, quite and really central.

title: Great location, friendly helpful staff, firmly recommended.
review: This newish five star is right in the centre of town.  It is small enough that the staff have the time and inclination to assist you - they were hugely helpful to me when sorting out some international courier services I needed to arrange.  The rooms and bathroom are well appointed and breakfast was good, though don't be afraid to ask the staff to replenish items in the small but crowded dining room.  It is worth paying a bit extra for the Deluxe Rooms giving access to the Spa - great to unwind after a day walking around town.  Not the cheapest, but worth it for a bit of luxury.

title: Our favorite hotel of the trip!
review: My husband and I stayed in 5 hotels during our 2 week trip to Italy and the Golden Tower was by far our favorite. It's located in an ideal spot from which to venture out and discover the beauty and charm that is Florence. We walked all over the place! The room itself was lovely, with the most awesome shower/tub we've ever experienced. The bed was very comfy and the furnishings modern and pretty. Everything was nice and clean. We had a deluxe room and with that we got freebies from the fridge (and snacks) as well as a good breakfast buffet each morning. The champagne and strawberries were a nice welcome. Loved it!

title: Beautiful Boutique Spa Hotel in central Florence.
review: My wife and I stayed in the Golden Tower Hotel in Florence for an all too brief 2 days during our honeymoon in Italy.  After we left we both agreed that we should have stayed longer.  It is convenient for the Uffizi Gallery, the Ponte Vecchio and many other sights of this beautiful city.  The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and can book tickets to many of florence's attractions for you.  Our room was small but very comfortable and the feature of being able to watch foreign television in its original language was a great plus as our Italian left a lot to be desired.  The breakfast buffet was also excellent.  The big plus of the Golden Tower, aside from it's location, is the spa in the lower ground floor.  This is a perfect place to relax and unwind after a day in the…

title: By Car
review: Nice hotel, great location, but difficult to find initially. As a previous reviewer had indicated the GPS was no help, we found that as well so if you're trying to find this hotel with a GPS you will probably be lead around in circles as we were. My best map was my iPhone and google maps which did manage to pin point the hotel and eventually we found it, however the hotel is located in a 'Piazza' and while this may be obvious to locals, it's a basically a squareish open area, which also means that it's a pedestrian area and cars are somewhat barred from entry, so getting in is through a side street the other 2 obvious entry ways are barred with small pillar barriers, (see map included in photos).  Comfortable and Clean, the rooms are bit on the small side, but space is always at…

title: Great location, but not much atmosphere
review: We wanted to be at the centre of things and not pay mad money but having walked round Florence for three days we feel pretty sure we might just have bagged a more atmospheric place to stay.  The hotel is fine - brand new, beautifully fitted out, great beds and linens. stunning spa,  nice staff, fine breakfast.  So what's my gripe?  Well, it hit 41 degrees while we were there.  We arrived hypoglycaemic. shattered, hot to a room that smelt of Germolene and and was stifling, having no air.  Fair enough, after I complained of they gave us a card that allowed us to leave the a/c on while we went out to eat and eventually the room was fine, ambience wise.  But I longed for a bit of sitting out space and a bit of atmosphere, which this place doesn't really have space for.  BUT- they…

title: Great spot
review: After eventually finding this place hot and bothered and not being able to check in before 2,30 , we eventually fell in love with Florence the hotel the food the people, one complaint was also with the air conditioning wich didnt seem to work but hopefully they fix that problem , This hotel would have to be in the best position in Florence and we highly reccomend it...

title: For the little extras that you want...
review: As I got married in Italy my Husband and I decided to stay on in Italy for the honeymoon. I booked this hotel by e-mail as I wanted the room that was on the website with the stone wall behind the bed. On arrival the staff were brilliant and had great English. When we arrived into the room it was just as I had expected and was really well done...my husband thought it was a little small but with the bathroom and wardrobes off the room via a corridor I thought it was prefect...they even left a bottle of bubbly and some nibbles and italian biscuits!!  We decided to order room service as we so tired from travelling, the food was amazing..we never got to eat in the hotel after that but the breakfast too was very good. Location wise it was prefect and close to everything..all the…

title: Great hotel with friendly staff
review: This hotel is in a great location, a short walk from Piazza del repubblica and ponte vecchio. The satff are very helpful and friendly and the interior of the hotel downstairs is beautifully decorated. The breakfast is superb and we treated ourselves to an energy massage for 40 mins which is inlcuded in one of the 2 day stay deals and was excellent. The only thing i would say is that you don't get the feeling of staying in a GRAND hotel since it fronts onto a small side street. For the same price range, you can stay at some of the larger hotels which front onto piazza's or the river. Otherwise, a lovely place to stay.

title: The importance of reviewing a hotel prior to booking...!
review: As a seasoned traveler, I was stunned to find that we were made prepay the rooms upon arrival at the hotel. In total we had 4 doubles and 1 triple room at this hotel. In 3 of the rooms the air conditioning did not work and in one room the shower was broke.  The staff were unapologetic, unhelpful and disinterested in our problems. It is understandable that in such beautiful cities as Florence that people are dawn there to see the place, not by the excellence of service in the local hotels. However, this does not justify the hotel’s total lack of disregard for the wellbeing of its clients. If you can book elsewhere in Florence, I would strongly recommend it.

title: Some like it hot
review: We arrived in Florence on a Friday afternoon in a rental car armed with a GPS device.  Even the GPS couldn't find the location of this hotel, but eventually we got the car close enough to walk to the hotel and grab someone from the front desk to come with us and navigate our car to the hotel .  The staff is friendly and nice.  The room was beautiful, quiet, and comfortable.  The only glitch that we had was there was no hot water during our stay.  It appears that they had a problem with their hot water system and needed at part to fix it.  The proper thing to do would have been to at least alert guests that there was a problem with the system.  They did no such thing.  When I asked about the water at the front desk they did tell me about the problem, and were very apologetic, but…

title: Very nice staff, beautiful room, great location.
review: Although Florence was much more "touristy" than we had anticipated, this hotel was a gem!!  Very welcoming and smiling staff were always available at the front desk.   They ALL spoke English very well.   The room was a basic double room, but it was very posh and yet very cozy at the same time.   We walked everywhere from our hotel, to see the "David", to the Duomo, over the bridges to great restaurants, to the train station, etc.  I would highly recommend this hotel.  One of the nicest we stayed in during our 2 weeks in Italy!!

title: Just as I hoped!
review: My husband and I just returned from our Italy trip and this was one of my favorite hotels we stayed in. We were there on the 7th and 8th of May. The staff spoke great english and were very helpful with everything we needed. the location was great and I loved that everything was new. We had the room they show on their website with the rock wall behind the bed, it was a good size room (keeping european standards in mind) and was very romantic. The bathroom was super nice and the shower head rocked! It's of course not the cheapest place  but if you want a new hotel with all the trimmings and a great location you won't regret the splurge. My only wish is that the Spa would have stayed open later so we could have had the chance to try out the hot tub!

title: Great location, great staff, nice hotel
review: We booked 3 nights in April and was very happy with everything. Location is perfect, 2 min from main square, but in very quiet street. All main attractions are close as well as shopping. Valet parking is also great thing. Rooms are nice, beds great. Staff very helpful. Very good choice for Florence..

title: Good Choice
review: The hotel is brand new and is perfectly located for seeing everything and also for shopping. It's a small palace, beautifully renovated and nicely decorated. We’ve stayed in a classic double and my daughter and niece in classic twin room. The rooms were very comfortable, quiet and clean, beds and bedding were excellent, although, I must say, the double room was too small for a five star hotel and the bathroom was worse than the other one, equipped with a shower only. So I recommend the twin room instead of a double. The Staff were outstanding, extremely friendly, helpful and enthusiastic. They were always available to solve any problem, to make reservations for Uffizi and Academia to avoid the queues, to the recommend us good restaurants or trattorias (which we prefer). We ate…

title: A gem of a hotel in the perfect location
review: We were in Italy on our honeymoon and staying at the Golden Tower was a highlight for us! The staff was especially warm, kind, and always helpful (EVERY one we spoke to treated us like a friend),  giving us directions and making dinner reservations for us. The complimentary SPA is fantastic! The jacuzzi, showers, saunas, and fluffy robes and slippers....all of it was very soothing and romantic. Other perks: The breakfast was delicious, and I appreciated having access to the hotel computer to check my email whenever I wanted. The desk clerk stowed our bags for an entire day after we checked out, so that we could enjoy an extra day of sight-seeing.  The room itself was SILENT, peaceful, and the marble bathroom with all the amenities was fantastic. We received complimentary…

title: What a great city and what a great hotel
review: I was suprised by the good service and kindness of the staff It really is a good hotel with everything you can wish for. I've been in many city's and many hotels this is one that stands out if you're talking about service. There so kind. It is in middle of the centre.

title: Whilst Florence is an absolutely wonderful city - this hotel certainly made our stay
review: We were welcomed by friendly staff and nothing was too much trouble, from arranging airport transfers to city directions and even suggestions were to dine.  What can we say, 3 nights in the magnifico suite was truly 'MAGNIFICO'.  Private use of the Spa was exceptional.    We would highly recommend this hotel and can't wait to return.

title: Wonderfully restful hotel in central Florence
review: We were greeted by name on arrival! Staff were friendly, helpful  and enthusiastic; the room was very comfortable and extremely quiet. Beds and bedding were excellent, breakfasts very good with lots of fresh fruit. The small spa was a very relaxing place to spend a half hour or so after a day's sight-seeing. Everything was just as decribed, no extras, no catches. We didn't eat in the restaurant as there are so many places withing 5 minutes of the hotel. The location is very quiet but central - a few minutes stroll (past de luxe shopping) from the river, the Uffizi gallery and the Duomo. One tiny niggle: a small shelf in the bathroom to put toilet bags on would have been useful.

title: almost heaven
review: loved the location,rooms geougeous...easy to come and go from...best breakfast of anywhere we stayed in italy...beds were out of this world...only one problem...the service truck comes to deliver supplies every morning at about 530 AM and we were awakened every morning at that time. When we asked reception about this they just looked at us as if we lost the plot so on the last morning I got up to observe what exactly this LOUD banging was and observed a service truck was the culprit. Im not sure if we could stay here again because of this...what a shame because this hotel was ljust redone sooooo tastefully! If u risk it  take earplugs! In all fairness to this hotel I plan to bring ear plugs on all my travels... one other thing... we were unable to control temp. of the room...…

title: Great new hotel
review: This hotel opened recently.  What a joy it was to stay in a hotel where everything was new, everything worked perfectly.  The beds were the most comfortable we have ever had in Italy, and that includes Westins Heavenly Bed.  The staff was young and enthusiastic, very willing to please.  Not that you go to Italy to watch TV, but they had the greatest TV setup of any hotel we have stayed at anywhere in the world.  It featured at least a hundred channels, including FOX News (we were able to watch the Massachusetts Senate results- Yeah Scott Brown!!!). We have stayed at many properties in Florence, but have now found a permanent spot.

title: Felt like royalty
review: This hotel is excellent.  From the moment that I arrived I was treated like visiting royalty.  I was concerned that the rooms would be small based on the web pictures, but my room was huge.  This spa was glorious and everyone who worked in the hotel was pleasant and friendly.  I can't wait to return!

title: A very friendly and  confortable hotel
review: We are from Greece Skopelos island and we were searching a hotel in San Gimignano, Italy. After we saw the Golden Tower in Firenze we changed our destination ;o)  We found the hotel through trip advisor and the reviews were magnificent. We sent some mail in order to see whether there is availability and how soon will they reply. They were replying immediately even late at night and the reception help us a lot in organizing the trip. We went to Rome and then by train to Firenze. The hotel is located in the historical center of the town (Centro Storico) and is 5 minutes from the train station. From the hotel you don’t need taxi or bus to go around the Town. Everything is near and of course the receptionists can arrange your everyday trip :O)  We arrived late at night and the…

title: Golden Towers is a fabulous new hotel with an outstanding location and staff.
review: We cannot say enough wonderful things about this new hotel.  The location is perfect for seeing everything and around the corner from the loveliest shopping street in Florence.   The room was new and so comfortable and the bathroom sparkled.  Enclosed shower so no leaks on to floor.   The manager and all the staff were outstanding and so friendly.  They arranged for tickets to Uffizi and Academia  in advance and for a driver to Tuscany for the day  stopping anywhere we wanted for a very fair price .  The staff  also helped us map out whatever we needed to find.  Florence is not that big so with a good map it is easy.    There are only 21 rooms, so make your reservations well in advance.

title: lovely stay for our honeymoon
review: We were pleased when they gave us a complimentary upgrade! Florence/Tuscany was definitely the highlight of our honeymoon vacation. Beautiful, new hotel, walking distance to the sites. Hotel staff very friendly, especially, Clara, who offered us helpful information. Very comfortable room, Lovely decor. Great breakfast too, especially the cappuccino.

title: Brand new hotel in a convenient location
review: This is a brand new hotel in a very convenient location--Piazza Stozzi. We were few minutes walk from anything we wanted to see, and minutes (by taxi) to the train station. It is very expensive (because of the location) but we got a discount rate online. In spite of being in the center of town, the hotel is very quiet.  After a crazy 48 hour airplane trip full of delays and cancellations, it was such a relief to enter our luxurious room and sink into our nice, soft bed. The room was quite nice, with crisp white linens, brand new marble and white bathroom, air conditioning, and a super high-tech sky light that opens, closes, and swivels. The ceiling was old, probably part of the original building, which made the room even more interesting. Our room looked to be one of the smaller…

title: Not at all 5 star!!!
review: Don't waste your money! I always subscribe to "you get what you pay for" but this hotel did not at all deliver according to their exorbitant rates. The front desk gave no service. We asked to use an iron - to which the response was we do not lend out irons as we have a Laundry service - fair enough, but then he goes on to say 'It is Sunday and Laundry service is not available". He then offered that a waitress will quickly iron our shirt and short at no cost. We were very pleased with this until when we checked out there was a 18 Euro Laundry service charge!!! Unbelievable! And the lady checking us out did not want to listen to our explanation of the situation - her response was "We do not do anything for free" The ironing was a pretty poor job but we didn't complain as we…

title: Great mix of old world and new world.
review: My husband and I just got back from our amazing stay at the Golden Tower.  I highly recommend this place.  The location is convenient, but serene.  It's totally new inside and nicely decorated without that faux hip vibe that many hotels go for nowadays.  The continental breakfast offered a great variety (i.e. mango/orange juice, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, yogurts, breads, etc.) and was delicious.  The room had nice exposed stone, arched doorways, and Renaissance art to add to the old world charm, but had a  modern bathroom, hard wood floors, and crisp white linens to give it a sharp modern feel.  The staff was very helpful and friendly.  It even included free internet which can be very useful on a trip.  I can't stop gushing about the Golden Tower!

title: Not quite perfect
review: First the positives - This hotel is brand new right in the center of things. The breakfast buffet is delicious and the staff are friendly. Now the negatives. Our DELUXE room was quite small. We had requested in our email a king bed but were given a queen size. The room was equipped with a shower only and my wife sure missed her bath. When questioned, the front desk claimed that we were in a deluxe room and that king size beds are not available in Italy. An absurd statement since our other hotels in Italy had king beds. We were granted a small discount but would have preferred a king bed as we had requested and been promised and be sure to request a bathtub if it is important for you.

title: Wonderful location.  Terrific staff!!
review: Perfect central location, just a stone's throw from cafes and restaurants around Piazza Republica, and very short walk from all major museums. Newly renovated as noted in other reviews, with extremely comfortable rooms and baths.  Excellent breakfast/service.  Staff did seamless job of booking tix for Uffizi and elsewhere, and making resos at various slightly off-the-beaten path restaurants (eg Natalino) which made for a delightful and relaxed stay.  Sara (front desk) had particularly good suggestions, and was always brimming with smiles and good cheer, but I thank all of the the Golden Towers staff for their geniality and help!!!  My only quibble is that the a/c was weak-ish, but the hotel was extremely accommodating in adjusting that (by 2nd night) to a very comfortable range.…

title: 5*Luxury & amenities at a bargain
review: At the behest of our AMEX travel agent, we booked this hotel with some hesitation as we have always stayed in established "older" properties in Italy. Hvg stayed at Villa D'Este the year before, their rate was too good to be true. We were very nicely surprised with The Golden Tower. It was recently opened 2 months prior. The buidling was totally gutted and restored. The interior was spotless, bright, cheerful, luxurious and beautiful. It was a luxury boutique hotel in every sense of the word.  ROOM / AMENITIES: Our first room, albeti small, was beautiful but the a/c was a little warm. So I called the front desk and Marco Piteo cheerfully showed me other options. In the end we got a huge, beautiful room (#401- featured on their website).  Our windows looked out to the cobbled…

title: Fantastic!!!!
review: This is a new hotel in the best part of Florence, near great shops and sites of interest, yet the hotel is absolutely quiet and beautiful.  The entire staff at the hotel made us feel welcomed and at home and gave us great suggestions for dining and tours.  Breakfast was delicious and hearty, and we were greeted each morning with a fabulous smile and a welcoming  "Buon Giorno".  The comfort  of our room was wonderful-- remarkably quiet, very good bed, great bathroom, luxurious towels, and true air-conditioning...which was important given we were there in July.  Also, they had free internet acess.  When in Florence again, we'll be at the Golden Tower Hotel!

title: Great hotel, good value - one of the best i've stayed in
review: I agree with most of the positive posts - great location, room decor hotel etc.   I originally booked a classic double. When I arrived the person who was in the room before me had been smoking and it still smelled bad. Initially, the hotel offered to have the cleaning staff air out the room and use air spray. I made it clear that was not an acceptable option. The hotel happily offerd to put me into another room. I think they gave me an upgrade (in terms of room size) because the room was much bigger. It was beautifully decorated, comfortable bed, great linens, bathroom etc. Really top notch.   I did not use the spa facilities.   For thos planning a their trip to florence, I highly recommend you reserve your museum tics ahead of time. There's a small service fee but it's worth it…

title: Luxury hotel - reasonable upscale prices - BEST location in Firenze!
review: There are so many things to say about Golden Tower and all are accolades.  Brand new place - couldn't find a review on Trip Advisor when we booked!  Setup is wonderful - five story antique building that has been renovated.  Just off the Piazza Strozzi -- parking is unavailable but the hotel can valet for 25 Eur a night (good deal for major European tourist city).  Finding the hotel is a bit of a trick as most streets in Florence are one way or blocked/dead-ends.  But if you can simply make it to the Piazza they'll walk out and find you.  Staff is the key - amazing staff.  Elisa, Marco, Frederica are all fabulous.  Must have been trained by the Ritz or Waldorf families.  Hotel itself is a luxury boutique hotel.  Grand sitting room, comfortable breakfast room, 5-6 rooms per floor,…

title: Can not be better...
review: Absolutely a bargain. Super Standard - fair price. Centraly located - good equiped - nice people.   We had room no. 204. Absolutly great. Clean, calm room. Bathroom marmor... Great breakfast. Worth to stay again.

title: New hotel - very good
review: This is a brand new hotel (opened late May) - it smells new! The location is excellent, right at the centre of Florence, one minute walk from Piazza de la Signoria, and a five minute walk from the train station and the Duomo. This does not mean that it is noisy: not at all, as the hotel is off Piazza Strozzi, on a narrow road and all very quiet. The room (regular) was on the small side, but not unpleasant. A number of very good features: the bed incredibly comfortable (albeit not massive), a big LCD screen, wonderful shower, marble in the lavatory, ETRO products, the staff very friendly indeed. and the breakfast good (fresh fruit, pastries, cereals - some cooked breakfast which did not seem terribly appetising). One downside: there was hardly any view, or rather the room…

title: The real luxury experience!
review: It was my first time in Florence and the Golden Tower made our stay as much more pleasant as ever!!!! The staff is friendly and very helpful, everything is new and well arranged. We spent much time in the Spa...very suggestive. Thank you, we will come back!
